Autoquest Page

The content of this page has been taken from the web archive of floxia's autoquest page:
http://web.archive.org/web/20060526110220/http://www.floxa.com/aqsearch.php

A Baby's First Picnic [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Afiniti, Sulin
Additions by: Vyolet
Level: 23, 24
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): E'nat'dae
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a crawling baby boy (30 minutes)
    In E'nat'dae. From recall, go 3E, S.
  2. to give a child's leather shoes to a crawling baby boy (1 hour)
    Shoes are located inside a musty chest in the warehouse in Esacha Fen. From entrance to the fen, go all N, W, all N, W, N, W, all N, E, N, E, 2N, W, 4N, 2E. Open chest, get shoes chest.
  3. to give a large white bib with a picture of a man on the platter to a crawling baby boy (1 hour)
    In Crystal Lake on a cranky crustacean. From @, go N, all W, 5N, 2E, D.

A Bar Tale and a Mug of Ale [Complete]

Contributed by: Zeaquis
Additions by: Antdos, Decrata
Level: 12, 15
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Underground Tunnels
Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Olaffson, the head bartender (30 minutes)
    In Ye Daemon's Forge, a pub in the the Warrior quarter of Med City. From Med recall, enter warrior, then E, E, E, E, S, S, W, W.
  2. to find Kayla, the head waitress (5 minutes)
    Also in Ye Daemon's Forge -- look in the nearby rooms.
  3. to find Schlossar (5 minutes)
    Also in Ye Daemon's Forge, usually in the "Noisy Corner" room.
  4. to kill a horrifying mudmonster (1 hour)
    In the Courrain River rooms in Med City. Go to the Med City entrance via the river that flows into the City from the north and follow the river. The mudmonster loads just inside.
  5. to find Schlossar (20 minutes)
    As above.

A Beastman's Secret Collection [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Falkore, Froto
Level: 29
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Xanthal
Total Time: 3 hours, 35 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a beastman guard (1 hour)
    In Xanthal. From @, go 2N, 5W, search, D, cast breathe water, all D, search, all E, kill Malanase for key. Then go all W, all U, 3E, open door N, 2N, U, N, W, N, unlock door N, open door (sneak), N.
  2. to find Captain Amos' boots ( )
    Located on the Pirate Ship. From @ entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, E, E.
  3. to find a room called A Marble Hallway (30 minutes)
    From @, go 2N, 5W, search, D, cast breathe water, all D, search, all E, kill Malanase for key. Then go all W, all U, 3E, open door N, 2N, U, N, W.
  4. to give Captain Amos' boots to a beastman guard ( )
    As above.

A Beaver Wants To Be A Rabbit [Complete]

Contributed by: Kethric
Additions by: Prodius, Jeffre
Level: 15
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Preserve, Med City
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a beaver (30 minutes)
    In the Preserve. From entrance, go 2W, N, E, N and look around.
  2. to find Mirisia, the seamstress (30 minutes)
    From Med recall, enter warrior, then go 3W, N. Note: you receive slippers and pajamas.
  3. to give a pair of pink bunny slippers and pink bunny rabbit pajamas to a beaver (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Black Crow's Contempt [Complete]

Contributed by: Takphius
Additions by: Phu
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Vark Outpost,
Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a black crow (1 hour)
    In Vark Outpost. Note: you are moved to another room.
  2. to find a room called Before a Rune Carved Door (30 minutes)
    From where you are moved: pull lever, go all N, 2E.
  3. to find a vark arch-magi (20 minutes)
    Go N.
  4. to kill 5 of a frightened young raven and 3 of a terrified young raven and 6 of a small lynx kitten (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Castiack:
    ravens: from entrance, go all N, U. Also, from temple in zone, go U.
    small lynx kittens: from the room A Dead End, go N (hidden exit.)

A Book of Spells for a Bored Enchantress [Complete]

Contributed by: Thaspian
Level:
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Med City, Crime Underground
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a bored enchantress (30 minutes)
    From Med City recall, enter mage and go E.
  2. to find a book of spells (45 minutes)
    Loads on Spider in the Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N until you are in "An Antechamber," then N again. Spider loads here (hidden.) Note: this is find-original. This is SOLO and FIND-ORIGINAL.
  3. to give a book of spells to the bored enchantress (15 minutes)

A Bottle of Wine for the Duke [Needs Detail]

Additions by: A Russian Player, Aqueya, Turnbul
Level:
Difficulty:
Locale(s):
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to get a bottle of Eorthes Blysse Albia (3 hours)
    In Verthandi.
  2. to give a bottle of Eorthes Blysse Albia to the Duke of Trellor ( )
    As above.

A Brass Telescope for the Astronomer [Complete]

Contributed by: Kirgan
Level: 24
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Braneri, G'dangus
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find an astronomer (30 minutes)
    In Braneri. From entrance, go N, W, N, all W, U.
  2. to find a brass telescope (1 hour)
    In G'Dangus, on one of the Lighthouse Keepers (there are 3-4.) From entrance, go all N till fountain, then all E, all U in the lighthouse.
  3. to give a brass telescope to an astronomer (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Broom for Osiquine [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Aljan
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Gloumewood Farm, Med City, Brookhaven
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find a room called Before a Decrepit House ()
    In Gloumewood Farm. From @, kill farmhand, loot key, unlock gate,open gate. Then go 4E, 2N, 3E. Enter ring, then pray. You will enter a random spot in NPK; look around for this room.
  2. to find a broom ()
    Loads on the janitors in Med City.
  3. to find a room called Before a Decrepit House ()
    As above.
  4. to give broom to Osiquine ()
    Osiquine loads in Gloumewood NPK. She's aggro, so move fast.
  5. to find Ariid the Magician ()
    In Brookhaven. From @, go 3N, E to the Thirsty Hog. Ariid is here. Note: you receive a staff.
  6. to find a room called Before a Decrepit House ()
    As above.
  7. to give a staff to Osiquine ()
    As above.

A Cameo for Granny / A Cameo for Grandma [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Arterix and Zalathorm
Additions by: Aofaxx, Kernighan
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Lyngaeli's Nightmare
Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the young girl (30 minutes)
    In Trellor on Merchant's Circle (hidden.)
  2. to find a cameo on a delicate golden chain (1 hour)
    Loads in Lyngaeli's Nightmare. From @, go all N, sleep; go all N, enter box. Look for werewolves, who load the cameo.
  3. to give a cameo on a delicate golden chain to the young girl (1 hour, 15 minutes)
    As above.

A Chair for a Tired Guard [Complete]

Contributed by: Norgath
Additions by: Lanthor
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s):
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find a gnomish guard (1 hour)
    In Sonedal. Find Dulen, buy vial, hold vial. Go S to laboratory; pour red, pour blue, pour blue, remove vial, quaff vial. (You're now little.) Then go W, D, all W, S, E, N, D, E, S.
  2. to find a small wooden chair (no limit)
    In Wytherwind, in “The Skeleton of an Ancient Atrium.” From entrance, go 3W, N, 2W, all S, U, 2N, W, N.
  3. to find a gnomish guard (1 hour)
    As above.
  4. to give a small wooden chair to a gnomish guard (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Chisel For A Blind Gravedigger [Complete]

Contributed by: Sutanal
Level: 24
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Fen, Thunderhoume
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the Blind Gravedigger (1 hour)
    In the Fen. From entrance to the fen, go all N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E, N (hidden), E, N, 2E, S, E, S, E, S, 2E, 3N, open gate, N into a bleak and murky cemetery.
  2. to give a stonecutter's chisel to a blind gravedigger (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Thunderhoume on stonecutter. From @, go N, 3D, N, 3D, search, D, E, N, 3E, 2D, 2N, 6W, 2N, E.

A Cigar For Prytel [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Siraphali
Level: 29
Difficulty: no idea!
Locale(s): Brookhaven, Temple Of Kukdheuda
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. In Brookhaven. From @, go 4N, W to the Thirsty Hog.
  2. to give an unlit cigar to Prytel, the bartender (no limit)
    In Temple of Kukdheuda CPK.

A Coat Made of Golden Deer's Fur[Complete]

Level: 24, 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Dragmire, Akenuas Glade
Total Time: 5 hours
Objectives: 3 hours, 15 minutes
  1. to find Yarla, the orcish tailor (1 hour)
    In the Tailor Shop in Dragmire. From just inside the start of the zone ("At the Checkpoint"), go all W to Barracks Road intersection, then S, W.
  2. to find 6 of fur of a golden deer (1 hours, 30 minutes)
    These load in Akenuas Glade. From zone entrance, go E, N, 2E, 3 N, W, N, 2W, N, 4W (including hidden exit), S, 2W, S, 5E (hidden), S (hidden), S, E and look around.
  3. to kill 2 of a druidic guard (15 minutes)
    These will pop in the room with you as soon as you get the last deer fur.
  4. to give 6 of fur of a golden deer to Yarla, the orcish tailor (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Coolibah Branch for the Elemental Guardian of Fire [Complete]

Contributed by: Morluis
Level: 10-15
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Medievia City, Forbidden Forest
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find an elemental guardian of Fire (30 minutes)
    In Med Castle. From recall, go all U, 9N, 2W, 2N. Fire elemental loads around here.
  2. to find the branch of a coolibah tree (2 hours)
    Buy from Alexious Lightfoot in the Forbidden Forest. From Med recall, enter mage, go 4W, 2S, W, open gate, W, 9N, all E, all S, and E into Alexious Lightfoot's hut.
  3. to give the branch of a coolibah tree to an elemental guardian of Fire (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Crown for Pherrance[Incomplete]

Level: 26
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Med City
Total Time: 3 days, 1 hour
Objectives:
  1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
    See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to find the Crown of Proximation (1 day)
    Created within Dark Escarpment (link not available).

A Dagger for the Trainee [Complete]

Contributed by: Kirgan
Level: 21
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Trellor, Dray'mar
Total Time: 1 hour, 55 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the assassin trainee (25 minutes)
    In Trellor, all E to Eastern Gate of Trellor, then all S on Kilran Way.
  2. to find a Ramentor's shadowy dagger (1 hour)
    Daggers load on Ramentors in Dray'mar. From zone entrance, go 2W, S, D. Ramentors are hidden here (they backstab!)
  3. to give a Ramentor's shadowy dagger to the assassin trainee (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Dagger for Tiatanus the Graceful [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Zuppio
Level: 15
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Labyrinth, Med City
Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Tiatanus the Graceful (1 hour)
    In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, 4E, 2S, 2W, N.
  2. to find a ruby-hilted dagger (1 hour, 25 minutes)
    In the Labyrinth Weapon Shoppe.
  3. to give a ruby-hilted dagger to Tiatanus the Graceful (20 minutes)
    As above.

A Daren-Made Bow for Sintarus [Complete]

Contributed by: Phu
Additions by: Sulin
Level: 20
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Quinstone's Keep
Total Time: 1 hour, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Soqilyte the Holy (30 minutes)
    In Quinstone. From @ go N, 2E, 2U, all E, all N, E, U, E, S, E.
  2. to give a genuine replica Daren bow to Soqilyte the Holy (40 minutes)
    In Sevoseth. From @, go N, 2W, 5N, 2E, S, U and buy it.

A Dragon's Eye For Marious [Complete]

Contributed by: Dima
Level: 26
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Medievia City, Goland's Tower
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
    See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to find a dragon's eyeball, encased in a glass sphere (2 hours)
    Loads on Varanexus in Goland's Tower. From @, go N, 3W, all N, 3E, c breathe water, D, kill for key, U, 2E, 2S, search, unlock trapdoor (or if you can pick, don't bother getting the key, come straight here), D, all W, S, W, N. Kill Calsinc (he wanders N/S) for key. Go all S, N, all W, unlock door N, open door N. Varanexus loads here.
  3. to give a dragon's eyeball, encased in a glass sphere to the wizard (1 hour)
    As above. Note: this is SOLO NO-DRAGON NO-MAGIC NO-COMM FIND-ORIGINAL NO-SUMMON NO-PHASE NO-TO-PHASE. Walk S to CT 29; enter portal to Med.

A Dress for Twexli [Complete]

Contributed by: Dima
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Tharhalas, Arcadia
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Twexli (1 hour)
    In Tharhalas. From @, go all W, N, all W, U, all N, E, U, all N, all E, U, S, E, all S, E, all S, all W, U, all W, all N, all E, all S, 2U, N, cast levitation, D, and look around.
  2. to give the dress of a thousand snowflakes to Twexli (2 hours)
    In Arcadia. From entrance, go all U, all S, W, all S, E, all S, and enter whirlpool. If the room you end up in is not "A Set of Ice Monuments at the Heart of Lyel's Arcadia", recall and repeat the above. Then go E, S, D, S, W, kill. Return to "A Set of Ice Monuments...", go E, N, D, N, E, kill. Return to "A Set of Ice Monuments...", W, unlock entrance, open entrance, N, kill Lyel, get dress.

A Drink for the Queen [Complete]

Level: 10
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Preserve, Med City
Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the Fairy Queen (30 minutes)
    In the Preserve. From zone entrance (@), go: W, W, W, N, E, N, W, W, W, S, W, S, E, search, S, D, all E (you will have to ethereal through a door.) Kill the Consort for his key. Unlock the door to the E then go E. The Fairy Queen loads here.
  2. to find a thimble of Fairy Brew (1 hour, 30 minutes with extension)
    In Familiar Haunts Tavern. From Med recall, enter mage. Go all W, search, D. Buy brew here.
  3. to give a thimble of Fairy Brew to the Fairy Queen (25 minutes)
    As above.

A Dying Adventurer's Wish [Complete]

Additions by: Ryntrax, Vanscha
Level: 26
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Labyrinth
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a lost adventurer (30 minutes)
    From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level.
  2. [hidden objective] to give a last will and testament to a lost adventurer (3 hours, 30 minutes)
    Will loads in Van Kyln's Estate; c locate will to make sure they've loaded. From @, go 2N, 2E, 2D, pick chest, open chest, get all chest for key to unlock gate, 2U, all W, N to closed W door, then unlock gate, open gate, 3W, 3N, E. This puts you above a grave. Now go into each down exit you find, looking at corpses, for the wills, which load randomly on corpses.

A Fancy Pouch for the Spider [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Kolohe
Level: 24
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Crime, Ryvaera
Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the Spider (30 minutes)
    In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then 3N.
  2. to find an embroidered satin pouch (1 hour)
    Located in Ryvaera in Sylaia's Workshop
  3. to find the Spider ( )
  4. to give an embroidered satin pouch to the Spider ( )

A Favor for Aitrilla [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Untin
Level: 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Gloumwood Farm,
Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Aitrilla, wife of Magdono (50 minutes)
    In Gloumewood Farm.

A Favor for Malanase [Incomplete]

Level: 28
Difficulty: hard (no-death!)
Locale(s): Xanthal
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Malanase (30 minutes)
    In Xanthal. From zone entrance, go N, 5W, search, 2D (be sure you're breathing water), search, E, E. Malanase loads here. He gives you a crude key to Xanthal's room.
  2. to kill Xanthal, Kynase, Kalafungen, Thysa, and Mercapto (1 hour)
    All located in Xanthal. This is no-death. From Malanase, go 2W, 2U, 3E, 3N, and kill the servant for the tower master key. From here ("A White Marble Staircase"), the other mages can be found as follows:
    Xanthal: U, N, 2W, N, unlock door N, open door N, N.
    Kynase: 2E, U, 2E, unlock door E, open door E, E.
    Kalafungen: 2 S, U, N, unlock door E, open door E, E.
    Thysa: 2N, U, 2N, unlock door E, open door E, E.
    Mercapto: 2W, U, N, W, unlock door S, open door S, S, unlock door S, open door S, S.

A Favor for the Centaurs [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Dethros
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s):
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the centaur leader (30 minutes)
    In Mystical Forest.
  2. to kill 8 of a jungle giant ( )
    In Mystical Forest.

A Few Easy Kills [Complete]

Contributed by: Aideen
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): City of Medievia, Xanthal, Shadowclaw, Pirate Ship
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a traveler (30 minutes)
    In Med City, often on Market Street.
  2. to kill 5 of a tired soldier and 5 of the sleepy pirate and 5 of a beast (3 hours)
    Tired soldier: In Shadowclaw. Go W from Undergate and up the staircase. Go to the various halls and look around.Sleepy pirate: In Pirate Ship, below decks in the Sleeping Quarters.Beast: In Xanthal, in the shelter. From zone entrance (A Sandy Path), N, all W, N, E, E, N, W.

A Firedrake's Revenge [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Embere
Additions by: Ashwin
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Medievia, Fire Giant's Keep CPK
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a belligerent firedrake (1 hour)
    In Med City. From recall, enter mage, 4N, 5E.
  2. to kill 8 of a firenewt
    In Fire Giants' Keep CPK. From @ go U, all S, E, all S, E (yes for CPK) and look around. You may have to wait for repop to get all 8.

A Fishing Pole for Baskille [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Ardon, Slig, Arrumar
Level: 22
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): The Fury, Trellor
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Baskille, the retired sailor (30 minutes)
    From Trellor recall, go all N, W.
  2. to give a long fishing pole to Baskille, the retired sailor (1 hour)
    In the Fury. on the main deck. Go to the southernmost part of it (The Main Deck of the Fury - Before the Bridge) then go all S, W, D, E, all N, D, all S (through door). To the W and E are fishing pirates; the pole loads on them.

A Gardener's Woes [Complete]

Level: 21, 22, 23, 24
Difficulty: medium
Locale(s): Graveyard, Warrens
Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
    In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
  2. to kill 10 of a mudvole (30 minutes)
    In Warrens of the Moshata. From entrance (D), go all north, then down (entering NPK!) then wander around to find 10 mudvoles. They are usually hidden, so need sense life to pick them up. They're non-aggro and somewhat easier than some of the other mobs on that level (e.g. mudmen and talpidaes).

A Gift for a Daughter [Complete]

Level: 22, 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Lattyrna, Shadmire
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find a gate guard (30 minutes)
    From entrance to City of Lattyrna ("A Deep Ocean Pool"), go: D, D, D, E, E, N, N.
  2. to find the golden scales of Samrah (50 minutes)
    In Shadmire. From entrance to zone ("Beneath a Canopy of Interwoven Tree Branches," go W, N, N, W, W, N, N, W, N, N, N, N, N, D, E, E, E, E, E, E, E, S, D, W, N, N, N, N. You'll have to kill Samrah to get her scales.
  3. to give the golden scales of Samrah to a gate guard (10 minutes)

A Gift of Life [Incomplete]

Level: 27, 28
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Cloud Giants, Berkovic
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Mahgnus the Jeweler (1 hour)
    In Cloud Giants. From entrance (@), go N, 2U, 4E, S, search, D, S.
  2. to find the Gem of Souls (no limit)
  3. to give the Gem of Souls to Sardhara, the jeweler (35 minutes)

A Gift? [Complete]

Level: 26, 27
Difficulty: moderate to hard
Locale(s): Lyryanoth
Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Nyenra Anyaranal, king of the Lizardfolk (1 hour)
    In Lyryanoth. First, find any lizardfolk commoner that loads "a pair of Lizardfolk claws." Kill him and get the claws. Next, from Lyryanoth recall, go all E. Kill the 2 lizardfolk warriors blocking the way. Go all E, wear the claws on your hands to climb, then all U. Go E, N, W, open door, N. The king gives you a tiger orchid.
  2. to give a tiger orchid to Melnshara Daenar (45 minutes)
    In the other castle in Lyryanoth. From recall, go all W. Kill the four angry protestors. Go W, S, 3W, U. Go E, S, U. Go W, give flower queen.

A Great Minotaur Injustice [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Labyrinth, NaeraMae
Total Time: 4 hours, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the Minotaur (1 hour)
    In Labyrinth. From zone entrance, go all E, all S and look around.
  2. to kill Hadren and Osrava and Herind and Branae and Threzdi and Hrendar and Jernian and Kraden (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In NaeraMae. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S and then pick/kill guard for key to rooms E and W from here, and from the rooms to the S.
  3. to find NaeraMae's great axe (1 hour)
    From zone entrance, go 2U, 2S, all E to gate. Get key or pick gate to continue E. Go all E, search, then E and open door E (key is on guardian or again, it is pickable.) Go 2E, S and kill NaeraMae for axe. This is find-original.

A Green Apple for a Depressed Unicorn [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Bhalodus
Level: 21
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s):
Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to to find a mourning unicorn (45 minutes)
    In Yldari. From zone entrance ("A Pair of White Marble Gates"), go 2N, W.
  2. to find a juicy green apple (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Forbidden Forest.

A Guised Cloak for a Spy [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Raenyn
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Underground Shafts, The Swamp And Forest Of Thanos
Total Time: 6 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a spy (1 hour)
    In Underground Shafts. From @, go D, N, all E, all N,all E, 3S.
  2. to find a guised cloak (5 hours)
    In Thanos on the Lich of Thanos.
  3. to give a guised cloak to a spy (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Halo for the High Priestess [Complete]

Contributed by: Cipactli
Level: 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Ruins of Czareran
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the high priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
    See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to find a floating halo of glowing stones (1 hour 30 minutes)
    On Morthanes in Czareran. From @, go all S (opening gates along the way) until west, then go W, U, all N. Note: mob is permanently fireshielded.
  3. to give a floating halo of glowing stones to the high priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Hammer for Chayton [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Kernighan
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderately hard
Locale(s): Med City, Aeketh
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Chayton, the weaponsmith ( )
    In Clerics Quarter in Med City. From Med Recall, enter cleric, then E, E, E, E, N, E.
  2. to find the warhammer of immortality ( )
    Found in Village of Aeketh on the Chief's servant. In Aeketh, go all W, E, then N through wilderness. Then go all W, 2N, 3W, all N, all W, N, E, search, pick hatch, open hatch, D. Note: this is find-original.
  3. to give the warhammer of immortality to Chayton, the weaponsmith ( )
    As above.

A Housewife Needs Cleaning Help [Complete]

Contributed by: Vashka
Level: 27
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Med City, Sceptrum, Fury, Sevoseth, Enara
Total Time: 5 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a sweet housewife (1 hour)
    In The Hidden City of E'nat'dae. From zone entrance, go N, W, 9N, 4E, 3N, 2W, open door N, N.
  2. to find a grandmotherly housekeeper (30 minutes)
    From above, go S, 2E, 3S, 4W, 8N, all E and look around.
  3. to find a prim maidservant (15 minutes)
    In Medievia City. From recall, enter mage. Go 4N, all W.
  4. to find a wary janitor (15 minutes)
    From recall in Med City, enter thief and look around. Note: You will receive a broom.
  5. to give a broom to a prim maidservant (10 minutes)
    As above.
  6. to give a wire scrub brush, a bucket of water, a pair of kneepads, and a wet, soapy dishrag to a prim maidservant (3 hours)
    a wire scrub brush: in Sceptrum on a village boy. From entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, go all D, all N to "An Intersection Bathed in Crimson," then W and look around.
    a bucket of water: in the Fury. "A young girl disguised as a deckhand" and "a young deckhand" sometimes load with this object, on the Main Deck level.
    a pair of kneepads: In Sevoseth on a maid in the tavern. From entrance to tavern go all N, W.
    a wet, soapy dishrag: in Enara. From entrance, go N, all W, N, W, all N to the Scullery. Two scullery maids carry dishrags in their inventory ("trash.")
  7. to find a sweet housewife (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Hungry Beggar [Complete]

Level: 22, 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Horneg's Keep
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find a filthy beggar (20 minutes)
    In Med City, in the Thieves Quarter. From Med recall, enter thief, then move around the area.
  2. to give half a loaf of bread to a filthy beggar (30 minutes)
    Cast create food (or have someone else do it for you) until half a loaf of bread is created.
  3. to give 2 of the bracelet of life to a filthy beggar (no limit)
    Loads on Horneg in Horneg's Keep. From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here.

A Hungry Soldier [Complete]

Contributed by: Kenser
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Quinstone, Sceptrum
Total Time: 4 hours, 5 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a hungry soldier (40 minutes)
    In Quinstone's Keep. From @, go N, 2E, 2U, 2E, 2N, 2E.
  2. to find Dipwaun, the cook (20 minutes)
    From the soldiers, go all W, S, E, S.
  3. to find a jar of paprika (2 hours)
    In Sceptrum Ishachi. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N till down intersection, then D, all N, all E, S, all E. The jar loads on Michel.
  4. to give a jar of paprika to Dipwaun, the cook (45 minutes)
    As above. He gives you some soup.
  5. to give a bowl of soup made from crushed swamp plants to a hungry soldier (20 minutes)
    As above.

A Jealous Scruff [Complete]

Contributed by: Pawana
Level: 24
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Medievia, Crime Underground
Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Scruff (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, go 3S.
  2. to kill 2 of a black hound of Vonliege (40 minutes)
    In the gauntlet in Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go 2D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D.go all E, N, D, 2N, E, S. Kill novice for key. Go N, W, all S, U, all W, unlock N, N to enter "The Gauntlet." Kill the mob in each room, loot the key, and unlock/open the door to the N to get to the next room. Repeat until you have killed 2 hounds.
  3. to find Scruff (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Magical Armor For Calime [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Zeela
Level: 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Shadowclaw, Asnor
Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Calime, mage of the fortress (30 minutes)

  2. to find a suit of ringmail (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Asnor. Follow path all U and N to troll guard for gate key; go N through gate and look around for paladin guard who loads it.
  3. to find Calime, mage of the fortress (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a suit of ringmail to Calime (5 minutes)
    As above.

A Magical Fishing Pole for Jelit Maranid [Complete]

Contributed by: Takphius and Elagneros
Level: 23
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Gnomenel, Garden of Reminiscence
Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Jalit Maranid (30 minutes)
    In Gnomenel. From entrance, go E, 2S, E.
  2. to give a glass fishing pole infused with a green mist to Jelit Maranid (1 hour, 20 minutes)
    Buy in Garden of Reminiscence from a seller of exotic wares. From entrance, go N, U, all N, W and buy pole at small rainbow stand for 15000 gold.

    In G'dangus. From @, go all N, then S, all E, and look for a female villager. Note: this is find-original.

A New Collar for Lep [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Aideen
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Condemned Arena, The Fury
Total Time: 3 hours, 35 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Lep, the mutt ()
    In the Fury. It wanders but normally loads near the bridge, on southern part of main deck.
  2. to find a collar of thorns ()
    In Condemned Aren on rabid wolves. They're near the beginning part of zone. Note: The collar is cursed. Be sure you have remove curse cast on it.
  3. to find Lep, the mutt ()
    As above.
  4. to give a collar of thorns to Lep, the mutt ()
    As above.

Additions by: Xarlthus, Akshay, Sulin

Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes

  2. to find Jhulud, the Master Musician (45 minutes)
    In El Cantara. From the @, follow the path to "The Gates of El Cantara." From there, go N, W, N.

A New Ladle for Aitrilla [Complete]

Contributed by: Tasia
Additions by: Pawana, Anadolyn, Renli, Neru
Level: 22, 24
Difficulty:
Locales:
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Aitrilla, wife of Magdona (30 minutes)
    In Gloumewood Farm. From entrance, kill the farmer, loot key, unlock gate, open gate. Then go 4E, S to "At a Clothesline, Near the Creek". Search pants for key (may not see them there) and get key from the pants. Then go to 2N, 3E, unlock door, and look around to find Aitrilla.
  2. to give a heavy steel ladle to Aitrilla, the wife of Magdono (2 hours)
    In Enara on the cook. From @, go 4N, all W, S, 3E, N, E, all N to the kitchen.

A New Lyre for Busking Imp [Complete]

Contributed by: Circo
Additions by: Mospolo
Level: 27, 28
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s):
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a busking imp (30 minutes)
    In City of Medievia, in Mages' Quarter, on the Avenue of Occasional Remembrance.
  2. to find an ebony lyre (1 hour)
    In the City of Trellor. From recall, go U and look for the priest who loads this. (Get help to kill him.)
  3. to give an ebony lyre to a busking imp (30 minutes)
    As above.

A New Self [Complete]

Contributed by: Arden
Level:
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Gypsy Camp, Great Tree
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find your shadow (40 minutes)
    In the Great Tree. From south entrance, go 2N, 2U, W, U. This mob will usually be dead when you get there, but the zone has a lifespan of only 11 minutes, so just wait around.
  2. to give an image of yourself to your shadow (1 hour)
    Loads in Gypsy Camp. From the entrance to the zone ("Base of the Slope"), go E, all S, W, S, W, buy a ticket, S, W, W, N, N, N, give ticket gypsy, W, W, all N. If you kill a magic mirror in "The Fun House," it will leave an "image of yourself" on the ground.

A New Shovel for Henry [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Xianra
Level:
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med, Gloumewood
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener ()
    In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
  2. to find a long handled shovel ()
    Loads on Homfer in Gloumewood.

A New Skeleton [Incomplete]

Level: 26, 29
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Mynoric, Thanos
Total Time: 5 hours
  1. to find a charred skeleton (1 hour)
    In Mynoric Garrison. From zone entrance, go 4N, all E, S, W, open door S, S, kill Gekrenvelle for a tarnished silver key on a chain. Go back to intersection, go all W, unlock door N, N.
  2. to find (object) a human skeleton (3 hours)
    In Thanos, on a gelatinous cube.

A New Tail for an Enchanted Mouse [Complete]

Contributed by: Bhalodus, Rhykiah
Level: 24
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Celestia, Sonedal Ravine
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find an enchanted mouse (1 hour)
    At Palace Celestia. From entrance, go 2E, 16N, 3E, hidden S.
  2. to give a mouse's tail to an enchanted mouse (2 hours)
    Loads on a white mouse in Sonedal Ravine. From @,go D, E, D, E, D, E, D, S, E, S, S to the laboratory. From here, go 2N and look for Dulen the Wandering Peddler. Buy vial from Dulen and return to the laboratory. Here, hold vial, type "pour red", "pour blue", "pour blue" to make the vial of lavender potion. Remove potion, quaff potion. Then go down and look around for a white mouse.

A New Tool for Sardhara [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Raenyn
Level: 23-24
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Medievia, Brookhaven
Total Time: 5 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a room called The Main Courtyard of Medievia (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, go E.
  2. to find auonium ore (2 hours)
    Ore is found in Brookhaven. From zone entrance (@) go 2N, 3W and buy pickaxe. Look around on the streets of town for a mob labeled "A smiling man is here, looking for misplaced litter" who carries "a long bar made of iron." Kill him and loot the bar. Next, go to recall (the fountain at the center of town) and unlock grate, then go D, W, 5N, 3W. (There are tough aggro mobs through here -- sneak if you can!) Then hold pickaxe and use pickaxe repeatedly; soon a piece of ore will 'fall' to the floor.
  3. to find Sardhara, the jeweler (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, go N, 2W.
  4. to find a stonecutter's chisel (2 hours)
    In Thunderhoume on stonecutter. From @, go N, 3D, N, 3D, search, D, E, N, 3E, 2D, 2N, 6W, 2N, E.
  5. to give auonium ore and a stonecutter's chisel to Sardhara (30 minutes)
    As above.

A New Towel for the Queen [Complete]

Additions by: Pleen
Level: 26
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Cloud Giants, Dragmire
Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find one of the Queen's bathing boys (1 hour)
    In Cloud Giants. From "Floating Atop an Island of Clouds," go 3E, S, open door, U, E S, W, S.
  2. to find a fluffy towel (1 hour)
    Buy from Yarla in Dragmire. From entrance to zone, go W, U, N, D, 8W, S, W.
  3. to find one of the Queen's bathing boys (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a fluffy towel to one of the Queen's bathing boys (5 minutes)
    Note: you must give the towel to a specific boy (try give towel 2.boy, give towel 3.boy, etc.)

A New Toy for Scruff [Complete]

Contributed by: Sypha
Additions by: Bhalodus
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Gloumewood
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Scruff (30 minutes)
    In Med City, S of recall.
  2. to find Bame, the farm dog (1 hour)
    In Gloumewood Farm. From entrance to zone, kill farmhand and loot key, unlock gate, open gate. Go 5E and look around for this mob (who wanders).
  3. to find a steak dinner (2 hours)
    In Med City in the Pipe Bowl. From recall, go all S to the Center of the Fish Market, then 3E, N.
  4. to give a steak dinner to Bame, the farm dog (1 hour)
    As above. Note: you receive a chew toy.
  5. to give a chew toy to Scruff (30 minutes)
    As above.

A New Whip for Dayonas

Contributed by: Velsara
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellorian Penitentiary, Rydhordel Woods
Total Time:
Objectives:

    In Trellorian Penitentiary. From entrance, goW, 2N, E, kill guard for key (may need to go E, 2U to find a guard with the key), unlock, open, 4N, E, N, W, 2N, W, 5N, 2E, kill tall strong man for the key, unlock, open, 2E, N to Dayonas office.
  2. to find a whip of frozen anguish ( )
    In Rydhordel Woods, loads on Drenaliok, follow walkthrough (link not available) to get to "dead end," search, D

A Peeping Tom [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Zeaquis
Level: 12, 15
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Crystal Lake
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Kayla, the head waitress (25 minutes)
    In Med City's Ye Daemon's Forge pub. From Med recall, enter warrior, then E, E, E, E, S, S, W, N and look around.
  2. to give a fly fishing rod to a girl in a bathing suit ( )
    Loads in Crystal Lake in the picnic area in the NW part of the zone. She appears as "A pretty young girl is here."
  3. to find a peeping tom ( )
    Just south of the girl.

A Pelt of Lynx Fur [Needs Detail]

Completed by: Krilith

Objectives:

A Pet for a Lonely Man [Complete]

Contributed by: Kirgan
Additions by: Antdos
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Horneg's, Spiderwode
Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a practical magician (30 minutes)
    In Med City Mages' Quarter.
  2. to find a clear stone or a pale blue stone or a deep red stone or a dull gray stone (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Horneg’s Keep, on the gargoyles. From southern @ to Spirited Heights, go W, N, W, N, W, 2N, W, all N, U, S, U, W, U, S, U, E, U, S, follow the path around till there is a gate. The gargoyles are around here; you may have to kill the golems guarding the gate to get to more gargoyles on the other side.
  3. to give a clear stone or a pale blue stone or a deep red stone or a dull gray stone to a practical magician (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a beginner's guide to summoning elementals to a practical magician (2 hours)
    In Spiderwode, on an apprentice, in the Chandali camp, in a room called "Inside a Black Wagon" in the north part of the camp. From the entrance: Go all N until "A clearing in the wood," then all W, N, 2W, N, 4W, N. Kill the apprentice found here or steal it for minimal effort.

A Pirate Dog's Revenge [Complete]

Contributed by: Zynix
Level: 23, 24, 28, 29, 30
Difficulty: easy-hard
Locale(s): Fury, Med City
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Lep, the mutt (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Fury. He's usually on the first lower deck (where Ramarke would be) or on the top deck near the up/down ladder. Exact directions vary, but he usually loads at the back of the ship.
  2. to kill Scruff (45 minutes)
    In Med City, just south of recall.
  3. to give Scruff's spiked collar to Lep (45 minutes)
    Loot Scruff's corpse and return as above. This is a find-original objective.

A Poor Guardsman's Goblin Troubles [Complete]

Additions by: Kirgan
Level: 18, 21
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City
Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a Medievia Guardsman (30 minutes)
    In Med City.
  2. to kill 3 of a mountain goblin and 3 of a goblin and the Goblin King (1 hour)
    From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. From here, go all W, all N, E, all S (through doors), U to Goblin King. Look around for other goblins.
  3. to find a Medievia Guardsman (15 minutes)
    As above.

Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Enara, El Cantara
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes

  2. to find a porcelain doll (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In El Cantara. From zone entrance, go U, 2N, E, 10N, E, N and buy from Olibinda.

  2. to find a leather-bound prayer book (1 hour)
    In Wytherwind, on Gurth. From entrance, go 3W, N, 2W, all S, U, all N, 2W, N.

    As above.
  4. to give a leather-bound prayer book to Lanselius (4 minutes)

A Present for Edenna [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Phu
Additions by: Thralin, Takphius
Level: 19
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s):
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Trero Owadd (30 minutes)
    In Gnomenel. From entrance, go 11E, 2S into Number Seven Main Street. Note: this will only work during daytime hours.
  2. to find Captain Abnart (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, go all S to the Wharf. Go east along the Wharf, and south and north along the piers, if necessary, to find the Captain. Note: you receive a pair of golden earrings.
  3. to give golden earrings to Trero Owadd (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Present for the Fire Giant Queen [Complete]

Contributed by: Krieven
Level: 27
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Fire Giants' Keep, Sceptrum Of Ishachi
Total Time: 8 hours, 5 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the fire giant king (2 hours)
    From @, go U, all S, E, all S, E (yes for CPK), all E, all N, search, N, all W, N, all U.
  2. to find a ring of blue inferno (4 hours)
    In Sceptrum. From @, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N (don't go through hidden N), 2E, search, E and look around.
  3. to find the fire giant king (3 hours)
    As above.
  4. to give a ring of blue inferno to the fire giant king (5 minutes)
    As above.

A Priest's Justice [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Xebadir
Additions by: Kernighan
Level: 22
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Graveyard, Wittermark
Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the High Priest of the Church ( )
    In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
  2. to kill 5 of a dark-eyed nymph and 3 of an evermore wisp (1 hour)
    In Wittermark.
  3. to find the High Priest of the Church ( )

A Quill for the Architect [Complete]

Contributed by: Tichonoph
Additions by: Pleen
Level: 19
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Braneri
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find an academy architect (30 minutes)
    From zone entrance, go N a few and look around.
  2. to find 3 of a small feather quill (1 hour)
    There are up to 6 that load in the zone. From "A Tall Statue in the Quad" (5N from zone entrance), go:

    5E, S in a Well-Kept Classroom (for one)
    3S, 3E, N in a Rather Messy Office (for one), then S, E, U, W, N in an Alchemist's Lab for another
    3S, 2W, N, W in the Front of a Classroom for one, then E, S, 2W, U, 2E, S in the Office of Astronomy for another
    3N, 2W, D, N, W, S and look in the crate for one

  3. to give 3 of a small feather quill to an academy architect (30 minutes)
    As above.

A Rare Toad [Complete]

Contributed by: Zynix
Additions by: Lanfaer
Level: 18, 19, 23
Difficulty: easy to hard (CPK: can be staked!)
Locale(s): Fire Giants, Dark Woods
Total Time: 3 hours, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the fire giant cook (1 hour)
    In Fire Giants' CPK. From zone entrance (@), go U, 4S, E, 3S, 4E (yes for CPK), 11N (you might have to get key for gate or pick it), 5 W, 2S, W. Note: For the key, look on the mobs in the area before the gate.
  2. to kill 4 of the rock toad (2 hours)
    In Dark Woods CPK. Look around the first part of CPK (Northern side.) The rock toads are hidden mobiles and they are fairly easy, approximately level 20+ warriors.
  3. to find the fire giant cook (45 minutes)
    As above.

A Rose for Khal[Complete]

Contributed by: Dnik
Level: 23
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Trellor
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Khal the Jeweller (no limit)
    From Trellor recall, Khal's Jewelry is W, W, W, W, W, N, N, N, N, W.
  2. to give a shimmering rose carved of smooth, white marble to Khal the Jeweller (no limit)
    In Wytherwind. From zone entrance, go 3W, N, 2W to the intersection. Go N to the Hall of Records, then W (hidden), N, kill troll, open gate, N. You are in the Garden of Lost Idols. Look for the Dark Horseman -- he holds the rose.

A Scepter For Ludovicianus [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Vashka
Level: 28
Difficulty: very hard (challenging AQ)
Locale(s): Sonedal Ravine, Seanstrean Reef
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Ludovicianus, King of the Cynomies (2 hours)
    In Sonedal Ravine. See map (link not available). Go down into the ravine and look around for Dulen, the wandering peddler. Buy a vial from him, then go inside the shack and hold vial. Then type pour blue twice and then pour red. Quaff the vial then go N, D to get inside the tunnels. Now go E, 2S, W, D, 2N, 2E, D, N, E, D, S, U. (Sneak and move fast as there are many annoying aggro mobs on the way.)
  2. to find a king's scepter (no limit)
    In Seanstrean Reef; you have to run the whole zone. See map/walkthrough (link not available). You will need a few heroes to help you.Alternatively, as this objective is not find-original, you can buy a scepter on auction.
  3. to find Ludovicianus, King of the Cynomies (1 hour)
    As above.
  4. to give a king's scepter to Ludovicianus, King of the Cynomies (5 minutes)
    As above.

A Slain Guardian's Revenge [Complete]

Contributed by: Rarazona
Level: 25, 26
Difficulty: easy to hard (may involve PK)
Locale(s): Enchanted Oak Graveyard, Pirate Ship
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a lost spirit of a Trellor guard (30 minutes)
    Located in Enchanted Oak Graveyard. From Trellor recall, go 18 S, W.
  2. to kill Captain Amos Trask, the navigator, the first mate, the lookout, 5 of the pirate, and 3 of the angry pirate (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    All in Pirate Ship:
    Amos Trask: From entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, 2E.
    navigator: From Amos, go 2W, D, 2E, search, pick floorboard, open floorboard, D, E, pick door, open door, S.
    first mate: From navigator, go N, 2W, pick door, open door, S.
    Lookout: From first mate, go N, E, U, all N till U, all U.
    Pirates and angry pirates are found around the zone.

Contributed by: Trystian

Level: 28
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Brookhaven, Arcadia
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a daydreaming student (1 hour)

  2. to give a toy slingshot to a daydreaming student (2 hrs)
    In Arcadia, on the clever boys. From @, go all S, 3U, N, 3E, all S, enter whirlpool, and look around nearby.

Total Time: 2 hours

Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Crime Underground
Total Time: no limit

  2. to find a room called the East Entrance to Trellor Courtyard (30 minutes)
    From CU Crossroads, go W till up. Then go all N, all U to Trellor recall, then 3E.
  3. to kill 3 of a thief and 2 of a dark spy (20 minutes)
    These appear in the room with you.

    From above, go 2S.

A Very Special Proposal [Complete]

Contributed by: Grimrow
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Medievia City, Celestia, Braneri, Gypsy Camp
Total Time: 6 hours, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an apprentice (1 hour)
    In Med City. From recall, enter mage and look around.
  2. to give a slender band of gold, holding a bright diamond solitaire and a tiny jewelry box to an apprentice. (2 hours, 30 minutes)
    In Celestia.From entrance, go N, 2E, N until you reach "A Gold and Marble Staircase," then go all U, W, S. Band of gold loads on Lady Ritayn, of Lunari's heart.Then go N, E, D, S. Jewelry box loads on Toren, the darkest of warriors. He has lots of hp and hits pretty hard; we recommend help.
  3. to give a beautiful, lonely rose to an apprentice (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Braneri.From entrance, go N, W, 4N, W, S.
  4. to give a box of chocolates to an apprentice (1 hour)
    In Gypsy Camp on a loitering gypsy, around the ticket booth.
  5. to give a box of chocolates and a beautiful, lonely rose to a young lady (30 minutes)
    In Med City.Go to SE entrance to Med City and look around.
  6. to find an apprentice (15 minutes)
    As above.

Aching Feet [Incomplete]

Additions by: Murdoch
Level: 27, 28, 29
Difficulty: very hard (flags)
Locale(s): Shadowclaw, Horneg's
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Hallandur (45 minutes)
    In Shadowclaw. On entry to the zone, go E, U the Spiral Stairway one level, W, all S, E.
  2. to find Horneg's boots of levitation (no limit)
    From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search, W. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here. This objective is solo, find-original and no-death.

Acorn Charm Believer [Complete]

Completed by: Rarazona and Kronik
Additions by: Krildari
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Tharhalas
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a young lady (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From southeasternmost entrance to Med City (@), look around.
  2. to find an acorn charm necklace (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Tharhalas on Twexli. From entrance to zone, go all W, N, all W, U, all N, E, U, all N, all E, U, all S, E, all S, follow path E, U, all W, all N, all E, all S, U, 2N, D (you will need to have levitation before going down), 3N, E. (Twexli is a cleric mob and might dispel levitate, so if you are a lower level, you may want to carry a boat for the likely event you need to flee and heal up before finishing.) This is a find-original objective.
  3. to give an acorn charm necklace to a young lady (30 minutes)
    As above.

Acorn Shells Needed for a Craft Project [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Belizar
Additions by: Maneak
Level: 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Enara, Sonedal Ravine
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find an Enaran woman (30 minutes)
    In Enara. Go N to E/W crossroad and look around.
  2. to find 5 acorn shells (3 hours)
    In Sonedal Ravine. Follow path from entrance E and D till you find Dulen. Buy vial, go into his shack, hold vial, pour blue, pour blue, pour red, quaff vial. Then go 4S, W, E, W, N and look around on the ground for the acorn shells.
  3. to give 5 acorn shells to an Enaran woman (30 minutes)
    As above.

Acorns for Squirrels [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Zasildar
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s):
Total Time:3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a grey squirrel ( )
    In Enara, west of the gypsy camp.
  2. to give 5 of a burkenut acorn to a grey squirrel (2 hours)
    In Brookhaven. From entrance, go 4N, pick door, open door. Go N into NPK. Acorns are found on ground. Mobs are aggro and mean -- sneak and invis don't help much (we suggest help.)
  3. to kill 3 of a chipmunk ( )
    In Enara, west of the gypsy camp.

Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Lyryanoth, El Cantara

  2. to find Patimir the Acting Coach (30 minutes)
    In El Cantara. From entrance,go U, 2N, E, 8N, E, N.
  3. to give a mustache to an actor portraying Keine Noth (1 hour)

Total Time: 9 hours, 40 minutes

Adventurer's Disguise [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Mospolo
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Labyrinth, Pyramid
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a lost adventurer (30 minutes)
    In Labrynth from zone entrance (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N, W. Kill Grue, get key grue, unlock grate, open grate, D. Adventurer wanders around here. Note: this is solo and no-death.
  2. to give a vine belt, a pair of boots woven from vines, and a loin cloth to a lost adventurer (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Pyramid.

    loin cloth: on native boy waving a fist. From recall, go N, 3W, 5N, 2U, S, all E and look around.
    vine belt: on mama monkey. From recall, go 2S, 2U, S and look around.
    vine boots: on papa monkey.

Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): New Genesia
Total Time: 1 hour
Objectives:

    These wander randomly through the zone.

Aid Helvenis [Complete]

Additions by: Kernighan
Level: 19, 24
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora, Derah (evil), Gypsy Camp
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Helvenis, the Havensdora magician (15 minutes)
    From north entrance, go: S, S, E, E, S, E, E, E, S, S, E, E, all S then E.
  2. to give 2 of an image of yourself and a human heart to Helvenis, the Havensdora magician (50 minutes)
    Image of yourself: loads in Gypsy Camp. From the entrance to the zone ("Base of the Slope"), go E, all S, W, S, W, buy a ticket, S, W, W, N, N, N, give ticket gypsy, W, W, all N. If you kill the mirror in "The Fun House," it will leave two "image of yourself" in the corpse.

    Human heart: loads in evil Derah. After entering evil Derah from entering "A Destroyed House" (in the southwest part of good Derah), go E, N, E, E, N, N, E, U. Get the heart from the corpse of the girl.

  3. to kill 10 busking imps (15 minutes)
    These pop in the room as soon as you give the above items to Helvinis. They are easy, one-hit-to-kill mobs.

Aid Horneg in Blood Elemental Study [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Phu
Additions by: Cathsow
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Spirited/Horneg's Keep, evil Derah
Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Horneg (1 hour)
    From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search, W. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. (Horneg is here.) Note: You are given a clear jar.
  2. to kill the blood elemental (1 hour)
    In evil Derah.
  3. to give a clear jar to Horneg (45 minutes)
    This is the jar you received in the first step.

Aid Kuukle in Water Retrieval [Complete]

Additions by: Klerity, Liadhan
Level: 27, 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Goland's, Vark Outpost, Riverton Mines, Crime Underground
Total Time: 5 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Kuukle (1 hour)
    In Goland's Tower. Enter the zone and go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle.
  2. to find an alchemy jug and a backpack-style waterskin and a beautifully embroidered wineskin (3 hours, 20 minutes)
    an alchemy jug: Loads on Nephalis, the Viper in Crime Underground. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. Be sure you have "sense life." From here: go S, S, S.
    a backpack-style waterskin: in Riverton Mines, on a water boy. From entrance to mines, go all S, all E, and N until you see one.
    a beautifully embroidered wineskin: Loads on a Vark arch-magi in Vark Outpost. From @, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever. Then go 2N, 2E, N to Vark arch-magi. Warning: This mob has permanent fireshield and is in a cold room; it is very difficult to solo.
  3. to give an alchemy jug and a backpack-style waterskin and a beautifully embroidered wineskin to Kuukle (1 hour)

Aid Lawyer With His Case [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Dyntillium
Additions by: Dima
Level: 18
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Medievia City, Riverton
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find a lawyer ()
    In Med City. From recall, go 4W, 2S and look around.
  2. to give a book of laws to a lawyer (45 minutes)
    Purchase in Riverton. From northern entrance, go S,4W,N, and buy the book.

Aid Mayor with Troll Problem [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Garganthus and Lyesainer
Additions by: Anonymous, Shaedehart
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Wilderness, Med City, Riverton
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, 4W, N, W, N, U, S.
  2. to find the mayor [of Riverton] (30 minutes)
    In Riverton. From the north entrance, 3S, W, S, U.
  3. to find the wilderness room at 1041 x 1285 (30 minutes)
    In the wilderness. Follow the road south from Riverton until you reach the intersection in front of the inn.
  4. to find the wilderness room at 1041 x 1289 (10 minutes)
    In the wilderness. Walk south from last objective to the room directly in front of the inn.
  5. to find the drinkmaker (10 minutes)
    In The Inn. From ent, all south.
  6. to find a drunkard (5 minutes)
    In the inn. North from drinkmaster, but may roam a few rooms.
  7. to give a frosty mug to a drunkard (3 minutes)
    Go back to the drinkmaster and buy mug, give to drunkard.
  8. to give a frosty mug to a drunkard (2 minutes)
    Again, as above.
  9. to give a frosty mug to a drunkard (1 minutes)
    Again, as above.
  10. to find a drunkard ()
    The last one passed out, need to roam to find another drunkard.
  11. to find a serving maid (5 minutes)
    In the inn. Roams.
  12. to find the wilderness room at 1041 x 1289 ()
    As above. You fight the drunk here - very very easy.
  13. to find a serving maid (5 minutes)
    As above.
  14. to find a bard (5 minutes)
    In the inn. He's in the room S and W of the bar.
  15. to find the wilderness room at 1041 x 1289 (5 minutes)
    See above.
  16. to find the wilderness room at 1080 x 1249 (30 minutes)
    ++++++++~~+++++++
    +++++++++~+++++++
    +++++++++~+++++++
    ++++++++~~+++++++
    +++++'''~''++++++
    ++'''''~~~''+++++
    '''~~~~~#~~'+++++
    ''~~vv~vvv~'''+++
    ~~~vvv~vvv~~''+++
    ~vvvv~~~vvv~'++++
    "vvvv~vvvvv~'++++
    "vvvvvvvvv~~'++++
    """vvvvvvv~'''+++

    It's northeast of the Inn and southeast of Riverton. Use a sextant, if necessary, to confirm your location.

  17. to find the mayor (30 minutes)
    As above.

Aid Monk With Care Package [Complete]

Contributed by: Piixe
Additions by: Sulin, Dima
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): The Graveyard, Trellor
Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a quiet monk (1 hour)
    Located in Med Graveyard. From graveyard entrance, all N, all E, N into the cathedral, E or W, U.
  2. to find a pair of fine leather leggings, a straw sun hat, and a small wrist sundial (1 hour)
    A pair of fine leather leggings: From Med recall, enter warrior, then go 3W, N, buy leggings.
    A straw sun hat: In Trellor. From recall go 5s, 2e, s, buy hat.
    A small wrist sundial: Buy at the same place as hat.
  3. to give a pair of fine leather leggings, a straw sun hat, and a small wrist sundial to a quiet monk (40 minutes)
    As above.

Aid Sendaria in Potion Study [Complete]

Contributed by: Onark
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, go 5N, 6E.
  2. to find 3 of object a rosy-scented potion filled with a thin pink liquid (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Lumond's Haven. From Med City recall, enter haven, then go 2W, N, and buy 3 potion.
  3. to give 3 of a rosy-scented potion filled with a thin pink liquid to Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (30 minutes)

Aid the Dean [Complete]

Corrections by: Jadeyn, Gustov
Level: 18
Difficulty: hard (attacks by trade mobs)
Locale(s): Braneri
Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the dean of the academy (45 minutes)
    In Braneri. From entrance to zone ("Before a Grand Iron Gate"), go: 5N, W until D, D, kill the fish, then loot all the fish for "a small bronze key." Then go U, 4E, unlock door N, open door N, go north. You are given a small stone.
  2. to find a room called "Before A Grand Iron Gate" (10 minutes)
    This is the first room in the Braneri zone.
  3. to give a small black stone to a priestess of the Sun (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Riverton, essentially straight S from Braneri. The priestess loads in the Temple of the Sun, which is in the NW corner of Riverton. Note: this step is SOLO NO-PORTAL NO-DRAGON NO-MAGIC, so you'll have to walk or ride by horse. The time limit is generous though.

Aid the Forest Faeries [Complete]

Contributed by: Carolinus
Additions by: Lyesainer
Level: 27, 30
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Gloumewood Farm
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Ohnalia (1 hour)
    In Gloumewood Farm. From zone entrance, go 5E, 2N, 2E to "Behind the Farmhouse." Enter ring and pray; you will be teleported to NPK part of the zone. Look around for the black cat; kill it 9 times, then look for Ohnalia.
  2. to give 5 tiny fairy corpses to Ohnalia (1 hour)
    These load on the lybicats, which wander randomly in the NPK part of the zone.

Aid the Stranded Adventurer with Iron Rations [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Zendrakeh
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Zuldahun's Glacial Cathedral, Med, Asnor
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find a stranded adventurer ()
    In Zuldahun's Glacial Cathedral. From zone entrance, go 3S, 2E, 2S (Note: Some of these rooms do cold damage, and are slippery).
  2. to find 5 iron rations ()
    From Med recall, go 9S, E and buy them here.
  3. to give 5 rations to a stranded adventurer ()
    As above
  4. to give mountain climbing boots to a stranded adventurer ()
    At Asnor on mountain climbers (hidden). From the southeast @, go N and U and look around.

Alendora Broth [Complete]

Contributed by: Tellahane, JJC
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora
Total Time: 1 day
Objectives:
  1. to find a Malindora boy (1 hour)
    In Forest of the Alendora. From the western entrance, follow the path until you arrive at the camp.
  2. to give an illicit mushroom and a shitaki mushroom and the root of an elder oak, emanating a yellow phosphorescent glow to a Malindora boy (23 hours)
    Illicit mushroom: In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N. Go E, all N, E, E, all N, W, W, N, U. In 2 of the 6 rooms in this section, there are benches which load mushrooms. "Get all bench" to gather shitaki mushrooms.
    Root: In Alendora on Nacenus, the Malindora magician. From north entrance to zone, go: 2S, 2E, S, 4E, 2S, 2E, then all S.

Alignment Issues [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Angulain
Additions by: Rextor, Antdos
Level: 26
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Med City, Thanos
Total Time: 3 hours, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
    In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
  2. to kill 3 of a necromancer and 3 of a crimson death and 3 of a creeping doom (3 hours)
    In Thanos.
  3. to find the High Priest of the Church (20 minutes)
    As above.

Alligator Purse for Melnshara [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Xeanne
Additions by: Saracen
Level: 26, 29, 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Thanos, Akenuas Glade
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Melnshara Daenar (1 hour)
    In Lyryanoth. From recall, go all W. Kill the four angry protestors. Go W, S, 3W, U. Go E, S, U, W.
  2. to kill 10 of a green alligator and a crimson alligator and 4 of a brown alligator (2 hours)
    Green and crimson alligators are in Thanos. Green alligators wander along the northeast corner; crimson alligator is with the queen alligators. Brown alligators load in Akenuas Glade along the river. Note: this is no-death.

Difficulty: moderate (NPK)
Locale(s): Celestia, Alps
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Amacia, Icy Beauty (1 hour)
    In Celestia. From entrance, go N, 2E, N until you reach "A Gold and Marble Staircase," then go all U, all N.
  2. to give a simple kyanite barrette to Lady Amacia, Icy Beauty (3 hours)
    In Alps.

Amongst Us [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Sulin
Level: 19
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Crypt Of Vatos
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Angelicus, Liamnar's minion (30 minutes)
    In Crypt of Vatos. From zone entrance (@), pull lever. Then go all W, all D to "The Bottom of the Steps." Go all E (hidden exit), search, open trapdoor, U, E to graverobber. Kill graverobber and loot key. Then go W, D, all W, unlock door W. W.Note: The zone is solo lev 31, and mobs are aggro and see invis. Bring a lot of friends!

Difficulty: easy to moderate
Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Trellor
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Captain Amos Trask (1 hour)
    Located on the Pirate Ship. From @ entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, E, E.
  2. to kill 9 of the Trellor gate watchman and 12 of the Trellor Cityguard (1 hour)
    Located in the City of Trellor.

Amphritrite's Slipper Collection [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Jaztari
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s):
Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Amphritrite ( )
    In Lattyrna. From zone entrance, go all D, 2E, all north to herald, kill herald for the dolphin-shaped key, go N, unlock door, go U then N to Amphritrite.
  2. to find windtreading slippers and webbed slippers and a pair of white silk slippers and red silk slippers embroidered with silver thread and a pair of diamond-studded silk slippers ( )
    windtreading slippers: Loads in Enchanted Oak Graveyard on sprites. From Trellor recall, go 18S, 3W, 3S, 3W, 3U, 3N, 4W, 3S, 3E, 2N, 2W, S, E.
    webbed slippers: Loads in Lattyrna on Alexander. From Trellor recall, go all E, all D, all E, N, all D, 2E, 3N, all W, all U, S, E to Alexander.
    a pair of white silk slippers: Buy from Emma the Weaver. From Trellor recall, go 5W, 3S, W.
    red silk slippers embroidered with silver thread: Loads on Availe, Queen of the Cloud Giants. From "Floating Atop an Island of Clouds," go 3E, S, open door, U, E S, W, S. a pair of diamond-studded silk slippers: Loads in Celestia on Amacia. From @, go N, 2E, all N to U exit, all U, all N.
  3. to find Amphritrite ( )
    As above.
  4. to give windtreading slippers and webbed slippers and a pair of white silk slippers and red silk slippers embroidered with silver thread and a pair of diamond-studded silk slippers to Amphritrite ( )
    As above.

An Angel's Quest [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Clarisa
Additions by:Krieven
Level: 25, 26, 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Alcordian,Pirate Ship
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the angel of Redemption (1 hour)
    In Alcord. From zone entrance, go all S, E, 4S, 5W, 2N. Fags: none
  2. to kill 2 of a pirate, 2 of the swashbuckler, 2 of the midshipman, 2 of a very drunk pirate, 2 of the pirate (1 hour)
    In Pirate Ship.
  3. to kill 3 of a beastman, 3 of a feline beastman, 3 of a beast, 3 of a goatman (1 hour)
    In Xanthal.
  4. to kill 5 of the Red Eye and 5 of an old campaigner (1 hour)
    In Shadowclaw. From zone entrance to Shadowclaw (@), go S, E, all U, then W and S along that level.

An Apprentice Needs Ethereal Slippers [Complete]

Contributed by: Sakuya
Level: 24
Difficulty: moderate (no summon, no phase, find-original)
Locale(s): Med City, Xanthal
Total Time: 3 hours, 5 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an apprentice (30 minutes)
    In Med City Mages' Quarter.
  2. to find the bored salesgirl (15 minutes)
    In Med City Mage Quarter in The Shop of the Minor Enchanter. From recall, enter mage. Go W to Street of the Mellow Enchantment, then 4S, W.
  3. to find a pair of ethereal slippers (2 hours, 3 hours with extension)
    In Xanthal on Thysa. From entrance, go N, 3W, 3N, kill servant for master key, 2N, U, 2N, unlock door E, open door E, E. (She is !melee and shockwaves.)
  4. to give a pair of ethereal slippers to an apprentice (20 minutes)
    As above.

An Apprentice Wants to Be a Clown [Complete]

Contributed by: Zeela
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Lyngaeli's Nightmare
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to fin an apprentice (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter mage and look around.
  2. to find an animal-skin balloon, a white clown suit with black pom poms, and a bellows (2 hours)
    All items load in Nightmare: From @, go all N and sleep. When you wake, go 1N and enter box. Go 2N, 3W, open door, W, kill Grandma for amulet. Go 5E and 2N, hold amulet. Go D and 2N. Kill Helvyra for needle. Go 2S, U, S, E, and search while holding needle. Go 2E and enter box. The bellows and the animal-skin balloon can both be found on a balloon salesman in this part of the zone (hidden). Then, return to the box. Go all N from the box, E, S, and search for E exit. Go E and kill Cyhaeck for key. Unlock/open safe and loot toothpick. Go W, N, W, and unlock door toothpick. Go N and W and kill a marionette for the white clown suit with black pom poms.Note: You have to die, pk yourself, or finish zone to exit.
  3. to give an animal-skin balloon, a white clown suit with black pom poms, and a bellows to an apprentice (1 hour)
    As above.

An Enchanting Date [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Angulain
Level: 24
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Med City, Wytherwind
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a bored enchantress (30 minutes)

  2. to find Antygon [hidden objective] (2 hours)
    In Wytherwind. From entrance ("A Roofless Entryway"), go 3W, N, 2W, 3S, U, 2S, 5W, S, U, S, E, U, E, 3W, S, D.
  3. to give a small stuffed dragon to the bored enchantress (30 minutes)
    Buy in Med City. From recall go 3E, N, all E.Note: You receive a blue orb.

An Errand For Aitrilla [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Bhalodus, Shaedehart
Additions by: Aenjeh, Loere
Level:
Difficulty: no idea!
Locale(s): Gloumewood Farm
Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a room called The Entrance to the Gloumewood Farm (30 minutes)
    In Gloumewood Farm, at @.
  2. to find Aitrilla, the wife of Magdono (1 hour, 45 minutes with extension)
    In Gloumewood Farm. From entrance, kill the farmer, loot key, unlock gate, open gate. Then go 4E, S to "At a Clothesline, Near the Creek". Search pants for key (may not see them there) and get key from the pants. Then go to 2N, 3E, unlock door, and look around to find Aitrilla.
  3. to give a pair of denim overalls to Aitrilla, the wife of Magdono (3 hours)
    In Coliseum, on the gardener.

An Evil Deed for Tyssa [Complete]

Contributed by: Takphius
Level: 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Gloumewood
Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Tyssa, the leader of the lybicats (45 minutes)
    In Gloumewood. From entrance, go E, all N, all E, W, enter ring, pray. Look around for a room with N/S/W exits; go through hidden E. Then go all E, U.
  2. to kill Ohnalia, Queen of the Forest Fairies (50 minutes)
    From above, go D, all W, look for D exit nearby. Then go D, S, W, N (hidden). Ohnalia loads here. (Be sure to dispel her sanc first!) Loot her wand.
  3. to find Tyssa, the leader of the lybicats (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give Ohnalia's wand to Tyssa, the leader of the lybicats (5 minutes)
    As above.

An Important Ingredient [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Globares
Additions by: Ansfrid
Level: 21
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Med Castle, Arcadia
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
    See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to give a bottle of maple syrup to the wizard (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Arcadia. From @, go all U, N, 3E, 4S, enter whirlpool. If you do not end up at "An Ancient Stone Column, a Landmark of Tryss' Arcadia" then cast word of recall and try again until you end up at "An Ancient Stone Column, a Landmark of Tryss' Arcadia." When you are there, go W, S, all E, 2N, all E, get maple cart.

An Important Message [Complete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Lattyrna
Total Time: 1 hour, 55 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Alexander (30 minutes)
    In Lattyrna. From zone entrance, go all D, all E, 3N (to Ivory Road), all W, N, all U, S, E.
  2. to give a scribbled note on old parchment to the satyr (1 hour)
    In Fire Giants' Keep. See Satyr/Satyr's Flute in Frequent Pathways. Note: you receive the satyr's flute.
  3. to give the satyr's flute to a congenial bard (41 minutes with extension)
    On the main streets of Trellor. From recall, go S to the Merchant Circle, and head E or W until you find one.

    In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go N, N, W, W, N, W, N, W, W, W, W, S, S, S, W. (Be careful: Agalinis is aggro!)
