An Old Axe for Soulstealer [Complete]

Contributed by: Lithena
Additions by: Kirgan, Antdos
Level: 19
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Mynoric Garrison
Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Soulstealer the Weaponsmaster (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, go 5 N, E, N.
  2. to give a massive single-bladed mithril axe to Soulstealer the Weaponsmaster (55 minutes)
    Found in Mynoric. From @, go 4N, search, U, W until you see the Captain of the Lancers. Kill him for his key. Now go all E to "Circular Hall and Staircase," D, 2S, W, unlock door N, N, unlock rack, open rack, get axe rack.

An Old Woman Off Her Rocker [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Bingyi
Additions by: Anonymous, Sulin, Arrumar
Level:29, 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Derah
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the elderly woman (1 hour)
    In Derah. From recall, go 2W, open door N, N.
  2. to give a slate writing tablet to the elderly woman (1 hour)
    Writing tablets are found in Brookhaven in a room called "A Secluded Schoolroom." From East Fork Road at the Church, go W (into the church), N, W. They load on the students. Note: this is find-original.
  3. to give the headband of rage to the elderly woman (2 hours)
    Loads in Spiderwode on a blood red darkling. From @, go 3N, 5W, 2N, W, search, S, search, D, all N, all E, S. It's the evil aligned darkling, and unlike the others it's aggro. (bs red) Note: this is find-original.

An Omelet for the Goblin King [Complete]

Contributed by: Bhalodus
Additions by: Norgath, Sidmesh, Wyndryk, Shaedehart
Level: 25, 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med Castle, Catacombs, Trellor, Med City
Total Time: 5 hours, 5 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the gnomish cook (40 minutes)
    From recall in Medievia, go: all U, all N until "An Intersection in the Chamber of Planes," then W, W, W, N, N, E, E, U, E, all E, all S, W, all S.
  2. to find 4 of an egg recovered from deep within the catacombs and some bloody meat and a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese (4 hours)
    some bloody meat: In Trellor, in "Morg's Butcher Shop." From recall, go 5E, 4S, E. Buy 2.meat
    a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese: In Med City, From recall, go 5E, 4N.
    an egg recovered from deep within the catacombs: In Catacombs. Note: this is find-original.
  3. to find the gnomish cook (20 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give 4 of an egg recovered from deep within the catacombs, some bloody meat, and a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese to the gnomish cook (5 minutes)
    As above.

An Omelette Fit For A King [Needs Detail]

Level: 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Lyryanoth
Total Time: 9 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Cilanya, head cook of Daenar (1 hour)
    In Lyryanoth. From recall, go all W and kill the 4 angry protestors. Then go W, S, 2W, S.
  2. to find Julianus Daenar (1 hour)
    From above, go N, W, U, N, 2W, search, 2U.
  3. to find Cilanya, head cook of Daenar ()
    As above.
  4. to give a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese and a generous portion of ham and a round of cheese and a leathery dragon's egg(0 given so far) and a golden dove egg and a blue-colored egg and an unfertilized Gloumewood Farm egg and an egg recovered from deep within the catacombs to Cirilya, head cook of Daenar (6 hours)
    a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese: In Med City, From recall, go 5E, 4N.
    a generous portion of ham: Buy in Med City. From recall, 5E and 3N to Desigra's Delicatessen.
    a round of cheese: In Brookhaven's "Butter Cross" shop. From @, go N, W.
    a leathery dragon's egg: in G'dangus on the dragon golems.
    a golden dove egg: In the "spring" section of Arcadia, in a bird's nest in At the Foot of a Rising Hill.
    a blue-colored egg:
    an unfertilized Gloumewood Farm egg: Loads on Gloumewood hens. Search the corpses.
    an egg recovered from deep within the catacombs: In Catacombs.
    Note: this is find-original.

An Unusual Herb [Complete]

Contributed by: Helitus
Level: 12
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Underground Tunnels
Total Time: 1 hour
Objectives:
  1. to find Illevrin, the shopkeeper (30 minutes)
    In the House of Herbs and Healing in Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 4N, 2W, N.
  2. to give a sprig of gemsly to Illevrin, the shopkeeper (30 minutes)
    In Underground Tunnels. From Med City recall, enter thief, then go 4S, D, N, 2E, 2S, E, N, W, S, E, N, 2E, D, N. Loads on the ground.

Anatomical Knowledge [Complete]

Additions by: Loere
Level: 26, 27, 29, 30
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Academy of Braneri, Catacombs
Total Time: 5 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a distinguished professor (1 hour)
    In Braneri. Several load randomly just inside zone (in the quadrangle area) and within the buildings on the SW and SE aspects of the quad.
  2. to kill a huge, hairy spider (2 hours)
    Located randomly in catacombs.
  3. to kill a cave bear (30 minutes)
    Located randomly in catacombs.
  4. to kill a cave painting (30 minutes)
    Located randomly in catacombs.
  5. to kill a giant eel (30 minutes)
    Located randomly in catacombs.
  6. to kill a vampire bat (30 minutes)
    Located randomly in catacombs.

Anatomy Class [Complete]

Contributed by: Klerity
Level: 18
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Academy of Braneri, Aeketh
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a distinguished professor (30 minutes)
    In Braneri. From zone entrance (@), go 2N, W, open door W, W, open door N, N, W.
  2. to kill 2 of a mastah and 2 of a wullart (45 minutes)
    In Aeketh. Mastahs load just inside the entrance (they are hidden) to the west. Wullarts load further in the zone. From the zone entrance, go all W, then E, all N, W until there are other exits, then look around.
  3. to find a distinguished professor (15 minutes)
    As above.

Anel's Revenge [Complete]

Contributed by: Zynix
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Riverton, Mynoric Garrison
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Anel (30 minutes)
    In Riverton. From north entrance (@), go 9 S, W, kill Gaoler for key, W, unlock cell S, S. You will be given a crystal lens.
  2. to find the room Outside the Mynoric Garrison (30 minutes)
    From the entrance to Mynoric Garrison, just inside (north) in the zone.
  3. to kill Terrakor Dylan, Lord of the Garrison (no limit)
    From "Outside the Mynoric Garrison," go 4N, search, U, 2E, 2 S, hold lens, hold ball of light, use lens, 2N, 4W, N, E, U.
  4. to kill Anel (10 minutes)
    Anel loads immediately right after you kill Terrakor Dylan. He is a level 18-20 warrior.

Angel of Redemption [Needs Detail]

Level: 25, 28
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Alcordian Battleground
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the angel of Redemption (30 minutes)
    In Alcord. From zone entrance, go all S, E, 4S, 5W, 2 N.
  2. to kill 8 of the undead corpse of a peasant and 8 of the undead corpse of a soldier and 4 of an undead corpse (2 hours)
    The undead peasants and soldiers are in Eldrick; the undead corpses are in Thanos.

Angry Pirate's Problem [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Afiniti
Level: 24
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Derah, Trellor, Great Tree, Cloud Giants, Pirate Ship
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find the angry pirate (1 hour)
    In Pirate Ship.
  2. to find Madam Zash (35 minutes)
    In Derah. From entrance to the zone, go N, N, N, N, N, N, W.
  3. to give a vial of jasmine oil and a mushroom and an aloe leaf and a beautiful orchid to Madam Zash (3 hours)
    a vial of jasmine oil: On a gypsy merchant in Trellor.
    a mushroom: In Great Tree, on the ground.
    an aloe leaf: Found on bath boys in Cloud Giants. From "Floating Atop an Island of Clouds," go 3E, S, open door, U, E S, W, S.
    a beautiful orchid: in Derah.
    Note: You will receive an elixir.
  4. to find the angry pirate (1 hour)
    As above.
  5. to give a sweet-smelling elixir to the angry pirate (5 minutes)
    As above.

Antlers for the Hunter [Complete]

Contributed by: Afiniti
Additions by: Elagneros
Level: 24, 25
Difficulty: moderate to hard
Locale(s): Preserve, Akenuas Glade
Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes to 1 hour, 50 minutes with extension
Objectives:
  1. to find a hunter (30 minutes)
    In the Preserve. See hunter in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to give the antlers of a golden stag to a hunter (50 minutes; 1 hour, 20 minutes with extension)
    These load in Akenuas Glade. From zone entrance, go 2N, E, N, 2 E, 3N, W, N, 2W, N, 4W (including hidden exit), S, 2W, S, 5E (hidden), S (hidden), S, E and look around for the stag (among several deer.)

Armor for Warrior of The Dark Army [Complete]

Contributed by: Urand
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): New Genesia and Alcordian Battle Field
Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a warrior of the Dark Army (30 minutes)
    In New Genesia. From the southern row of @, find the one with a north exit, then go N and look around.
  2. to kill Halsenar, the ancient war general (50 minutes)
    In Alcord. From entrance, go S and look around.Note: this is solo.
  3. to find the armor of Halsenar (50 minutes)
    This loads on Halsenar, but it appears as "a forgotten piece of history."(You can use the key word "armor" to take it.)
  4. to give the armor of Halsenar to a warrior of the Dark Army (30 minutes)
    As above.

Armorer Convention [Complete]

Additions by: CB
Level: 26, 29
Difficulty: very hard (entering Demonforge solo)
Locale(s): Med City, Fire Giants' Keep, Trellor, New Ashton
Total Time: 7 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Orak the smithy (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, then go S, S, S, W.
  2. to find Lan the Warlock (30 minutes)
    In Trellor, on the north part of Merchant Circle. From recall, go 5N, 4E, N.
  3. to find a fire giant weaponsmaster (2 hours)
    In Fire Giants' Keep. From entrance, go U, all S, E, all S, E (yes for CPK), all E, 11N, all W, 2N, W.
  4. to find Bruno (30 minutes)
    In New Ashton. From western entrance, go 2E, 2N, 3E, N.
  5. to find the blacksmith (30 minutes)
    In Derah. From recall, go 5W, S, E.
  6. to find Rornuk, the black-skinned smith (3 hours)
    In Demonforge. See the walkthrough for how to find Demonforge (link not available). Note: this step is nearly impossible solo.

Arrow Collector [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Lyesainer
Additions by: Antdos, Eleazar

Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Quinstone, Wittermark
Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a tall archer (45 minutes)
    In Quinstone Keep. From zone entrance (@), go 2N, all E, U, all E.
    to find 8 of either a bronze banded arrow or a long, thin arrow, tipped with a smooth slate head or a gaily painted arrow (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    a bronze banded arrow: in Aeketh.
    a long, thin arrow, tipped with a smooth slate head: Loads at Wittermark on the Wittermark elves.
    a gaily painted arrow: Loads on Imp Guards in the Underground Shafts (invisible.)
  2. to give 8 of either a bronze banded arrow, a long, thin arrow, tipped with a smooth slate head, or a gaily painted arrow to a tall archer (30 minutes)
    As above.

Objectives:

  2. to give 3 of a newly fletched arrow and 2 of an arrowhead to a hunter (1 hour, 10 minutes)
    Loads on an Esachan hunter and on the ground near him in Esacha Fen. To find Esachan hunter, from Esacha entrance, go all N, S, search for hidden exit, 3E, 2N.

Art Equipment for Project [Complete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Level: 22
Difficulty: moderate (solo, find-original)
Locale(s): Braneri, Gnomenel,
Total Time: 2 hours, 55 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a frustrated student (1 hour)
    In Braneri. From zone entrance, go 4N and look around.
  2. to give a paint-covered artist's smock to a frustrated student (45 minutes)
    Loads in Gnomenel. From entrance go all E, 2W, 2N, 2W and look around (sometimes roams.)
  3. to find a can of yellow paint and Yaxley's paintbrush (40 minutes)
    Loads on Yaxley in Enara NPK. From entrance of Enara, go 2N, 4E, 4N, E, N, E, N (into NPK), 3E, N, E, 2N, 3W to "Before A Village of Wagons." Then go W and S to find Yaxley.
  4. to give a can of yellow paint and Yaxley's paintbrush to a frustrated student (30 minutes)
    As above.

Assassin's Revenge [Needs Detail]

    Loads in Tomb. From @, go D, 3N, 2E, open gate, S, E.
  2. to kill a criminal mastermind ( )
    From Lyryanoth recall, go 3S, 3E, N, E (the last two exits are hidden). The mastermind loads here with two other mobs.

Assassinate Gatyasa for a Concubine [Complete]

Contributed by: Egani
Level: 29
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Sceptrum
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a royal concubine (45 minutes)
    In Sceptrum. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N, E.
  2. to kill Gatyasa, first of the royal wives (45 minutes)
    From above, go N, E. Note: she is iceshielded.
  3. to find a royal concubine (30 minutes)
    As above.

Assassinate King Kalklinor [Complete]

Contributed by: Leaya
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Fortress Shadowclaw, Karlisna
Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Balur (50 minutes)
    In Fortress Shadowclaw. From entrance: S, E, 5U, W, 2S, open door S, S.
  2. to find a room called A Jail Cell (15 minutes)
    From Balur go: 3N, E, 5D, W, S, E, 2N, 2E, N.
  3. to find a room called A Small Escape Tunnel (5 minutes)
    Search (there's a hidden down exit) and go D. This is an escape tunnel to Karlisna.
  4. to find a room called Upon the Stairs (10 minutes)
    Go 3E, 2N, 2E, search (there's a hidden east exit) and go E. You're now in Karlisna. (Note: There's an aggro mob in this room.)
  5. to kill King Kalklinor (30 minutes)
    Go U, W, 2N, 2E, S. King Kalklinor is sitting here, reading a book.
  6. to find a thieves' dirk (10 minutes)
    Loot the key off Kalklinor's corpse and go: N, 2W. Unlock chest, open chest, get dirk chest.
  7. to give a thieves' dirk to Balur (25 minutes)
    As above. (NOTE: you can't go back the way you came, so you have to recall and portal/dragon back to Fortress Shadowclaw.)

Assassinate Kregora for NaeraMae [Complete]

Contributed by: Jaztari
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): NaeraMae, Shadowclaw
Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find NaeraMae (1 hour)
    In NaeraMae. From @, go 2U, 2S, all E to gate. Get key or pick gate to continue E. Go all E, search, then E and open door E (key is on guardian or again, it is pickable.) Go 2E, S.
  2. to kill Kregora, High Priest of Shadowclaw (1 hour)
    To kregora: On entry to the zone ("Undergate"), go E, all U, and all S. Search and go S. Note: you receive a diamond tiara.
  3. to find NaeraMae (1 hour, 5 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a diamond tiara to NaeraMae (5 minutes)
    As above.

Assassinate Officials at Naeramae [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Baraz
Level: 25, 27, 30
Difficulty: medium
Locale(s): Naeramae, Crime Underground
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (1 hour)
    In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
  2. to kill Hadren, NaeraMae, and Threzdi (2 hours)
    These mobs load in NaeraMae.
    Threzdi: From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the east.
    Hadren: From Threzdi, go W, all S, then E.
    NaeraMae: Go to throne room area. From the northwestern corner of throne room, search, go east, pick lock for east or kill those mobs (tough), go all E then all S. The hidden mob there is NaeraMae.
  3. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves ( )
    As above.

Assassinate Pherrance for Council Members [Complete]

Contributed by: Pleen
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a Member of the City Council (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, go 2N, 2E.
  2. to find the criminal mastermind (30 minutes)
    From Lyryanoth recall, go 3S, 3E, N, E (the last two exits are hidden). The mastermind loads here with two aggro other mobs.
  3. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
    See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.

Assassinate the Duke of Trellor for Vonliege [Complete]

Level: 26, 27, 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Crime Underground
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (1 hour, 25 minutes)
    In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
  2. to kill Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (1 hour)
    See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways. Note: this is solo and no-death. It may take you several passes to kill Pherrance.
  3. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (1 hour)
    As above.

Assassinate the Man [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Symax
Level:
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Med City, Asnor
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find the Master Assassin of the Veiled Society (4 hours)
    Loads in a couple different zones: Medievia, Mystical Forest, Aeketh, Crime Underground, and maybe others. Get to the zones and cast sense presence to see if he's there. If he is, just wander until you find him. He's super hidden.
  2. to kill a grumpy old man ( )
    From Asnor's south @, go all U/N until you see a W exit. Go all W. The grumpy old man loads here.

Assassinate the Mayor of Medievia [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Bezolod
Level: 15
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Med City
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find a member of the veiled society ( )
    In Med City/Underground Tunnels. From Med City recall, go all E until you have exited the City, then go all S through "Beautiful Gardens" until you are on the river. (Get a boat or levitate to go on the river.) Go W then N up the river until you see a south exit called "The Underground Jetty." Go south here, then look around in the nearby rooms for this mob.
  2. to kill Basalan, the Mayor of the City ( )
    See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
  3. to find a member of the veiled society ( )
    As above.

Assassinate Tunnelmaster [Complete]

Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): New Ashton, Dark Escarpment
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Rene the waitress (30 minutes)
    In New Ashton. From southern entrance to zone (@), go 3E, N.
  2. to find a room called An Extra Seating Area for the Ash Cafe (5 minutes)
    From the above, go E, N.
  3. to kill Tastaniumus, the Tunnelmaster (2 hours)
    In Dark Escarpment. From entrance to zone, go U, 6 W, S (hidden), S, 2E. You've just entered a 3x3 area of rooms; there's a key called "a finger bone" in at least one of them. Move from room to room and type "Get all mound" until you have the finger bone key. Then return to the first room you entered in 3x3 area. From here, go 5W, N, 3W (use the finger bone key to unlock the door.) The tunnelmaster loads here.
  4. to find a room called An Extra Seating Area for the Ash Cafe (25 minutes)
    As above. You will be attacked by a fire beetle (it's an easy kill.)

Assassinating NaeraMae's Diplomats for Duke [Complete]

Contributed by: Daynal
Additions by: Takphius
Level: 28
Difficulty: easy (if you can pick)
Locale(s): Trellor, Castle Med, Gdangus, Naeramae
Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Doligoth, the Master Thief (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, go D, all E, 2S and look around (he wanders.)
  2. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
    See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
  3. to find a room called The Rusty Barnacle Tavern (20 minutes)
    In Village of G'dangus. From entrance, go 3N, W, all S.
  4. to find a room called a Sleeping Room filled with Broken Glass (20 minutes)
    From zone entrance, go 2U, 2S, W, 2S.
  5. to kill Branae (30 minutes)
    From above, go 2N, 7E, 3S, E.
  6. to kill Hrendar (30 minutes)
    From above, go W, 2S, W.
  7. to kill Threzdi (30 minutes)
    From above, go E, N, E.
  8. to find Hadren (40 minutes)
    From above, go W, 2S, E.

Assassination of the Miser [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Elyvern
Level: 28, 29
Difficulty: moderate (solo, no-death)
Locale(s): Med City
Total Time: 5 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a Master Assassin of the Veiled Society (4 hours)
    Loads in 1 of 3 zones randomly: Mystical Forest (forest part), Asnor, or Aeketh Vale.
  2. to kill a grumpy old man ()
    In Asnor.

Assassinations for Vonliege [Complete]

Contributed by: Zynix
Level: 18, 21
Difficulty: easy to moderate
Locale(s): Crime Underground, DeRah (good), Riverton, Lyryanoth
Total Time: 7 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (1 hour)
    In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
  2. to kill the mayor [of Riverton], the mayor [of DeRah Villadom], and the mayor of Lyryanoth (5 hours)
    The mayor of Riverton: See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways. The Riverton mayor is an approximately level 20 warrior.

    The mayor of DeRah Villadom: From the entrance to Derah, go to recall. Then go all W, E, N, open door west, W, U. The DeRah mayor is an approximately level 20 mage.

    The mayor of Lyryanoth:: From recall in Lyryanoth, go W, N, U. The Lyryanoth mayor is an approximately level 20-21 warrior.

    This objective is flagged as solo, no-death, no-summon, and no-phase.

  3. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (1 hour)

Assemble Bible for Commander [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Xereph
Level:
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Trellorian Penitentiary, Underground Shafts, Rhaiaden
Total Time: 5 hours, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the prison chaplain (40 minutes)
    In the Trellorian Penitentiary. From zone entrance (@), go all W, all N, kill the guard, E, all U, kill the guard, all D, W, unlock gate, all N, E, N, kill guard, unlock door west, open door west, all W, all N, open door N, all N.
  2. to find a room called The Training Grounds (1 hour)
    In the Underground Shafts. From zone entrance (@), go D, N, 2E, 2N, 2E, all S, all E.
  3. to kill a tired prisoner ( )
    This mob loads in the room you just entered.
  4. to find a room called Inside a Hidden Talarths Refuge (1 hour)
    In Rhaiaden.

Assist a Jealous Knight [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Yenadar
Level: 22, 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Alcordian, Shadowclaw
Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Halsenar, the ancient war general (30 minutes)
    In Alcordian, wandering in the southern part of zone.
  2. to find Hallandur (30 minutes)
    In Shadowclaw. On the second level, go south along the hall and then east into his office.
  3. to kill 7 of a soldier of Shadowclaw and Hallandur (25 minutes)
    The soldiers pop in the room with you.

Assist Apprentice in the Alcordian Battleground [Complete]

Contributed by: Urand
Level: 28-30
Difficulty: moderate to hard (CPK)
Locale(s): Alcord, Goland's Tower
Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Ara (1 hour)
    In Alcord. From @, go all S, 2W, all N (several hidden exits) and look around.
  2. to find the book of dark rituals (2 hours)
    In Goland's Tower, in CPK area. From Goland's entrance, go all N to the front door of the tower. From their, go 2E, 3N, W, N, W, D and kill pond dweller for key. From here go U, S, 2E, S, and search with key in inventory. Then go D, 2W, S, W, open door, W, S, open door W, W, open door N, N, search, 2N, search D, N. West of this altar is 1 room of CPK with the priest that loads the book.
  3. to find Ara (1 hour)
    As above.
  4. to give the book of dark rituals to Ara (30 minutes)
    As above.

Assist Drunken Man with Date Preparations [Complete]

Contributed by: Ceresir
Additions by: Makios
Level: 25, 28
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Trellor, Castle Medievia, Enara, El Cantara, Vark Outpost
Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the drunken man (30 minutes)
    In Trellor, located randomly. This is a hidden mob.
  2. to give a heavy pair of navy blue pants with gold trim and blue leather boots that are far too big and a book of romantic verse to the drunken man (3 hours)
    blue leather boots that are far too big: loads on Kaisa, king of Enara. From @, go all N, 3W, 4N 3E, N, open door, N, and ice the guards there for the guardpost key. Unlock/open door, N, open portcullis, 3N, 2U, 2S, E, 2N, W, search, 2N, E, open door, N, W, N, W and kill Kaisa.
    a book of romantic verse: pops on Madame Miriam in El Cantara. She is in the room "The Institute of Free Verse". From @, go U, 2N, E, 4N, 2W, N. Kill Miriam
    a heavy pair of navy blue pants with gold trim: pops on a special Kerstian novice in Castle Medievia. From the top of the dragon staircase, go: 2E, 2S, W till U, 2S, open door E, E. This is where he wanders. Look for "(Blue Aura) An adept member of the Kerstian Elites regards you carefully."
  3. to give a beautifully embroidered wineskin to the drunken man (1 hour)
    Loads on a Vark arch-magi in Vark Outpost. From @, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever. Then go 2N, 2E, N to Vark arch-magi. Warning: This mob has permanent fireshield and is in a cold room; it is very difficult to solo.

Assist Dwarven Miner [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: MR
Level:
Difficulty: moderately easy
Locale(s): Riverton Mines
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find a dwarven miner (40 minutes)
    In Riverton Mines.
  2. to find a mine foreman ( )
    You receive a lantern.
  3. to give a lantern to a dwarven miner ( )
    You receive 5 chunks of newly mined ore.
  4. to give 5 chunks of newly mined ore to a mine foreman ( )

Assist Famine [Complete]

Contributed by: Sulin
Level: 11
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): City Of Medievia
Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Famar, the town crier (30 minutes)
    In City of Medievia. From recall go S.
  2. to find a room called Medievia Post Office (10 minutes)
    From Famar, go 2N, 2E.
  3. to find a generous portion of ham (30 minutes)
    From Post Office, go W, S, 4E, 3N, buy ham.
  4. to find a room called Medievia Post Office (10 minutes)
    From Desigra's Delicatessen, 3S, 4W, N, E.

Assist Lunari In Finding A Saving Relic [Complete]

Contributed by: Phu
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Goland's Tower, Celestia
Total Time: 2 hours, 55 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Lord Lunari, Sorcerer of the Moon (1 hour, 10 minutes)
    In Celestia. From @ go N, E.
  2. to find the dagger of Varanexus [hidden] (1 hour)
    In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go N to "Before Goland's Tower." Then go 3W, all N, all E till down exit, D, kill dweller for key ("a narrow bone which might serve as a key"). Then go U, S, 2E, search, D. Then go 2E, 2N, D, 2W, S, 2W, N to Calsinc the caretaker. Kill him for a key. Then go all S, N, to locked door west. Unlock the door and go W; unlock the door and go N. Varanexusloads here.
  3. to give Varanexus' dagger of Thaumaturgy to Lord Lunari, Sorcerer of the Moon (45 minutes)
    As above.

Assist Riverton Trading Partners [Complete]

Contributed by: Mandroth
Level: 24
Difficulty: medium
Locale(s): Riverton, Ruellia
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find the mayor (1 hour)
    In Riverton. See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to find the wilderness room at 1053x1239 (30 minutes)
    This is the Riverton trading post just to the southwest of town.
  3. to find three of a fertilizer sack (no limit)
    See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go N to the village. These sacks load on the fertilizer hauler mob ("A man trudges from the farms to the mushroom caves is here") which randomly wander the streets in the village. This objective is flagged as find-original.
  4. to find the wilderness room at 1053x1239 (30 minutes)
    As above.

Difficulty: moderate

    In Trellor. From recall, U, 2N, U.
  3. to find a plump priest (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to kill the Kraken (1 hour)
    In Lattyrna. From Trellor recall, go all E, D, D, all E, N, all D, all E, then N to "Ivory Road, Near the Gates" then all E until "The Intersection of Crystal and Ivory" then 6N until "The Intersection of Crystal and Onyx," then 2E, 2U, W, N. The Kraken loads here.

Assist the Vhartogs [Complete]

Additions by: Ceresir
Level: 27, 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Brookhaven
Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a vhartog commander (1 hour)
    In Brookhaven. From zone entrance (@), go all N to the gate. The 2.guard has an invisible key; kill him and loot it. Unlock door, open door, N. The commander loads here. (We recommend then going immediately S to prevent being attacked.)
  2. to kill 10 of a sleepy homeowner (1 hour)
    Located in Brookhaven, in pairs. Wander around until you find a locked door to a house, then pick or ethereal past it.
  3. to find a vhartog commander (15 minutes)
    As above.

  4. to kill 2Soldiers and a mercenary mage and 4 of the soldier ()
    Load outside in Chepstow. You will need key from the warrior in objective 2.

    As above.

Assisting Dread [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Lanario
Level: 21
Difficulty: moderately easy
Locale(s): Trellor, Horneg's Keep
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Dread the Armourer (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, 5 N, 3W, N.
  2. to give a human skull helmet, a breastplate of rib bones, orc-skin sleeves, and orc-skin leggings to Dread the Armourer (2 hours)
    In Horneg's Keep, on the Gargoyle Commander. From southern @ to Spirited Heights, go W, N, W, N, W, 2N, W, all N, U, S, U, W, U, S, U, E, U, S, follow the path around till there is a gate. (It may be unlocked. If you are not a thief you will have to kill the mob that is guarding it; otherwise it's pickable.) Then go all S till you come to another door. Open it, go all S to find the Gargoyle Commander. You may possibly have to kill him multiple times for the multiple items.

Assisting the Wizard [Complete]

Contributed by: Afiniti
Additions by: Fiegmund
Level: 28, 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Vark, Wilderness, Vanlarra
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
    See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to kill a vark arch-magi and 2 of a renegade wizard and Horneg (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    vark mage: In Vark Outpost. From entrance, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever, 2N, 2E,open door N, N. Spawns in a cold room, is fireshielded, and has images.
    renegade wizard: In the wilderness, on NaeraMae and E'urtzen islands.
    Horneg: In Horneg's Keep. From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here.

Astronomer's Tools [Complete]

Contributed by: Zynix
Level: 22, 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Yldari, Pirate Ship
Total Time: 1 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Frynyari, the Sapphire Knight (40 minutes)
    In the Palace of Yldari. From the entrnace to the zone (@), go 5 N, W, 5 N, W, 2U, S, W, S, 2U.
  2. to give a brass sextant to Frynyari, the Sapphire Knight (1 hour)
    The brass sextant loads on the Navigator in Pirate Ship. From the entrance to the zone (@), go E, 4N, E, U, S, 2E, search, D, E, S. Kill the navigator (a level 20+ warrior.)

Astronomer's Woes [Complete]

Contributed by: Ravir
Level: 23
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Braneri, Wilderness
Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an astronomer (30 minutes)
    In Academy of Braneri in the astronomy building, N, W, N, W from zone entrance.
  2. to find a room called The Highest Point of Medievia (30 minutes)
    In Mt. Vryce. From the zone entrance, go N, all U, N, all E, S, all E, N, all E, 3S, all E, all U, S, all U.
  3. to kill 2 of a gargoyle (15 minutes)
    These load when you enter the room.

Avenge a Death [Complete]

Additions by: Kirgan
Completed by: Milekan
Level: 24
Difficulty: extremely hard (no flags)
Locale(s): Derah, Ruellia
Total Time: 3 hours, 12 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the mayor (30 minutes)
    From entrance into Derah, go all N until "The Towne Fountain," then all W until "The Business Square," then N, open door west, W, U.
  2. to find Agalinis, the village foreman (30 minutes)
    In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go N, N, W, W, N, W, N, W, W, W, W, S, S, S, W. (Be careful: Agalinis is aggro!)
  3. to find the mayor (20 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to kill 2 of a visiting dignitary (1 hour)
    In Riverton. These are found in the upper level of the inn, one each in the rooms N, W, and S from the hall. From recall in Riverton, go 2W, S until there's a west exit to "Inn of the Blazing Sun." Then go W, all U, and pick doors north, west, and south.
  5. to give a message to a visiting dignitary (1 minute)
    Enter the third of the above listed rooms.
  6. to find Agalinis, the village foreman (30 minutes)
    As above.
  7. to find the mayor (20 minutes)
    As above.

Avenge Slayings in the Yldari Forest [Complete]

Contributed by: Zasildar
Additions by: Milekan
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Yldari, Wittermark
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the Lord of Yldari (30 minutes)
    In Palace of Yldari. From entrance, go all N, W, 2N, open gates, all N, E, all N.
  2. to kill 10 of a Wittermark Dryad and Ensatia, the Dryad Queen (no limit)
    In Wittermark.
    Dryads load just N of zone entrance (hidden.)
    Ensatia: From zone entrance, go all W, all S, all W, all S, all W, all W, all S, then all W to "A Throne of Bone and Wood." Ensatia loads here.

Avenge the Blood Witch [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Belizar
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Condemned Arena, Gloumewood Farm
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find the blood witch (1 hour)
    Located in Condemned Arena.
  2. to kill Osiquine (no limit)
    In Gloumewood Farm. From @, go all E to locked gate, then 2N, W, enter ring, "pray." Look around for a black cat. Kill it 9 times, which pops Osiquine. Kill her and get the key to her shack.
  3. to find the book "The Joy of Potion" (no limit)
    Look around for a hidden E exit. After going E, go N, unlock door, N, open door E, E, open drawer, search drawer, get key drawer, W, search, U, unlock chest, open chest, get book chest.
  4. to find a blood witch (1 hour)
    As above.
  5. to give the book "The Joy of Potion" to a blood witch (5 minutes)
    As above.

Baenlyr Anti-Venom Potion [Complete]

Level: 28, 30
Difficulty: moderate (with help) to hard (staked NPK)
Locale(s): Graveyard
Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the High Priest of the Church (20 minutes)
    In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
  2. to find the wilderness room at 1052 x 1240 (1 hour)
    Just west of the western entrance to Riverton. Screen looks like this:
    ++...::*.::::..
    .....:******:..
    ++...::.*III@I~
    +.....::*I I~
    +......:$I I~
    +......#:@ I~
    ++++...:*III@I~
    ++++...:****:..
    +++....:....:.+
    ++.....::::::..
    ++.++....:....+
  3. to find the Adder of Death (2 hours)
    In Thanos. From zone entrance, 2N, 3W, S.
  4. to kill the Adder of Death (20 minutes)
    Get some help with this!
  5. to find the wilderness room at 1052 x 1240 (1 hour)
    As above.

Baenlyr for Breakfast [Complete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Additions by: Cipactli, Magtheridon

Level: 20
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Underground Tunnels, Graveyard, Riverton, Brookhaven
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the magius, Shorn Cavar (30 minutes)
    In The Underground Tunnels. From path outside Graveyard, go 10N, 2E, D, 6S, W, 2S, E, N, W, S, E, S, E, N.
  2. to give a tin of smoked Genesian baenlyr and a baenlyr filet to the magius, Shorn Cavar (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    a tin of smoked Genesian baenlyr: in Riverton. From north @, go 6S, 2W, N, buy baenlyr.
    a baenlyr filet: In Brookhaven. From entrance, go W,S.

Baenlyr Problem [Complete]

Additions by: Vincent, Milekan
Level: 22
Difficulty: hard (time limit, all no-death)
Locale(s): Alendora
Total Time: 3 hours, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a Havensdora hunter (1 hour)
    In Forest of the Alendora. From the northern zone entrance (@), go all S, all E, then all S until you are in "An Illuminated Meadow." Hunters should move randomly in this area.
  2. to kill 15 of a baenlyr (2 hours)
    Try looking near CT 54.
  3. to find a Havensdora hunter (45 minutes)

Bagels for a Customer [Complete]

Contributed by: Vyra and Arias
Additions by: Morrrad, Sulin
Level: 12
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Trellor
Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Kaliska the hostess (30 minutes)
    Found in the Cleric Quarter of Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 4E, 4N, 2W, N.
  2. to give 2 of a bagel with cream cheese to Kaliska the hostess (45 minutes)
    Bagels with cream cheese can be purchased at the Coffee Pot in Trellor. From recall, 5S, 4W, S.

Baking Supplies for Dipwaun [Complete]

Contributed by: Ceresir
Level: 27, 30
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Quinstone's Keep, Hamlet of Egriel
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Dipwaun, the cook (1 hour)
    In Quinstone. From @, go N, 2E, 2U, 2E, N, E, S.
  2. to find a wooden rolling pin and a sack of flour (no time limit)
    In Egriel. Enter the zone during daytime hours (after 6 am.) Go 2E, 3S, 2E, N. Rolling pin loads on Aleib here. Sack of flour loads on the ground in the root cellar of the windmill. From here, go 3S, E, D.
  3. to give a wooden rolling pin and a sack of flour to Dipwaun, the cook (40 minutes)
    As above.

Ballerina's Blues [Complete]

Contributed by: Miranar
Level: 20
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Akenuas, E'nat'dae
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find a graceful ballerina (45 minutes)
    At the Imperial Ballet School in the Hidden City of E'nat'dae. From entrance, go N, W, 8N, W, D.
  2. to give a soft, red foxtail with a white tip to a graceful ballerina (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    Loads on a small fox at Akenuas Glade. From entrance, go N, W and look around.

Banana For Yaxley [Complete]

Contributed by: Elagneros
Additions by: Satra
Level: 19
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Enara, The Gypsy Camp
Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Yaxley (40 minutes)
    In Enara. From entrance of Enara, go 2N, 4E, 4N, E, N, E, N (into NPK), 3E, N, E, 2N, 3W to "Before A Village ofWagons." Then go W and S to find Yaxley.
  2. to find a bundle of bananas (1 hour)
    In the Gypsy Camp. From entrance, follow the path until you reach the ticket vendor. Buy a ticket to enter the carnival. From vendor, go S, 2W, all N, give ticket to the gypsy, all W, 3N, 3W which puts you in front of gorilla cage. Bananas are in cage.
  3. to give a bundle of bananas to Yaxley (40 minutes)
    As above.

Bandit Alliance [Incomplete]

Level: 26, 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Elnissa
Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the bandit leader (30 minutes)
    In Forbidden Forest. From zone entrance, go all E, S, E, 3S, 3 W, 2N, 2E and look around for this hidden mob.
  2. to find the leader of the bandits (1 hour)
    In Underground Shafts. From zone entrance, go D, 2E, 2N, 2E, 4S, 4E and look around for this hidden mob.
  3. to give a large sack of gold bars to the leader of the bandits (1 hour)
    Found in Elnissa.

Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Ensatia, the Dryad Queen (30 minutes)

Locale(s): Mellorian
Total Time: no limit

  2. to give a toy doll to the Baroness's guustael (no limit)
    In Med City. From recall, go 3E, N, all E, and buy doll.

Barthamel's Escape [Complete]

Contributed by: Mandroth
Additions by: Jaztari
Level: 20, 21, 23, 24
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Mellorian Citadel, Mystical Forest
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Barthamel, the imprisoned pirate (no limit)
    In Mellorian. From zone entrance, go 6N (to altar), 3W, S, 2 E, S. (Be sure someone doesn't start running the zone while you're here!)
  2. to give a set of lockpicks to Barthamel (no limit)
    Lockpicks can be bought from the key-shop in Mystical Forest. From the southern entrance (the @ which has a north exit) it's 2N, W, 6N, E to the shop; alternatively, from recall, it's 3S, E. Return to Barthamel.

Baskille Yearns for Cookies [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Feytor
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Medievia, Trellor, E'nat'dae
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Baskille (1 hour)
    In Trellor. From recall, all N, W.
  2. to give a chocolate chip cookie and a small gingerbread man with chocolate chip eyes to Baskille ()
    In Med City. From recall, enter thief, 4E, 2N, W, buy cookie. In E'nat'dae. From recall, go 3S, W, buy gingerbread.
  3. to find a white chocolate chip macadamia nut cookie ()
    In Sceptrum. From @, go all N, all E, enter mirror, all D, all N, S, D, U, all E. Kill hungry boy for cookie.
  4. to give a white chocolate chip macadamia nut cookie to Baskille ()
    As above.

Baskille's Hunger [Complete]

Contributed by: Ogrim
Additions by: Autolycus
Level: 17, 23
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Trellor, Preserve
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Baskille (30 minutes)
    See Baskille in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to find a chocolate brownie (1 hour)
    On a brownie in the Preserve. From the zone entrance (@), go 2 W, N, E, N, 2W, S, 2W ("Crossing a Wooden Bridge"), S, E, search, S (hidden opening), D, E, search, S. The brownies will be in these rooms.
  3. to find Baskille (15 minutes)
    As above.

Baskille's Rumbling Tummy [Complete]

Additions by: Eldren
Level: 24
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Dragmire, Med City
Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Baskille (30 minutes)
    See Baskille in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to find a crayfish claw (30 minutes)
    In Dragmire. From @: W, U, N, D, 4W, 4N, 3E*, 2S, 2E. Look for crayfish.
    *Be careful heading east here: it's NPK and the mushrooms and spheres can see invis. Cast Quick and run the 3E, 2S, E to avoid them or sneak. Crayfish claw loads on "A crustacean, much like a lobster. . ."
  3. to give a crayfish claw to Baskille, the retired sailor (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to find of either a bottle of Ashton Lager, a bottle of Dragmire Stout, or a frosty mug full of "Olaffson's Special" (20 minutes)
    Frosty mug can be purchased in Med City. From Med recall, enter warrior, then E, E, E, E, S, S, W, W. Buy special.
  5. to give 1 of either a bottle of Ashton Lager, a bottle of Dragmire Stout, or a frosty mug full of "Olaffson's Special" to Baskille, the retired sailor (20 minutes)
    As above.

Battle Claws for an Assassin [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Eliashin
Additions by: Bandof
Level: 30
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Medievia, Spiderwode
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an assassin of the Veiled Society (30 minutes)
    From Med recall, enter Warrior, then go 2W, 2S, D, 2S, 2W, 3S, 4E, D, 3N, 2W, 4S, 2W to the "Secret Prison" room. Search. U. E.
  2. to find darkling battle claws (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    Loads in Spiderwode, from the Darklings. Head towards the mansion (northish part of the zone, east of the chandali camp). Search the middle room of the mansionand go D. Darklings load here.
  3. to find an assassin of the Veiled Society (25 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give darkling battle claws to an assassin of the Veiled Society (5 minutes)
    As above.

    In New Ashton, in the cafe in the SE part of town.
  3. to find Helasus the Barkeep (30 minutes)

Beads For Daroctwil [Complete]

Contributed by: Ororuque
Level: 28
Difficulty: hard (CPK)
Locale(s): Brookhaven, Coliseum
Total Time: 6 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Daroctwil (1 hour)
    In Brookhaven. From @, go all N, kill guards for key, unlock/open north. Go N, 2W, N, E, N, W, U, N, D, N, 2E, U, N, D, E, Y for CPK, D. Note: if you can sneak past all the varthogs, this part is pretty easy; otherwise, get help.
  2. to find an ogre named Gezzamal (2 hours)
    In Coliseum. From northern entrance go: 2S, E, S, E, 2S, 3W, N, 3W, 5S, 2E.
  3. to give Gezzamal's beads to Daroctwil (1 hour)
    As above.

Bear Claws for Harash [Complete]

Contributed by: Holcaul
Updated by: Shanoyu
Level: 13, 16
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Preserve, Med City
Total Time: 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Harash (10 minutes)
    Harash is found in Med City, in the market area. From recall, go E, E, E, N, N, N.
  2. to find a bear claw (20 minutes)
    Loads in the Preserve. From entrance to the Preserve, go to the bear cave: W, W, W, N, E, N, W, W, W, W, W, W, W, N, D. Bears load here in the cave.
  3. to give a bear claw to Harash (10 minutes)
    As above.

    headband: in Eldrick's on Ludoc.

Beastman Errands [Complete]

Additions by: Awnuk
Level: 23, 24
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Xanthal
Total Time: 5 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a beastman (45 minutes)
    Just inside the zone (go north once or twice), two beastmen usually load.
  2. to give a butchered piece of human carcass to a beastman (2 hours)
    Found in Asnor in the freezer. From entrance, go Nu, U, 3N, U, 5N, U, 2W, D, all W, 2E, 2S, E, N, W, N, open freezer, get all freezer.
  3. to give a stone cup to a beastman (45 minutes)
    Buy in Mystical Forest. From recall, go 2N, W, 8E and buy cup.
  4. to give a bloody shortsword to a beastman (2 hours)
    In Tharhalas, on guards toward the back of the zone.

Beautiful Gifts [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Disiku
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Asnor
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find a High Priest of Skye Temple (1 hour, 20 minutes)
    In Asnor, about 9 levels up. From SE @ entrance, go due N/U until you are in the Temple. Go all N. At "A Long Stairwell," go U, then all S, U, then all N. The High Priest loads here at the Altar of Skye.
  2. to find a jeweled rose ( )
    Loads in Mynoric Garrison.
  3. to give a jeweled rose to the High Priestess of Trell (30 minutes?)
    See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.

Beaver Problem [Complete]

Contributed by: Loere
Level: 27
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Ryvaera
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Delaia, the naiad empress (30 minutes)
    In Ryvaera. From western @, go 2S, 3D, E, open portcullis, 2N.
  2. to kill a beaver kit [hidden objective] (30 minutes)
    From Delaia, go 2S, W, U, all E. Mob will load here and engage you automatically.
  3. to find Bavtor, the beaver king (20 minutes)
    From above room, search, E, 2N, 3E, S, 2W, D, S, W, 2N, 2E, 2S, E, S, 2W, kill guards for key, unlock/open door, W.
  4. to find a room called On a Roof, in Deep Water (20 minutes)
    From throne room in last objective, go U, N, W.
  5. to kill 2 of a member of Bavtor's royal guard (20 minutes)
    These load in the above room and automatically engage you.Note: When you complete this final objective, Delaia appears in your room and ports you to a room in Mount Vryce.

Become Inebriated Fisherman's Friend [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Neverra
Level: 18
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s):
Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an inebriated fisherman ( )
    In Crystal Lake. From entrance, go N, all W. Mob wanders around this area.
  2. to give Pixie's Pure Spirits and a bottle to an inebriated fisherman ( )
    Pixie's Pure Spirits can be found in Med. From recall, enter mage, then go W, 2N. A bottle can be found in Trellor; from recall, go 5E, S, E.

Bedamire's Mess [Complete]

Level: 27, 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Mellorian, Med City, Pirate Ship, Enara
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Bedamire, the Senior Servant (no limit)
    In Mellorian Citadel. From zone entrance, go all N, 2S, 2E, and S through the door.
  2. to give a mop and 2 of a wet, soapy dishrag and a broom to Bedamire, the Senior Servant (no limit)
    a mop: Mop can be found in Pirate Ship on a midshipman (a level 20+ warrior) on the Main Deck level.
    a wet, soapy dishrag: in Enara. From entrance, go N, all W, N, W, all N to the Scullery. Two scullery maids carry dishrags in their inventory ("trash.")
    a broom: Load on janitors in Med City.

Beginning Mage Books for Apprentice [Complete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Additions by:Decrata, Maelstrom, Shaedehart, Hypnux
Level: 27, 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find an apprentice (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter mage and look for "A young man performing errands."
  2. to find a beginner's guide to wilderness spells and a beginner's guide to necromancy and a beginner's guide to summoning elementals and a beginner's guide to spells of armageddon (2 hours)
    All are located in Spiderwode on an apprentice, in the Chandali camp, in a room called "Inside a Black Wagon" in the north part of the camp. From the entrance: Go all N until "A clearing in the wood," then all W, N, 2W, N, 4W, N. Book loads here.
  3. to give a beginner's guide to wilderness spells and a beginner's guide to necromancy and a beginner's guide to summoning elementals and a beginner's guide to spells of armageddon to an apprentice (30 minutes)
    As above.

Bellringer's Rope Dilemma [Complete]

Contributed by: Afiniti
Additions by: Milekan, Kernighan, Antdos
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med Graveyard
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the young bellringer (30 minutes)
    In Med Graveyard, in the church. From the "Cathedral Foyer", go W, U, W, all U.
  2. to give a long coil of rope and 2 of a coil of mossy rope to the young bellringer (2 hours, 30 minutes)
    a long coil of rope: In Pirate Ship. From zone entrance (@), go E, all N, E, U, E, E, 5 N, D, S, S, pick door W, open door W, 3S, E. Get all crate for the rope.
    a coil of mossy rope: In Esacha Fen. In the room "A Drydock in the Fen." It loads on the ground. From entrance to Esacha Fen, go 3N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E, N (hidden exit), E. Then go S and E to the drydock area. Note: this is find-original.

Belly Dancer Needing Gems [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Pleen
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): El Cantara
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Zora, Mistress of Dance (45 minutes)
    In El Cantara. From zone entrance, go U, 2N, E, 8N, 2E, N.
  2. to find an amethyst and a glittering diamond (1 hour)
    Both are in Goblin Castle:
    amethyst: From entrance to Goblin Castle, go all W, 3N, E, 4S.
    diamond: From above, go U. Defeat Goblin King and loot key. Diamond loads in the chest. Note: These are find-original.
  3. to give an amethyst and a glittering diamond to Zora, Mistress of Dance (30 minutes)
    As above.

Belt for a Fisherman [Complete]

Contributed by: Aivanther
Level: 25, 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Crystal Lake, Horneg's Keep
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find an inebriated fisherman (no limit)
    In Crystal Lake. From entrance, go N, all W and look around.
  2. to find a belt of protection (no limit)
    Loads on Horneg in Horneg's Keep. From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here.
  3. to give a belt of protection to an inebriated fisherman (no limit)
    In Crystal Lake. From entrance, go N, all W and look around.

Berries for Forager [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Railker
Additions by: Swiftmoon
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Alendora, Rydhordel Woods, Ruellia
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a forager (30 minutes)
    2. In Alendora.
  2. to give a clump of blue berries and a clump of green berries and a red berry and some blackberries to a forager ( )
    Clump of blue berries and clump of green berries: in Ruellia.
    Red berry: in Alendora.
    Blackberries: in Rydhordel Woods. Enter northern @ and go W, S, W, 4S (Small Clearing in the Wood). If it's not here, then go all S, 3W.

Berry Salad for King's Birthday [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Amare and Alyxe
Level: 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Enara, Brookhaven, Alendora, Ruellia
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the cook (30 minutes)
    In Enara. From entrance, go N, 7W, N, W, 8N, open door, 3N.
  2. to give a clump of ripe berries and a small clump of green berries and a small clump of blue berries and 3 of a red berry to the cook (3 hours, 30 minutes)
    a clump of ripe berries: Loads in Brookhaven in a thorny bush in the room In a Tangled Thicket.
    a small clump of green berries and a small clump of blue berries:
    In Ruellia. Search in the room "Beside a Valley Wall" then go E, U, N, and get all shrub. Then go S, D, W, S and get all shrub. a red berry: Located in Alendora, on anteaters, Havensdora foragers, and in rooms. From northern @, go 2S, 2E, S, E, and look around for anteaters.

Besieged By Angels [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Kirgan
Level: 29
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Sceptrum, Braneri, Alcord
Total Time: 7 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Reverend Welsh, the town preacher (50 minutes)
    In Sceptrum. From @, go all N, 2E, enter mirror, all D, all N (hidden.)
  2. to kill the angel [hidden objective] (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Braneri. From entrance, go 5N, 2W, search, go D (kill fish for bronze key). Then go U, 5E, unlock door N, N, kill Dean for silver key. Then go S, E, unlock door N, N, kill Provost for gold key.Then go S, unlock door S, S, kill secretary for wooden key. Then unlock door W, W, kill Chancellor for huge iron key. Then go E, N, 3W, all N, U, N, give 1 gold usher, N, E, unlock door N, all U (you must have a good aligned person here if you are not), kill angel.
  3. to find Reverend Welsh, the town preacher (50 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to kill the angel [hidden] ()
    The Angel of Redemption is at the center of lake in Alcordian.

Better Business for Genkaya [Complete]

Contributed by: Milekan
Additions by: Cimn
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Lyryanoth
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Genkaya (30 minutes)
    In Lyryanoth. From recall, go 3S, 2E, N.
  2. to kill 5 of a brother of the Purification Society (1 hour)
    From above, go S, E, S. One will have a pure white key: be sure to get this for your next objective.
  3. to give the book of Purification to the master blacksmith, Genkaya (39 minutes)
    The book also loads in Lyryanoth. From recall, go 5W, 3S, unlock door W, W. Book loads on the floor. Return it to Genkaya.

Big Bugs [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Phu
Level: 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Graveyard/Med City, Thanos
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
    In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
  2. to kill 3 of a mammoth dragonfly and a gargantuan mantis and 4 of a black widow (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Thanos.
  3. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
    As above.

Birthday Gift for Princess Ita [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Additions by: Clarisa, Gruok
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Arcadia, Lagoon of Menace
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to to find the Empress, J'Inaere il'Rafie (30 minutes)
    In E'nat'dae. From recall, go all N, all U, all S.
  2. to to find a pair of elbow-length white gloves and a stylish hand fan, displaying blossoming flowers and a pair of pink lace-trimmed wool socks (2 hours)
    Socks: in Arcadia on the sheep. From zone entrance, go all U, all S, all E, all S, enter whirlpool. If you end up at "An Ancient Stone Column, a Landmark of Tryss' Arcadia" go W, S, E until "A Field of Wheat." Look around for the sheep. Fan and gloves: in Lagoon. From entrance, go W, S, all W, all S and look around. A visiting lady loads the fan and a serving maid loads the gloves.
  3. to give a pair of elbow-length white gloves and a stylish hand fan, displaying blossoming flowers and a pair of pink lace-trimmed wool socks to the Empress, J'Inaere il'Rafie (30 minutes)
    As above.

Objectives:
  1. to find the blood elemental (1 hour, 20 minutes)
    At recall in evil Derah.

Blood for Witch [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Talron, Elecruse, Zasildar
Level: 26, 28, 29
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Condemned Arena
Total Time: 6 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a blood witch (2 hours)
    In Condemned Arena. From zone entrance, go all E, N, 2E, 3S, E, S, E, S, all E, N, 2E (hidden exit), S, E.
  2. to kill 12 of either a red warg, a bandit scout, a grey wolf, a black wolf, a stealthy bandit, or a slender bandit (2 hours)
    These all load in Condemned NPK.
  3. to give a dried human corpse to a blood witch (2 hours)
    This loads in a rusty iron cage under the dome of Condemned. In the northeast part of the zone, pull the branch. Then go S, 3W, S, W, S, D, 2W, N.

Blood of the King of Snakes for the Crazy Alchemist [Complete]

Contributed by: Takphius
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Braneri, Sceptrum
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a crazy alchemist (30 minutes)
    In Braneri. From entrance, go 2N, E, N, open door E, 3E, U, W and look around.
  2. to kill Ssslasssusss, King of Snakes (1 hour)
    In Sceptrum. From entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N (through hidden exit) till D, D, U, W and look around.
  3. to give a vial of dark yellow potion to a crazy alchemist (30 minutes)
    As above.

Blowdarts for an Esachan Hunter [Complete]

Contributed by: Helitus
Additions by: Kiona, Dweia
Level: 19
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Esacha Fen
Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an Esachan hunter (1 hour)
    In Esacha Fen, on barge.
  2. to find 3 of a blowdart (1 hour)
    On the natives in Pyramid. From recall, go N, all W. If he is not there, then go 5N 2U S all E, W, N, all E. Loads anywhere on that route.

Bluebells for Sendaria [Complete]

Contributed by: Zynix
Additions by: Vashka
Level: 23
Difficulty: fairly easy
Locale(s): Academy of Braneri, Trellor
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (30 minutes)
    Sendaria can be found in Trellor, in the northeast corner of the Merchant Circle. From Trellor recall: E, E, E, E, E, all N, then E.
  2. to give 3 of a pretty bluebell or an anklet of bluebells to Sendaria, Mistress of Magic (3 hours, 30 minutes)
    Bluebells can be found in the Academy of Braneri. Go all N until "A Small Well," then W, S, S, W (open gate.) Only one loads in the zone per reset.
    Anklet of bluebells loads in Tharhalas.

Bone Equipment for a Skeletal Warrior [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Petros
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Alcord
Total Time: 3 hours, 55 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a skeletal warrior (1 hour)
    In Alcord. From zone entrance, go all S, E, S and look around.
  2. to find a carved bone bracelet and a bone necklace and a shield of old bones and a fine bone ring (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    All load in Xanthal as follows:

    Bone bracelet: loads on Malanase.
    a bone necklace: on a beastman.
    a shield of old bones: From center of tower, go all E, U, E, N.
    a fine bone ring: on Kalafungen.

  3. to find a skeletal warrior (1 hour)
    As above.
  4. to give a carved bone bracelet and a bone necklace and a shield of old bones and a fine bone ring to a skeletal warrior (5 minutes)
    As above. Note: the necklace is cursed, so you will need to remove curse (or have someone do it for you) to give it away.

Bonk's Big Date [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Carisman
Level: 25, 26
Difficulty: fairly easy
Locale(s): Trellor, Braneri, Wytherwind, Lattyrna
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Bonk the Cleaver (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, 5E, 3N, E.
  2. to give a beautiful, lonely rose and a seashell necklace and a bottle of FretherField White from the Wytherwind Winery to Bonk the Cleaver (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    a beautiful, lonely rose: In Braneri. From zone entrance, go N, W, 4N, W, S.
    a seashell necklace: in Pirate Ship on the navigator.
    a bottle of FretherField White from the Wytherwind Winery: in Wytherwind. In Wytherwind on the underground level. From the zone entrance, go all S (to "Deep in the Mire"), W, W, W, S, S, S, search, D, D. (Be sure you're breathing water.) Go W, N, N, W, S, W, W, N, N, W. Get the crow bar. Go down to a room called "An Underwater Wine Cellar." Unlock crate, open crate, and get all crate.

Bonk's Competition [Complete]

Level: 19, 21, 22
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Med City, Trellor
Total Time: 3 hours, 5 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Bonk the Cleaver (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, 5E, 3N, E.
  2. to find a room called The Coffee Pot (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, 5S, 4W, S.
  3. to find a room called Familiar Haunts (1 hour)
    From Med recall, enter mage. Go all W, search, D.
  4. to find a room called The Hungry Lizardfolk (45 minutes)
    In Lyryanoth. From recall, go 4E, N.
  5. to find Bonk the Cleaver (20 minutes)
    As above.

  2. to give a lace-trimmed bonnet to Morwa, the shopkeeper (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Yldari. Loads on a young maid. in room called "The Gallery of Paintings" In Yldari. From @, go all N, W, 2N, open gates, 2N, 2E, U, W, S.

Book for a Child [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Plegue
Additions by: Cipactli
Level: 22
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Enara/Esacha, Braneri
Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a drowsy child ( )
    In the Gypsy Gemothalle in Esacha Fen. From entrance to the fen, go E, 3N, 2E, 3N, W, N, W, N, W, N, E and look around.
  2. to find a large book of short stories (1 hour)
    In the monastery in Braneri. From @, go 8N, 2W, pick/ethereal, W, N, E.
  3. to give a large book of short stories to a drowsy child ( )

Book for Henry [Complete]

Contributed by: Hyksos
Level: 24
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Graveyard
Total Time: 5 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Miranlo, the royal gardener (2 hours)
    Miranlo loads in Lyryanoth. From @ head straight north to the town fountain, Then go all west (angry Protestors will block your way) when you get to the protestors, go north. He will wander around in this area, but wont go far. He will give you the HitchHikers Guide to the Galaxy.
  2. to give the book to Henry, the Cathedral gardener (1 hour)
    In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
  3. to find Miranlo, the royal gardener (2 hours)
    As above.

Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Riverton
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the bookseller (1 hour)
    From Riverton North Gate, go S, 4W, N.
  2. to find a learned mage (30 minutes)
    In Riverton Mines (S of west gate).

Books for a Bookworm [Complete]

Additions by: Cipactli, Phu
Level: 26, 27, 29
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Xanthal, Braneri
Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a bookworm (3 hours, 35 minutes)
    In Xanthal. From entrance (@), go N, W, W, N, N and kill the servant who loads the tower master key. Go W, N, W, U to "A Carpeted Hallway." Go N, W, unlock door S, S.
  2. to give 3 of either a large book of short stories, a well-bound book, a dusty book, a condensed holy book, a treatise on "the good," or a religious treatise to a bookworm (1 hour)
    These load on the ground in various spots in Braneri; it is not necessary to kill any mobs to get them. Check the classrooms in the buildings just to the W and E of the zone entrance, or at the altar (all north and up from entrance.)

Boots for Hissalt [Complete]

Contributed by: Miraessa
Level: 28
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Crime Underground, Spirited Heights
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Hissalt, a novice thief (30 minutes)
    In Crime Underground. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. Then go S, W. Make sure to have "sense life" casted.
  2. to find Horneg's boots of levitation (1 hour)
    From Spirited Heights' northern entrance go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for the key. Unlock gate, open gate. Then go: 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search, W. Open sar, get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. Sandril will attack (lvl 20 cleric). Anytime you try looting the sarcarphagous she will attack. Then go: E, U, W, wear amulet (from corpse), U. Kill Horneg, loot corpse.
  3. to give Horneg's boots of levitation to Hissalt, a novice thief (30 minutes)
    As above.

Boots for Traveller [Complete]

Contributed by: Zynix
Level: 19, 21, 23
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Ruellia, NaeraMae
Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a weary traveler (30 minutes)
    This mob is just inside the entrance to Ruellia. Enter the zone by going D, then N, N, W, N. (This is also recall within the zone.)
  2. to give boots of striding to a weary traveler (4 hours)
    In NaeraNae, boots of striding load on Herind the druid. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the east (pick or kill the guard for the key.) Herind is charmable and about level 25.

Borrow Joy of Grammar for a Teacher [Complete]

Contributed by: Carolinus
Additions by: Lilopi
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Celestia
Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a lovely teacher (30 minutes)
    In E'nat'dae. From @, go 2N, W, cast breathe water, then go 4W, 2N, D, open grate, N, U, N, W, 5N (to Cherry Blossom Boulevard), 3E, N.
  2. to find Lady Ritayn (45 minutes)
    In Celestia. From entrance, go N, 2E, 12N, 3U, W, S. Lady Ritayn (invisible) gives you the book.
  3. to give the Joy of Grammar to a lovely teacher (30 minutes)
    As above.

Bouncer for Bonk [Complete]

Contributed by: Lurline
Level: 25, 27
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Trellor
Total Time: 1 hour, 35 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Bonk the Cleaver (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, 5E, 3N, E.
  2. to find a room called Merchant Circle (5 minutes)
    Go W.
  3. to kill 5 of a drunken brawler (10 minutes)
    Note: These pop in the room with you.
  4. to find Bonk the Cleaver (10 minutes)
    Go E.
  5. to find a room called Merchant Circle (5 minutes)
    Go W.
  6. to kill 2 of an inebriated fisherman (10 minutes)
    These load in the room with you, and in the room to the east.
  7. to find Bonk (10 minutes)
    As above.
  8. to kill 2 of a drunken pirate (15 minutes)
    Note: These pop in the room with you.

Bracers for Dread [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Kaycee
Level: 19, 20, 22, 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Goland's Tower, Crime Undergr, 26ound, Riverton
Total Time: 4 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Dread the Armourer (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, 5 N, 3W, N.
  2. to give bracers emblazoned with a bloody dragon's tail insignia, tempered steel bracers, the bracers of thievery, and the bracers of defense to Dread the Armourer (4 hours)
    bracers emblazoned with a bloody dragon's tail insignia: Load on an Elite Guard in Goland's Tower.
    tempered steel bracers : can be bought in Riverton at Guarian's Armory; from northern entrance, go S, 3W, S.
    bracers of thievery: load on Shalin in Crime Underground.
    bracers of defense: load on Herosai in Crime Undergound. Note: this is a find-original step.
  3. to find the Stormwatch Commander (10 minutes)
    In Trellor. From Dread's Armoury, go S, 3E, N.

Brandy for an Imp Cousin? [Complete]

Additions by: Magtheridon
Level: 19
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Med, Graveyard
Total Time: 1 hour
Objectives:
  1. to find a busking imp (30 minutes)
    In City of Medievia, in Mages' Quarter, on the Avenue of Occasional Remembrance
  2. to give a brandy bottle to a busking imp (30 minutes)
    Enter the City of Med Graveyard. Go to the southwest corner and enter the Caretaker's house. Find "The Parlor." Search, then go east; search again, then go down. Follow the tunnel around, finally going up. Get the brandy bottle from the sarcophagus. Return to Mages' Quarter to give the bottle to the imp.
    Alternatively, the brandy can be purchased in Trellor in the tavern on the E side of Merchant Circle.

Break for Danet [Complete]

Contributed by: Pawana
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Gloumewood
Total Time: 4 hours, 55 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Danet, the stableman (1 hour)
    In Gloumewood Farm. From @, go all E, all N, U, D (hidden), get needle (key), get to barn door on south side of farm, unlock/open door, S, look around.
  2. to find Malory, the stableman (30 minutes)
    Look around in the stable.
  3. to find a bottle of BristoleField Red from the Wytherwind Winery and a beautiful, lonely rose (2 hours)
    Rose is in Braneri. From entrance, go 4N, all W, open gate, W, S.
    Wine is in Wytherwind. From entrance, go all E, N, open door, 2W, S, E, search, S, search, 2D, 2E, N, 3W, 4S, 2W, 2N, W, search, cast breathe water, D, get all, unlock 2.crate, get all 2.crate.
  4. to give a bottle of BristoleField Red from the Wytherwind Winery and a beautiful, lonely rose to Malory, the stableman (45 minutes)
    As above.
  5. to find Danet, the stableman (30 minutes)
    As above.

Breakfast for a Homeless Beggar [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Velsara
Additions by: Corinthalus
Level: 19
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Sevoseth, Trellor, Medievia City, Gloumewood Farm
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find a homeless beggar ( )
    At Sevoseth. From zone entrance, go N.
  2. to find 3 of an unfertilized Gloumewood Farm egg and a brass milk jug and a hunk of cheese and a generous portion of ham ( )
    Cheese: can be purchased at Cleo's Market in Trellor. From recall, go 5N, W, N.
    ham: can be purchased in Med City.
    eggs: search corpses of large hens at Gloumewood.
    milk jug: loads on the farmhand with the farmer's daughter, also in Gloumewood.
  3. to give 3 of an unfertilized Gloumewood Farm egg and a brass milk jug and a hunk of cheese and a generous portion of ham to a homeless beggar (45 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a frying pan and a sizzling-hot spatula to a homeless beggar ( )
    frying pan: in Sevoseth near beggar.
    a sizzling hot spatula:in Gloumewood Farm. (Note: get this only AFTER you've completed step 3.) Go to clothes line Search pants for shiny key. Go to farmhouse, unlock door, and kill Aitrilla, who loads spatula

Brew For The Harbormaster [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Sonjya
Level: 19
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Med City
Total Time: 1 hour
Objectives:
  1. to find the harbormaster (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, go all S to "Center of the Fish Market." Then, go 4S, W, N.
  2. to give Pixies Pure Spirits to the harbormaster (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter mage, W, 2N, buy pixie.

Bring Angel Soul [Complete]

Contributed by: Xereph
Additions by: Kirgan

Difficulty:
Locale(s): Alcord, Wytherwind
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the Angel of Redemption (30 minutes)
    In Alcord, at the center of the lake.

Bring Back the Squirrels [Complete]

Contributed by: Raevan
Level: 2
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): The Rydhordel Woods, Cholsen's Mansion, E'nat Dae
Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Mathaelda the witch (40 minutes)
    From northern entrance to Rydhordel, go N, W, S, W, all S, 8W, all S.
  2. to find a small pecan and a walnut and 3 of a handful of pecans (2 hours)
    a small pecan: Found in E'nat'dae on a chipmunk. From @, go 2N, all W (hidden), 2N, D, open grate, N, U, and look around.
    a walnut: Found in E'nat'dae on the squirrel (in same area as chipmunk).
    a handful of pecans: found in Cholsen's Mansion. From entrance go 2N, 3E, shake tree 3x.
  3. to find a room called On the Porch (30 minutes)
    From northern entrance to Rydhordel, go N, W, S, W, all S, 8W, S.
  4. to give a small pecan and a walnut and 3 of a handful of pecans to Mathaelda, the witch (10 minutes)
    As above.
  5. to kill 2 of a wolf with mottled fur, and 2 of a vine-roped bear, and 2 of a black crow (20 minutes)
    These spawn in the room with you.

Bring Baroness Mirror [Complete]

Additions by: Dweia
Level: 18, 19
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): The Mellorian Citadel
Total Time: 5 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the Baroness Sasune (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Mellorian.
  2. to give the mirror of the ages to the Baroness Sasune (4 hours)
