Bring Catacombs Egg Woman [Complete]

Level: 21, 24
Difficulty: very hard (depending on catacombs pop)
Locale(s): Shadmire, Catacombs
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find an elderly woman (45 minutes)
    Enter Shadmire. From "Beneath a Canopy of Interwoven Tree Branches," go W, N, N, W, W, N, N, W, N, N, N, E, E, S, S, E, E, E.
  2. to give an egg recovered from deep within the catacombs to an elderly woman (2 hours, 15 minutes)
    Find the catacombs and eggs according to the traditional methods.

Bring Club Bonk [Complete]

Completed by: Lazare
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Asnor
Total Time: 8 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Bonk the Cleaver (1 hour)
    In Trellor. From recall, 5E, 3N, E.
  2. to find a large wooden club (6 hours, 40 minutes)
    Loads in Asnor. Follow the path up the mountain N to the rock slide, then go 2W, D, all W to the troll guards, who load the clubs.
  3. to give a large wooden club to Bonk the Cleaver (40 minutes)
    As above.

Bring Dread Armor [Complete]

Level: 23, 24
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Alcord
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Dread the Armourer (30 minutes)
    In Trellor, on Merchant Circle. From recall, go 5 N, 3W, N.
  2. to give a suit of Alcordian battle armor to Dread the Armourer (3 hours)
    In Alcord. From zone entrance (@), go S, S, E, and all S until you see an Alcordian knight, which appears as "A skeleton wearing black armor on its body." The knight loads the suit of Alcordian battle armor. Kill the knight and return the suit to Dread.

Bring Elf Fish [Complete]

Level: 24, 25, 26
Difficulty: easy (if you have fishing gear)
Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora, Wilderness
Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an elven fisherman (1 hour)
    In Forest of the Alendora. From western entrance, go S, S, E, then all S until you spot the fisherman.
  2. to find a northern pike (40 minutes)
    Using fishing gear, fish in the stream just north of the zone. Keep trying until you catch a pike. Don't try to save any other fish... you have to catch them "fresh" for each step.
  3. to give a northern pike to an elven fisherman (20 minutes)
  4. to find a spoonbill (20 minutes)
    Repeat as with step 2 above.
  5. to give a spoonbill to an elven fisherman (20 minutes)
  6. to find a bass (20 minutes)
    Repeat as with step 2 above.
  7. to give a bass to an elven fisherman (20 minutes)

Bring Elf Rabbit's Foot [Complete]

Level: 24, 26, 27, 28, 30
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Medievia, Forest of the Alendora
Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (1 hour, 40 minutes)
    See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N.
  2. to give a lucky rabbit's foot to Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (1 hour, 20 minutes)
    A lucky rabbit's foot can be purchased at Randall's Pawn Shop Trellor. (From recall, S, S, S, S, S, E, E, S.)

    Since the flags on your AQ make portaling, flying, etc impossible, get a clannie to purchase and mail you a rabbit's foot from Trellor. You can pick it up in Enara, which is just to the NW of Forest of the Alendora.)

    Alternatively, when you see the title of your quest, you can buy a rabbit's foot in Trellor, then proceed to Alendora.

Bring Elf Repaerdnim Root [Complete]

Level: 23, 24
Difficulty: easy to hard
Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora, Catacombs
Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Loranelle, the Malindora sorceress (1 hour)
    In Forest of the Alendora, in the first room of the Grove of the Elder Oak. From north entrance to zone, go: S, S, E, E, S, E, E, E, S, S, E, E, then all S until you find her.
  2. to find a repaerdnim root (2 hours)
    In Catacombs on the wise hermit, OR you can purchase one off auction.
  3. to give a repaerdnim root to Loranelle, the Malindora sorceress (20 minutes)

Bring Fothwin Gloves of Falconry [Complete]

Level: 22
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Crime Underground, Alendora
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Fothwin, a novice thief (30 minutes)
    In Crime Underground. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. Be sure you have "sense life." From here: go S.
  2. to give the gloves of falconry to Fothwin, a novice thief (1 hour)
    Gloves of falconry load on the falconers in Forest of the Alendora. From north zone entrance, go S, S, E, E, S and look in the nearby rooms until you find a falconer.

Bring Garlik Rocks [Incomplete]

Additions by: Dalia
Level: 29
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Asnor
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Garlik (45 minutes)
    In Asnor. From the south entrance (@), go U, 2N, 4 E.
  2. to give 5 of a large rock to Garlik (2 hours, 45 minutes)
    These load in Realm of the Cloud Giants on "a cloud giant commoner." (Note: they are "junk" in the corpses.)
  3. to kill Garlik ( )
    As above.

Bring Head to Witch Doctor [Incomplete]

Additions by: Melidia, Sulin
Level: 19, 22
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Pyramid
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the witch doctor (1 hour)
    In Talqaxtyl's Pyramid. From zone recall, go N, 3E, 6N, 2W, 5N, 2E, N, E, 2N (A small dark hut.)
  2. to find a mummified head impaled on a stake (1 hour, 20 minutes)
    PK someone, find one, or buy one off auction.
  3. to give a mummified head impaled on a stake to the witch doctor (40 minutes)
    As above.

Bring Heart to Phoenix [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Ribaldor
Level: 26, 28
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Spirited/Horneg's, Crime Underground/Derah
Total Time: 5 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the phoenix (no limit)
    In Horneg's Keep From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search, W. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. (Horneg is here.) Then go N and look for a hidden mob (the astral gatekeeper), who holds a key. Kill him and get the key. Go northish and look for a door; unlock, and enter. The phoenix loads here.
  2. to find a human heart ( )
    Human heart loads in Crime Underground or in Derah. In Crime Underground, from zone entrance, go 2E, 2D, E, S, D, all E, N, D, and follow the path north, opening/picking as you go. Human heart loads on the hulk mob. In evil Derah: After entering evil Derah from entering "A Destroyed House" (in the southwest part of good Derah), go E, N, E, E, N, N, E, U. Get the heart from the corpse of the girl.
  3. to give a human heart to the phoenix ( )

Bring Hissalt Crossbow[Needs Detail]

Level: 25, 27, 28
Difficulty: very hard (CPK)
Locale(s): Crime Underground
Total Time: 8 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Hissalt, a novice thief (1 hour)
    In Crime Underground. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. Then go S, W. Be sure you have "sense life."
  2. to give the Firetooth crossbow to Hissalt, a novice thief (7 hours, 20 minutes)
    Loads in Fire Giants' Keep CPK.

Bring Instruments to Elven Minstrel [Complete]

Additions by: Xercan, Kernighan
Level: 23, 24
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora, Fire Giants
Total Time: 9 hours, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a very bad elven minstrel (1 hour)
    In Forest of the Alendora. From the western entrance to Forest of the Alendora, go S, S, E, then all S until you see him.
  2. to find a satyr's flute (2 hours)
    In Fire Giants' Keep. See Satyr/Satyr's Flute in Frequent Pathways.
  3. to give a satyr's flute to a very bad elven minstrel (50 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to find a handcrafted drum carved with ancient symbols (3 hours)
    Loads on Dream Weavers in the Catacombs.
  5. to give a handcrafted drum carved with ancient symbols to a very bad elven minstrel (1 hour)
    As above.
  6. to find a rosewood mandolin (1 hour)
    Loads in Trellor on a congenial bard, in the southern part of the Merchant Circle.
  7. to give a rosewood mandolin to a very bad elven minstrel (1 hour)
    As above.

Bring Lazanas Spectacles [Complete]

Contributed by: Kinibane
Level: 24, 25
Difficulty: moderate (no flags)
Locale(s): Rhaiaden, Naeramae
Total Time: 6 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Lazanas, Sand Sifter of the Hashendi (2 hours)
    In Rhaiaden NPK near "A Hard, Sandy Desert Road."
  2. to find a pair of wire-rimmed spectacles (2 hours)
    In NaeraNae, wire-rimmed spectacles load on Threzdi the archmage. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the east.
  3. to give a pair of wire-rimmed spectacles to Lazanas, Sand Sifter of the Hashendi (2 hours)
    As above.

Bring Life to a Hermit [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Kethric
Level:
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Thanos, Stornaway, Berkovic, Mystical Forest
Total Time: 6 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the shade of a hermit (1 hour)
    Outside shack in Thanos.
  2. to find an elixir of life and the Gem of Souls and the holy symbol of a forgotten god (4 hours)
    Elixir loads in Mystical on reset.
    Gem of Souls loads in Berkovic, or you can buy at auction.
    Holy symbol can be found in Stornaway.
  3. to find the shade of a hermit (1 hour)
    As above.

Bring Life to the Desert [Complete]

Contributed by: Maneak, Miltonio
Level: 27
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Rhaiaden, Gypsy Camp
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Lazanas, Sand Sifter of the Hashendi (1 hour)
    In Rhaiaden NPK near "A Hard, Sandy Desert Road."
  2. to find 4 of a tiny drop of rain (1 hour)
    In Gypsy Camp. Loads on black cat, screech owl, priestess, guardian panther, and gypsy guards. From @, go D, E, 3S, W, S, search room for entrance, S, W, all S to "The Gathering Tent". Kill guards. Either wait for repop or look around for other mobs.
  3. to give 4 of a tiny drop of rain to Lazanas, Sand Sifter of the Hashendi (1 hour)
    As above. Note: you receive a black and white scroll.

Bring Lucretia Ingredients [Complete]

Level: 23, 24, 27, 28
Additions by: Zurick
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Trellor, Lattyrna, E'urdin Zilartzen, Shadowclaw, Cloud Giants
Total Time: 4 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Lucretia the Healer (40 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, go 3W, N, W.
  2. to find some green colored seaweed (15 minutes)
    In Lattyrna. Loads on a dolphin, in the palace area of the zone. Note: this is not a find-original objective.
  3. to give some green colored seaweed to Lucretia the Healer (15 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to find a bits of fungi (30 minutes)
    In E'urdin Zilartzen. Loads on a forked fungus darkling. From entrance to zone, go E (until you teleport), then S and E along the carpet until you find this mob. Be sure to get at least two: you'll need to eat one to get out of the zone. Note: this is not a find-original objective.
  5. to give bits of fungi to Lucretia the Healer (30 minutes)
    As above.
  6. to find a red eye gem (45 minutes)
    Red eye gems load on the Red Eye mob in Shadowclaw. From zone entrance to Shadowclaw (@), go S, E, all U, then W and S along that level. Note: this is not a find-original objective.
  7. to give a red eye gem to Lucretia the Healer (45 minutes)
    As above.
  8. to find an aloe leaf (45 minutes)
    In Cloud Giants; they load on the bath boys. From "Floating Atop an Island Of Clouds," go E, E, E, S, open door, U, E, S, W, S.
  9. to give an aloe leaf to Lucretia the Healer (45 minutes)
    As above.

Bring Mandolin to Music Teacher [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Breetai
Level:
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Trellor
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find an elderly music teacher ( )
    In Med City Mages' Quarter. Recall, enter mage, then go 4W, S, E.
  2. to find a congenial bard ( )
    On the main streets of Trellor. From recall, go S to the Merchant Circle, and head east until you find one.
  3. to give a bottle of wine to a congenial bard ( )
    Buy from Kryor's place, located in the SE section of Merchant Circle in Trellor. Note: You receive a mandolin.
  4. to give a mandolin to an elderly music teacher ( )
    As above.

Contributed by: Yelm
Additions by: Pleen
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Preserve, Alendora
Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a hunter (25 minutes)
    In the Preserve. See hunter in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to give a wooden longbow and a large, leather-bound quiver to a hunter (no limit)
    Loads on a Havensdora hunter. From the north @, go go 2S, 2E, 3S, 3W, N, W. The mob, which appears as "A pale-skinned elf walks silently through the Alendora," should load nearby,

Bring Peace to Riverton [Complete]

Level: 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Riverton, Riverton Mines
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the mayor (1 hour)
    See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to kill Malevich (2 hours)
    At the bottom of the Riverton Mines. From the entrance to the Riverton Mines (south from the West Entrance to Riverton), go all S, all E, and then N until there is a down exit. Go D, W, all S, W, all N, E, S, D to "Beneath the Gladiators' Arena." Go W, W, W, all S, all E, all N, W, all S, W, N, N, D to "A Mined-Out Shaft." Go E, N, W, N, E, N, N. Malevich is here; it may take several passes to kill him (especially if he is fireshielded.)
    This step is flagged as solo and no-death.

Contributed by: Katriel
Level: 25
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Arcadia, Lagoon
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Eyira (1 hour)
    In Lagoona. From @, go U, W, N, 2W.
  2. to find Lemonade and Bar (2 hours)
    In Lagoon. From @ go W, S, 2W, 2S, W, 2S, W. Kill Waenda and get BAR and LEMONADE from corpse.
  3. to give bar and lemonade to Eyira (1 hour)
    As above.

Bring Root Harald [Complete]

Contributed by: Cipactli
Additions by: Phu
Level: 18, 21
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Alendora, Crime
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Harald, the novice thief (1 hour)
    See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From there, S, S, E is usual load position.
  2. to find the root of an elder oak, emanating a yellow phosphorescent glow (1 hour)
    Root loads in Alendora on Nacenus, the Malindora magician. From north entrance to zone, go: S, S, E, E, S, E, E, E, S, S, E, E, then all S.
  3. to give the root of an elder oak, emanating a yellow phosphorescent glow to Harald, the novice thief (1 hour)
    As above.

Bring Shoes to Samrah [Complete]

Level: 24
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Riverton, Shadmire
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Samrah (30 minutes)
    In Shadmire. From entrance to zone ("Beneath a Canopy of Interwoven Tree Branches," go W, N, N, W, W, N, N, W, N, N, N, N, N, D, E, E, E, E, E, E, E, S, D, W, N, N, N, N.
  2. to give a pair of emerald shoes to Samrah (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    The mayor of Riverton loads emerald shoes. See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways. Kill her and return them to Samrah.

Bring Torranus Cask [Complete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Additions by: Vlooi
Level:
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Mellorian, Alendora
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Torranus, barkeeper of the Prized Boar (30 minutes)
    See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, S.
  2. to give a cask of Vermillion Cascade to Torranus, barkeeper of the Prized Boar (2 hours, 30 minutes)
    In the scullery of the Mellorian Citadel. From entrance, go all N, 2S, W, N, U, all W, 3S, 2E, N.

Bring Venomous Oil to Harald the Novice [Complete]

Contributed by: Zynix
Level: 22, 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Crime Underground, Dark Escarpment
Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Harald, the novice thief (10 minutes)
    See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From there, S, S, E is usual load position.
    In Crime Underground.
  2. to give 3 of a flask of venomous oil to Harald, the novice thief (2 hours)
    Oil loads on zagamites in Dark Escarpment (but not always: upon entry to the zone, "c locate oil" to make sure there is some. Otherwise you will have to wait for repop.) Zagamites are hidden and load in the "oil rooms" of the zone. From entrance to the zone, go all W until you can go N, go all N, then E or W. Be sure to remove your light before entering the oil rooms!

Bring Village Leader Book [Complete]

Additions by: Ariste
Level: 12
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Trellor
Total Time: 1 hour, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the village leader (20 minutes)
    In Forbidden Forest. From entrance of zone ("A Large Clearing Leading Out of the Forest"), go E, all N till you get to a village gate. The gate loads locked. To find the key (a golden acorn), walk around and find a mob called "a brown squirrel". (Note: the acorn doesn't always load on every squirrel, so you may have to kill more than one to find the key.) Go back to the gate, unlock gate, open gate and go N, N, W, W, W, W, all N to An Elegant Hut. (The village leader loads in the hut, but tends to wander if the door to the hut is left open.)
  2. to give The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy to the village leader (50 minutes)
    Buy at Cleo's Food Market in Trellor. From Trellor recall, go N, N, N, N, N, W, N.

Bring Wedding Bands to Abbot [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Kethric
Additions by: Zeela
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the abbot (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, go all E, N.
  2. to find Isemeine the Silent (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In the Grove of Verthandi. From @, follow the path N and W. Isemeine drops a key that binds itself to you.
  3. to give 2 wedding bands of braided gold to the Abbot ( )
    The wedding bands are located in a locked rose-crystal box in the deeper water under the spring. The spring is SE of Isemeine.

Bring Wolf's Bane to Innkeeper [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Kaycee
Additions by: Cipactli
Level: 22
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): City of Medievia, evil Derah
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the receptionist ( )
    In Med City. From recall, 6N, E, U. You will receive the purple flower of wolf's bane to give to the innkeeper.
  2. to give the purple flower of wolf's bane to the innkeeper ( )
    In evil Derah. From good Derah recall, go all N to the fountain in evil Derah, then W, N.

Bringing Light to the Evil [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Ribaldor
Additions by: Kernighan
Level: 30
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Derah, Riverton
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find the vampire ( )
    In Derah. From recall, go 5W, N, W, U. Open desk, get key desk. From there, go D, E, 2S, W to enter evil DeRah. E, 2N, W through Barrier to find the vampire.
  2. to give The Light of the Sun to a vampire (no limit)
    Loads on Entity in Riverton temple. From Riverton north entrance, go S, all W, 2U, kill guardians and loot key, unlock and open door W, W, and kill Entity.

Bringing Water to the Desert [Complete]

Contributed by: Ysandre
Additions by: Miltonio
Level: 17
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): El Cantara, Forbidden Forest
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Nhabal, a nomadic chieftain (30 minutes)
    From El Cantara zone entrance: U, N, W (hidden), U, all north and west to the NW corner of the Nomad Camp
  2. to give a crooked twig wand to Nahbal (1 hour)
    Buy from Alexious Lightfoot in the Forbidden Forest.From Mage portal in Med, go 4W, 2S, W, open gate, W, go N and E to At The Edge of a Mud Pool, then all south into mud pool and east into Alexious Lightfoot's hut.Note: you receive a green orb upon completion of this AQ.

Burkenut Pie [Complete]

Contributed by: Danyela
Level: 26
Difficulty: easy to hard (NPK, but not find-original)
Locale(s): Brookhaven
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Uvian, the baker (30 minutes)
    In Brookhaven. From zone entrance, go N, E.
  2. to give 4 of a burkenut acorn to Uvian (2 hours)
    From above, go W, 3N, pick door, open door. Go N into NPK. Acorns are found on ground. Mobs are aggro and mean -- sneak and invis don't help much (we suggest help.)

    In Med City Mage Quarter, usually south of the portal.

    In southern part of Med City.

    Found near the cat.
  4. to find a gypsy girl ( )

Calm Young Girl's Fears [Complete]

Contributed by: Zaknafian
Additions by: Mospolo
Level: 27, 30
Difficulty: moderate to hard
Locale(s): Trellor, Demonforge
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find the little girl (no limit)
    In Trellor, hidden on the main streets.
  2. to kill 15 of a vaporous phantasm (no limit)
    In Demonforge. These are very easy to kill mobs and can be easily killed by room spells when there are no other mobs in the room. Vaporous Phantoms do not show up on location, are not targetable, and are worth 0 xp. Obey the usual Demonforge rules and it will be easy. If you can't find enough, just wait and be patient; they continuously, though slowly, reload in and near the forge room, and then wander around.

Candles for a Novice [Complete]

Contributed by: Kirgan
Level: 19
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Braneri
Total Time: 1 hour, 35 minutes
  1. to find a novice of the Holy Order (30 minutes)
    In Clerics' Quarter in Med City.
  2. to find the chapel preacher (45 minutes)
    In Braneri. From zone entrance, go all N, all U, all N. If you are stopped, "give 100 coins usher" and go N. Note: you receive some candles.
  3. to give 5 of a tall candle to a novice of the Holy Order (30 minutes)
    As above.

Candles for a Wedding [Complete]

Contributed by: Pleen
Level: 16
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Brookhaven
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the Abbot (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 7E, N.
  2. to give a silver candlestick and 6 of a decorative candle and 6 of a fragrant candle and 6 of a plain candle to the Abbot (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    The candlestick can be purchased in the Bridal Shop in Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 3S, W. The other candles can be purchased in Brookhaven. From zone entrance, go W, N.

    In Mystical Forest. From recall, go in any cardinal direction and look around.
  2. to give a box of chocolates to the citizen (45 minutes)
    On the loitering gypsy in Gypsy Camp. From the Ticket Booth, go S and look around (it's hidden). Note: This is find-original.

Canteens for the Waterboy [Complete]

Contributed by: Ravir
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Riverton Mines, New Ashton
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a water boy (30 minutes)
    In Riverton Mines. From west entrance of Riverton, go E, pick/ethereal S, go all S, all E, then N until you see a water boy.
  2. to find a leather canteen (2 hours with extension)
    Buy in New Ashton. From south entrance (@), go W, W, N. Buy canteen here.
  3. to find a water boy (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a leather canteen to a mine foreman ( )
    From water boy, go all S, all W til D, D, all N, E, E, all S, W, all N, E, S, D, and look around for the foreman.

Captain Abnart's Collection [Complete]

Level: 28, 29
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Med City, Fury, Pirate Ship, Braneri
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Captain Abnart (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, go all S to the Wharf. Go east along the Wharf, and south and north along the piers, if necessary, to find the Captain.
  2. to give a copper sextant, a primitive sextant, and a brass sextant to Captain Abnart (no limit)
    copper sextant: The copper sextant is found on Merrick, the navigator of the Fury, on the upper deck at the south end.
    primitive sextant: On top of the astronomy building in Braneri. From zone entrance, go N, W, N, W into the astronomy building. Go all W, U, then E until you are in the room "Beside a Window." Search, then go up.
    brass sextant: The brass sextant loads on the Navigator in Pirate Ship. From the entrance to the zone (@), go E, 4N, E, U, S, 2E, search, D, E, S. Kill the navigator (a level 20+ warrior.)

Cards for Fortune Teller [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Shauku
Level: 18
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Gypsy Camp
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the lizardfolk fortune teller ( )
    In Lyryanoth. From @, go all N, S, 2E, open curtain, N.
  2. to find an ornamented gypsy tarot deck ( )
    Loads on Madame Isramala in Gypsy Camp. From @, go D, E, 3S, W, search, 3S, all W, all S.
  3. to give an ornamented gypsy tarot deck to the lizardfolk fortune teller ( )
    As above.

Carmea's Garden [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Additions by: Dejaduo
Level: 22
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Esacha Fen, Gnomenel
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Carmea Aliphaas (1 hour)
    In the Gypsy Gemothalle in Esacha Fen.
  2. to find a burlap bag of compost and a tray of seedlings and a small gardening rake (2 hours)
    These load in Gnomenel:

    seedlings: on Adwen Tinolle, during the day.
    burlap bag: on Oliade Saecyn during the day. She may be found wandering randomly on Jorenel Street (2E and N of zone entrance) or in her home, Number Four Jorenel Street.
    rake: on multiple mobs.

Contributed by: Cimn
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Lyngaeli
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the shopkeeper (30 minutes)
    In the Med City Bridal Shop in the Clerics' Quarter.

    In Lyngaeli's Nightmare.

Carry the Flame of Rocky [Complete]

Level: 12, 14
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Wilderness
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Rocky, Baalzebul's pet rock (30 minutes)
    In the Godhall in Med City. From recall, go S, S, S, S, E then enter portal. Go U, U, U, U, U. Type "wizlist baalzebul" to find the correct office, then follow the directions to that office.
  2. to find the wilderness room at 1019 x 846
    Just south of the @ to Mt. Vryce. From Med City, follow the river north to the entrance of Mt. Vryce. When you are standing in the correct spot, your screen should look like this:

    nnnnnnn^^^^^^^^nnnnnn
    n^nnnnn^^^^^^^^nnnn^n
    ^^^^nn^^^^^^^^^^nnn^^
    ^^^^nn^^^^^^^^^^nnnn^
    ^^nnnn^^^^^^^^^^^^nn^
    n^nnnn^^^^@^^^^^n^^^^
    ^^^nn^^^^^#^^^^^^^^^^
    n^^^^^^^^^~^^^^^^nnnn
    n^^^^n^^^~~^^^^^nnnnn
    ^^^^nnn^^~^^^^^nnnnnn
    ^^nnnnn^^~^^^^^nnnnnn
    nnnnnnnn~~^^^nnnnnnnn
    nnnnnnnn~nnnnnnnn^^^n

Carving for Sonoria [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Krieven
Level: 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Lattyrna, Seanstrean Reef
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Poseidon ( )
    From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 5 N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, U, W. You are given a carving of a mermaid.
  2. to give a carving of a mermaid to Sonoria ( )
    In Reef.
  3. to find Poseidon ( )
    As above.

Case for a Scroll [Complete]

Contributed by: Sartan
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate (NPK)
Locale(s): Med Castle, Elnissa
Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
    See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to give a map case to the wizard (1 hour, 40 minutes)
    In Elnissa. From zone entrance, find the guard that has the pewter key (should be at or near entrance.) Go N to "Entry Hall." Search (several times) for the down exit. Go D, S, W. Kill Gorland. Get map case corpse. Note: this is find original.

Catch a Mermaid! [Complete]

Contributed by: Afiniti
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Fury, Lattyrna
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (no limit)
    From the entrance to the Fury, go go all N/E/W/S (depending on orientation) then go U, U, E, 7S, W, D, E, N, W, W, W, S, S.
  2. to find a mermaid (1 hour)
    In Lattyrna. From entrance to zone, go all D, all E, N, all D, all E, N until "Ivory Road, Near the Gates," 3E, N until "Intersection of Crystal and Onyx." Then go a few west and there is the mermaid.
  3. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (no limit)
    As above.

Catch the Grave Robber [Complete]

Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
Objectives:

  2. to find a room called The Crypt (20 minutes)
    From Graveyard entrance, go 7N, W.
  3. to find a room called A Secret Tunnel (10 minutes)
    From above, go W, search, D.
  4. to find a room called The Hidden Study (10 minutes)
    From above, go all S, all E, open trapdoor, U.
  5. to find Famar, the town crier (20 minutes)
    As above.

Cater for Pherrance [Needs Detail]

Difficulty: moderate (SOLO NO-DRAGON NO-DEATH)
Locale(s): Graveyard, Enara, Kirys Ayr
Total Time: 3 hours, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
    See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways. You will receive 4Small, rolled-up notes.
  2. to give a small, rolled-up note to the cook (30 minutes)
    In Enara. From zone entrance, go N, 7W, N, W, 11N.
  3. to give a small, rolled-up note to the chef (45 minutes)
    In Kirys Ayr. From zone entrance, go 4U, 2E, N.
  4. to give a small, rolled-up note to the ship's cook (50 minutes)
    In Pirate Ship.
  5. to give a small, rolled-up note to the fire giant cook (1 hour, 15 minutes)
    In Fire Giants' Keep.

Cave People Need Weapons [Complete]

Contributed by: Rarazona

Level: 26
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Mystical Forest
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the chief (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Mystical Forest. From far right @, go S, W, S, W, all E, W, all S.
  2. to give 5 of a silver trident to the chief (1 hour)
    These can be found on tritons located in the On the Ocean rooms surrounding the zone (designated by the @s). Warning: Beware the turtle!

Chalice for Poseidon [Complete]

Level: 27, 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Lattyrna, Quinstone's Keep
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
    From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 5 N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, U, W.
  2. to find a jeweled chalice of gold (2 hours)
    Loads in the chest at the end of Quinstone's Keep (see walkthrough (link not available).) This step is NO-DEATH FIND-ORIGINAL NO-SUMMON NO-PHASE NO-TO-PHASE.
  3. to give a jeweled chalice of gold to Poseidon (30 minutes)
    As above.

Checking Other Potion Shops [Complete]

Contributed by: Phu
Level: 17
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Trellor, Labryinth, Riverton
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the ghostly image of a sorcerer (1 hour)
    In Castle Med. From the "top of the dragon staircase", go: all W, all U, all S
  2. to give a crystal potion and an amber potion and a cloudy white potion to the ghostly image of a sorcerer (30 minutes)
    Load in Trellor. From recall, go 5N, 6E
  3. to give a golden seal potion and an orange potion to the ghostly image of a sorcerer (30 minutes)
    In Riverton. From north @, go S, all W, S, E.
  4. to give a green potion and a misty potion to the ghostly image of a sorcerer (1 hour)
    In Labyrinth. From zone entrance (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, 2S, W.

Cheer Up Satyr [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Kethric
Additions by: Vashka
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Fire Giants Keep, Verthandi
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the satyr (1 hour)
    In Fire Giants Keep. From entrance, go U, all S, E, all S, W, and look around.
  2. to find a lusty satyr (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Verthandi, near the May Queen in Vernalea Meadows. Note: you receive the horn of a satyr..
  3. to give the horn of a satyr to the satyr (1 hour)
    As above.

Cheering Up a Statue [Complete]

Level: 23, 24
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Riverton, Med City, Wilderness
Total Time: 8 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a devout pilgrim (1 hour)
    In the streets of Riverton. Try entering the north entrance, then walking west along Ruby Avenue.
  2. to find object leather riding gloves (1 hour, 20 minutes)
    Buy at Malgaron's in Riverton, on the north side of Topaz Avenue.
  3. to find a pair of riding breeches (1 hour, 20 minutes)
    Buy at Avalon's in Riverton. From Malgaron's, go S, E, E, N.
  4. to find a room called A Riding Stable (1 hour)
    From Avalon's, go S, E, E, N, E, S, S, S, W, all S.
  5. to find the wilderness room at 1001 x 1050 (4 hours)
    This is a branch on a path in the wilderness not far from the City of Medievia, to the south (actually, probably SSE). From the eastern gate of Medievia, go south. The first branch point will be a statue of a golden dragon. Keep going south. One room south of a maroon "U" is this room.
  6. to kill the violin player, the trombonist, and the declaiming actor (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In City of Med, Mage's Quarter. From Med recall, enter mage, then go E, S, S, S, E (the actor) then D (the 2 musicians.)
  7. to find the wilderness room at 1001 x 1050 (30 minutes)
    As above.

Cheese for the Enchanted Mouse

Contributed By: Pleen
Level: 24
Difficulty: moderate (solo, find original)
Locales: Palace Celestia, Brookhaven
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an enchanted mouse (30 minutes)
    At Palace Celestia. From entrance, go 2E, 16N, 3E, hidden S.
  2. to give a round of cheese to an enchanted mouse (1 hour)
    In Brookhaven. From entrance, go N, W. Buy cheese (38 gold).

Chef's Salad [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Antdos and Vashka
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s):
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Estralita, the cathedral cook ( )
    In the Graveyard. From entrance to the Graveyard, go all N, all E, N to "The Cross Aisle," 4E, 2N, W.
  2. to find a bottle of wine, a bunch of carrots, a tomato, a head of lettuce, a bunch of bananas, a small pile of oranges and a small pile of apples ( )
    In Braneri. From the @, go 4N, W, all N. Check the barrel and crate, then go S and check here too. Go S, W, D, get bottle, then go N, W, S, checking in barrels all the way.
  3. to give a bottle of wine, a bunch of carrots, a tomato, a head of lettuce, a bunch of bananas, a small pile of oranges and a small pile of apples to Estralita, the cathedral cook ( )
    As above.

  7. to find the High Priestess of Trell ( )
    As above.

    This is a ridiculously simple AQ which involves making 3 round trips between the High Priestess in Trellor (up and north from Trellor recall) and the High Priestess in Riverton (in the northwest corner of Riverton).

Circle of Life [Complete]

Additions by: Afiniti, AB
Level: 21, 22
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Ulhazzen, Enara, Med City/Trellor, Riverton Mines
Total Time: 3 hours, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the ringleader (30 minutes)
    In Ulhazzen. From eastern @, go U and all W till you see him.
  2. to find a twirling silk circle skirt and a circle of topaz and a beautiful platinum wedding ring (2 hours)
    a twirling silk circle skirt: Loads in Enara on a young lady. From zone entrance, go all N to streets and look around.

    a circle of topaz: In the Riverton Mines on a "scholar of the healing arts." From entrance to mines, go all S, all E until there is a D exit. Then go D, all N, 2W, and follow the path south.
    a beautiful platinum wedding ring: Purchase at the bridal shops in Med City (cleric quarter) or Trellor.
  3. to find the ringleader (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a twirling silk circle skirt and a circle of topaz and a beautiful platinum wedding ring to the ringleader (5 minutes)
    As above.
  5. to kill 3 of an escaped prisoner (20 minutes)
    These pop in the room with you.

Contributed by: Zynix
Level: 23, 24, 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Pirate Ship
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Deshiavani, the Unforgiven (30 minutes)
    From Med recall, enter warrior. Go 4W, 2N, W, U.
  2. to give a mop to Deshiavani, the Unforgiven (2 hours, 30 minutes)
    Mop can be found in Pirate Ship on a midshipman (a level 20+ warrior.)

Clean the Filthy [Complete]

Additions by: Mandroth, Milekan
Level: 27, 28, 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Braneri, Yldari, Fury, Cloud Giants
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Famar, the town crier (15 minutes, 18 minutes with extension)
    In Med City, S of recall.
  2. to give a bucket of water and a wooden scrub brush and a large bar of soap to a filthy beggar (2 hours)
    a bucket of water: in the Fury. "A young girl disguised as a deckhand" and "A young deckhand" sometimes load with this object, on the Main Deck level. Note: These are no-rent objects!
    a wooden scrub brush: In Cloud Giants; loads on the bath boys. From "Floating Atop an Island Of Clouds," go E, E, E, S, open door, U, E, S, W, S.
    a large bar of soap: in Braneri in a crate in a room called "Crates of Dry Goods." From zone entrance, go all N to "A Small Well," then N, 2W, D, N, W, S. Note: these are find-original objectives.

    The filthy beggar loads in Med City.

  3. to give a bubbling green potion to the filthy beggar (1 hour, 45 minutes)
    Loads in Yldari on the alchemist. From zone entrance, go all N, all W, N to gate, N, all E, W, U, E. Kill Captain for key. Then go W, D, all W, all S, all E (hidden exit), S, all E, unlock door, 2E, S. Alchemist loads here.

    2N, 2W, S, W (earth maiden)
    E, 2N, 2W, N (water maiden)
    S, 2E, N, 3E, N, E (air maiden)
    W, S, 3W, N, D, 2N, U, N, D, all N (avatar of a dark goddess)

Clean Up The Fen! [Needs Detail]

Cleaning Equipment [Complete]

Contributed by: Antdos
Level: 22, 23
Difficulty: moderately easy
Locale(s): Goland's Tower, Trellor
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Sendaria, the Mistress of Magic (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, go 5E, 5 N, E.
  2. to find an elegant feather duster (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    This is find-original. Kuukle in the upper level of Goland's tower has this item. Enter the zone and go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle. Note: there are "dusters" and "feather dusters" in Med and Med Castle which won't work.
  3. to give an elegant feather duster to Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (30 minutes)
    As above.

Cleaning Materials for Streetsweeper [Needs Detail]

Level: 20
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Mystical Forest, Fury
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find the streetsweeper (1 hour)
    In Mystical Forest, anywhere in the Stone City. From southern entrance to zone (harbor), go N x 2, W, N x 5 then wander around on City streets until found.
  2. to give a mop, a bucket of water, and a faded cloth fragment to the streetsweeper (no limit)
    a mop: in Pirate Ship.
    a bucket of water: in the Fury. "A young girl disguised as a deckhand" and "a young deckhand" sometimes load with this object, on the Main Deck level.
    a faded cloth fragment: in Lyryanoth.

Cleaning Supplies for a Minotaur [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Cimn
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s):
Total Time: 9 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a female minotaur ( )
    In NaeraMae.
  2. to find 2 of a feather duster and 2 of a broom and 2 of a wooden scrub brush ( )
    a broom: Load on janitors in Med City.
    scrub brush:In Cloud Giants; loads on the bath boys. From "Floating Atop an Island Of Clouds," go E, E, E, S, open door, U, E, S, W, S.
  3. to find a bucket of water or a one-gallon water jug (5 hours)
    Bucket: loads in Fury.
    Jug: loads in New Ashton.

Cleaning Supplies for Symoni [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Bhalodus
Additions by: Aolani
Level: 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Celestia, Cloud Giants, Esacha, Goland's
Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Symoni, a palace maid (45 minutes)
    In Palace of Celestia. From zone entrance, go N, 2E, then all N and look around.
  2. to find a wooden scrub brush and a bucket of washwater and an elegant feather duster (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    a wooden scrub brush: In Cloud Giants; loads on the bath boys. From "Floating Atop an Island Of Clouds," go E, E, E, S, open door, U, E, S, W, S.
    a bucket of washwater: In Esacha Fen in the Gemothelle.
    an elegant feather duster: Kuukle in the upper level of Goland's Tower has this item. Enter the zone and go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle. Note: there are "dusters" and "feather dusters" in Med and Med Castle which won't work.
  3. to give a wooden scrub brush and a bucket of washwater and an elegant feather duster to Symoni, a palace maid (45 minutes)
    As above.

Cleaning up the Muddy Girl [Complete]

Contributed by: Seishiro
Level: 23, 24
Difficulty: fairly easy
Locale(s): Riverton, Enara, Braneri, Fury
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a muddy-faced girl (30 minutes)
    In Riverton, wandering the streets.
  2. to find a large bar of soap and a wet, soapy dishrag and a bucket of water (2 hours)
    a large bar of soap: in Braneri in a crate in a room called "Crates of Dry Goods." From zone entrance, go all N to "A Small Well," then N, 2W, D, N, W, S.
    a wet, soapy dishrag: in Enara. Loads on "a scullery maid," from entrance, go N, all W, N, W, all N to the Scullery.
    a bucket of water: in the Fury. "A young girl disguised as a deckhand" and "A young deckhand" sometimes load with this object, on the Main Deck level. Note: These are no-rent objects!
    Note: these are find-original objects.
  3. to give a large bar of soap and a wet, soapy dishrag and a bucket of water to a muddy-faced girl (30 minutes)
    As above.

Cleaning Up the Village of Aeketh [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Urand
Additions by: Strydikaa
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Aeketh
Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Jundu (30 minutes)
    In Aeketh. From entrance to zone, go all west then E (i.e. all W but one), then north through wilderness. Then go all west, N, N, W, W, W, N, N, N, U.
  2. to kill 5 of a mounted mercenary (45 minutes)
  3. to find Jundu (30 minutes)
    As above.

Cleanse Lyryanoth of Crime [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Dima, Losgar
Level: 26, 30
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Lyryanoth
Total Time: 6 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the mayor of Lyryanoth (50 minutes)
    From entrance to zone, go all N to "At the Town Fountain," then W, N, U.
  2. to find Toronfyr, the guard captain (1 hour)
    From Lyryanoth recall, go all W to where the four angry men mobs are. Kill them, then go all W, search, open trapdoor, then D, N.
  3. to kill a criminal mastermind (50 minutes)
    From Lyryanoth recall, go 3S, 3E, N, E (the last two exits are hidden). The mastermind loads here with two other mobs.
  4. to find Toronfyr, the guard captain (1 hour)
    As above.
  5. to kill Mordulon (1 hour, 40 minutes)
    From Lyryanoth recall, go N, 2W, open door, N, W, open door N, N, E, N, W, open door W, W, kill apprentice and loot key. Go N and look around; search in rooms with no exits. In one room, the key will crumble; go U to Mordulon (in a no-flee room.) Once you get Mordulon to about 25%, he disappears. Go back to the room where you found the apprentice and kill him, he'll be at full health.
  6. to find Toronfyr, the guard captain ( )
    As above.

Cleanse the Evil [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: PH
Additions by: Liadhan
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Xanthal
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find the priest of Trell ( )
    In Trellor, U and N from recall.
  2. to kill Mercapto and Kalafungen and Thysa and Kynase ( )
    All located in Xanthal. From zone entrance, go N, 5W, search, 2 D (be sure you're breathing water), search, E, E. Malanase loads here; get the key from him. From Malanase, go 2W, 2U, 3E, 3N, and kill the servant for the tower master key. From here ("A White Marble Staircase"), the other mages can be found as follows:
    Kynase: 2E, U, 2E, unlock door E, open door E, E.
    Kalafungen: 2S, U, N, unlock door E, open door E, E.
    Thysa: 2N, U, 2N, unlock door E, open door E, E.
    Mercapto: 2W, U, N, W, unlock door S, open door S, S, unlock door S, open door S, S.

Cleansing a Wounded Warrior [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Thaspian
Additions by: Belizar
Level:
Difficulty: moderate (solo)
Locale(s): Lyryanoth
Total Time: 4 hours, 5 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Toronfyr, the guard captain (2 hours)
    In Lyryanoth. From recall, go all W to where the four angry men mobs are. Kill them, then go all W, search, open trapdoor, then D, N. Note: this is solo and no-death.
  2. to find a vark arch-magi (1 hour)
    in Vark Outpost. From @, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever. Then go 2N, 2E, N to Vark arch-magi. Warning: This mob has permanent fireshield and is in a cold room; it is very difficult to solo.
  3. to find a room called Temple of Artemis (20 minutes)
    In Elysium. From Azure, fly 2W, 51N, go to north @. From here, farsight S, which takes you to the temple.
  4. to find Toronfyr, the guard captain ( )
    As above.

Cleansing Castiack [Incomplete]

Additions by: Kirius
Level: 27, 28
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Castiack
Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Queen Fiona (1 hour)
    In Castiack.
  2. to kill 15 of either a harpy commoner, a harpy guard, a harpy scavenger, or a small fog fairie (40 minutes)
    3. In Castiack.

Clear a Path for the Graverobber [Complete]

Contributed by: Krevitch
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med Graveyard, Eldrick's Tomb
Total Time: 3 hours, 55 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a graverobber (30 minutes)
    In Med Graveyard (hidden).
  2. to kill 5 of the undead corpse of a soldier and 2 of a skeletal soldier and 5 of a stone gargoyle and 5 of an imp and 5 of a hoardling (3 hours)
    Found in Eldrick's Tomb. From @, go all N, kill golems, get key, unlock gate. In there, kill the soldiers and the fireshielded mage for a broken piece of plaque. Then go back to the gate, then go all E, a couple S, search, lure and kill Ludoc. Then go all N, W to gate, N, all W, a few N, search, W, unlock hatch, open hatch, U, E, wander and kill stone gargoyles. Then trap/ice Kronin for key into CPK. Go to southwest or southeast corner, down into CPK, unlock gate, open gate, wander around and kill imps and hoardlings.
  3. to find a graverobber (25 minutes)
    As above.

Clear a Path through Rhaiaden [Complete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Level: 29
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Rhaiaden
Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a protective father (30 minutes)
    In E'nat'dae. From @, go N, W, 9N, 3E, S.
  2. to kill 3 of an addax and 3 of an armadillo lizard and 5 of a thorny devil and 4 of a blind snake and 2 of a desert bobcat and 3 of a deadly rattlesnake and a female black widow and 3 of a desert tarantula and 3 of a desert iguana and 4 of a coyote (1 hour, 15 minutes)
    All found in Rhaiaden. Enter the zone and follow the path south; all of these mobs load nearby.
  3. to find a protective father (30 minutes)
    As above.

Clear Our Names! [Complete]

Contributed by: Owen, Araelle
Level: 17
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): NaeraMae, Labyrinth
Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a ragged-looking minotaur (1 hour)
    In NaeraMae. From @, go all U, S.
  2. to kill the minotaur ()
    In Labyrinth. From entrance, go 2E and look for "A large humanoid creature with the headof a bull is roaming the labyrinth."

Clear Out The Thieves [Complete]

Contributed by: Phu
Additions by: Mospolo
Level: 26
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Crime Underground, Med City
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, 4W, N, W, N, U, S.
  2. to kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves and Nephalis, the Viper and Celdspar, the Master Thief and Shaelin, the Master Thief and Seldan, the novice and Imrah the apprentice and Dorlion, the guardsman and 3 of a thief (1 hour, 10 minutes)
    In Crime Underground:
    Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves - In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N (Be sure you have sense life!)
    Nephalis, the Viper- From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, E, E, E, S. Be sure you have "sense life." From here: go S, S, S.
    Celdspar, the Master Thief and Shaelin, the Master Thief - From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D. go all E, N, D, 2N, E, S. Kill novice for key. Go N, W, all S, U, all W, unlock N, N to enter "The Gauntlet." Kill the mob in each room, loot the key, and unlock/open the door to the N to get to the next room. Celdspar loads in the first room and Shaelin in the fourth room.
    Seldan the novice: From The Center of the Underground Tunnel Network, go 4S, 2W, open door W, W
    Imrah the apprentice - From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, W, S, W. Imrah is here (hidden).
    Dorlion, the guardsman - From den of house 2D, pick wall, open wall, E, S, kill thief, get key corpse, unlock grating, open grating, D, 2W, N.
    thief - loads everywhere in zone.
  3. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (20 minutes)
    As above.

Clear the Air at the Thirsty Hog [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Kovad
Level: 26, 29
Difficulty: moderate (NPK)
Locale(s): Brookhaven
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Prytel, the bartender (30 minutes)
    In the Thirsty Hog in Brookhaven. From zone entrance, go 3N, W.
  2. to kill 5 of a puddle of sewer slime (1 hour)
    Look around for a cheerful janitor who loads "a long bar made of iron," which is a key. Unlock grate using this key at recall (E, S from Prytel.) Go D, then E and W to find 5Slimes. Mobs are in gas rooms and are no-melee. Note: this is no-death.
  3. to find Prytel, the bartender (30 minutes)
    As above.

  1. to find the cook ()
    In Enara. From @ go 2N, 7W, N, W,N.
  2. to find the commander ()

Clearing the Mist [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Dolph
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Rhaiaden, Dark Woods
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the ogre chieftain (40 minutes)
    In Dark Woods. From @, go 4S (yes for CPK), E, S, all E, 3S, E, N, E, all N.
  2. to kill 4 mistlings and 3Wraiths ( )
    In the swamp part of the zone.
  3. to find a torch of blue steel, ablaze with a flame of Undying Light ( )
    In Rhaiaden on Lazanas.
  4. to give a torch of blue steel, ablaze with a flame of Undying Light to the ogre chieftain (2 hours)
    As above.

Clearing the Way [Complete]

Contributed by: JW, Stevin
Level: 16
Difficulty: easy (but watch for NPKers)
Locale(s): Spire of Kirys Ayr
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an inn guest (45 minutes)
    From entrance to Spire, go E, 6 U, 2E, N (through door).
  2. to kill 12 of either a stone golem, a cavehunter bat, a spotted green lizard, a goblin scavenger, a horned gray toad, a rosehair tarantula, an onyx firedrake, or a silverfang wolf (45 minutes )
    Located randomly in the caverns in the Spire. (You'll need either levitate or a boat to get around.) From the inn guest, go S, 2W, all D, S, E, D, W, 3S to enter NPK and look around. Consider sneaking and/or invisibility to choose which of these you want to kill.

Cleric Challenge [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Ansfrid
Contributed by: Hastura
Level: 29
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Naeramae, Asnor, Trellor
Total Time: 3 hours, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the [cleric] guildmaster (30 minutes)
    In Med City.
  2. to find Branae (40 minutes)
    In NaeraMae. From @, all U, 2S, all E, pick gate, open gate, all E, S to guard with multi-key ring. Get key ring. Then go S, unlock E, open E, E.
  3. to find Huede (40 minutes)
    In Asnor. From south @, go all N and U.
  4. to find the high priestess of Trellor (40 minutes)
    See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.
  5. to find the [cleric] guildmaster (20 minutes)
    As above. Note: you are teleported U to another room..
  6. to kill Branae (15 minutes)
    Note: he pops in the room with you. Note: this is no-death.
  7. to kill Huede (15 minutes)
    As above.
  8. to kill the high priestess of Trellor (15 minutes)
    As above.

Cleric's Pilgrimage [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Sarius
Level: 20
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Medievia, Wilderness, Trellor
Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the High Priest of the Church (20 minutes)
    In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
  2. to find the high priestess of Trell (2 hours)
    See Priestess in Frequent Pathways. Note: this is no-portal, no-dragon, no-summon and no-phase.

Clerical Class Reunion [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Sakuya
Level: 24
Difficulty: moderate (solo, no summon, no phase)
Locale(s): Trellor, Wilderness, Asnor, Derah
Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a priest of Trell (30 minutes)
    In Trellor, in the temple. From recall, go U, N, U, and look around.
  2. to find a temple monk (40 minutes)
    In altars in the Wilderness.
  3. to find a hardy-looking monk (1 hour)
    In Asnor, about 9 levels up. From SE @ entrance, go due N/U until you are in the Temple. Go N and look around.
  4. to find the mortified priest (40 minutes)
    In evil Derah. From good Derah recall, go all N to the fountain in evil Derah, then 2W, 2S, open door W, W, U.

Contributed by: Kardina

Level: 25
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Alendora, The Spire Of Kirys Ayr
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find a elven scout (1 hour)
    In The Forest of Alendora. From the western entrance, 2S, Eand look around.
  2. to find a spidersilk cloak (45 minutes, 1 hour 45 minutes with extension)
    In The Spire of Kirys Ayr. The cloak loads on a dark elven mage. From @, go E, D, S, E, D, W, all S, W, 2S.
  3. to give a spidersilk cloak to an elven scout (30 minutes)
    As above.

Contributed by: Bingyi
Additions by: Nimbulaxan, Helitus

Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Pyramid
Total Time: 1 hour, 10 minutes
Objectives:

  2. to give a loin cloth to a native woman (40 minutes)

Clothes for a Sorcerer [Complete]

Contributed by: Arski
Additions by: Elagneros, Grayberr
Level:
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Crystal Lake, The City of Dray'mar
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a ghostly image of a cloaked sorcerer (30 minutes)
    In Castle Med. From the top of the dragon staircase, go: all W, all U, all S.
  2. to find a thick, purple velvet robe (1 hour)
    Located on a member of the Veiled Society. From Med recall, enter warrior, 2W, 2S, D and look around for this (hidden) mob.
  3. to find a scaly hide of a purple flying fish ( )
    Located on the purple fish in Crystal Lake, which appears as "Hovering briefly above the water's surface, a purple fish."
  4. to find a thinly wrapped purple sash (1 hour)
    Purchase in Dray'mar. From zone entrance, go 2W, 4N, 2E, N and buy it here.

Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): The Barbegazian Alps
Total Time: 5 hours
Objectives:

  2. to find 2 of a lump of coal, the scarf of warmth, a rooty carrot, a conical red hat, and masterfully woven mittens of green and red wool ( )
    Coal: in Med City on pretty clerk in market area.
    Scarf of warmth: in New Ashton on woman in NPK.
    Rooty carrot: in Forbidden Forest village.
    Conical red hat: in Gnomenel.
    Mittens: on Samrah in Shadmire.

Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Rhiaden

Objectives:

Clumsy Waiter's Blunder [Complete]

Contributed by: Bingyi
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Village of Brookhaven, Palace Celestia
Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a clumsy waiter (45 minutes)
    In Village of Brookhaven. From zone entrance, go 2E, all N, E.
  2. to give a bright silver platter to a clumsy waiter (1 hour, 25 minutes)
    Platter loads in Celestia. From zone entrance, go N, 2E, and all N till you see the harried cook. (This is a rare load and seems to only happen during daytime hours.)

Coffee for the Sleepy [Complete]

Contributed by: Pleen and Ariste
Level: 20, 22
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Braneri, Med City, Trellor
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a sleepy student (30 minutes)
    In Braneri. From zone entrance, go 8N, 2E, N.
  2. to give a cup of iced coffee to a sleepy student (1 hour)
    Buy in Med City. From recall, enter mage, W, N, W.
  3. to give an iced cup to a sleepy student (1 hour)
    Buy in Trellor. From recall, go 5S, 4W, S. Note: "an iced cup" is really "an iced cup of coffee". This is one of the rare cases that the name of the item as displayed with 'list' is different from the name you see when you id it.

Collar for the Puppy [Complete]

Contributed by: Bhalodus
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Celestia, Med City
Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a chocolate-colored puppy (45 minutes)
    In The Palace Celestia. From zone entrance, go N, 2E, then all N into palace until you find the puppy.
  2. to give Scruff's spiked collar to a chocolate-colored puppy (1 hour)
    Scruff loads in Med City, 3S from recall.

Collect Coins for Sardhara [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Volkerii
Level: 30
Difficulty: wretched hard!
Locale(s): Med City, Wytherwind, Mellorian, Kirys Ayr , Asnor
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Sardhara, the jeweler (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, go N, 2W.
  2. to find an ancient coin from the keep of Wytherwind and an ancient golden coin, produced in the City of Vanlarra and a rare coin and a small coin, engraved with the Ayr family crest (no limit)
    an ancient coin from the keep of Wytherwind: Loads on the mob "A Spirit of the Southern Wind" which appears as "A figure flowing with yellow robes hides his face beneath a hood." From zone entrance ("A Roofless Entryway"), go all W, N, all W, then S, S, S and look around.
    an ancient golden coin, produced in the City of Vanlarra: Loads in Mellorian.
    a rare coin: Loads in Asnor.
    a small coin, engraved with the Ayr family crest: Loads in Kirys Ayr. You have to run the zone to get the coin, which loads in the treasure room.
  3. to give an ancient coin from the keep of Wytherwind and an ancient golden coin, produced in the City of Vanlarra and a rare coin and a small coin, engraved with the Ayr family crest to Sardhara, the jeweler ( )
    As above.

Colored Potions for Sendaria [Complete]

Contributed by: Antdos
Level: 18
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Mystical
Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (20 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, go 5N, 6E.
  2. to find a deep blue potion and a glowing potion and a potion of truesight and a blood red potion and a potion containing a shimmering liquid and a bright pink potion (1 hour)
    In Mystical Forest. From recall, 3W, S. All potions can be bought here.
  3. to give a deep blue potion and a glowing potion and a potion of truesight and a blood red potion and a potion containing a shimmering liquid and a bright pink potion to Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (20 minutes)
    As above.

Combat Alcohol Abuse [Complete]

Additions by:Arramar, Sulin

Level: 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Home Of The Winds
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Lilolt (45 minutes)
    In Home of the Winds. From @, go 2N, E, all N, W, N, E, N, all E, all N, all W,all S, all E, N, all E, all N, all W, all S, E.
  2. to kill a drunken dwarf (1 hour)
    In Tharhalas. From @, go all W, N, all W, U, 2E, all N, kill dwarf.
  3. to find Lilolt (30 minutes)
    As above.

Comfort the Lost Lady [Complete]

Contributed by: Karekano
Level: 22
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Medievia, Enara
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a lost woman (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, go 6S and look around in the wharf.
  2. to give a child's doll to a lost woman (1 hour)
    Doll is in Enara, on the little girl mob. From entrance, go 3N and look around.

Components For A Spell For The Blood Witch [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Decrata and Kundra Additions by: Juliesse, Dima

Level: 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Condemned Arena, Gloumewood Farm, Dragmire
Total Time: 5 hours, 5 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a blood witch (1 hour)
    In Condemned Arena. From zone entrance, go all E, N, 2E, 3S, E, S, E, S, all E, N, 2E (hidden exit), S, E.
  2. to find a crayfish claw, a chicken foot, and a spray of oak leaves (2 hours, 40 minutes)
    a crayfish claw: in Dragmire. From entrance, go all W, U, all N, D, all W until second N exit. Then go all N, S, all E, S, and look around.
    a chicken foot: In Gloumewood Farm. From entrance, kill farmhand, loot key,unlock gate, open gate, go E and look around for hen. Kill hen, then search corpse, then examine corpse.
    a spray of oak leaves: in Verthandi. From entrance go N, 2E, 2W, 2N, E, 2N, 2E, all N, and kill Jack in the Green (hidden). Search corpse and loot. .
  3. to find a blood witch ()
    As above.
  4. to give a crayfish claw, a chicken foot, and a spray of oak leaves to a blood witch ( )
    As above.

Components For Horneg's Spell [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Raevan
Level: 29
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Spirited Heights, Vark Outpost, Toshi,
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Horneg (45 minutes)
    From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2 N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search, W. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U (Horneg is here.)
  2. to find an enchanted dragon claw (no limit)
    In Toshi on Shen Lung.
  3. to find a small globe of glowing rocklight (no limit)
    In Vark Outpost.

Compost Delivery [Complete]

Level: 22
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Forbidden Forest, Enara
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Johansva, the stable keeper (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, then W, W, S.
  2. to give 3 of an owl pellet to Johansva, the stable keeper (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    Loads on the screech owls in Enara. From zone entrance, go 2N, 7W, N, W, 11N, E, 5N, E, 6N, E, search, 2N, and look around (hidden exits here) for 3 owls, who load a pellet each. You are given a burlap bag of compost upon completion of this step.
  3. to give a burlap bag of compost to a village gardener (30 minutes)
    Gardener loads in Forbidden Forest. From zone entrance, go E, all N (through gate) to garden area, then look around.

Confront Tyr [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Tellahane
Level: 30
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Lost Civilization
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Ybbez (1 hour)
    In Lost Civilization.

Contact Kuukle for Henry [Complete]

Level: 19
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Goland's Tower, Graveyard
Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
    In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle,: then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
  2. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (20 minutes)
    In the garden rooms (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen. You receive a vibrant purple flower.
  3. to give a vibrant purple flower to Kuukle (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle. You receive a cute little daisy.
  4. to give a cute little daisy to Henry, the cathedral gardener (1 hour)
    As above.

Control the Talpidae Population [Complete]

Level: 26, 29
Difficulty: moderate (with help) to hard (solo, staked NPK)
Locale(s): Warrens of the Moshata
Total Time: 5 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Gasherbrum (1 hour)
    At the bottom level of Warrens. From entrance, go D, all N, D, all E, 7S, all W, N, D, D, D, N, W, W, W, S, S, D, E, S, S, W, W, D, N, N, D. This level is a small rectangle of about a dozen rooms, and Gasherbrum loads here (or occasionally on the way here.)
  2. to kill 7 of a talpidae (2 hours, 30 minutes)
    These creatures are located randomly in Warrens, appearing as "This enormous fur-covered creature gnaws at the cavern walls." This objective is no-death.
  3. to find Gasherbrum (1 hour)
    As above. This objective is no-death.

Cookie for Coendra [Complete]

Contributed by: Ide
Additions by: Plegue, Amethest, Antdos
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Gnomenel, Stornaway
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Coendra Giran (1 hour)
    In Gnomenel. From zone entrance, go all E to "Where Ceranel Street meets Main Street," then 4S, 2W.
  2. to give a white chocolate macadamia nut cookie to Coendra Giran (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Sceptrum on a kitchen boy. From @, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N, S, D, U, all N, E, S, open door, all E, and look around.

Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Brookhaven
Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes

  2. to kill 3 of a hired guard and 2 of an armed sentry (1 hour)
    These wander in Brookhaven.

Create Green Potion [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Tellahane, Ribaldor
Additions by: Pleen
Level: 25
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Braneri, Med City, Alendora
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find a crazy alchemist (30 minutes)
    In Braneri. From zone entrance, go 2N, E, N, open door E, 3E, U, W, and look around.
  2. to give 2 of a sprig of gemsly, a darkmoon root, and the red berry to a crazy alchemist (no limit)
    The first two load in the reagent garden under Med City. From Med City recall, enter thief, 3S, D, N, 2E, 2S, E, N, W, S, E, N, 2E, D and look around. The red berry loads in Forest of the Alendora, on the Alendora forager.
  3. to give 2 of a darkmoon root and 2 of a piece of fruit to a crazy alchemist (no limit)
    These load in the reagent garden, as above. You may need to leave the zone and re-enter to have the items pop bonded to you.

Create the Flames of Infinity for Sahale [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Takphius
Level: 28
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Gloumewood Farm
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Sahale, the shopkeeper (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 4W, N, W.
  2. to give the Flames of Infinity potion to Sahale, the shopkeeper (no limit)
    Make this in Gloumewood Farm. The "Joy of Potions" book in the witch's hut tells how to make it from components.

Create the Leech's Kiss for Sahale [Complete]

Contributed by: Bhalodus
Additions by: Kwellium
Level: 23
Difficulty: hard (challenging AQ medal)
Locale(s): Med City, Gloumewood
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find Sahale, the shopkeeper (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 4W, N, W
  2. to give the Leech's Kiss potion to Sahale, the shopkeeper (no limit)
    Make this from components that load in Gloumewood. All components det in 2Days:9 of flesh of a leech:From entrance, go a few E, then N to well. Type "turn handle", breathe water, and go D. Kill leeches, and search corpses for flesh until you have 9 (may need repop.)
    eyes of a water newt:At the river, go N; kill newt; search corpse to get eyes. If it didn't load, go all S for a second newt.
    hemlock leaves: From @, go all E, N, W, enter ring, pray. Look around for D exit; go D and look for a bush. Search bush to get leaves.
    jar of soil:From @, go all E to locked gate, then 2N, W, enter ring, "pray." Look around for a black cat. Kill it 9 times, which pops Osiquine. Kill her and get the key to her shack. Look around for a hidden E exit (there are two or more). After going E, go N, unlock door, N, open door E, E, open drawer, search drawer, get key drawer, W, search, U, unlock crate, open crate, get all crate. Find the jar here labeled "soil."
    Mixing them all together:From the soil, go D, N, and put 9 flesh, eyes, leaves, and jar in the cauldron. Get stick cauldron, hold stick, and type "stir".

  1. to find Sahale, the shopkeeper (1 hour)
    In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 4W, N, W.
  2. to give a Serpent's Fire potion to Sahale, the shopkeeper (no limit)

Crime Baron [Complete]

Contributed by: Pleen
Level: 13, 17
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Underground Tunnels
Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the town crier (20 minutes)
    In Med City, S of recall.
  2. to kill Kengil, the crime baron (2 hours)
    From Med recall, enter thief, then go 3S, then D. Go N, W, 4N, E, 2N, 2W, D, W, U. Get the key ("an iron key, stamped with a large "K") which loads on "a puny halfling thief." Then go D, E, U, 2E, 2S, W, 2S, W, D, 3W. (Note: a few of the exits are invisible; you have to search first. The last door is locked.)
  3. to give Kengil's gauntlets to the town crier (20 minutes)
    As above.

Crocodilian Gifts[Incomplete]

Additions by: Tenen
Level: 26
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Thanos
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the King of the Crocodilians (1 hour)
    In Thanos. Go all E, all N, all E, N.
  2. to find a jewel-encrusted helm (2 hours)
    jewel encrusted helm: in Thanos. Kill adder for key, (go back to entrance, all W S for adder). From there, go N, E til N, all N, unlock door, all W, all S, W, S, W, S for high priest.
  3. to give a jewel-encrusted helm to a Queen of the Crocodilians (1 hour)

Crushing a Mutiny [Complete]

Contributed by: Nerocellen
Additions by: Antdos
Level: 26, 27
Difficulty: easy (if you have sneak; is SOLO NO-COMM NO-DEATH NO-SUMMON NO-PHASE NO-TO-PHASE)
Locale(s): Pirate Ship
Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Captain Amos Trask (45 minutes)
    In Pirate Ship. From zone entrance, go E, 4N, E, U, S, U, 2E.
  2. to find the first mate (40 minutes)
    From above, go 2W, D, 2E, search, pick/open floorboard, D, W (open door), S.
  3. to find the navigator (40 minutes)
    From above, go N, 2E (open door), S.
  4. to kill the angry pirate (30 minutes)
    This is a hidden mob -- use faerie fog. From above, go N, W, U, 2W, U, S and look around.

Crystal for Xythe [Complete]

Contributed by: Vlar
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Riverton, Riverton Mines
Total Time: 1 hour
Objectives:
  1. to find Xythe (30 minutes)
    In Riverton. From northern entrance, go S, 5W, S.
  2. to give 5 of a chunk of freshly mined crystal to Xythe (1 hour)
    Crystals load on foremen in Riverton Mines. See Mines in Frequent Pathways.

Cure Madam Zash's Illness [Complete]

Level: 19
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Derah, Med City
Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Madam Zash (35 minutes)
    In Derah. From entrance to the zone, go N, N, N, N, N, N, W.
  2. to give a deep blue potion to Madam Zash (45 minutes)
    Deep blue potion can be purchased in Medievia in House of Herbs and Healing. From recall: enter cleric, then N, N, N, N, W, W, N.

Cures for a Thief [Complete]

Contributed by: Kernighan
Level: 22, 23
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Crime Underground, Med City, Courrain Island/Animated Chess Board
Total Time: 4 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Harald, the novice thief (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From there, S, S, E is usual load position.
  2. to find a purple, crystalline periapt and 3 of some Yrani roots and 5 of a deep blue potion (2 hours)
    purple, crystalline periapt: from the Animated Chessboard. From the entrance to Courrain Island, go N, E, N, W, N. For the barrel ride, "give 100 coins man." The room you land in has 2 hidden serpents who load the periapts.
    Yrani roots: can be purchased in Medievia in Desigra's Delicatessen. From recall: E, E, E, E, E, N, N, N.
    deep blue potion: can be purchased in Medievia in House of Herbs and Healing. From recall: enter cleric, then N, N, N, N, W, W, N.
  3. to give a purple, crystalline periapt and 3 of some Yrani roots and 5 of a deep blue potion to Harald, the novice thief (40 minutes)
    As above.

Cures for a Thief [Complete]

Completed by: Mandroth
Level: 22, 23
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Crime Underground, Med City, Courrain Island/Animated Chess Board
Total Time: 4 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Harald, the novice thief (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From there, S, S, E is usual load position.
  2. to find a purple, crystalline periapt and 3 of some Yrani roots and 5 of a deep blue potion (2 hours)
    purple, crystalline periapt: from the Animated Chessboard. From the entrance to Courrain Island, go N, E, N, W, N. For the barrel ride, "give 100 coins man." The room you land in has 2 hidden serpents who load the periapts.
    Yrani roots: can be purchased in Medievia in Desigra's Delicatessen. From recall: E, E, E, E, E, N, N, N.
    deep blue potion: can be purchased in Medievia in House of Herbs and Healing. From recall: enter cleric, then N, N, N, N, W, W, N.

Dagger for Doligoth [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Kovad, Anonymous

Locale(s): Trellor
Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Doligoth, the Master Thief (45 minutes)

  2. to find a zagamite dagger ( )
    Loads on zagamites in Dark Escarpment. From zone entrance, go U, all W until N exit. Remove your light source! Then go all N and look for the hidden zagamite mobs.
  3. to give a zagamite dagger to Doligoth ( )
