Dark Deeds a Foul [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Phu
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Vark Outpost, Tomb, Alps
Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the Outpost Commander (35 minutes)
    In Vark Outpost. In Vark Outpost. From entrance, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever, 2N. (Look for the bleached bone key which loads on scout, usually a few E.) From above, with key, go all W, all N, 3E.
  2. to kill 2 of a female tomb guard and Cendrelia, high priestess of the tomb ( )
    In Tomb of Oblivion. To get to the entrance, portal 98, then fly about 7N and 3E. From the zone entrance, go 2D, all W, E, all N. Cendrelia loads here. Guards wander.
  3. to find the Outpost Commander ( )
    As above.
  4. to kill a young fairy girl ( )
    In Alps.

Dark Elven Uprising [Complete]

Contributed by: Antdos
Additions by: Mospolo, Zanitho
Level: 19
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Spire of Kirys Ayr
Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the elven king (30 minutes)
    In the Forbidden Forest. From Med City recall, enter mage, then go 4W, 2S, 2W, 4N, 2E, all N, 2N, all N, 5E, 2N. Look for rooms called "A Forest of Dark and Gnarled Trees." One of them will have a hidden exit east, into room "In A Strange Colored Mist" with no exits. From "In a Strenge Colored Mist" go E, S, E, 3D, W, 2S, kill guard for key or pick door S, open door S, 3S, kill female elven servant for key, 2S, E, S, unlock door S, open door S, S. The king loads here. He's aggro, so leave right away or plan to kill him.
  2. to kill 2 of a dark elven assassin and 2 of a dark elven mage and 2 of a dark elven priestess (1 hour)
    In Spire, From @, go E, D, S, E, D, W, 3S and look around.

Death Card for Gypsy Girl [Complete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Lyngaeli's Nightmare
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a gypsy girl (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter mage and look around.
  2. to find a death card (2 hours)
    In Lyngaeli's Nightmare on the fortune teller. See the excellent walkthrough (link not available) at Death Corps' web site for details.
  3. to give a death card to a gypsy girl (1 hour)
    As above.

Death Flower for Horneg [Complete]

Contributed by: Jefry
Additions by: Takphius
Level: 24
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Horneg's Keep, Lyngaeli's Nightmare
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the small imp (45 minutes)
    In Horneg's. From entrance, go 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S, pick gate (or kill golem for key), open gate, 2S, open door S, S and look around.
  2. to find Horneg (15 minutes)
    From the gate above, go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U.
  3. to find a death flower (2 hours)
    In Lyngaeli's Nightmare. From entrance, go: all N, sleep, N, enter box, 2N, all W, kill grandma for key (amulet of fear protection.) Then go all E, all N, W, hold amulet, D, 2N, kill Helvyra for key (hairpin needle.) Then go 2S, U, E, S, search, 2E, enter box. Find the clown with stilts; kill clown and loot stilts. Then go N until you see the E exit to the freak show; go E, N, search, E, kill freak for key. Unlock safe; get toothpick. Then go W, S, W, N, W, wear stilts, N, kill cow for cowbell. Then go S, E, all N, unlock door, N, U, wear cowbell, W, kill Gigglesworth for death flower.
  4. to give a death flower to Horneg (1 hour)
    As above.

Death's Deck [Complete]

Additions by: Bhalodus
Level: 22, 25, 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s):Graveyard, Nightmare
Total Time: 2 hours, 32 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a room called The Necromancer's Sanctum Mortis (30 minutes)
    In the Graveyard. From zone entrance, go N, E, search, D.
  2. to find a death card (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Lyngaeli's Nightmare on the fortune teller. See the excellent walkthrough at Death Corps' web site (link not available) for details. Among other flags, this objective is NO-MAGIC NO-COMM NO-DEATH.
  3. to find a room called The Necromancer's Sanctum Mortis (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a death card to a necromancer (2 minutes)
    As above.

Decorate Gremmon's Office [Complete]

Additions by: Takphius
Level: 20
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Braneri, Akenuas, Cloud Giants
Total Time: 6 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, go 4W, N, W, N, U, N.
  2. to give the antlers of a golden stag to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (2 hours)
    These load in Akenuas Glade. From zone entrance, go 2N, E, N, 2 E, 3N, W, N, 2W, N, 4W (including hidden exit), S, 2W, S, 5E (hidden), S (hidden), S, E and look around for the stag (among several deer.)
  3. to give a small telescope to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (2 hours)
    In Academy of Braneri in the astronomy building, N, W, N, W from zone entrance. Go west in building, up the stairs, then east until in the room "Beside a Window." Search, then go up. Telescope loads "loose" in the room.
  4. to give a black urn painted with silver runes to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (2 hours)
    In Cloud Giants. From entrance, go N, all U, E, S, W, 2S, W, D, N, E, D, W, D, E, kill Polythenis for key -- use it to unlock boulder in next sequence. Then go W, U, E, U, W, S, U, E, 2N, E, all N, all E, S, all E, all N, W, N, search, W, N, E, get urn.

Decorative Drinks for the Drinkmaker [Complete]

Contributed by: Thaspian
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Wilderness Inn, E'nat'dae, Kirys Ayr, Quinstone
Total Time: 4 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the drinkmaker (30 minutes)
    In a Wilderness Inn. From the one NE of Med City, go 6E from entrance.
  2. to find a jeweled chalice of gold and a painted waterskin, portraying a bright waterfall and a waterskin with the crest of the Ayr family (3 hours, 30 minutes)
    a jeweled chalice of gold: In Quinstone, in Lord Quinstone's treasure chest at the end of the zone. Please refer to the excellent walkthrough available here (link not available).
    a painted waterskin, portraying a bright waterfall: Buy in E'nat'dae. From zone entrance, go all N until you see an E exit called "Morwa's General Store," then go E into it.
    a waterskin with the crest of the Ayr family: Buy in Kirys Ayr. From zone entrance, go E, 2U, E, N.
  3. to give a jeweled chalice of gold and a painted waterskin, portraying a bright waterfall and a waterskin with the crest of the Ayr family to the drinkmaker (20 minutes)
    As above.

Defeat the Prison Breakout [Complete]

Contributed by: Anonymous
Level: 19
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Ulhazzen
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a Medievia Guardsman (30 minutes)
    In Med City, randomly.
  2. to kill the ringleader and 15 of an escaped prisoner (1 hour)
    In Ulhazzen. From eastern @, go U and all W till you see the ringleader; the escaped prisoners load randomly in the zone.
  3. to find the prison warden (30 minutes)
    From "The Center of the Rock Quarry," go 2E, N.

Defend Agimon's Sandwich

Completed by: Arline, Petros
Level: 16
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City
Total Time: 2 hours, 8 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Lord Agimon of House Shinasu (30 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter thief, 2E, 2S.
  2. to find Larre Rigrin (1 hour)
    In Gnomenel, in Number 4 Main Street.
  3. to find Lord Agimon of House Shinasu (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to kill 10 of a camouflauged thief (8 minutes)
    These pop in the room with you. This is a no-death objective.

Defend the Cathedral [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Zalathorm
Level: 13
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Graveyard
Total Time: 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a cathedral templar (10 minutes)
    From entrance to Graveyard, go all N, all E, N, and look around.
  2. to kill 2Dark zombies (10 minutes)
  3. to kill 2 animated skeletons (10 minutes)
  5. to kill a spectral wraith and the ghost of a soldier (10 minutes)

Defend the Citadel [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Jaflin
Level: 25, 27, 28
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Trellor, Mellorian Citadel
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the High Priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
    See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to kill 30 of either a pirate invader or a hungry pirate (2 hours)
    In Mellorian Citadel, right after you have "activated" the zone. Do this as described in the Mellorian walkthrough (link not available) After doing this, go towards the stairs to the first level and start killing pirates.
  3. to find a room called the High Altar (30 minutes)
    Complete the Mellorian zone (link not available) then return to Trellor. From Trellor recall, go all U and N to the altar.

Defend the Priestess [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Krugon
Level: 27, 28
Difficulty: very hard
Locale(s): Stornaway
Total Time: 5 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the phantom priestess (1 hour)
    In Stornaway.
  2. to kill 10 of either a velociraptor, a triceratops, a pterodactyl, a deinonychus, a stegosaurus, an ankylosaurus, an iguanodon (4 hours)
    Located in Stornaway.
  3. to find the phantom priestess (1 hour)
    As above.

Delaia's Birthday Present [Complete]

Additions by: Vashka, Walno
Level: 19, 22
Difficulty: moderate (NPK)
Locale(s): Ryvaera, Dragmire, Rydhordel
Total Time: 6 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Nyxaia, the daughter of the empress (45 minutes)
    In Ryvaera. From zone entrance ("On the Surface of the River"), go 2S, D, E, D to "A Palace Balcony," then go N, W, N.
  2. to give a woven wooden basket to Nyxaia, the daughter of the empress (1 hour)
    Loads on Baevrilla in the beaver lodge part of Ryvaera.
  3. to find 4 of either a shiny green apple, a bunch of red grapes, some blackberries, a sweetened pear, a bundle of bananas, or some dried figs (2 hours)
    Shiny green apple: Loads in Crystal Lake in a camper's picnic basket. These can be found in the northwest (campground) and southeast (picnic area) parts of the zone.
    Bunch of red grapes: Loads on mobs in picnic area of Crystal Lake (inside picnic basket).
    Blackberries: load in Rydhordel Woods.
    Sweetened pear: loads in Med City on Lady Arabella. From recall, enter thief, 2E, 2S.
    Bundle of bananas: loads in the Gypsy Camp.
    Dried figs: load in Dragmire. Purchase from the orcish grocer. From "At the Checkpoint," go 2W, N, W
  4. to give 4 of either a shiny green apple, a bunch of red grapes, some blackberries, a sweetened pear, a bundle of bananas, or some dried figs to Nyxaia (40 minutes)
    As above.
  5. to find a bright pink ribbon (1 hour)
    In Rydhordel Woods on Jamynie in the hedge maze.
  6. to give a bright pink ribbon to Nyxaia ( )
    As above.

Deliver a Message for Dramous [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Milekan
Level:
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Brookhaven
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Dramous, the Mayor of Brookhaven (1 hour)
    In Brookhaven. From recall, go all N, all W, get the key from the messenger. From recall, go east, unlock door, S, U, 2E. (You have to drop key to get to mayor -- can't enter room with slippery key.)
  2. to find a member of the Brookhaven City council (10 minutes)
    From recall, all N then all W.
  3. to find Dramous, the Mayor of Brookhaven (10 minutes)
    As above.

Deliver a Message Home [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Bhalodus
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Vanlarra, Realm Of The Cloud Giants
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a failed tower applicant (20 minutes)
    In Vanlarra. From western entrance to zone, go E until you find one.
  2. to give the bracelet of twins to a lady of Riverton. (2 hours, 15 minutes)
    Bracelet of twins loads in Realm of the Cloud Giants. From zone entrance go N, 2U, 5E, kill member of armed guards for palace key, S, open door U, U, W, S, E, S, all U, kill Ceseracades. A lady of Riverton loads at Ruby Avenue in Riverton. From @, go S, all W til you see the lady (hidden mob).

Deliver a Sea Elf Note [Complete]

Additions by: Sulin
Level: 26, 28, 29
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Lattyrna
Total Time: 5 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a sea elf (2 hours)
    In Lattyrna. From @, go all E, N, all D, all E, 3N, 3W, all N, W.
  2. to give a small, rolled-up note to Minnos (3 hours)
    In Reef. From second @, go all W, 5S, W, U, follow path through and down volcano, 4S, E, open door, all E, give note minnos.Note: this is no-comm.

Deliver Citizens from Evil [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Rarazona
Level: 20
Difficulty: easy to hard
Locale(s): Trellor, Xezadha
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the High Priestess of Trell ( )
    See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to find a xezadha worshipper ( )
    In Xezadha. From entrance, all N. (Be forewarned it will attack you on sight.)
  3. to kill 5 of a xezadha worshipper, kill 5 of a xezadha worshipper [sic], and kill Xezadha ( )
    Worshippers will be found wandering in the cathedral N, E, and W of the entrance to zone. To find Xezadha, go all N from the zone entrance to the altar. From the altar, open tile and go D, 2S, search, then W, S, and pick door or get key and unlock. From there go W, D, all E and again kill priestess for key or pick door to unlock. Open door and go E, D, all W, S, all E, all D, all W to find Xezadha. (This mob is part cleric/part warrior and may be fireshielded so be cautious.)
  4. to find the High Priestess of Trell ( )
    As above.

Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Riverton Mines, Lyryanoth
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Kiknanen, the foreman (1 hour)

  2. to give a crudely written letter to a mine foreman (1 hour)
    See Mines in Frequent Pathways.
  3. to find Kiknanen, the foreman (1 hour)
    As above.

Deliver Message to King Greybeard's Cousin [Complete]

Level: 24, 28
Difficulty: hard (aggro mobs)
Locale(s): Mystical Forest, Stornaway Castle
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
    In Mystical Forest. From recall, go all E, all N, all W, N, U, 5S, 5E, all N.
  2. to find the ghost of King Clayborne (1 hour)
    In Stornaway. From entrance ("Standing Before the Gates of Stornaway Castle"), go N, N, N, N, N, E, U, U, W, W, W, N.

Deliver Scrolls to Callard [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Yasujiro
Additions by: Stephano
Level: 30
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Tomb of Oblivion, Barbegazian Alps
Total Time: 4 hours, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Callard ( )
    In Tomb of Oblivion. From @, go D, 4N.
  2. to find Nathelian (2 hours)
    In Alps. Make and wear skis. Then from entrance, go N, all E, all U, N (make sure you have less than 100 stones in inventory.) Then go all E, N, E, all N, 2E, N, W, 2N, follow path W till S.
  3. to find Callard ( )
    As above.

Deliver Secret Message [Complete]

Contributed by: Theresa
Level: 14
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Med City, Trellor
Total Time: 1 hour
Objectives:
  1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
    See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to find a cityguard of Trellor (30 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, look around. Note:you receive a green orb.

Destroy Beastial Alliances [Complete]

Contributed by: Antdos
Additions by: Dima, Mospolo
Level: 24
Difficulty: no idea!
Locale(s): Tomb Of Oblivion
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Gaul, the temple usher (45 minutes)
    In Tomb of Oblivion. From entrance, go 2D, 3W and look around.
  2. to find Knorr, the battle cleric (1 hour)
    In Tomb. From @, 2D, 3S, 2W, N, W, N.
  3. to find a High Priest of Skye Temple (1 hour, 15 minutes)
    In Asnor, about 9 levels up. From SE @ entrance, go due N/U until you are in the Temple. Go all N. At "A Long Stairwell," go U, then all S, U, then all N. The High Priest loads here at the Altar of Skye. Ice troll for battering ram.
  4. to find a room called The Compound Entrance (30 minutes)
    In Xanth. From @, N.
  5. to kill 20 of either a beastman, a feline beastman, a goatman, or a beast (45 minutes)
    In zone.
  6. to kill an eagleman (15 minutes)
    From the zone entrance, "A Sandy Path," go N, 2W, o door N, 3N, U, S, open door S, S.

Destroy the Light [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Kernighan
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Ulhazzen, Riverton
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find the Avatar of a Dark Goddess (3 hours)
    In Ulhazzen. From western @, go E and D into the mines. Head north and west, and look for a D exit. Go D, then follow the path N, going U and D as needed to "An Altar to a Dark Goddess."
  2. to kill 2 of a priest of the Sun, 2 of a priestess of the Sun, and 2 of a guardian (3 hours)
    These load in the temple in the NW part of Riverton. One of the guardians carries a key you need for next objective.
  3. to find the Light of the Sun (no limit)
    Loads in the Temple of the Sun (NW corner of Riverton) on the Solar Entity. From the altar, unlock door W, open door W, W. This is a tough mob to kill solo, so get help.
  4. to give the Light of the Sun to the Avatar of a Dark Goddess (30 minutes)
    As above.

Destroy Works of Meddling Mages for Medievia Guard [Complete]

Level: 26, 29
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Med City, Xanthal
Total Time: 5 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a Medievia Guardsman (15 minutes)
  2. to kill 3 of a beast, 2 of a beast woman, 2 of a doddering beastman, and a beastly servant (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    These mobs load in Xanthal.
    a beast: These load all in the shelter. From zone entrance, N, all W, 3N.
    a beastly servant: From zone entrance, N, 2W to "The Tower Entrance," then 3N. (Be sure and get the key he loads.)
    a doddering beastman: From the beastly servant, all E, U, all E, unlock door N, open door N, N. Note: one of a kind mob in zone, so to kill the second you'll have to wait for repop.
    a beast woman: With Kynase. From the doddering beastman, S, E, unlock door E, open door E, E. Note: one of a kind mob in zone, so to kill the second you'll have to wait for repop.
  3. to find a Medievia Guardsman (15 minutes)
  4. to kill gargoyle, the large gargoyle, and the gargoyle commander (1 hour)
    In Horneg's Keep.
  5. to find a Medievia Guardsman (15 minutes)

Total Time: 5 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the Wizard (1 hour)
    In Aeketh.
  2. to find the Great Eruptor (3 hours)
    In New Ashton CPK.

Dice For The Gambler Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways.

Contributed by: Sorban
Level: 21
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): City Of Medievia, Alendora
Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an impoverished gambler ()
    From Med recall, enter mage, then go 4N, 2E, S, E, D and look around (hidden).
  2. to find a pair of black dice ()
    On Takenos in Alendora. See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N.
  3. to give a pair of black dice to a gambler (30 minutes)
    As above.

Dice Instead of Cards [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Elagneros
Level: 20
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Dragmire Stronghold, Alendora,
Total Time: 1 hour, 55 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a gambler (40 minutes)
    In Dragmire. From "At the Checkpoint," go 2W and all N.
  2. to find a pair of black dice (40 minutes)
    In Takenos in Alendora. See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N.
  3. to find a gambler (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a pair of black dice to a gambler (5 minutes)
    As above. Note: you receive a deck of marked cards.

Digging up the Dead's Treasure [Complete]

Level: 21
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): New Genesia
Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a room called Outside the South Gate of New Genesia (30 minutes)
    In the center of the @@@@ row on the south side of New Genesia.
  2. to find the wilderness room at 425 x 1490 (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    This is on the southwest part of the continent along the shore, between Lyryanoth and CT 37.
  3. to kill a baenlyr (15 minutes)
    This is no-death. Baenylr pops in the above room.

Dinner for Amos [Complete]

Contributed by: Cuxuit
Additions by: Tesbeth
Level: 25
Difficulty: hard (rare loads)
Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Wilderness
Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the cook of the pirate ship (30 minutes)
    On the Pirate Ship. From zone entrance, follow the path E, all N, all E. On the ship, head north and look for a down exit. Then go D, all S for the cook. The cook will give you a fishing rod.
  2. to give 4 of either a spoonbill or a bass to the ship's cook (45 minutes)
    Acquire these by fishing nearby. The nearest fishing area can be found by flying south to the nearby altar, then 4 or 5 west to the 2x2 lake. They are rare loads and are find-original.

Dinner Preparations [Complete]

Contributed by: Nezryth
Level: 26
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Castle Medievia, Gloumewood Farm
Total Time: 1 hour, 35 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the gnomish cook (30 minutes)
    From recall in Medievia, go: all U, all N until "An Intersection in the Chamber of Planes," then W, W, W, N, N, E, E, U, E, all E, all S, W, all S.
  2. to give an ear of sweet corn and a giant tomato to the gnomish cook. (1 hour, 5 minutes)
    These load in Gloumewood Farm. From @, go 2E, N, get all plant, get all corn.

Dipwaun's Dilemma [Complete]

Contributed by: Afiniti
Additions by: Karria
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Quinstone, Sceptrum
Total Time: 4 hours, 5 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a hungry soldier (40 minutes)
    In Quinstone's Keep. From @, go N, 2E, 2U, 2E, 2N, 2E.
  2. to find Dipwaun, the cook (20 minutes)
    From the soldiers, go all W, S, E, S.
  3. to find a jar of paprika (2 hours)
    In Sceptrum Ishachi. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N till down intersection, then D, U, all N, all E to door, S, open door E, all E. The jar loads on Michel.
  4. to give a jar of paprika to Dipwaun, the cook (45 minutes)
    As above. He gives you some soup.
  5. to give a bowl of soup made from crushed swamp plants to a hungry soldier (20 minutes)
    As above.

Dipwaun's Dinner Joke [Complete]

Contributed by: Mospolo
Level: 21
Difficulty: very easy
Locale(s): Quinstone, Gloumewood
Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Dipwaun, the cook (45 minutes)
    In Quinstone. From @, go N, 2E, 2U, 2E, N, E, S.
  2. to find a bucket of slop (1 hour)
    In Gloumewood Farm. From @, go 6E, 2S, E, N. Kill man for bucket.
  3. to give a bucket of slop to Dipwaun, the cook (45 minutes)
    As above.

Dirty Clothes [Complete]

Contributed by: Zasildar
Additions by: Pleen
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Brookhaven, Braneri, Wilderness
Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a sleepy homeowner (30 minutes)
    In Brookhaven. From zone entrance, go N, all W, S.
  2. to find a large bar of soap (30 minutes)
    This loads in Braneri in a crate in a room called "Crates of Dry Goods." From zone entrance, go all N to "A Small Well," then N, 2W, D, N, W, S. Note: you are teleported to the Underground Tunnels in Med City.
  3. to give a large bar of soap to the water weird (10 minutes)
    This loads in the room in which you've just been transported.
  4. to give 2 of some wrinkled pajamas to the water weird (10 minutes)
    As above.
  5. to find a room called On the River Courrain, Inside a Narrow Tunnel (10 minutes)
    Enter Med City by the river to the north of town and follow the path until you find this room.
  6. to find a room called On the River Courrain, at a Waterfall (30 minutes)
    Just outside the Labyrinth in the wilderness; look for the cluster of 6 @'s.
  7. to find a long bargeman's pole (1 hour)
    In Enara. Loads on a gypsy bargeman in the canal area.
  8. to find a room called On the River Courrain, at a Waterfall (30 minutes)
    As above.
  9. to find the wilderness room at 992 x 1220 (30 minutes)
    South of the above, near Gnomenel. This is a river square.
  10. to give 2 of a mud-stained shirt of white cloth to a sleepy homeowner (30 minutes)

Distillery Dilemma [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Afiniti
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Esacha, Braneri, Riverton
Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the temporary distillery foreman (1 hour)
    In Esacha Fen, NW part.
  2. to give a small feather quill to the temporary distillery foreman (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Braneri in the astronomy building, N and W of zone entrance.
  3. to give a sapphire-tipped quill to the temporary distillery foreman (1 hour)
    a sapphire-tipped quill: Loads on the Mayor of Riverton. See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.

Do Some Damage [Complete]

Completed by: Maximillion
Level: 25, 26, 27, 28, 30
Difficulty: easy (if you can find Barklins)
Locale(s): Crystal Lake, Wilderness
Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Wandering Damage (30 minutes)
    Found in Crystal Lake. From entrance to zone, go N until you are on the pier, then go E or W onto the lake to find this randomly loading mob.
  2. to kill 5 of a Barklin tree (45 minutes)
    Located at random in the Wilderness. Try near Vanlarra.
  3. to find Wandering Damage (30 minutes)
    As above. Completion of the quest results in the award of a staff made of stripped elm wood [Lev(0) Loc(hold) 10xquickness - NoBits sta(10) con(2) Cond(pristine - 185 Days)] in addition to the usual AQ and gold bonuses.

Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the young girl (30 minutes)
    In Trellor, on Merchant's Circle.
  2. to find a little toy doll (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    Purchase at the toy shop in Medievia. From recall, go 5E, N, 3E. This item is find-original.
  3. to give a little toy doll to the young girl (30 minutes)
    As above.

Difficulty: very easy

Total Time: 1 hour

  2. to find a downy feather quill shed from a molting owl (30 minutes)
    In Haven; buy from Magrah's General Store. Type "haven," 3W, S, buy quill.

  2. to kill a small baby dragon (3 hours)
    In Asnor. From southern entrance, go U, 4N, U, N, open boulder, 3W, kill old man, loot axe, unlock floorboard, open floorboard, D.

Dresses for a Rush Wedding [Complete]

Contributed by: Carolinus
Additions by: Helitus, Shaedehart, Dima
Level: 22, 23
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Med City, Ryvaera
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a student (1 hour)
    In Med City. From recall, enter mage, 4E, S, 2E, U.
  2. to find a white silk dress, beaded with moonstones and an amber shift (1 hour)
    In Ryvaera. The naiads load in the western part of the zone, under water. A white silk dress, beaded with moonstones loads on a moonstone naiad; an amber satin shift loads on an amber naiad.
  3. to give a white silk dress, beaded with moonstones and an amber satin shift to a student (30 minutes)

Dresses for Lady Goland [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Uamak, Cildanor
Level: 28
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Lord Goland's Tower, E'nat'dae
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Lady Goland (1 hour)
    In Goland's Tower. You receive 200000 coins to buy dresses.
  2. to find a peacock blue dress and a brilliant red dress (30 minutes)
    In E'nat'dae. From zone entrance, go N, W, 4N, E and buy dresses.
  3. to find Lady Goland (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to give a peacock blue dress and a brilliant red dress to Lady Goland (10 minutes)
    As above.
  5. to kill an opal dragon (15 minutes)
    In the room with Lady Goland. It is advisable to have a caster and a tank. You may have to flee.
  6. to find Lady Goland (10 minutes)
    As above.

Drinks for Duke [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Takphius
Level: 26
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor,
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find a serving lad (30 minutes)
    In Trellor
  2. to find 3 of a warm mug of coffee and 3 of a steaming mug of mint tea and 3 of a steaming mug of hot chocolate (3 hours)
    tea and hot chocolate: These both load in Alps CPK.

Drinks for the Draug [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Geengyr
Additions by: Teufeli, Takphius
Level: 21
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): New Ashton, Dragmire, Med City
Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a Draug (45 minutes)
    In New Ashton, wandering.
  2. to give a one-gallon water jug to a Draug (20 minutes)
    Buy at the Watering Hole in New Ashton. From City Hall Sqare, go W on Hickory Road, then S.
  3. to give a jug of hard cider to a Draug (45 minutes)
    In Dragmire. From @, go W, U, N, D, 7W (intersection), 4N, E. Buy it here.
  4. to give a mug of black coffee to a Draug (45 minutes)
    In Med City. From recall, enter Mage, W, N, W. Buy it here.
  5. to give a canteen of lemonade to a Draug (15 minutes)
    In New Ashton. From southern @, go 2W, N. Buy it here.

Druid Diplomacy in NaeraMae [Complete]

Contributed by: Bhalodus
Additions by: Cipactli
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Akenuas, NaeraMae
Total Time: 4 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Aeldar (1 hour)
    In Akenuas Glade. From zone entrance, go E, N, 2E, 3N, W, N, 2W, N, all E, S, all E, S, all E, all N (hidden exit), W.
  2. to find Herind (1 hour)
    In NaeraMae. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go 2E, 4S,then through the door to the east (pick or kill the guard for the key.)
  3. to kill Jernian (1 hour)
    From Herind, go 2W.
  4. to find Aeldar (1 hour)
    As above.

Drunken Fishing [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Vashka
Additions by: Ravir, Lograk
Level: 21
Difficulty: easy
Locale(s): Crystal Lake, Wytherwind, Mystara, Med City
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find an inebriated fisherman ( )
    In Crystal Lake, at the campsite. From @, go 3N, 3W, and look around.
  2. to give a bottle of Bristolefield Red from the Wytherwind Winery, a keg of Foster's lager, and Pixie's Pure Spirits to an inebriated fisherman ( )
    a bottle of Bristolefield Red from the Wytherwind Winery: In Wytherwind on the underground level. From the zone entrance, go all S (to "Deep in the Mire"), W, W, W, S, S, S, search, D, D. (Be sure you're breathing water.) Go W, N, N, W, S, W, W, N, N, W. Get the crow bar. Go down to a room called "An Underwater Wine Cellar." Unlock 2.crate, open 2.crate, and get all 2.crate.
    a keg of Foster's lager: in the Mystara Souvenir Shop. From @, go all W till D, S, E, buy keg.
    Pixie's Pure Spirits: in Med City. From Med recall, enter mage, W, N, N.

Drunken Wishes [Complete]

Level: 20
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Kirys Ayr
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find an old grizzled wizard (45 minutes)
    In Kirys Ayr. From zone entrance, go E, D, S, E, D, W, 3S, E, S, E, 2S and look around (he's usually invisible.)
  2. to give a bottle of wine to an old grizzled wizard (15 minutes)
    From zone entrance, go E, 3U, E, S. Buy wine here.
  3. to give 5 of a waybread to an old grizzled wizard (15 minutes)
    From zone entrance, go E, 2U, E, N. Buy waybread here.
  4. to give a staff of the spire to an old grizzled wizard (45 minutes)
    From zone entrance, go E, all U, 3E, N. Loads (irregularly) here on the guardian, who may take several passes to kill at this level.

Dry Widow's Tears [Complete]

Completed by: Ceresir
Level: 27, 28, 29
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): DeRah, Sceptrum
Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the widow (40 minutes)
    In good DeRah. From zone entrance (@), go 7N, 3W, 3S, E, S, E.
  2. to give a mourning veil to the widow (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    Mourning veil loads on weeping widow (appears as "A young woman weeps uncontrollably" in Sceptrum. From zone entrance, go N into the church and look for a widow that loads the veil.
  4. to give a wilted black rose to the widow (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    Rose loads in Sceptrum Ishachi. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror. From there, go all D and all N (there is a phantom exit to walk through) and kill Welsh for key. From Welsh, go S, D, U, all N, and search well. Get key then go E, unlock/open door, E, U, unlock/open trapdoor, U and kill Amelia for her key. From Amelia go all D, W, N, W, unlock/open door, W. To get into the Emperor's tower you have to "talk mistress magnum malum". From the room you are transferred to, the Emperor is all U. Kill him and loot the rose.

Dubious Daggers [Incomplete]

Additions by: Sulfyr
Level: 26, 28, 29, 30
Difficulty: hard (CPK)
Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Fire Giants
Total Time: 5 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find the criminal mastermind (1 hour)
    From Lyryanoth recall, go 3S, 3E, N, E (the last two exits are hidden). The mastermind loads here with two other mobs.
  2. to find a diamond studded dagger and the Dagger boots (3 hours)
    In Fire Giants' Keep CPK. From @, go U, 4S, E, 3S, E (yes for CPK), all E, 2N, pick/ethereal door, all N, S, search, reduce weight to under 75, all D, all E, W, all N, E, all D, all N, D. Master thief loads here; both items load on him.

Duster for Morwa [Complete]

Contributed by: Bhalodus
Additions by: Kaxx, Elagneros, Shaedehart
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Golands
Total Time:
Objectives:
  1. to find Morwa (30 minutes)
    In E'nat'dae. From zone entrance, go N, W, 6N, E.
  2. to find an elegant feather duster (50 minutes)
    Kuukle in the upper level of Goland's tower has this. Enter the zone and go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle. Note: there are "dusters" and "feather dusters" in Med and Med Castle which won't work.
  3. to give an elegant feather duster to Morwa (30 minutes)
    As above. Note: The player gets a blue orb in addition to gold upon successful completion of AQ.

Duster for Town Crier [Complete]

Additions by: Milekan
Level: 21, 22, 23, 24
Difficulty: moderate (all solo)
Locale(s): Med, Goland's Tower
Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the town crier (20 minutes)
    In Med, a few S of recall.
  2. to give an elegant feather duster to the town crier (2 hours)
    Kuukle in the upper level of Goland's tower has this. Enter the zone and go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle. Note: there are "dusters" and "feather dusters" in Med and Med Castle which won't work.

Dwarf King Assassination [Complete]

Additions by: Milekan
Level: 26
Difficulty: hard (solo, no-portal, no-death)
Locale(s): Crime Underground, Tharhalas
Total Time: 6 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (1 hour)
    In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
  2. to kill Melthan, King of the Helbalas dwarves (4 hours)
    In Tharhalas. From entrance, go all W, N, all W, U, all N, E, U, all N, all E, U, S, E, all S, E, all S, all W, U, all W, all N, all E, all S, all U, N, D, all N, all W, all N, S, E (hidden exit) to king.

Earth Crystal Creation with High Priestess [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Alexial, Iradel, Sarius
Level: 20
Additions by: Lilopi
Difficulty:
Locale(s): Trellor
Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the high priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
    See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.
  2. to find Madam Zash (40 minutes)
    In Derah. From entrance to the zone, go 6N, W. Note: You will receive a gold-colored stone.
  3. to find Madame Isramala (1 hour)
    In Gypsy Camp. From zone entrance, go D, E, 3S, W, 3S (including searching for a hidden exit), 6W, 2S. You receive a chunk of freshly mined crystal.
  4. to find Nanutut, the Oracle (1 hour)
    In El Cantara. From zone entrance, go U, N, W, U, 4N, 2W, 2N, (there are some hidden exits). You receive a molten rock.
  5. to give a gold-colored stone, a chunk of freshly mined crystal, and [an item] to the high priestess of Trell (25 minutes)
    As above.

Egg Drop Soup for the Duke [Incomplete]

Contributed by: Jaztari
Additions by: Kirgan
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Enara, Gloumewood
Total Time: 9 hours, 10 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Kaisa (1 hour)
    From @, go all N, 3W, 4N 3E, N, open door, N, and ice the guards there for the guardpost key. Unlock/open door, N, open portcullis, 5N, 2U, 2S, E, 2N, W, search, 2N, E, open door, N, W, N, W.
  2. to find the cook (20 minutes)
    From Kaisa , go E, S, E, S, W, 2S, E, 2S, W, 2N, 2D. Then go S, all W, N, all W, N.
  3. to give 3 of a chicken's foot to the cook (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    Found on hens in Gloumewood Farm. From zone entrance, go all E and look around. Search corpses of hens to reveal feet.
  4. to give an onion to the cook (20 minutes)
    In Village Market in Forbidden Forest. From @ go E, 2N, W.
  5. to give 5 of a smashed egg from the catacombs to the cook (6 hours)
    Get from people exiting the Catacombs.

Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Realm of the Cloud Giants
Total Time: 3 hours
Objectives:
  1. to find Vole, King of the Cloud Giants (45 minutes)

  2. to kill Garlik and 4 of a gigantic woman and 8 of a roaming giant and 4 of a barbarous-looking giant (2 hours)
    In Asnor. From southern zone entrance, go U, 3N, 3E. Giants are all in a 2-room radius.

Elite Assassin [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Palpatinus
Level: 26
Difficulty: hard
Locale(s): Fire Giant's Keep, Vark Outpost
Total Time: 4 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find an insane renegade vark (1 hour, 40 minutes)
    in Vark Outpost. From @, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever. Then go 2N, 2E, U (hidden),2E, search, N, 2W, D into CPK/hidden exit area. Go W and look around.
  2. to kill 4 of the elite fire giant guard (3 hours)
    In Fire Giants' CPK. From above, go E, E (Y for CPK), then all E and all N. Pick door (if you can't pick, get the key from the two-headed meazel which loads nearby.) Open door N, N and look around for these mobs.

Elixir of Life for Clayborne [Incomplete]

Level: 28, 30
Difficulty: very hard (difficult mobs to solo)
Locale(s): Stornaway, Mystical Forest
Total Time: 5 hours, 50 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find the ghost of King Clayborne (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    In Stornaway Castle. From zone entrance, go all N to a closed door, open, N, E to "Base of the Central Stairway", 2U, all W to throne.
  2. to give an elixir of life to the ghost of King Clayborne (3 hours, 20 minutes)
    Found in Mystical Forest. From recall, go all E, all N, all W to closed door, open door, N, U.

Elixir of Longevity [Needs Detail]

Contributed by: Raenyn
Additions by: Petros, Barcho
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): The Academy of Braneri, Hives of the Giants, Tharhalas, Crypt of Vatos
Total Time: 4 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a crazy alchemist (40 minutes)
    In Braneri. From entrance, go 2N, E, N, open door E, 3E, U, W and look around.
  2. to give a valerian root and a ball of pollen and a speckled toadstool to a crazy alchemist (3 hours)
    valerian root: is on Exatli the sprite in Tharhalas; can steal root.ball of pollen: in Hives of the Giants. Stealable on some of the bees or in the hexagonal cell rooms.
    a speckled toadstool: in Crypt of Vatos on Plurg, the fungus. At zone entrance, pull lever. Go all W, all D, all E through hidden exit. Plurg is in this area; steal toadstool or kill.
  3. to give an elixir of life to an apparition of an ancient alchemist (1 hour)
    Apparition loads in Tomb of Oblivion. From entrance, go D and then go N until the intersection (A Hexagonal Sandstone Cave).From there go 2E, 2S, E.

Empty Jars for the Bathing Girls [Complete]

Contributed by: Ontarious
Additions by: Athnex, Pleen
Level: 27
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Crime Underground, Crystal Lake
Total Time:2 hours, 15 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a girl in a bathing suit (30 minutes)
    In Crystal Lake. From entrance, go N, 10W, 13N.
  2. to find 2 of a clear jar (1 hour, 15 minutes)
    These load in Crime Underground on Chalemvir and other mobs. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From here, Chalemvir is N, N, D, N (he's "An enormous hulk...").
  3. to give 2 of a clear jar to a girl in a bathing suit (30 minutes)
    As above.

Enchanted Brownies Disaster [Complete]

Additions by: Phu, Satra
Level: 23
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Med City, Preserve
Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find Winchel, the baker (30 minutes)
    In Med City Thieves' Quarter. From recall, enter thief, then go 4E, 2N, W.
  2. to kill 5 of a brownie (2 hours)
    In the Preserve. From the zone entrance (@), go 2W, N, E, N, 2 W, S, 2W ("Crossing a Wooden Bridge"), S, E, search, S (hidden opening), D, E, search, S. The brownies will be in these rooms.
  3. to give 5 of a chocolate brownie to Winchel, the baker (30 minutes)
    As above.
  4. to find a room called A Cozy Home (20 minutes)
    On Ramarke Street. From med recall, go 7S, 4E, 5S, open door W, W.
  5. to kill 5 of a brownie (20 minutes)
    These pop in the room with you.

End to a Tyrant's Reign [Complete]

Additions by: Dima, Milekan
Level: 25
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Trellor, Spirited/Horneg's
Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a whimpering poet (45 minutes)
    In Trellor. From recall, go U, all N, all W, all N and look around.
  2. to kill Horneg (45 minutes)
    From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here.
  3. to find a whimpering poet (30 minutes)
    As above.

Locale(s): Toshi
Total Time: 2 hours
Objectives:

Enlightened Pilgrim [Needs Detail]

Additions by: Milekan, Rabilieus
Level: 25, 29
Difficulty: very hard (NPK)
Locale(s): Riverton, Asnor, Lyryanoth
Total Time: 5 hours, 30 minutes
Objectives:
  1. to find a devout pilgrim (30 minutes)
    In the streets of Riverton. Try entering the north entrance, then walking west along Ruby Avenue.
  2. to give the crystal dagger of Enlightening and the cloak of Enlightenment to a devout pilgrim (5 hours)
    Cloak loads in Asnor on the priest.
    Crystal dagger loads in Lyryanoth. From recall, go 2E, S, kill lizard and loot key, then U.

Enlightenment for a Pilgrim [Complete]

Contributed by: Tyunsorcio
Level:
Difficulty: moderate
Locale(s): Riverton, Catacombs
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find a devout pilgrim (45 minutes)
    In Riverton, wandering randomly. Try entering the north @, then walking W along Ruby Avenue.
  2. to give 6 of a ring carved of black stone, engraved with runes to a devout pilgrim (no limit)
    These load on dreamweavers in the Catacombs.
  3. to to give a ring of divine protection to a devout pilgrim (no limit)
    Loads in Bloodstone, or you can purchase from someone (it's not find-original.)

Equip a Trader [Complete]

Additions by: Vlar
Level: 20
Difficulty: easy to hard
Locale(s): Academy of Braneri, many others
Total Time: no limit
Objectives:
  1. to find a trading master (30 minutes)
    In Academy of Braneri, go N until "A Small Well." Then go W then all N.
    2.
  2. to give 3 of any of :a bag of holding, a pair of drow skin boots, mountain climbing boots, leather riding boots, makeshift bone leggings, a pair of heavy black boots, a white goose feather quill, a brass sextant, Casino's and Gambling: The Gamblers Anonymous Handbook, or a burlap sack to a trading master (no limit)
    Note: You can give 3 of the same item if needed.
    white goose feather quill: Buy in Riverton at the Grocery and General Store on Emerald Avenue.
    bag of holding: Loads in Crime Underground.
    drow skin boots:
    mountain climbing boots: From the grumpy old man in Asnor Mountains.
    leather riding boots:
    makeshift bone leggings: From the skeletal abomination in Wytherwind. From zone entrance ("A Roofless Entryway"), go all W, N, all W, S, S, E, D, D, W, all S, E, E, N, N, N, N, then all W until you see one.
    heavy black boots:
    brass sextant: The brass sextant loads on the Navigator in Pirate Ship. From the entrance to the zone (@), go E, 4N, E, U, S, 2E, search, D, E, S. Kill the navigator (a level 20+ warrior.)
    Casino's and Gambling: Buy at "A Broken Down Wagon" in Dragmire. From just inside the start of the zone ("At the Checkpoint"), go W, W, N, W. Sometimes this can also be found on mobs wandering around in Med City, including the crier.
    burlap sack:

    Equip Gremmon [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Bavyon
    Level: 27, 30
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Alcord, NaeraMae, Asnor, Vark, Crime, Labyrinth or New Ashton
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall ( )
      In Med City. From recall, go 4W, N, W, N, U, N.
    2. to give a suit of Alcordian battle armor to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall ( )
      In Alcord. From zone entrance (@), go S, S, E, and all S until you see an Alcordian knight, which appears as "A skeleton wearing black armor on its body." The knight loads the suit of Alcordian battle armor. Kill the knight and return the suit to Gremmon.
    3. to give a red steel helm and visor and boots of mountain climbing to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall ( )
      The former loads on NaeraMae on a minotaur. The latter loads on the mountain climber in Asnor.
    4. to give a [shortsword] to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall ( )
      In Vark's Outpost. From the @, go N and find your way to the top. Go E 2 or 3 times, go U (hidden exit), and go all N. Follow trail around twice (,it's a weird zone that changes as you circle it) and look for a Vark scout. (Sense life is needed). Kill him and get his shortsword.
    5. to give a bag of holding and 10 green potions to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall ( )
      The bag of holding loads on the mob in the 5th challenge area in Crime Underground. Green potions may be purchased in Labyrinth or New Ashton.

    Equip Halfling for His Journey [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Antdos, Aaromyer
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Forbidden Forest
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Alexial Lightfoot (30 minutes)
      In Forbidden Forest. From @, go 3E, S, E, 3S, 4E, 3S, E.
    2. to give a wicked shortsword and a spiked buckler and a small Drallan helmet to Alexious Lightfoot (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      a wicked shortsword: in NaeraMae on Hadren.
      a spiked buckler: on Naeramae.
      a small Drallan helmet: in Ulhazzen on the War Maiden of Fire. From western @< go 2E, D, W, S, W, S.

      Note: this is find-original.

    Equip the Durgeons [Complete]

    Contributed by: Mandroth
    Level: 18, 20
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Dray'mar, Karlisna
    Total Time: 4 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Ves'pre, the first one of Dray'mar (40 minutes)
      In Dray'mar. From zone entrance (@), go 2E, 2N, 2W, U, 2N.
    2. to give 5 of a pair of golden sleeves and 5 of a polished golden helmet and 5 of a golden cloak and 5 of a pair of polished golden leggings and 5 of a pair of golden gauntlets to Ves'pre the first one of Dray'mar (2 hours, 20 minutes)
      Wander the streets of Karlisna looking for the heavily armored guards, who load full sets of golden eq.
    3. to kill 10 of a Rametor and 4 of an evil Glimara (1 hour, 10 minutes)
      These mobs load randomly in the tunnels under Dray'mar. From Ves'pre, go 2S, D, S, D, and wander. Rametors are hidden mobs so make sure you have sense life on.
    4. to find Ves'pre, the first one of Dray'mar (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Equipment for the Templar [Complete]

    Contributed by: Yandyr
    Level: 16
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Karlisna, Graveyard
    Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a cathedral templar (30 minutes)
      In Med Graveyard. From entrance, go all N, all E, N.
    2. to find a pair of polished golden sleeves and a pair of golden gauntlets (30 minutes)
      Im Karlisna. From @, go 7E, N, buy sleeves, buy gauntlets.
    3. to give a pair of polished golden sleeves and a pair of golden gauntlets to a cathedral templar (45 minutes)

    Ergale's Revenge [Complete]

    Contributed by: Seishiron
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: easy to moderate (no death)
    Locale(s): The Sonedal Ravine
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Ergale, the nomad (30 minutes)
      In the Sonedal Ravine. From eastern @, go 2D, 2W and look around.
    2. to kill 6 of a growling cur, 6 of a malnourished mongrel, 6 of a wild dog, and 5 of a scavenging hound (2 hours)
      These mobs all wander in Sonedal. From above, go W and look around. Note: this is solo and no-death.
    3. to find Ergale, the nomad (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Errand for the Dragon Turtle [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Bhalodus
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Mystical Forest
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the centaur leader (1 hour)
      Centaur Leader loads in Mystical Forest. Unicorns (and horns) load in the southern side of Mystical Forest. From southern entrance to zone ("An Ocean Harbor"), go N, W, N, then all E along the path. Move around northwest and you will find the centaur leader is hiding in the deep forest.
    2. to kill 3 of a cavewoman, 3 of a caveman, Dinoboy, the shaman, a concubine, and the chief (1 hour)
      Dinoboy loads in Mystical Forest. From far top right @, go W, S, W, S, W, all E, and you will find him. Caveman and cavewoman load around the rooms near dinoboy. Chief and concubine load in the same room. From Dinoboy, all E, W, all S. Shaman loads N, E from chief in the shaman's cave.

    Essence of the Undead [Complete]

    Contributed by: Jadeyn
    Additions by: Kirgan
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Goland's Tower, Enchanted Oak Forest
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Varanexus (1 hour)
      In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go N to "Before Goland's Tower." Then go 3W, all N, all E till down exit, D, kill dweller for key ("a narrow bone which might serve as a key"). Then go U, S, 2E, search, D. Then go 2E, 2N, D, 2W, S, 2W, N to Calsinc the caretaker. Kill him for a key. Then go all S, N, to locked door west. Unlock the door and go W; unlock the door and go N.
    2. to kill a lost spirit of a Trellor guard and 3 of a ghost of a mercenary (45 minutes)
      From the southern entrance to Trellor (@), go N, W and look around.
    3. to find Varanexus (45 minutes)
      As above.

    3. to find a carousing pirate (1 hour)
      As above.
    4. to give 3 of a chunk of deer meat and 6 of a barrel to a carousing pirate (5 minutes)

    Estralita Cooking Woes [Complete]

    Contributed by: Leiza
    Level:
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): The Graveyard, Brookhaven
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Estralita, the cathedral cook (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In the Graveyard. From entrance to the Graveyard, go all N, all E, N to "The Cross Aisle," 4E, 2N, W.
    2. to get a stein of Brookhaven ale, 2Sticks of butter, and 4 loaves of sourdough bread (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      At Brookhaven. From @, go N to: - The Bakery to buy 4 of the sourdough bread,
      - The Buttery to buy 2Sticks of butter, and
      - The Thirsty Hog to buy the stein of Brookhaven ale.

    Evil Brew for a Witch [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Dyzzie
    Level: 26, 28, 29, 30
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Condemned Arena, E'urdin Zilartzen, Sealed Caves
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a blood witch (45 minutes)
      In Condemned Arena. From zone entrance, go all E, N, 2E, 3S, E, S, E, S, all E, N, 2E (hidden exit), S, E.
    2. to give 2 of a thin, flexible blade of grass with a sawlike edge and 2 of a green, flaky patch of fungus to a blood witch (2 hours, 15 minutes)
      a thin, flexible blade of grass with a sawlike edge: located in E'urdin Zilartzen.fungus: in Sealed Caves. From zone entrance, go 2E, S, E, D, E, D, S, E, S (The Bat Cave). Then search, go 2S, 2E, S (Glowing Chamber) and cast teleport (Crystal Cavern). Then go 2W, N, all W, N, 2W, all S, 2W, 3S, W, 5S, W, S, 2W, all S, W, 3S, E, S, E, 2S, E, S, E, 2S, 2E, S, 9E (An Intersection) then 3S. (Fungi Cavern). Loads on ground here or 3W or 2E or E, 3S or 3W, 4S, 2E from here.

    Evil Deeds [Complete]

    Contributed by: B
    Level: 27, 28
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): DeRah (evil), Trellor
    Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Madam Zash (30 minutes)
      In Evil Derah. From zone entrance to good Derah (@), go: 7 N, 5 W, S, W (entering evil Derah), E, N, 4E, S. (Then get out, because Zash will attack.)
    2. to kill 5 of a priest of Trell (45 minutes)
      In the Temple of Trellor. From Trellor recall, go U and N until you find the priests.

    Evil Goats [Complete]

    Contributed by: Yasujiro

    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Xanthal, Cantara
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:

    2. to find a nanny goat (30 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From entrance, go U, N, W (hidden), U, S, W, 2S, U, S.
    3. to find the goatherd (30 minutes)
      From nanny goat, go W, 2N.
    4. to kill 3 of a billy goat (30 minutes)
      These pop in the above room.

    Locale(s): Med Castle, Fire Giants
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
      See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to find a gold-braid belt (2 hours)
      In Fire Giants. From zone entrance, go U, all S, E, all S, E (yes for CPK), all E, 2N, pick door N, open door N, all N, S, search (weight must be below 75Stone to avoid death trap), all D, all E, all D, all E, D. Kill mage for belt. Note: This is find-original.

    Evil Predictions [Complete]

    Level: 24, 26
    Difficulty: moderately easy
    Locale(s): DeRah (evil), Lattyrna
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Madam Zash (30 minutes)
      In Evil Derah. From zone entrance to good Derah (@), go: 7 N, 5 W, S, W (entering evil Derah), E, N, 4E, S. (Then get out, because Zash will attack.)
    2. to kill Amphritrite and 5 of a nereid (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Lattyrna. From zone entrance, go all D, 2E, 4N, 2E, then N through the garden area where nereids are found. To get to Amphritrite: Return to "Ivory Road, Near the Gates." Go N, N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, open door, U, N. (It's easier to kill Amphritrite with help!)
    3. to give a belt made of seashells to Madam Zash (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Exchange Genetic Knowledge [Complete]

    Contributed by: Kreb
    Additions by:
    Level: 25, 26
    Difficulty: easy to moderate
    Locale(s): Xanthal, Warrens
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Moshata (30 minutes)
      In Warrens. From zone entrance (@), go D, 6E, D, S, 5W, N, W, 3D, N, 3W, 2S, D, E, 2S, 2W, D, 2N, D, 2E, 3S. Note: you receive a scribbled note.
    2. to give a scribbled note on old parchment to Xanthal (1 hour)
      In Xanthal. From zone entrance, go N, 5W, search, 2D (be sure you're breathing water), search, E, E. Malanase loads here. He has a crude key to Xanthal's room. From Malanase, go 2W, 2U, 3E, 3N, and kill the servant for the tower master key. From here ("A White Marble Staircase"), U, N, 2W, N, unlock door N, open door N, N. Xanthal is here.

    Exorcising the Cathedral [Complete]

    Contributed by: Kirgan
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: moderate (NPK, no-death) to hard (if you encounter lesser male tramix)
    Locale(s): Xezadha Cathedral
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a xezadha worshipper (45 minutes)
      In Xezadha. From zone entrance, go 3N and look around.
    2. to kill 5 of a tramachite (1 hour, 15 minutes)
      From zone entrance, go all N to altar, D through hidden, S, all D (cramped rooms.) Then look in the 2x2 rooms, for the mage with key. Get the key, then unlock door S, S, all W, all S, all E, all D, W to A Palace Deep Below the Surface. Tramachites load here.

    Exotic Flowers [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Additions by: Realto, Bost
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Underground Tunnels,
    Total Time: 3 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Miranlo, the royal gardener (45 minutes)
      In Lyranoth. From zone recall, go 6 W then 2N.
    2. to find a beautiful orchid and a sprig of gemsly (2 hours)
      A beautiful orchid loads in good Derah. From recall, go W to business center, then N. Open door W and enter "A Fragrant House." In the garden behind the house loads an orchid. You will have to go to evil Derah and then back to good Derah to pop a 2nd orchid.
      Sprig of gemsly loads in the Underground Tunnels. From Med City recall, enter thief, then go S, S, D, N, E, E, S, S, E, N, W, S, E, N, E, E, D, N.
    3. to give a beautiful orchid and a sprig of gemsly to Miranlo, the royal gardner (1 hour)

    Exotic Food for Morg [Complete]

    Contributed by: Cipactli
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Riverton, Trellor
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Morg the Butcher (30 minutes)
      In Trellor. From recall, go 5E, 3S, E.
    2. to find a tin of smoked Genesian baenlyr and a packet of dried tiger and a sliver of cured eel and a smoked piece of salmon and a king crab and a lobster (1 hour)
      Smoked Genesian baenlyr, packet of dried tiger and sliver of cured eel: In Riverton. From northern @, go 5S, 2W, N and buy it here.
      smoked piece of salmon, king crab and lobster: In Med City. From recall, go 11S, buy from fish vendor.
    3. to give a tin of smoked Genesian baenlyr and a packet of dried tiger and a sliver of cured eel and a smoked piece of salmon and a lobster and a king crab to Morg the Butcher (15 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to give some blackberries to Morg the Butcher (15 minutes)
      Buy at Cleo's market. From Morg, go W, 8N, 6W, N.

    Exotic Wine [Complete]

    Additions by: Aiden, Miark
    Level: 17, 19
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Mystara, Wytherwind
    Total Time: 3 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Sigurd the barkeep (45 minutes)
      In the Whale and Dolphin Tavern in the town of Tanivsport in the Mystara zone. From zone entrance (@), go 2W, S, 3W.
    2. to give 2 of a bottle of FretherField White from the Wytherwind Winery and 2 of a bottle of BristoleField Red from the Wytherwind Winery to Sigurd the barkeep (3 hours)
      In Wytherwind on the underground level. From the zone entrance, go all S (to "Deep in the Mire"), W, W, W, S, S, S, search, D, D. (Be sure you're breathing water.) Go W, N, N, W, S, W, W, N, N, W. Get the crow bar. Go down to a room called "An Underwater Wine Cellar." Unlock 2.crate, open 2.crate, and get all 2.crate.

    Expanding the Mushroom Trade [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Eleazar
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Ruellia, Verthandi
    Total Time: 6 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a mushroom farmer (1 hour)
      In Ruellia. From Ruellia Crossing of Trails, go N, N, E, N, kill guards, N, N, E, E, N, E, N, N, N, W, N, N, W, N, U.
    2. to find a morel anda clump of oyster mushrooms and a shaggy-mane mushroom and an orange milk mushroom and a meadow mushroom and an angel mushroom (4 hours, 30 minutes)
      In Verthandi. These load on ground in ruins of hallistan area. From zone entrance, head north-north-westish. If you hit the river, you've gone too far.
    3. to give a morel anda clump of oyster mushrooms and a shaggy-mane mushroom and an orange milk mushroom and a meadow mushroom and an angel mushroom to a mushroom farmer (45 minutes)
      As above.

    Experiments With Call Lightning [Complete]

    Contributed by: Kobob, Zeela
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, New Genesia, Wilderness
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a thoughtful scholar (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter mage; follow Enterprise Street until you find a thoughtful scholar.
    2. to find a rod of lightning (30 minutes)
      In New Genesia. From recall, go D, all E, 2S, W. Buy lightning.
    3. to find the wilderness room at 700 x 700 (30 minutes)
      Hold the rod. From $, go W, 4S, then all W until you enter the room. Note: as soon as you enter the room, your hp will be reduced to 1.
    4. to find a thoughtful scholar (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Contributed by: Cipactli
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Haven,
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Timur, the town crier (30 minutes)

    2. to find a room called Izei's Travel Agency (15 minutes)
      From above, go all E.
    3. to find Timur, the town crier (15 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to find a room called Cirsela's Apothecary (5 minutes)
      From above, go 2W, N.
    5. to find a room called Faknel's Shop of Magic (5 minutes)
      From above, go S, W, N.
    6. to find a porcini mushroom and cheese tart (10 minutes)
      From above, go S, all W, and buy these items.
    7. to give a porcini mushroom and cheese tart to Timur, the town crier (10 minutes)
      As above.
    8. to find a room called The Avatar Info Booth (10 minutes)

    9. to find a room called Lumond's Sacred Garden (10 minutes)
      From above, go all N.
    10. to find Timur, the town crier (10 minutes)

    11. to find Wynisy (20 minutes)
      From above, go 3E, S, D.

    Eyes for Nurse Kana [Complete]

    Additions by: Bry
    Level: 19, 22, 24
    Difficulty: easy (if you can sneak) to very hard (otherwise)
    Locale(s): New Ashton
    Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Nurse Kana (1 hour)
      In New Ashton, underground. From southern entrance to the zone, go 3W, N, W, buy pizza, unlock open, open oven, N, search until exit down appears. Then go 2D, S, 2E, pick door N, open door N, N.
    2. to give 3 of a mudskipper's eye to Nurse Kana (2 hours, 20 minutes)
      In Underground Shafts. From @, go D, E, 2N, all E, 2S, E until you see "A slimy creature wriggles here in the mud."

    Eyes for the Esachan Hunter [Complete]

    Contributed by: Thaspian
    Additions by: Sonjya, Mospolo
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Esacha Fen, Quinstone
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an Esachan hunter (1 hour)
      From entrance to the fen, go 2N, search, E, 3N, 4E, S
    2. to find the eyes of an archer (1 hour, 45 minutes)
      In Quinstone's Keep. From zone entrance (@), go N to the room "The Foyer of the Keep," all E, U, all E, all S, U. Kill Sintarus, captain of the arches, and loot eye from him.
    3. to give the eyes of an archer to an Esachan hunter (45 minutes)

    Fabric Needed by Yarla [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Maneak
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Dragmire, Sonedal Ravine
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Yarla, the Orcish Tailor (1 hour)
      In Dragmire. From @, go W, U, N, D, all W to Barracks Road Intersection; then go S, W.
    2. to give 5 pieces of fabric to Yarla (30 minutes)
      Buy in Sonedal Ravine from Dulen for 10,000 per piece.

    Faceless Thieves [Complete]

    Contributed by: Elyvern
    Level: 30
    Difficulty: moderate [challenging AQ medal]
    Locale(s): Den Of Thieves 2, Graveyard, Crypt, Mausoleum
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Destinia (no limit)
      Destinia loads in Den of Thieves 2, one of 3 den holosections in the wilderness. Fly around and survey, looking for the keywords, "quick glimpses of motion out of the corner of your eye". Den of Thieves 2 is shaped like a mining cavern. Destinia loads on the ground floor.
    2. to kill 12 of a Doppleganger (no limit)
      Dopplegangers load in 3 graveyard holosections in the wilderness. All of these holosections have the same mobs but are different in level difficulties. They all share the same keyword "aura of sadness and despair." Fly around and survey. Dopplegangers are described as "familiar-looking man" in a room. You'll need 2 holosections worth of dopplegangers to get 12 of them.
    3. to find Destinia (no limit)
      As above.

    Faeries Revenge [Complete]

    Contributed by: Afiniti and Deschain
    Additions by: Milekan
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: moderate (no death)
    Locale(s): Yldari
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    1. to find a mourning faerie (1 hour)
      In Yldari, a couple rooms into the zone.
    2. to kill 10 of a dark faerie (1 hour)
      In Yldari. Wander around and find them - they're around the tower in the forest. From entrance, go all N, all E (hidden exit), S and look around.
    3. to find a mourning faerie (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Family Heirlooms [Complete]

    Contributed by: Leiya
    Additions by: Bhalodus
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Derah, Med Graveyard
    Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a room called A Freshly Open Grave (30 minutes)
      In Med Graveyard. From zone entrance, go all N, then all W until you see it.
    2. to find Madam Zash (35 minutes)
      In Derah. From recall, go S, W.
    3. to find a room called The Root-Cellar (45 minutes)
      In Derah. From recall, go all W, N, open door W, W, U. Examine drawer. (If it's locked, kill the major to get the key to unlock the drawer.) Get the key from the drawer. Recall, then go all N to evil Derah. Go N to evil Derah fountain, then go 5W, N, W, D.

    Family Reunion Messaging [Complete]

    Contributed by: Dnik
    Additions by: Phu, Cipactli
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Riverton, Academy of Braneri
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Malgaron (1 hour)
      In Riverton, on the north side of Topaz Avenue. From northern @, go 3S, 4W, N.
    2. to find the architect (1 hour)
      In Academy of Braneri, wandering around in the courtyard just to the north of the zone entrance. Note: this is no-dragon.
    3. to find Avalon (1 hour)
      In Riverton, on the north side of Topaz Avenue. From northern @, go 3S, 2W, N. Note: this is no-dragon.

    Fans for Melnshara [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Lurline
    Additions by: Maneak
    Level: 30
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Sceptrum, Czareran, E'nat'dae
    Total Time: 7 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Melnshara Daenar ( )
      In Lyryanoth. From recall, go all W. Kill the four angry protestors. Go W, S, 3W, U. Go E, S, U, W.
    2. to get a palm-fan and a demon fan and the hand-held fan ( )
      a palm-fan: In Sceptrum. It loads on Fan Attendant in "Crystal Throne Room" beyond the mirror.
      a demon fan: loads on queen in Czareran.
      the hand-held fan: buy in E'nat'dae from J'arga in J'arga's Oddities.
    3. to give a palm fan and a demon fan and the hand-held fan to Melnshara Daenar ( )
      As above.

    Fast Food [Complete]

    Contributed by: Innocentius
    Additions by: Azlie
    Level: 16
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor
    Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the wealthy citizen (30 minutes)
      In Trellor, located randomly in the Merchant Circle.
    2. to give a gryphon stew to the wealthy citizen (15 minutes)
      May be purchased in Trellor in Lunch's Restaurant, near the southwest corner of the Merchant Circle.
    3. to give a bagel with cream cheese to the wealthy citizen (15 minutes)
      May be purchased in Trellor, near the southwest corner of the Merchant Circle.
    4. to give some blackberries to the wealthy citizen (15 minutes)
      May be purchased in Trellor in Cleo's, near the north central part of the Merchant Circle.

    Fate Of A Friend [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Tesbeth
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Thanos
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Captain Abnart (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go all S to the Wharf. Go east along the Wharf, and south and north along the piers, if necessary, to find the Captain.
    2. to find a wilderness room (no limit)
      First, obtain a fishing rod. Enter CT 20 and go S until you see a 2x2 lake (south of Thanos, north of Alcordian.) AQ Decide: look around further. Hold rod, use rod, and repeat until you find a bass.
    3. to find Captain Abnart (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Feather Collection [Complete]

    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Enara, El Cantara
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:

      In Enara. From @, go 4N and look around (she wanders.)
    2. to give a feather-collection box to a little girl (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In El Cantara on the nomad woman. From zone entrance, go U, N, W (hidden), U, 4N, 2W, N.

    Feather Collection for Nomad Woman [Complete]

    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): El Cantara, Sceptrum
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a nomad woman (30 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From zone entrance, go U, N, W (hidden), U, 4N, 2W, N.
    2. to give a golden eagle's feather and a goldfinch feather and a dove feather to a nomad woman (30 minutes)
      All found in El Cantara:

      dove and finch: In "An Elevated Garden." From zone entrance, go U, 2N, E, all N until the various U exits, then go U.
      golden eagle's father: From @ go U, 2N, E, all N, U, 5E, 2N.

    3. to find the speckled feather of a hawk (1 hour)
      In Sceptrum Ishachi on the red kite. From entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N until pool; then D, U, and look around. Note: this is find-original.
    4. to give the speckled feather of a hawk to a nomad woman (30 minutes)
    5. to find an ostrich-feather quill (1 hour)
      In Esacha Fen on Pater Jeypez. From entrance to the fen, go 3N, W, N, W, N, W, N, 2W, 4N, 2E, N. Note: this is find-original.
    6. to give an ostrich-feather quill to a nomad woman

    Feed a Baby Bird [Complete]

    Contributed by: Tressa
    Level: 12
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Forbidden Forest
    Total Time: 1 hour
    Objectives:
    1. to find a small girl (20 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter thief, 2E, 3S, E. You receive a piece of bread.
    2. to give a piece of bread to a baby bird (20 minutes)
      In Forbidden Forest. From Med City recall, enter mage, all W, E, 2S, W, open gate, W, 2N. Give bread bird.
    3. to find a small girl (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Feed a Fat Cat [Complete]

    Contributed by: Elri

    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): The Hidden City Of E'nat'dae, Med
    Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a housemaid (45 minutes)
      From entrance of E'nat'dae, go N, W, 17N and look around.
    2. to give a saucer of milk to Fluffy (30 minutes)
      From Med recall, enter mage, go all W, search, D. Buy saucer of milk. Thenin E'nat'dae, go N, W, 17N, 2E, N to Fluffy.

    Feed a Starving Pixie [Complete]

    Contributed by: Cipactli
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Preserve
    Total Time: 1 hour
    Objectives:
    1. to find a pixie (30 minutes)
      In the Preserve. From the zone entrance (@), go 2W, N, E, N, 2 W, S, 2W ("Crossing a Wooden Bridge"), S, E, and look around.
    2. to give 2 of a chocolate brownie to a pixie (30 minutes)
      From "Crossing a Wooden Bridge", go S, E, search, S (hidden opening), D, E, search, S. The brownies will be in these rooms.

    Feed Ergale's Cat [Complete]

    Contributed by: Maximillus
    Level:
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Sonedal, Trellor, Med City
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Ergale, the nomad (1 hour)
      In Sonedal. From eastern entrance, go 2D, 2W, and look around.
    2. to give a saucer of milk to Nandee (2 hours)
      In Med City. From Med recall, enter mage, all W, search, D.
      Nandee loads in the Coffee Pot in Trellor. From recall, go 5S, W until The Coffee Pot is the south exit, then go S, U.

    Feed Kukdheuda's Demons [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Oharon
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Kukdheuda, Trellor, DeRah
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find room The Entrance to a Mysterious Temple (1 hour)
      Fly to Stornaway Castle, then fly 6 W and 20 S.It is the @ just a little south of you.
    2. to find 10 of some bloody meat (1 hour)
      In Trellor in Morg's Butcher Shop. From recall, go 5E, 2S, E and buy 2.meat.
    3. to find room The Entrance to a Mysterious Temple (1 hour)
      As above.
    4. to give 10 of some bloody meat to Kukdheuda, the fallen God (5 minutes)
      As above.
    5. to find a meat cleaver or a bloody meat cleaver (1 hour)
      meat cleaver: Loads in DeRah. From recall, go 5W, 2N, kill the butcher and steal his blade.
    6. to find room The Entrance to a Mysterious Temple (1 hour)
      As above.
    7. to give a meat cleaver or a bloody meat cleaver to Kukdheuda, the fallen God (5 minutes)
      As above.

    Feed Palace Pets [Complete]

    Additions by: Ariah
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Celestia
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Symoni, a palace maid (45 minutes)
      In Palace of Celestia. From zone entrance, go N, 2E, then all N into palace until you find her.
    2. to give half a loaf of bread to a timid bluebird (20 minutes)
      Loads south of Symoni. From "A Gold and Marble Staircase" in the palace, go all W, all N, and W until you see it. Half a loaf of bread is created randomly with the create food spell.
    3. to give a hunk of cheese to a small brown mouse (20 minutes)
      In the same room as the bluebird, and other rooms as well (is hidden.) Hunk of cheese can be purchased in Trellor at Cleo's Market. From recall, go 5N, W, N.
    4. to give a large chunk of meat to a chocolate-colored puppy (20 minutes)
      Near where Symoni loaded in the first step. Chunk of meat is created randomly with the create food spell.
    5. to give half a loaf of bread to a mother duck (20 minutes)
      Near entrance, at the first W exit. Go all W (through the meadow) then 2N.
    6. to find Symoni, a palace maid (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Feed Supplies for a Shepherd [Complete]

    Contributed by: Ceresir
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Hamlet of Egriel, Forbidden Forest, Esacha Fen, Academy of Braneri
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a shepherd (1 hour)
      The shepherd is in the Hamlet of Egriel. From @, go 2E, 3S, 2E, 2S, W. He wanders in this small grassy area.
    2. to give 4 of a sunflower seed, 2 of a head of lettuce, and a rooty carrot to the shepherd (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      sunflower seed: The seeds are in sunflowers, which are containers which pop on the ground throughout the Fen. They particularly pop on the "On a Precarious Walkway," which is in a hidden part of the Fen. From entrance to the fen, go 3N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E. The dead end, with one exit west, has a hidden exit north which leads to this area.
      head of lettuce: Pops in Barrels in the Academy of Braneri. There are 4 barrels in Braneri to check. From zone entrance, go 6N, W, 3N; then N; then 2S, W, D, N; then W.
      rooty carrot: Available in the Forbidden Forest, in the shop "The Village Market." From the first room in the zone, "Inside the Village Gate," go W.

    Feed the Anteater [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Kernighan
    Level:
    Difficulty: easy (solo)
    Locale(s): Alendora, Catacombs of Toshi
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find an anteater (30 minutes)
      Found in eastern part of Alendora.
    2. to kill 3 of a worker ant, 3 of a smaller ant, 3 of an ant, and 3 of a winged ant (1 hour)
      Found in Toshi.
    3. to find an anteater (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Feed the Birdies! [Complete]

    Level: 27, 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Rhaiaden
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find an ivory bird (30 minutes)
      In the Temple of Trellor. From recall, go U, N, then wander around lower levels of temple until you find the bird.
    2. to kill 4 of a wild worm (2 hours)
      In Rhaiden. From zone entrance, go 2S, E, 4S to the worm farm. This area of rooms loads several worms.
    3. to find an ivory bird (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Feed The Dog [Complete]

    Contributed by: Jeston
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): DeRah; Trellor; Med City
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the dog (1 hour)
      In Derah. From entrance, go W, 6N.
    2. to give find generous portion of ham, some bloody meat, smoked piece of salmon, and a pot of gryphon stew to the dog (1 hour)
      In Med City. From recall, 11S to fish vendor, buy salmon. From recall, 5E and 3N to Desigra's Delicatessen for generous portion of ham.In Trellor, from recall go 5E 4S buy 2.meat in Morg's Butcher Shop, then from recall in Trellor go 5S 2W S to Lunch's restraunt for pot of imported gryphon stew.

    Feed the Hungry Goblin [Complete]

    Contributed by: Anonymous
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Labyrinth, Riverton
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a gray goblin (30 minutes)
      From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all 5W, 6S, U, 4W, U.
    2. to find a normal ration (1 hour)
      From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, 3S, W, buy normal.
    3. to give a normal ration to a gray goblin (30 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to give a tin of smoked Genesian baenlyr to a gray goblin (1 hour)
      Tin can be bought in Riverton. From northern @, go 5S, 2W, N.

    Level: 12
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor, Preserve
    Total Time: 1 hour

    1. to find the young girl (30 minutes)
      In Trellor; she's hidden and wanders, usually on the E side of the Merchant Circle. Note: you receive a bunch of carrots.
    2. to give a bunch of carrots to a rabbit (1 hour)
      In Preserve, just W of @.

    Contributed by: Alizee
    Level: 11
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Med city
    Total Time: 1 hour
    Objectives:
    1. to find a busy scribe (30 minutes)

    2. to give a smoked piece of halibut and a tall glass of lemonade to a busy scribe (30 minutes)
      lemonade: in Thieves Quarter. From recall, enter thief,go all S, all E, 3N, all W, all S, all W, buy lemonade.
