    Fetch Scruff a Bone [Complete]

    Contributed by: Tellahane
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Dark Escarpment
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Scruff (30 minutes)
      S, S, S from recall in Med City.
    2. to give a klastakor rib bone to Scruff (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Dark Escarpment. From the entrance to the zone ("At the Mouth of a Dark Tunnel"), go 6 W, 2S, 2E. (Be sure to remove your light so you don't set the oil on fire!) There is a 3 x 3Square of 9 rooms that load "a klastakor rib." Look in the mounds in these rooms for this: type "get all mound."

    Fetch Something for Lady Goland [Complete]

    Contributed by: Tellahane
    Level: 26, 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Goland's Tower
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Lady Goland (2 hours)
      On the top level of Goland's tower.
    2. to give a beautiful silk and dragonskin dress to Lady Goland (1 hour)
      Enter the zone and go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle. Get the silk and dragonskin dress off Kuukle.

    Finch Prepares for a Party [Complete]

    Additions by: Idzalia
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: easy-moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Med City, Ruellia
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Finch (1 hour)
      In Trellor. From Trellor recall, go 5W, S, W.
    2. is to give 10 of Pixie's Pure Spirits to Finch (50 minutes)
      Pixie's Pure Spirits can be purchased in Med City. From Med recall, enter mage, all W, search, D.
    3. is to give some festive streamers to Finch (1 hour)
      Festive streamers are found in Ruellia on Heucher in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N, all W, S, W, W, W, W, S, S, S. Heucher is hidden in this area.
    4. to find the wizard (40 minutes)
      See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.

    Finch's Unearthly Trouble [Complete]

    Contributed by: Neru, Zeela, Faelicya
    Level: 24, 26
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Trellor
    Total Time: 1 hour, 35 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Famar, the town crier (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go S.
    2. to find a room called Entrance to the Temple of Trellor (20 minutes)
      In Trellor; recall.
    3. to find a room called Finch's Tavern. (10 minutes)
      From recall go 5W, S, W.
    4. to find a room called The Top Floor of the Tavern (5 minutes)
      From above, go U.
      AQ DECIDE (10 minutes)
      AQ DECIDE 1: Kill the ghost and be done with the job.

      1. to kill the lady in white ( )
        Loads in room with you.
      AQ DECIDE 2: Confront Finch.

      1. to find Finch (5 minutes)
        From above, D.
      2. to kill 4 of a Trellorian guardsman (10 minutes)
        These will pop in the room with you.
      3. to find a room call Finch's Tavern (5 minutes)
        From above, go W.

    Find a Light for Water Weird [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Cildanor
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: easy (solo)
    Locale(s): Medievia, Shadmire
    Total Time: 1 hour, 35 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the water weird (30 minutes)
      The water weird can be found (hidden) on the river under Medievia city. You need levitation or a boat to find it. Get on the river by the northern entrance to Medievia and head south through the @, then look around on the river for it.
    2. to find a glowing orb of blue light (40 minutes)
      Loads in Shadmire on "a tree spirit", which appears as "The translucent image of a scantily clad woman is floating here." These can be found inside the LPK section of Shadmire, not too hard to find by wandering around, as there are several of them. This objective is also FIND-ORIGINAL.
    3. to give a glowing orb of blue light to the water weird (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Find a New Sound for Jhulud [Complete]

    Contributed by: Afiniti
    Completed by: Kovad
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): El Cantara, Trellor
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Jhulud, the Master Magician (30 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From the @, follow the path to "The Gates of El Cantara." From there, go N, W, N.
    2. to give a rosewood mandolin to Jhulud, the Master Magician (1 hour)
      In Trellor. Look around the City for a congenial bard, who usually loads one.
    3. to give a silver flute to Jhulud, the Master Magician (45 minutes)
      Flute loads in Ulhazzen on an escaped prisoner which loads randomly through the zone. It may also pop on the ground in the prisoner's barracks.

    Find a Thesaurus for the Student [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Ceresir
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Braneri, Crystal Lake
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a determined student (30 minutes)
      In Braneri. From @, go 2N, E, open door E, 2E, S, W.
    2. to find a student's thesaurus (30 minutes)
      Loads on a peeping tom, which loads in Crystal Lake in the picnic areas in the NW and SE parts of the zone.
    3. to give a student's thesaurus to a determined student (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Find Aloe Leaves for Yigdal [Complete]

    Level: 24, 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): New Ashton, Cloud Giants
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Yigdal (30 minutes)
      In New Ashton. From "South Gate of New Ashton," go all N to "North Gate of City Hall Square and Town Line," then W, W, N.
    2. to find 3 of an aloe leaf (2 hours)
      In Cloud Giants; they load on the bath boys. From "Floating Atop an Island Of Clouds," go E, E, E, S, open door, U, E, S, W, S. You may have to wait for repop to get all 3 leaves, depending on how many leaves each bath boy loads.
    3. to give 3 of an aloe leaf to Yigdal. (30 minutes)

    Find Book for Mosocula [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Rakeesh
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Mosocula (1 hour)
      In Elnissa.
    2. to get the Book of Dark RItuals ( )
      In Goland's Tower, in CPK area. From Goland's entrance, go all N to the front door of the tower. From their, go 2E, 3N, W, N, W, D and kill pond dweller for key. From here go U, S, 2E, S, and search with key in inventory. Then go D, 2W, S, W, open door, W, S, open door W, W, open door N, N, search, 2N, search D, N. West of this altar is 1 room of CPK with the priest that loads the book. This objective is flagged as find original.
    3. to give the Book of Dark Rituals to Mosocula ( )

    Find Chisel for Mason [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Mestoph
    Additions by: Geengyr
    Level: 21, 25
    Difficulty: moderate (aggro mobs)
    Locale(s): Naeramae, Thunderhoume
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a minotaur mason ( )
      In Naeramae. From zone entrance, go S, all U, S, S, all E, pick gate E, all E, search, E, pick door E, then all E until you see the minotaur mason. This is solo.
    2. to give a stonecutter's chisel to a minotaur mason ( )
      In Thunderhoume. From zone entrance, go N, 3 D, N, 3 D, search D, E, N, 3E, 2D, 2N, 6 W, 2N, open door E. Kill the stonecutter (easy mob) and loot the chisel. This is solo and find-original.

    Find Cudgel for Nimbus [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Level: 20, 23
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Alcord, Draymar
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a roaming soul (1 hour)
      In Alcord. From zone entrance, all S, E, all S until W, then all W to lake and look around.
    2. to give a cudgel of bluish metal to a roaming soul (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      This item loads in Draymar on a Glimara ("A woman enshrouded in a black robe...") From entrance to zone (@), go N, 2W, 4N, W, D, S and keep looking.

    Find Deshiavani's Disc [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Kardina
    Additions by: Neru, Artca
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Medievia, Alendora
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Deshiavani, the Unforgiven ()
      In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, 4W, 2N, W, U.
    2. to find a silver disc inscribed with ancient Malindora runes ()
      In Alendora. First, find Takenos, a Havensdora gambler. See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N. Kill Takenos and get the key from Takenos' corpse. Go S, W, N, N, N, W, W, W, W, S. Unlock then open the strongbox. Get the harp (plus whatever else you want) from the strongbox (if the harp's not there, you won't be able to complete the AQ.) Go N, E, E, D, S, E, E, E, S, S, S. Go south again (it's a hidden exit), then S, W, S, W, S. There will be a few "sentry" mobs in these rooms. Hold the harp, then use harp. Go S, S, E, S, S, E, E. Da'raen is here; he loads the disc.
    3. to give a silver disc inscribed with ancient Malindora runes to Deshiavani, the Unforgiven ()
      As above.

    Find Exquisite Seashells [Complete]

    Contributed by: Tellahane
    Level: 25, 26, 27
    Difficulty: easy (if loads)
    Locale(s): Trellor, Lattyrna
    Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Stormwatch Mercenary (15 minutes)
      On the main streets of Trellor.
    2. to find a belt made of seashells (2 hours)
      In Lattyrna. Loads (irregularly) on Amphritrite. From zone entrance, go all D, 2E, all north to herald, kill herald for the dolphin-shaped key, go N, unlock door, go U then N to Amphritrite. (Solo, find-original).
    3. to find the Stormwatch Mercenary (30 minutes)

    Find Friends for Scruff [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Angulain
    Additions by: Anonymous
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Mystara,
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Scruff (15 minutes)
      In Med City, 2S or 3S of recall.
    2. to find a stray dog (30 minutes)
      In Mystara. From entrance, go 9W, S and look around.
    3. to find Lep, the mutt (45 minutes)
      On the Fury's main deck, on the south side.
    4. to find Scruff (15 minutes)
      As above.

    Find Gifts for a Traveler [Complete]

    Contributed by: Corvyn
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Enara, Talirond's Travelling Carnival
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a traveler (30 minutes)
      In Enara. On the first road, look around.
    2. to find a yo-yo, a set of juggling balls, a wooden dagger, and a tin whistle (1 hour)
      In Talirond's Travelling Carnival. To find the zone, fly to each of the major cities (generally ones with trade posts) and survey for the carnival, which looks like, "a tall, colorful wheel rises over a hastily erected fence." To win the prizes, go to the carnival games and type PLAY.
    3. to find a clicker, a stuffed dragon, a rubber baenlyr, and a glowstick (30 minutes)
      Play the games some more.
    4. to give a yo-yo, a set of juggling balls, a wooden dagger, a tin whistle, a clicker, a stuffed dragon, a rubber baenlyr, and a glowstick to a traveler (1 hour)
      As above.

    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): City Of Medievia
    Total Time: 5 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Cleric Guildmaster ()
      In Med City. From recall, enter guild.
    2. to find a room called Familiar Haunts (4 hours)
      In Med City. From recall, enter mage, go all W, search, D.
    3. to find the Cleric Guildmaste ()
      As above.

    Find Information for Pherrance [Complete]

    Contributed by: Cipactli
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, El Cantara
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
      See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to find a room called The Gates of El Cantara (20 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From zone entrance, follow path N in a few rooms.
    3. to find a scroll tied with a gold ribbon (30 minutes)
      Loads on Wadid, the Sharif's scribe. From above, go all N, U, 5E, all S, search, U.
    4. to give a scroll tied with a gold ribbon to Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Find Ingredients for Baker [Complete]

    Contributed by: Jynthor
    Additions by: Pleen
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Brookhaven
    Total Time:1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Winchel the baker (30 minutes)
      In Med City Thieves' Quarter. From recall, enter thief, then go 4E, 2N, W.
    2. to give a carton of eggs, 2 of a stick of butter, a round of cheese, and a jug of ewe’s milk to Winchel the baker (1 hour)

    Find J'arga's Friend [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Elagneros
    Additions by: ABronson M, Eliashin, Vlooi
    Level: 27
    Difficulty: moderate to hard
    Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Trellor
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find J'arga (30 minutes)
      In E'nat'dae in J'arga's Oddities. From @, go N, W, 7N, E.Note: you receive a rolled-up piece of paper and a vial of oil.
    2. to give a rolled-up piece of paper to a gypsy merchant (30 minutes)
      In Trellor in the square around recall. Note: you receive a rolled-up piece of paper in return.
    3. to find a dried rose, withered with age and a slender, purple iris (no limit)
      In Celestia at night.
      slender purple iris: from @, go 2E and head N.
      a dried rose, withered with age: from @, go N, 2E, 12N, U, all W, all N.
    4. to give a dried rose, withered with age and a slender, purple iris and a rolled-up piece of paper and a vial of oil to J'arga ( )
      As above.

    Find Kaaduk's Whip [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Ororuque
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): G'dangus, Dark Escarpment
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Kaaduk, the stable owner (no limit)
      In G'dangus. From entrance, go N, W.
    2. to find Tastaniumus (no limit)
      In Dark Escarpment. From entrance, go U, 6W, S (hidden), S, 2E. In 3x3 rooms, "get all mound" until you find finger bone. Then go 5W, N, 2W. Use finger bone key to open door. Go W. Kill tunnelmaster and get whip.
    3. to kill Kaaduk, the stable owner (15 minutes)
      As above.

    Find Krista's Drake [Complete]

    Contributed by: Cipactli
    Level: 18
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s):Wytherwind
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Krista (40 minutes)
      In Wytherwind. From zone entrance, go all S, all W, all S to fountain. From fountain, search, 2D, W, 2N, W, S, 2W, all N, E, all U, all N, 2E, all S, U, 3W (including hidden), all N.
    2. to give a metal dragon collar to the small blue drake (1 hour)
      From fountain (above), search, 2D, W, 2N, W, 3N, 2W, N, W, 2U, W.
    3. to find Krista (40 minutes)
      As above.

    Level: 18, 19
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Spirited Heights
    Total Time: 4 hours

    2. to find a room called A Private Little Hideout (2 hours)
      In Spirited Heights. From southern entrance go W, N, W, N, 2W, 2S, 5W, N, 2W, N, W, 3N.
    3. to find a congenial bard (1 hour)

    2. to give a thick circle of platinum, embedded with a Moonstone to Lord Lunari, Sorcerer of the Moon (2 hours)
      From above, go all E, D (hidden), N, all E, S, all E, N, E (hidden). It loads on the Dark Dragon.

    Contributed by: Ceresir

    Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes

    2. to find a lost gypsy (30 minutes)
      From above, go W, 5S, W, S and look around.

    Find Lost Potion Book for a Crazy Alchemist [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Mantitet
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Breneri, Gloumewood Farm
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a crazy alchemist (30 minutes)
      In Braneri. From entrance, go 2N, E, N, open door E, 3E, U, W and look around.
    2. to find the Joy of Potions (2 hours, 30 minutes)
      In Gloumewood Farm. From @, go all E to locked gate, then 2N, W, enter ring, "pray." Look around for a black cat. Kill it 9 times, which pops Osiquine. Kill her and get the key to her shack. Look around for a hidden E exit. After going E, go N, unlock door, N, open door E, E, open drawer, search drawer, get key drawer, W, search, U, unlock chest, open chest, get book chest.
    3. to give the Joy of Potions to a crazy alchemist (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Find Mining Equipment for Drek [Complete]

    Completed by: Ceresir
    Level: 24, 25, 26
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Dray'mar, Thunderhoume
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Drek, the master of timmerite (30 minutes)
      In the Proud Durgeon in Dray'mar, on the north side of the Ring of the Krudar.
    2. to find 3 of a pickaxe (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Thunderhoume. Randomly pops on dwarven miners (hidden mobs). From @, go N, 3D, N, 3D, search, D, E, N, 3E, 2D, 2N, 6W, 4N, 3D, search, D, 2N, D, 2N, E. The miners pop here. There is a passage north which leads to another lower area where miners pop. Note: other "pickaxes" in the game will not work. Only 2 axes pop per Thunderhoume reset, so you have to wait for the zone to pop to get a 3rd one.
    3. to give 3 of a pickaxe to Drek (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Find Missing Scepter for Kaisa [Complete]

    Contributed by: Bhalodus
    Additions by: Takphius
    Level: 21, 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Enara
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Kaisa (30 minutes)
      In Enara. From @, go all N, 3W, 4N 3E, N, open door, N, and ice the guards there for the guardpost key. Unlock/open door, N, open portcullis, 3N, 2U, 2S, E, 2N, W, search, 2N, E, open door, N, W, N, W.
    2. to give the emerald scepter of Enara to Kaisa (1 hour)
      From Kaisa, go S, W, open door, S, E, 2S, W, 2S, E, 2N, 2D, S, 3W, N, open door, 2W, open door, W, N, open door, all N, E, all N, E, 2N, E, N, U, ice Lansellius, who loads the emerald scepter of Enara (may need to remove curse).

    Contributed by: Mceil
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Shadowclaw, Karlisna
    Total Time: 2 hours

      In Karlisna. From @, go E to fountain, then look around for mages of the King, who load the cloaks.

    Level:

    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:

      In Trellor. From recall, go 9N, E.
    2. to give a fly fishing rod to the fisherman (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Loads on the hunter in the Preserve. See hunter in Frequent Pathways.
    3. to give the segment of an old earthworm to a fisherman (1 hour)

    Find New Stock for the Minor Enchanter Shop [Complete]

    Contributed by: Bhalodus
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Mystical Forest
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the bored salesgirl (30 minutes)
      In Med City Mage Quarter in The Shop of the Minor Enchanter. From recall, enter mage. Go W to Street of the Mellow Enchantment, then 4S, W.
    2. to find 5 of a blood red potion and 5 of a bright pink potion and 5 of a potion of truesight and 2 of a clear glass wand (1 hour)
      In Mystical Forest. From recall, 3W, S. All potions can be bought here. The clear glass wand can be purchased in the magic shop in Mystical Forest. From zone recall, go W until the N and S exits are 2Shops; enter the magic shop.
    3. to give 5 of a blood red potion and 5 of a bright pink potion and 5 of a potion of truesight and 2 of a clear glass wand to the bored salesgirl (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Find Old Friends for Scruff [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Trystian
    Level: 27
    Difficulty: easy (NPK)
    Locale(s): Med City, Mystara, Fury
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Scruff (15 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go 3S.
    2. to find a stray dog (45 minutes)
      In Mystara. From entrance, go all W, E, all S; mob wanders.
    3. to find Lep, the mutt (45 minutes)
      In Fury. From ”Out on the Prow," go all S, N, W and look around.
    4. to find Scruff (30 minutes)

    Find Orchid For Elven King [Complete]

    Contributed by: Turnbul
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Derah
    Total Time: 3 hours, 39 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the elven king (30 minutes)
      In the Forbidden Forest. From Med City recall, enter mage, then go 4W, 2S, 2W, 4N, 2E, all N, 2E, all N, 2W, to room "In A Strange Colored Mist" from there E, S, E, 3D, W, S, kill guard for key or pick door S, open door S, 4S, kill servant for key, S, E, S, unlock door S, open door S, S. Note: king is aggro and you need him at the end of quest so it's better not to kill him yet.
    2. to find a beautiful orchid (2 hours, 30 minutes)
      In good DeRah. From recall, go 3W, 2N, open door W, 2W.
    3. to give a beautiful orchid to the elven king (39 minutes)
      As above, remeber king is aggro.

    Find Plume for Journeyman [Complete]

    Additions by: Kaycee, Kernighan
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med, Wytherwind
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a traveler (20 minutes)
      In Med City. Usually several can be found randomly on Market Street.
    2. to find a coal-black plume (no time limit)
      Loads (irregularly) in Wytherwind on a mob called "The Soulless." From zone entrance, go all W, N, all W, 3S, E and look around if needed.
    3. to give a coal black plume to a traveler (15 minutes)
      As above.

    Find Reading Material for the Bored Lookout [Incomplete]

    Level: 20
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Trellor, Riverton
    Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the bored lookout (2 hours, 20 minutes)
      In Pirate Ship.
    2. to find the HitchHiker's Guide to the Galaxy (no limit)
      In Trellor. From recall, go 5N, 2W, N and buy here.
    3. to find the MudSlinger Newspaper (no limit)
      In Trellor at recall.
    4. to find a big book of short stories (no limit)
      In Riverton bookstore.

    Find Silver for Mahgnus [Complete]

    Contributed by: JJC, Mandroth
    Additions by: Kinibane
    Level: 22, 24
    Difficulty: easy (if you can sneak or if you ride dragon) to hard (if you can't/don't)
    Locale(s): Cloud Giants
    Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Mahgnus the Jeweler (40 minutes)
      In Cloud Giants. From entrance (@), go N, 2U, 4E, S, search, D, S.
    2. to give a lump of raw silver to Mahgnus the Jeweler (1 hour, 30 minutes )
      The lump of raw silver is found in Cloud Giants. From Mahgnus, go N, U, N, 3W, S, 2W, S, W, 2S, W, D, N, E, D, W, D, E. The object loads on the mob Polythenis (rare load).

      An older version of the AQ also requires you to collect a glittering diamond. The glittering diamond is in the Goblin Castle, in the goblin king's chest. From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all W, all N, E, all S, U. The Goblin King loads here.

    Find Staff of Ruling for Harbormaster [Complete]

    Additions by: Sozafus
    Level: 19
    Difficulty:
    Locale(s): Med, Goblin Castle
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the harbormaster (20 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go S until you reach the wharf. Then go W, open door N, N.
    2. to give the staff of ruling to the harbormaster (1 hour, 10 minutes)
      Staff of ruling loads on the Goblin King. From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all W, all N, E, all S, U. The Goblin King loads here.

    Find the Lost Actor [Complete]

    Contributed by: Asylium
    Additions by: Pleen
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Riverton, Trellor, Lyryanoth
    Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a young usher (40 minutes)
      In Riverton. From the northern entrance, go S, 2W, N.
    2. to give The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy to an actor portraying Lyrya Lan'y'nal (1 hour, 50 minutes)
      Purchase this in Trellor from Cleo's Food Market. From Trellor recall, go 5N, W, N. Then go to Lyryanoth (via CT 51 if desired.) To get to the theatre where this mob is located, from Lyryanoth recall go 3S, 3W, 2N.
    3. to find a young usher (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Find the Poor Woman's Locket [Complete]

    Contributed by: Elagneros
    Additions by: Senadra
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lost Civilization
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the poor woman (40 minutes)
      In Lost Civ in a room called "A Crumbling House." From zone entrance, follow the trail around (the first 12 rooms or so curve around but no branches.) At the first intersection ("Road in the Forest") go S, S, W, S, S, E, E, S, S, E, S, S, S, W, S, S, E, S, W, all S.
    2. to find a locket made of obsidian (40 minutes)
      In Lost Civilization. From woman go 7N, E, N, W, 2N, E to "A Mist Shrouded Forest." Examine corpse, get all corpse.
    3. to give a locket made from obsidian to the poor woman (40 minutes)
      From above, go W, 2S, E, S, W, 7S.

    Find the Queen of Ice a Flower [Incomplete]

    Level: 29, 30
    Difficulty: moderate (CPK)
    Locale(s): Elnissa
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Elnissa, Queen of Ice (2 hours)
      This is no-portal and no-death.

    Find the Sister of Marious' Maid [Complete]

    Additions by: Hypnux
    Level: 23, 25, 27 28
    Difficulty: easy to hard (depending on level)
    Locale(s): Med, Fury
    Total Time: 2 hours (2 hours, 30 minutes with extension)
    Objectives:
    1. to find a prim maidservant (30 minutes)
      From recall in Med City, enter mage. Go N, N, N, N, then all W.
    2. to find a young girl disguised as a deckhand (1 hour, 10 minutes; 1 hour, 40 minutes with extension)
      Find the current location of the Fury by going to Baskille and typing "where fury." Go to and enter the zone. From zone entrance ("The Edge of a Small Plank Before the Fury"), go W, U. Mob should load nearby on this level; I've seen her here as well as W, W, S, S, S from here. (Be sure you have sense life active and beware the many aggro mobs as you look for her.)
    3. to find a prim maidservant (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Find the Vademecum for the Librarian [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Ghulardi
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Med, Fortress of Elnissa
    Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the librarian (15 minutes)
      From Med recall, W, S, S.
    2. to find a mage's vademecum (1 hour, 40 minutes)
      In Fortress of Elnissa. Loads on a shelf gremlin.
    3. to give a mage's vademecum to the librarian (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Find Truant Students [Needs Detail]

    Level: 18, 29
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Braneri
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the dean of the academy (40 minutes)
      In Braneri. From entrance to zone ("Before a Grand Iron Gate"), go: 5N, W until D, D, kill the fish, then loot all the fish for "a small bronze key." Then go U, 4E, unlock door N, open door N, go north.
    2. to find a lazy student (10 minutes)
    3. to find a lazy student (10 minutes)
    4. to find a frustrated student (10 minutes)
    5. to find a frustrated student (10 minutes)
    6. to find a frustrated student (10 minutes)
    7. to find the dean of the academy (10 minutes)

    Finding Brookhaven Council's Mage [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Sagitron
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Brookhaven, Medievia, Vanlarra
    Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a member of the Brookhaven city council ()
      From entrance, 2W, 4N, W.
    2. to find a Magician's Shop ()
      From above, 2E, S from city council
    3. to find the Mage Guildmaster, Abinonius ()
      From recall, enter guild.
    4. to find a high mage of Vanlarra ()
      From western entrance of Vanlarra: all E, open gate, E, N, E, U, E.
    5. to find a journeyman mage ()
      From above, go W.
    6. to find a room called A Quiet Table Near the Brook ()
      From entrance to Brookhaven, go 2E, 4N, E, S (hidden).
    7. to find a member of the Brookhaven city council ()
      From a Quiet Table Near the Brook, go N, all W.

    Finding Lemili [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Nydror
    Level:
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Gloumewood Farm
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Chludo, the handsome pig farmer (40 minutes)
      In Gloumewood. From entrance, kill farmhand to get key. Unlock gate E, open gate, go all E until you see rooms with "Grass" in the title. Then find the pig sty and look around.
    2. to find Lemili, the farmer's daughter (1 hour)
      Enter the barn and go U.
    3. to find Chludo, the handsome pig farmer (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Fire Versus Water [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Level: 23, 24
    Difficulty: moderate to hard (in CPK)
    Locale(s): Lattyrna, New Ashton
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
      From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 5 N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, U, W.
    2. to kill the Fire Demon (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In New Ashton CPK. Search for a draug with the Gate key, and kill him or steal it. From New Ashton recall, go D, S, all E until you see a locked exit north. Unlock gate, N, then follow path. You'll have to kill Ro to get by. After him, go up and look around: the demon will be hidden.
    3. to give a circlet from the fire demon to Poseidon (30 minutes)
      As above.

    First Strike [Complete]

    Level: 26, 29, 30
    Difficulty: moderate (with a form of at least one other) to very hard (solo)
    Locale(s): Castle Med, Wilderness
    Total Time: 3 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
      See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways. You are given a blue orb.
    2. to find the wilderness room at 1001 x 1055 (1 hour)
      This room is to the south of an inn in the wilderness not far from the City of Medievia, to the south (actually, probably SSE). From the eastern gate of Medievia, go south. The first branch point will be a statue of a golden dragon. Keep going south to the next branch point, marked by a maroon "U". The inn is just south of here. To check your position, you can get a sextant (brass, primitive, or copper), hold the sextant, then use sextant.
    3. to find the wilderness room at 889 x 1415 (45 minutes)
      This room is located on the crescent-shaped island in the Sea of Infinity a little southwest of the City of Castiack. You can get to it by dragonback, but it may take several passes before you can land on it. Try approaching it from the N-S axis rather than the E-W direction: it will be easier to land.
    4. to kill 6 of a sunsprite, a renegade wizard, 3 of a baenlyr, and 2 of a roaming bandit (25 minutes)
      As soon as you enter this room, these mobs will pop. Tough to do solo! Don't take too many passes to kill them, or they'll start to wander off and you'll spend the last of your 25 minutes tracking them down. Alternatively, you can shield the 4 rooms surrounding this one so you can take your time fleeing out and the mobs won't be able to escape.
    5. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Fish for Fluffy [Complete]

    Additions by: Necaras, Pleen
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): E'nat'dae
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a grandmotherly housekeeper (30 minutes)
      In E'nat'dae. From zone entrance, go N, W, all N, all E, N.
    2. to find 3 of a chunk of fish (1 hour)
      Loads in Spirited Heights on a mutant cichlid. From north entrance to zone, go 3S, 2E, 2N, D.
    3. to give 3 of a chunk of fish to Fluffy, the housekeeper's Persian cat (30 minutes)
      Near the housekeeper, above.

    Fish Rebellion [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Thorlyn
    Additions by: Greendah, Zanthrin
    Level: 21, 22, 25
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Lattyrna, Fury, Crystal Lake
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a little red fish (45 minutes)
      In Lattyrna, on the palace grounds, in the fish garden, E of the castle.
    2. to kill a fishing pirate and a quiet fisherman and an inebriated fisherman (2 hours)
      A fishing pirate is located on Fury, on the lowest level of the Fury. A quiet fisherman is found in Crystal Lake. From entrance, go 2N, 3E, N, E, N, 2E, N, E, 7N and look around. An inebriated fisherman loads in Crystal Lake also. From @, go N, W and look around.
    3. to find a little red fish (45 minutes)
      As above.

    Contributed by: Leiya

    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Fury, Enara
    Total Time:

      In Fury, on the lowest level.

      As above.

    Fishing Trip [Complete]

    Contributed by: Xaine
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Crystal Lake, Trellor, Mighty Cutter Mystara, Enara
    Total Time: 9 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a quiet fisherman (30 minutes)
      In Crystal Lake. From entrance, go 2N, 3E, N, E, N, 2E, N, E, 7N and look around.
    2. to find a painted canoe (45 minutes)
      Purchase in Trellor. From the west gate, go 6W, N.
    3. to give a painted canoe to the quiet fisherman (45 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to find a long fishing pole (1 hour)
      In Enara. From @, go 2N, all W, N, W, 4N on the gypsy boy.
    5. to find a quiet fisherman (30 minutes)
      As above.
    6. to find some fishing line and tackle (1 hour)
      On a drunken sailor at Mystara. From @, go 2W, 2N.
    7. to find a quiet fisherman (15 minutes)
      As above.
    8. to find a weighted fishing net (1 hour)
      On "a young gypsy man works hard to keep the barges moving" in Enara. From @, go 2N, all E, all N, E, N, E, N, all E, N, E, all N, W, all S, W, S, W.
    9. to find a quiet fisherman (30 minutes)
      As above.
    10. to find a happy camper (45 minutes)
      From above, go W and look around.
    11. to find a straw sun hat or pirate captain's hat or white lace bonnet or a spelunking hat or a battered straw hat or a white fisherman's hat (1 hour)
      straw sun hat: In Trellor. From recall go 5S, 2E, S, buy hat.
    12. to find 6 of either a large prawn, a large salmon, a shiny trout, a northern pike, a spoonbill, a large carp, a catfish, a bullhead, a bass, or a crappie (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Find a body of water and start fishing.
    13. to give 6 of either a large prawn, a large salmon, a shiny trout, a northern pike, a spoonbill, a large carp, a catfish, a bullhead, a bass, or a crappie to a quiet fisherman (20 minutes)
      As above. Note: you receive a blue orb.

    Fix Pocketwatch for Jiader Belind [Complete]

    Contributed by: Kryne and Awnuk
    Level: 22, 24
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Gnomenel, Med City, Goland's Tower
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a room called Where Turanel Street Meets Jorenel Street (30 minutes)
      From entrance 2E, all S. Note: you receive a pocketwatch.
    2. to give a slightly broken pocketwatch to a tinkering profesor (30 minutes)
      In Mage's Quarter of Med City, near the portal.
    3. to give a set of tiny, metal tools to a tinkering professor (1 hour)
      From Tuthluth in Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go 4N, E, kill Dornloth for dragon claw key, W, all N, unlock door north, N, U, 2S, 2E.
    4. to find a room called Where Turanel Street Meets Jorenel Street (15 minutes)
      As above.

    Flasks for Cendrelia [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Ymire
    Additions by: Milekan
    Level: 27, 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Tomb of Oblivion, Spiderwode
    Total Time: 5 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Cendrelia, high priestess of the tomb (1 hour, 45 minutes)
      In Tomb of Oblivion. To get to the entrance, portal 98, then fly about 7N and 3E. From the zone entrance, go 2D, all W, E, all N. Cendrelia loads here. Note: This is a solo objective.
    2. to find 2 of a black flask or 2 of a vial of distilled spider venom (3 hours)
      The latter load on wolf spiders in The Spiderwode. From entrance to zone, head in N-W direction to find the spiders. Note: this is find-original.
    3. to give 2 of a black flask or 2 of a vial of distilled spider venom to Cendrelia, high priestess of the tomb (1 hour)
      As above.

    Flesh for the Damned [Complete]

    Contributed by: Illexio
    Level: 24, 27
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lost Civ, Derah (evil), Crime Underground, Trellor Graveyard
    Total Time: 6 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a minion of the damned (1 hour, 30 minutes)
    2. to give a human heart, a pair of eyes, and a mass of flesh to a minion of the damned (5 hours)
      a human heart: in evil Derah. After entering evil Derah from entering "A Destroyed House" (in the southwest part of good Derah), go E, N, E, E, N, N, E, U. Get the heart from the corpse of the girl.
      a pair of eyes: in Crime Underground on Chalemvir. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From here, Chalemvir is N, N, D, N (he's "An enormous hulk...").
      a mass of flesh: loads in Trellor Graveyard. From the southern @ entrance to Trellor, go N then all W till you can go S; go 2S; all E; 2D, all E until you can go S, then all S. Get book. Then N, all E, all N, all W until you can go S, then all S. Kill Sharlana, who loads the mass of flesh.

    Flower for the Widow [Complete]

    Completed by: Zynix
    Level: 24
    Difficulty:
    Locale(s): Derah
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find the widow (no limit)
      In good Derah. From entrance to zone, go all N until "The Towne Fountain." Go W, W, W, S, S, S, open the gate to the east (pick or ethereal), then E, S, E.
    2. to find a vibrant purple flower (no limit)
      Loads in Castle Med. From Med City recall, go 3 U, 7 N, E. Then get all rock.
    3. to give a vibrant purple flower to the widow (no limit)
      As above.

    Flowers for a Wedding [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Mospolo
    Additions by: Maneak, Owen, Araelle
    Level: 16
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the shopkeeper ( )
      In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 3S, W.
    2. to find 6 of a bouquet of gardenias and 4 of a dozen wonderful roses (45 minutes)
      Gardenias and roses are located in Gypsy Camp. From @, go D, E, 3S, W, S, and search for entrance. Gardenias load randomly on gypsy girls and mothers, while roses load on gypsy wenches.
    3. to give 6 of a bouquet of gardenias and 4 of a dozen wonderful roses to the shopkeeper ( )
      As above.

    Flowers for Jaysa [Complete]

    Contributed by: Jayden
    Level: 20, 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Gypsy Camp, Sceptrum
    Total Time:
    Objectives:

    2. to find a bouquet of gardenias (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Gypsy Camp on Gypsy Girl. From @, go D, W, S, 2E, 2S, W, 2S, E.

    Flowers for Jundu [Complete]

    Contributed by: Elagneros
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Aeketh
    Total Time: 3 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Jandaly (45 minutes)
      In Aeketh. From entrance to zone, go all west then E (i.e. all W but one), then north through wilderness. Then go all west, N, N, W, W, W, N, N, N, U. Search (multiple times if necessary) and go south.
    2. to find a pretty bluebell (1 hour)
      Loads in Braneri. From zone entrance, go 5N, W, open gate, W. Bluebell loads here on the ground.
    3. to find Jundu (45 minutes)
      In Aeketh. From entrance to zone, go all west then E (i.e. all W but one), then north through wilderness. Then go all west, N, N, W, W, W, N, N, N, U.
    4. to find the Aekethi Chief (30 minutes)
      From Jundu, go D, N, 9W, N, search, pick hatch, open hatch, D. Note: You receive a brass telescope upon completion.
    5. to give a brass telescope to Jundu (45 minutes)
      As above.
    6. to give a pretty bluebell to Jundu (5 minutes)

    Flowers for Lady Amacia [Complete]

    Contributed by: Elagneros
    Additions by Bhalodus, Moxaux
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Celestia, DeRah, Talqaxtyl's Pyramid
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Duke Ronen, the Golden (55 minutes)
      In Celestia on the second floor of the palace. From @, go all N, all E, all N till U, all U, S.
    2. to find a tiger orchid and a beautiful orchid (no limit)
      tiger orchid: in Talqaxtyl. Recall (A Clearing Before a Great Step Pyramid. If it doesn't load there, you must wait for the zone to repop.
      beautiful orchid: In DeRah. From recall, go 3W, 2N, open door W, 2W.
    3. to give a tiger orchid and a beautiful orchid to Ronen (1 hour)
      As above.

    Foiled Assassins [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Tios
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Med City, Wilderness
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
      See Basalan in Frequent Pathways. You'll be given a green orb.
    2. to find the wilderness room at 649 x 1549 (40 minutes)
      Just outside Lyryanoth.
    3. to kill 4 of a lizardfolk rogue (10 minutes)
      These pop in the above room and are fairly difficult mobs. Try blinding them and backstabbing them one at a time.
    4. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City ( )
      As above. You are given a blue orb upon completion of the quest.

    Food for the Chef [Complete]

    Contributed by: Afiniti
    Additions by:
    BhalodusLevel: 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Celestia, Med City, Trellor, Gypsy Camp, New Ashton
    Total Time: 2 hours, 55 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a harried cook (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      In The Palace Celestia. From zone entrance, go N, 2E, all N, E, all N, S to the royal pantry. .
    2. to find a dish of chicken and tomatoes and a chicken wing and some bloody meat and a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese and a generous portion of ham and a pot of imported gryphon stew (1 hour)
      a dish of chicken and tomatoes: Buy in Gypsy Camp. From @, go E, 3S, W, S, E.
      a chicken wing: In New Ashton, in "The Slaughter House" off of Hickory Road. From western @, go 2E, 2S, 4W, S.
      some bloody meat: In Trellor, in "Morg's Butcher Shop." From recall, go 5E, 4S, E. Buy 2.meat
      a generous portion of ham: In Med City, in "Desigra's Delicatessen." From recall, go 5E, 3N.
      a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese: In Med City, north of "Desigra's Delicatessen."
      a pot of imported gryphon stew: In "Lunch's Restaurant" in Trellor. From recall, go 5S, W, S.
    3. to give a dish of chicken and tomatoes and a chicken wing and some bloody meat and a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese and a generous portion of ham and a pot of imported gryphon stew to a harried cook (35 minutes)
      As above.

    Free Imprisoned Unicorn [Complete]

    Additions by: Amare, Bhalodus
    Level: 27, 28, 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Yldari
    Total Time: 3 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Angantyr (30 minutes)
      In Palace of Yldari. From zone entrance, go 5N, W, 5N, W, U, S, 3W, N, W, N, 3W to a room called "A Soft Bed of Moss." Angantyr loads here.
    2. to find Captain Brynjolf (30 minutes)
      In Palace of Yldari. From zone entrance, go 5N, W, 3N, 4E, U, E.
    3. to kill Captain Brynjolf (30 minutes)
      You get a bone-handled key after you kill him.
    4. to find the imprisoned unicorn (30 minutes)
      From zone entrance, go all N, E (through illusion), E, S, all E. Unlock doors with bone-handled key. Then go all E, U, S.
    5. to kill Rofocole (30 minutes)
      From above, go 2N. He is fireshielded and nearly impossible t o solo.
    6. to find the imprisoned unicorn (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Free Lost Soul from Suit of Armor [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Juliesse
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: very hard
    Locale(s): The Rydhordel Woods, Spiderwode
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find an animated suit of armor (1 hour)
      In Rydhordel Woods. From @, enter and go through maze. When out of maze, go S to the Entrance of the Park. Go 4S, W, 2S to A Large Trunk. Enter trunk. Go all S, 3W to 4-way intersection. Open door W, 5W, 2S, open door, E, look around for hidden mob Quisenil. Kill him and loot key (worked piece of stone). Go W back to Underground Barracks and return to 4-way intersection, "A Crossroad in the Tunnels." Unlock door S, open door S, 3S, walk around Circular Corridor till you find an an animated suit of armor (hidden mob).
    2. to give a human soul to an animated suit of armor (2 hours)
      Loads on tendril demon in Spiderwode.

    Free Lost Souls [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Zasildar
    Additions by: Helitus
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Alcordian
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the angel of Redemption (40 minutes)
      In Alcordian.
    2. to kill a trapped soul and a disgruntled soul and a dark soul and a dishonored soul and a forgotten soul (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      In Tomb of Oblivion.

    Free Medievia Castle Prisoners [Complete]

    Level: 12
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Med Castle
    Total Time: 4 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a member of the Veiled Society (2 hours)
      In Med City/Underground Tunnels. From Med City recall, go all E until you have exited the City, then go all S through "Beautiful Gardens" until you are on the river. (Get a boat or levitate to go on the river.) Go W then N up the river until you see a south exit called "The Underground Jetty." Go south here, then look around in the nearby rooms for this mob.
    2. to find Entity, the prisoner (2 hours)
      In Castle Med. From Med Recall, go all U then all N until the first room called "A Black Tiled Path." Go E then E again. Open the boulder (if not already open). Then go D, D, D, N, N, W, N. Kill the dwarf and get the key. Unlock gate west, open gate, W.
    3. to find Siryn, the prisoner (40 minutes)
      From Entity, go E, unlock gate E, open gate E, E.

    Free the Dwarven Prisoner [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Cildanor
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Riverton Mines, Vark Outpost
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a dwarven miner (30 minutes)
      In Riverton Mines. From entrance, go all S, all E till D, D and look around.
    2. to find a nearly dead dwarven prisoner (3 hours)
      In Vark Outpost.

    Free the Goblin Servants [Complete]

    Completed by: Rarazona
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate to hard
    Locale(s): Elnissa
    Total Time: 1 hour, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a servant goblin (30 minutes)
      In Fortress of Elnissa. From zone entrance, go N, all W, all N, search, E, all U, all S, E, pull lever. Return to the zone entrance. Then go all N, S, E, and get key wagon. Go W, N, unlock door N, 2N, W, N, E, S, W and look around. Servant goblins can be found wandering in this area.
    2. to kill Mosocula (40 minutes)
      To find Mosocula, go back to the room "Top of the Twisting Staircase." From this room, go S, W, search, W, all S, all E, 3N, look holes (this makes Mosocula appear). Then go all S, all W, all N, 2E, 2S, open door, 2E, N, E, N, E, S and kill Mosocula.

    Free The Prisoner From The Veiled Society [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Sulin
    Level: 11
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): City Of Medievia, Underground Tunnels
    Total Time: 1 hour, 55 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
      In City of Medievia. From recall go 4W, N, W, N, U, S.
    2. to find the prisoner (45 minutes)
      In Med City/Underground Tunnels. From Med City recall, go all E until you have exited the City, then go all S through "Beautiful Gardens" until you are on the river (get a boat or levitate.) Go W then north along the river until you see a S exit called "The Underground Jetty." Go S, all W, all S, N, follow path W until you find him.
    3. to kill an assassin of the Veiled Society (15 minutes)
      From The Secret Prison, search then go U, E, look around (hidden mob).
    4. to find the prisoner (10 minutes)
      As above.
    5. to give a signet ring bearing the seal of Medievia to Basalan, the Mayor of the City (15 minutes)
      As above.

    Free the Prisoners of Condemned Arena [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Jyl
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City of Medievia (30 minutes)
      In the City of Medievia, from recall: W, W, W, W, N, W, N, U, S.
    2. to kill a Gaoler Golem (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Located in Condemned Arena.

    Free the Slaves from Baazt [Complete]

    Additions by: Magtheridon
    Level: 22, 24
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Dragmire
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (20 minutes)
      See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to kill General Baazt (40 minutes)
      In the Grandstand of the Arena at Dragmire. From just inside the start of the zone ("At the Checkpoint"), go W, W, W, W, W, N, N, W, W, W, W, W, U, E, N, N, D, W.
    3. to find a filthy slave (30 minutes)
      From Baazt, go W, S, S, S, D, S. Kill the jailer and take his key. Unlock the cell to the west and go in. The filthy slave loads here.
    4. to find a slave girl (10 minutes)
      Go east, unlock door east, and go east again. The slave girl loads here.

    Free the Slaves from Trader [Needs Detail]

    Completed by: Bhalodus
    Level: 19, 21
    Difficulty: medium
    Locale(s): Med, Dragmire
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find a Medievia Guardsman (30 minutes)
    2. to find the room called the Eastern Gate of Medievia ( )
      All E from recall.
    3. to kill 2 orcs (20 minutes)
      They should appear as soon as you enter this room.
    4. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (20 minutes)
      See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
    5. to find a filthy slave (1 hour)
      In Dragmire Stronghold. From just inside the start of the zone ("At the Checkpoint"), go 7W, 4N, 3W.
    6. to kill Dramlok the breeder and the auctioneer and a slave trader (20 minutes)
      The first and last load in the same room as the filthy slave; the auctioneer loads W of them (hidden.)

    Freedom from Ice Worms [Complete]

    Contributed by: Isolde
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate to hard
    Locale(s): Zuldahun's
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a stranded adventurer (1 hour)
      In Zuldahun's Glacial Cathedral. From zone entrance, go 3S, 2E, 2S (Note: Some of these rooms do cold damage, and are slippery)
    2. to kill 3 of an ice worm (1 hour)
      These load in the corridors between the stranded adventurer and the entrance, after you've found him. They are evil aligned and iceshielded.

    Freeeedom! / Freedom [Complete]

    Contributed by: Carolinus
    Level: 24, 26
    Difficulty: easy to moderate (NPK, no death)
    Locale(s): Trellorian Penitentiary
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a tired prisoner (1 hour)
      From zone entrance, go 2N, W, all N to the prison gates. Kill the guard(s) to get the key. Then go W, U the guard tower and kill the guard for key. Go back to the gates, unlock the gate with both keys and enter the prisoner. Go 2N and look for the tired prisoner (either 2E or 2W of here.)
    2. to kill 2 of a prison guard and Deklon, the warden and Julonk, the warden (1 hour)
      Guards load randomly. From inside the prison gates, go all W until D, then D, all W for one warden. For the other, go all E, U, all E, D, all E.

    Fresh Pineapple [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Helitus
    Level: 18
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Talqaxtyl's Pyramid, Med City
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the chief (1 hour)
      In Talqaxtyl's Pyramid. From recall, N, 3E, 6N, 2W, 5N(through hidden exit), 2E, S, E, N.
    2. to find 3 of object a pineapple (30 minutes)
      Load on a muscular sailor on Med piers.
    3. to give 3 of a pineapple to the chief (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Fuchsia Hair Potion [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Satra
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Braneri, Gnomenel
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find a crazy alchemist (30 minutes)
      In Braneri. From entrance, go 2N, E, N, open door E, 3E, U, W, S.
    2. to give a lock of fuchsia hair to a crazy alchemist ( )
      In Gnomenel. From @, go 2E, 3N, 2E, kill Zaranne Hyndel for lock of fuchsia hair.

    Fungal Removal for Matheny [Complete]

    Contributed by: Ceresir
    Level: 27
    Difficulty: moderate (need sneak
    Locale(s): Crypt of Vatos
    Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Matheny, Captain of the Sentinels (30 minutes)
      In Crypt of Vatos. From zone entrance (@), pull lever. Then go all W, all D to "The Bottom of the Steps." Go all E (hidden exit), search, open trapdoor, U, E to graverobber. (Do not kill the mobs in this area yet: you need them for objective #2.) Kill graverobber and loot key. Then go W, D, all W, unlock door W. Sneak past Angelicus, a very tough, high level aggro mob. Go all W to Matheny (then go E immediately, as he is aggro.)
    2. to kill either a white lichen, a grey lichen, or a pulsating fungus (45 minutes)
      These are found in the area all E of Matheny through the hidden exit. (Be sure you have sense life.)
    3. to find Matheny, Captain of the Sentinels (5 minutes)
      All west, as above.

    Fur for Potions [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Lurline
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Yldari
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the alchemist (1 hour)
      In Palace of Yldari. From @ go all N, all W, N to gate, open gate, N, all E, W, U, E, kill captain for key, then W, D, all W, all S, all E (hidden), S, all E, unlock doors, 2E, S.
    2. to find 2 fur of a golden deer ( )
      In Akenuas Glade. From @, go N, E, N, 2E, 3N, W, N, 4W (including hidden), S, 2W, S, 5E (hidden), S, E and look around for golden deer.
    3. to find the alchemist ( )
      As above.
    4. To give 2 fur of a golden deer to the alchemist ( )
      As above.

    Fur Hide for Avalon [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Phu
    Additions by: Peb
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate (sneak and invis needed)
    Locale(s): Castiack, Riverton
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Avalon (1 hour)
      In Riverton, on the north side of Topaz Avenue. From northern @, go 3S, 2W, N
    2. to find a pelt of lynx fur (2 hours)
      Pelt loads in Castiack; loads on the lynx hunters in the west part of the zone.
    3. to give a pelt of lynx fur to Avalon (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Garden Hoes for Rofyle [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Neverra
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Gloumewood Farm, Coliseum, Dragmire, Gnomenel
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Rofyle, the head gardener (30 minutes)
      In Gloumewood Farm. Can be found wandering east of gate (kill farmhand for key to gate).
    2. to give 2 of either a rusty garden hoe, an ordinary garden hoe, or a small gardening rake to Rofyle, the head gardener (3 hours)
      Rusty garden hoes: load on orcish farmers in Dragmire. From entrance go W, U, N, D, 4W, N and look around.
      Ordinary garden hoe: loads in Coliseum.
      A small gardening rake: loads in Gnomenel. From the gate, go 14E, 2N, E, get rake rack.

    Garden Problems [Complete]

    Contributed by: Calisto
    Additions by: Sulin
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: medium (NPK - popular zone)
    Locale(s): Tharhalas, Warrens of Moshata, Catacombs, Dragmire
    Total Time: 6 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a dwarven guard (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Loads in Tharhalas. From @, go all W, N, all W, U, 2E, and look around.
    2. to kill 10 giant earthworms (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Load in Warrens of Moshata. From @, go D, all N, D. They load in the NPK area here, in the outer ring of rooms.
    3. to kill 2 cave blood-weed (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Located in the Catacombs.
    4. to give a rusty garden hoe to a dwarven guard (2 hours)
      Load in Dragmire on the orcish farmers.
    5. to find a dwarven guard (25 minutes)
      As above.

    Gardening for the Undead [Complete]

    Contributed by: Eleazar, Xveckthorn
    Level: 26, 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Van Kyln's Estate
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the rotting corpse of the groundskeeper (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Van Kyln's Estate. From @, go N, 2E, N [Next step is CPK] all D, pick chest, open chest, get all chest. Go back to @. Then from @, go N, all W, 4N, unlock gate, 5W, all N, E, D.
    2. to kill 12 of a veiled chameleon and 6 of a venomous viper and 6 of a screaming harpy and 6 of a wild dog and 4 of a large buzzard (2 hours, 30 minutes)
      These mobs are located in the part of the zone before entering the gate. From the groundskeeper: U, W, 3S, E past gate. The mobs are scattered

    Gardening Supplies for Henry [Complete]

    Additions by: Obercan
    Level: 21, 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Graveyard, Gnomenel
    Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
      In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
    2. to find a pair of gardening shears and a tray of seedlings and a small gardening rake and long hedge clippers (2 hours)
      In Gnomenel. From recall, go 7E, 2N, E, get all rack for the shears and rake. The seedlings load on Adwen Tinolle. From recall, go 6S, 4E, N. The long hedge clippers load on Verianne Locyn. From entrance, go 6E, 4S, E.
    3. to give a pair of gardening shears and a tray of seedlings and a small gardening rake and long hedge clippers to Henry, the cathedral gardener (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Garlic For Madame Zash [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Kardina
    Level: 27
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Verthandi, Egriel, Trellor, Brookhaven, Derah
    Total Time: 7 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Madame Zash ()
      In Derah. From @, go 6N W.
    2. to find Holda the Cook ()
      In Verthandi. From zone entrance, go N, 2E, all N, W, all N, E, all N, all E, all N, all W, N, W, all N, E, all N, W, N, N, N, W, W, all N (one of the norths is hidden), E, N, W, W.
    3. to give a carton of eggs and a sack of flour and 2 of a stick of butter and a hunk of cheese to Holda the Cook (4 hours)
      hunk of cheese: In Cleo's Market in Trellor.
      sticks of butter and carton of eggs: In Brookhaven. From @, go N, W and buy.sack of flour: In Egriel. Enter after 6 am to avoid CPK. From @, go 2E, 3S, 2E, 2S, E, D and get sack.
    4. to give 5 of a head of garlic to Madam Zash (45 minutes)
      As above.

    Garlic to Keep a Vampire Away [Complete]

    Contributed by: Sarius
    Additions by: Crixus
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Medievia, Verthandi
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a receptionist (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go 6N, E, U.
    2. [hidden objective] to find a head of garlic (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Verthandi, from Holda the Cook. From zone entrance, go N, 2E, all N, W, all N, E, all N, all E, all N, all W, N, W, all N, E, all N, W, N, N, N, W, W, all N (one of the norths is hidden), E, N, W, W. Holda loads here and gives you the garlic.
    3. to give a head of garlic to the receptionist (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Gasherbrum Wants to Celebrate [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Kernighan
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Gasherbrum (30 minutes)
      At the bottom level of Warrens. From entrance, go D, all N, D, all E, 7S, all W, N, D, D, D, N, W, W, W, S, S, D, E, S, S, W, W, D, N, N, D. This level is a small rectangle of about a dozen rooms, and Gasherbrum loads here (or occasionally on the way here.)
    2. to find a fat cigar (4 hours, 10 minutes)
      In Sceptrum Isachi on Lord Akarez. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror. Then all D, all N and look around (he wanders).
    3. to find Gasherbrum (35 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to give a fat cigar to Gasherbrum ( )
      As above.

    Gather Instruments For The Gypsy Musician [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Ryntrax
    Level:
    Difficulty: no idea!
    Locale(s): Esacha Fen, Med City, Gypsy Camp
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a gypsy musician (40 minutes)
      In Esacha Fen. From entrance to the fen, go 3N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E. Take the hidden exit north. From there go E, N, 2E, S, E, S, E, S, E, 2S, open door W, W.
    2. to find a brass trombone and a mahogany violin and silver finger cymbals (1 hour)
      Violin and Trombone: In Med City. From recall, enter mage, S, E, 2S, E, D. They load on the mobs in this room.
      Cymbals: In Gypsy Camp, in A Dancing Circle.
    3. to find a sheaf of sheet music (40 minutes)
      In Esacha Fen. Loads in a harpsichord in room Inside a Bargehouse (Note: there are more than one of these rooms, so wander around to get the right one.). From entrance to the fen, go 3N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E. Take the hidden exit north. From there go E, N, 2E, S, E, S, E, S, E, 2S, open door west, W. get all harpsichord.
    4. to give a brass trombone and a mahogany violin and silver finger cymbals and a sheaf of sheet music to a gypsy musician (40 minutes)
      As above.

    Gather Items for Insane Alchemist [Complete]

    Contributed by: Stevin
    Additions by: Shanoyu, Onark
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate (solo, find-original)
    Locale(s): Braneri, E'urdin, Mystical Forest, New Genesia
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the insane alchemist (1 hour)
      In Braneri. From @, go 2N, E, N, all E, U, W, N, and look around.
    2. to give 3 of bits of fungi, 1 truesight potion, and 1 amber rod of tentacles to the insane alchemist (3 hours)
      bits of fungi: In E'urdin Zilartzen. Loads on a forked fungus darkling. From entrance to zone, go E (until you teleport), then S and E along the carpet until you find this mob. Be sure to get at least four: you'll need to eat one to get out of the zone. Note: this is a find-original objective.
      truesight potion: Purchase in Mystical Forest. From the bottom left @, go 2E, 2N, W, 9 N, 3W, S. Buy truesight.
      amber rod of tentacles: Purchase in New Genesia. From the southern @, go N, all E, 2N, W, buy amber.

    Gather Lost Souls of Wytherwind for Redemption [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Pawana
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Alcordian Battle Grounds, Wytherwind
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the angel of Redemption (40 minutes)
      In Alcord. From @, follow path south until the first west intersection; go west to the lake and get to the center of the lake.
    2. to give 5 of a lost soul to the angel of Redemption (1 hour)
      On mob "The Soulless" in Wytherwind. From zone entrance, go all W, N, all W, 3S, E and look around if needed.

    Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Med City
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:

      In Forbidden Forest. From @, go E, 5N, E.
    2. to find a darkmoon root and 2 of a sprig of gemsly (30 minutes)
      The two load in the reagent garden under Med City. From Med City recall, enter thief, 3S, D, N, 2E, 2S, E, N, W, S, E, N, 2E, D and look around.
    3. to give 2 of a darkmoon root and 2 of a sprig of gemsly to a village meat worker (30 minutes)

    Gauntlets For Tyr [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Senadra
    Level: 27
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Mystical Forest, Dark Woods
    Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the incarnation of Tyr (45 minutes)
      In Mystical Forest. From recall, go all W, all N, pick door, open door, N, U, 5S, E to four-way intersection. Then go 2S, all U.
    2. to give the gauntlets of ogre power to the incarnation of Tyr (2 hours)
      Loads in Dark Woods (be careful, this zone is ALWAYS being staked).

    Additions by: Yandyr, Kernighan
    Level: 26, 30
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Ryvaera, Spiderwode
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:

      In Ryvaera. From western @, go 6E, D, E, D, 2S(search), E, 2N, 3E, S, 2W, D, S, W, 2N, 2E, 2S, E, S, 2W, kill beavers and loot key, unlock door W, open door W, W.
    2. to find the seedling of a silverwood tree (2 hours, 30 minutes with extension)
      Loads in Spiderwode on the red, green, brown, and blue zhayven mobs. From zone entrance, go 3N then W and look around.
    3. to give the seedling of a silverwood tree to Bavanna, the Beaver Queen

    Get Baby Gorilla for a Little Girl [Complete]

    Contributed by: Darkwind
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Enara, Gypsy Camp
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a little girl (30 minutes)
      In Enara. From zone entrance, go 4N and look E and W.
    2. to give a baby gorilla to a little girl (30 minutes)
      In Gypsy Camp. From @, go D, W, S, 2E, all S, W, S, W, buy ticket,S, 2W, all N, give ticket collector. Then go all W, all N, 2W, open cage north.Get baby gorilla from gorilla.
    3. to find an Enaran woman (10 minutes)
      In Enara. From zone entrance, go 4N and look E and W. (Move quickly.)
    4. to to give a bundle of bananas to an Enaran woman (20 minutes)
      Load in Gypsy Camp on gorilla.

    Get Bark Objects for Ensatia [Complete]

    Contributed by: Milekan, Murdoch
    Additions by: Yandyr
    Level: 26, 28, 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Dark Forest of Wittermark, Talqaxtyl's Pyramid, Catacombs of Toshi, Fire Giant's Keep
    Total Time: 1 day
    Objectives:
    1. to find a Wittermark Dryad (40 minutes to 1 hour, 34 minutes with extension)
      Just inside the start of the zone, to the west.
    2. to give a treant bark shield, a white bark breast plate and a set of bark leg plates to Ensatia, the Dryad Queen ( )
      a treant bark shield: loads in Fire Giants' Keep on the treant. From @, go U, all S, E, all S, W (illusionary), all W, N, all W, N.
      a white bark breast plate: loads in Toshi on the Queen. From @, go D, all N, all E, 2N, all E, all D, all N, 6E, all D, all W, 4E, either all N or all S then D to the Queen.
      a set of bark leg plates: loads on the zealots in Pyramid. Follow the path around Pyramid.
      Ensatia loads in Wittermark. From @, go all W, S, W, all S, all W, S, all W.

    Get Barrettes for Duke [Incomplete]

    Level: 18
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, The Underground Tunnels
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
      See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to give 3 of a jewel-studded barrette, worn in the hair to Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (50 minutes)
      These barrettes load on the reagent gatherers in the Underground Tunnels. From Med City recall, enter thief, 3S, D, N, 2E, 2S, E, N, W, S, E, N, 2E, D and look around.

      Loads on Miskina (irregularly) in Toshi, a difficult mob to kill solo at this level.

    Get Components for Costume for Spider [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Onark
    Additions by: Tokoloshe
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Spider (30 minutes)
      In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then 3N.
    2. to find a uniform of the soldiers of Ryvaera and the wings of an iolite naiad and a chalcedony and hematite trident (1 hour)
      In Ryvaera. The first and last load on soldiers in the palace. From western @, go 2S, 3E, 3D, 2W, open portcullis, 2N. The wings load on the naiad, which wanders.
    3. to find the Spider (45 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to give a uniform of the soldiers of Ryvaera and the wings of an iolite naiad and a chalcedony and hematite trident to the Spider ( )
      As above.

    Get Doubloons for Ramarke [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Ogrim
    Additions by: Kernighan
    Level: 25, 27, 28, 29
    Difficulty: very difficult
    Locale(s): Fury, Cliffs of Berkovic
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Merrick, the navigator of the Fury (no limit)
      Merrick is found on the bridge in the aft (south) part of the ship.
    2. to give a sack of golden doubloons to Ramarke, Captain of the Fury (no limit)
      Doubloons are found in Berkovic, with Berkovic himself (link not available). Ramarke is in Fury. From the entrance to the Fury, go go all N/E/W/S (depending on orientation) then go U, U, E, 7S, W, D, E, N, W, W, W, S, S.

    Get Duster For Awgawk [Complete]

    Level: 23
    Difficulty: medium
    Locale(s): Dragmire
    Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Awgawk, the Innkeep (20 minutes)
      Enter zone by going W, U, N, D. Then go W, W, W, W, W, W, W (to "An Intersection in the Stronghold"), then N, N, E.
    2. to give an elegant feather duster to Awgawk, the Innkeep (3 hours)
      Kuukle in Goland's Tower has this. Enter the zone and go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle. Note: This step is flagged as solo, but not find-original.

    Get Fresh Cigars for Lord Akarez [Complete]

    Level: 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Sceptrum
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Lord Akarez (1 hour)
      In Sceptrum Isachi. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror. Then all D, all N and look around (he wanders). Note: you receive 4 of a small sack of gems.
    2. to give a small sack of gems to the Tobacconist (1 hour)
      In El Cantara. From zone entrance, go U, 2N, E, 10N, W, N. Note: you receive 6 of a fat cigar.
    3. to find Lord Akarez (1 hour, 10 minutes with extension)
      As above.
    4. to give 6 of a fat cigar to Lord Akarez (5 minutes)
      As above.

    Get Holy Water for Priest [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Renem
    Level:
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s):
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find a priest ( )
      In Med City Clerics' Quarter.
    2. to give a flask of holy water to a priest ( )
      Flask of holy water loads on monks in the Graveyard cathedral. From entrance to Graveyard, go all N, all E, N, then E or W and U. Monks appear as "A tall man dressed in long brown robes is walking about quietly."

    Get Lizardfolk Disguise for Masquerade Ball [Complete]

    Additions by: DP, Cylantir
    Level: 27, 28, 29
    Difficulty: medium
    Locale(s): Med City, Lyryanoth
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a young lady (20 minutes)
      In Med City. From southeasternmost entrance to Med City (@), look around.
    2. to find a lizardfolk disguise (1 hour)
      In Lyryanoth, on the criminal mastermind and the disguised figures. The latter are easier to kill if you can blind the former. From Lyryanoth recall, go 3S, 3E, N, E (the last two exits are hidden).
    3. to give a lizardfolk disguise to a young lady (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Get Magical Items for Marious [Complete]

    2. to give a ring carved of black stone, engraved with runes, a shadowy dagger, and a handcrafted drum carved with ancient symbols to the wizard (3 hours)
      Found in the Catacombs. This is a find-original flagged objective.
      a ring carved of black stone, engraved with runes: loads on the Dream-Weaver.
      a shadowy dagger: loads on a sludge mephit.
      a handcrafted drum carved with ancient symbols: loads on the Dream-Weaver.

    Get Moshata Fur for Jorme [Complete]

    Contributed by: Sirrion and Milekan
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Warrens, Tharhalas
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Jorme, the Huntmaster (1 hour, 15 minutes)
      In Tharhalas. From zone entrance, go all W, N, 3W, U, 2E, 2N, 2E, N.
    2. to find a length of silky moshata fur (no limit)
      This is solo, no death, and find original.
    3. to find Jorme, the Huntmaster (45 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to give a length of silky moshata fur to the First Mate (45 minutes)
      In the Pirate Ship. From the entrance to the zone, go E, all N, E, U, S, 2E, search, pick floorboard, D, W, pick door, S.
    5. to find Jorme, the Huntmaster (45 minutes)
      As above.

    Get Mud to Audrey [Complete]

    Contributed by: Corian, Bingyi
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Warrens
    Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:

    Get Necklace for Amphritrite [Complete]

    Contributed by: Tellahane
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lattyrna, Mynoric Garrison
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
      From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 5 N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, U, W.
    2. to give a bejewelled necklace to Poseidon (2 hours)
      In Mynoric Garrison. From entrance to zone (@), go 4N, 2E, S, 2W, S. Kill Jailer for key. Go N, E, S. Kill Gekrenville for key. Go N, E, N, 4W, unlock door N, open door N, N. Kill skeleton for lens. Go S, 2E, search for trapdoor, U. Then go 2S, 2E, hold lens, hold a ball of light, use lens. Finally, go 4W, 3N, E, U. Kill Terrakor and Kielanir; either of them load the necklace.

    Get New Armor for Desarius [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Kabbal
    Level: 29
    Difficulty:
    Locale(s): Quinstone's Keep
    Total Time: 4 hours, 5 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Desarius ()
      In Quinstone's Keep. From @, go N, 2E, 2U, 2E, 3N, E, U, E, S and kill the mob with the tarnished crucifix; loot it. Then go N, W, D, W, 3S, 2W, 2D, 4W, 2U, 2W, 2N, 4W, unlock/open hatch, U.
    2. to find a golden cloak, a polished golden breast plate, a polished golden helmet, a pair of polished golden leggings, a pair of golden gauntlets, a pair of polished golden sleeves, and a polished golden shield ()
      In Karlisna on a heavily armored guard. From zone entrance, go 5E, 5N, E and look around
    3. to find Desarius (30 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to give a golden cloak, a polished golden breast plate, a polished golden helmet, a pair of polished golden leggings, a pair of golden gauntlets, a pair of polished golden sleeves, and a polished golden shield to Desarius ( )
      As above.
    5. to find golden chainmail leggings, a pair of golden chainmail sleeves, armor of Halsenar, and boots of the pure hearted (1 hour, 40 minutes)
      In Alcordian Battleground on Halsenar.
    6. to find Desarius ( )
      As above.
    7. to give olden chainmail leggings, a pair of golden chainmail sleeves, armor of Halsenar, and boots of the pure hearted to Desarius ( )
      As above.

    Difficulty:
    Locale(s): Trellor, Catacombs of Toshi
    Total Time: 5 hours
    Objectives:

      Near recall in Trellor.
    2. to give 3 of a platinum belt and 3 of platinum boots and 3 of a platinum shield to the Stormwatch Commander (2 hours, 30 minutes)
      In Toshi on ant guards. From southern @, go D, all N, all E, N till E, all E, 2D, and wander around.
    3. to give an ancient Mespavian longsword and 3 of a long, curved sword of black metal to the Stormwatch Commander (2 hours)
      In Dray'Mar.

    Get Restraints for Horneg [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Takphius
    Level: 30
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Horneg's Keep
    Total Time: 5 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Horneg (30 minutes)
      From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search, W. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U.
    2. to find manacles connected with frozen mithril links (4 hours)
