    Help Spy Stop Underground Army [Complete]

    Contributed by: Bhalodus
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a spy (30 minutes)
      In the Underground Shafts. From zone entrance, go D, N, E and follow path E and S until you find one.
    2. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
      See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
    3. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (40 minutes)
      See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
    4. to kill the leader of the bandits and 3 of a bandit (40 minutes)
      In Underground Shafts. From zone entrance, go D, 2E, 2N, 2E, 4S, 4E and look around for these hidden mobs, especially in the barracks rooms.
    5. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
      As above.
    6. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (10 minutes)
      As above. Note: you receive a green orb.

    Help Stormwatch Commander [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Reona
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Crime Underground
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Stormwatch Commander ( )
      In Trellor, 6N from recall.
    2. to kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves ( )
      In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
    3. to find the Stormwatch Commander ( )
      As above.

    Help Stormwatch Wipe Out the Crime Underground [Complete]

    Level: 22, 24, 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Crime Underground
    Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Stormwatch Commander (25 minutes)
      On the main N/S/E/W axis streets of Trellor.
    2. to kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (1 hour)
      From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!) I recommend killing Spider before Vonliege, in case you need to flee out from Vonliege. (Spider's in the room just to the south of Vonliege.) Note: others who have done this AQ say that you are asked to kill the master of novices here.
    3. to find the Stormwatch Commander (25 minutes)
      As above.

    Help Tabytha Rid the Rats [Complete]

    Contributed by: Alicist and Bhalodus
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Tabytha, Mathaelda's pet (45 minutes)
      From northern entrance to Rydhordel, go N, W, S, W, all S, 8W, all S, N, W.
    2. to kill 15 of a rat from the pack and 2 of a pack of rats and 10 of a sewer rat (2 hours)
      a rat from the pack: In Lost Civilization in a room called "A Crumbling House." From zone entrance, follow the trail around (the first 12 rooms or so curve around but no branches.) At the first intersection ("Road in the Forest") go S, S, W, S, S, E, E, S, S, E, S, S, S, W, S, S, E, S, W, all S. From this room, search. Then go S, search, E, S, E, E, S, S.
      a pack of rats: in Xanthal. From @, go 2N, 2W and look around.
      the sewer rat: in Trellor. From recall, open grating, go down, and look around.
    3. to find Tabytha, Mathaelda's pet (45 minutes)
      As above.

    Help Takenos [Complete]

    Level: 21, 22
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora, Enara
    Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (30 minutes)
      See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N.
    2. to find a deck of marked cards (30 minutes)
      In the Singing Bear Tavern in Enara. Enter by the south entrance. From "An Intersection," go all N, then W, then N. The mobs in that room have this item.
    3. to give a deck of marked cards to Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (30 minutes)

    Help Takenos Break a Run of Bad Luck [Complete]

    Contributed by: Anonymous
    Additions by: Pleen
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Alendora, Trellor, Dragmire
    Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (40 minutes)
      See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N.
    2. to find a lucky charm and a lucky rabbit's foot (1 hour)
      Charm: in Dragmire. From entrance, go W, U, N, D, 3W, all N to Headless Goblin Hall.
      Rabbit's foot: purchase in Trellor. From recall, go 5S, 2E, S.
    3. to give a lucky charm and a lucky rabbit's foot to Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Help Tastaniumus Get a Date [Complete]

    Contributed by: Lurline
    Level: 23, 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Dark Escarpment, Wytherwind
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Tastaniumus, the tunnelmaster (no limit)
      In Dark Escarpment. From entrance to zone, go U, 6 W, S (hidden), S, 2E. You've just entered a 3x3 area of rooms; there's a key called "a finger bone" in at least one of them. Move from room to room and type "Get all mound" until you have the finger bone key. Then return to the first room you entered in 3x3 area. From here, go 5W, N, 3W (use the finger bone key to unlock the door.) The tunnelmaster loads here.
    2. to give the staff of seduction to Tastaniumus, the tunnelmaster (no limit)
      In Wytherwind. From @, go 3W, N, 2W, 3S, U, all S, all W, S, U, S, E, U, E, N, 2W, N, W, N, 2W, S, D. Kill the mage to get his staff. (The staff doesn't always load so you may have to wait here quite a while. Also, it is cursed so you'll have to be able to remove curse before giving it to the tunnelmaster.) Note: this is a find-original objective.

    Help the Astronomer Merrick[Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Ogrim and Loere
    Updated by: Tarissa
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Fury, Braneri, Riverton
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Merrick, the navigator of the Fury (no limit)
      In Fury. From main deck, go U one level, 2E and all S until you see him.
    2. to find a small telescope and a sapphire-tipped quill (no limit)
      a small telescope: Loads in Academy of Braneri in the astronomy building, N, W, N, W from zone entrance. Go west in building, up the stairs, then east until in the room "Beside a Window." Search, then go up. Telescope loads "loose" in the room.
      a sapphire-tipped quill: Loads on the Mayor of Riverton. See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.
    3. to give a small telescope and a sapphire-tipped quill to Merrick ( )
      As above.

      Note: A previous version of this AQ also required you to get the book of constellations. Lest this some day be re-instituted the book of constellations: Loads on Psoralea in Ruellia. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go N, N (to Greenway of Ruellia), then 3E, N, E, 2N, E, open hanger, get key hanger, U, E (hidden exit), unlock hatch, open hatch, D. Psoralea loads here.

    Help the Bard in Love[Complete]

    Level: 21
    Difficulty: easy to moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Mynoric
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a congenial bard (30 minutes)
      On the main streets of Trellor. From recall, go S to the Merchant Circle, and head east until you find one.
    2. to find an ebony circlet studded with rubies (1 hour / 2 hours with extension)
      In Mynoric. From zone entrance, go 4N, search, U, S and look around for Kaurdag, who loads one of the ebony circlets.
    3. to give an ebony circlet studded with rubies to a congenial bard (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Help The Captain With His Little Boy [Complete]

    Contributed by: Milekan
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Med City
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a retired ship captain (10 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go 7S, 4E, 2S, W.
    2. [hidden] to find a room called A Crawlspace Behind the Piano(no limit)
      At the Wild Knights Bar in the warrior quarter. From Med recall,enter warrior, go 2E, all N, W, open piano, N.
    3. to find a yo-yo (1 hour)
      At Talironde's Traveling Carnival. Play the Ring toss booth to get it.
    4. to find a room called A Crawlspace Behind the Piano (30 minutes)
      As above.
    5. to give a yo-yo to a small boy (5 minutes)
      In the room with you.
    6. to find a retired ship captain (10 minutes)
      As above.

    Help the Caretaker Kill Weeds [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Mokker
    Level: 18
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): The Graveyard, Village of Gnomenel
    Total Time: 3 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the caretaker ( )
      In the Graveyard.
    2. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (20 minutes)
      In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
    3. to find Where Turanel Street Meets Jorenel Street (1 hour)
      In Gnomenel.
    4. to give a weed-killer potion to the caretaker ( )
      As above.
    5. to kill 2 of a giant snake (20 minutes)
      In the Graveyard.
    6. to find the caretaker ( )
      As above.

    Help the Chef Make Stew [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Yenadar, Awnuk, Phu
    Level: 21, 25
    Difficulty: wretched hard!
    Locale(s): Med Castle, Ruellia, Trellor, Wytherwind
    Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the gnomish cook (30 minutes)
      See Dragon Staircase in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue: E, all E, all S, W, all S.
    2. to give 3 of a shitaki mushroom to the gnomish cook (1 hour)
      In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N. Go E, all N, E, E, all N, W, W, N, U. In 2 of the 6 rooms in this section, there are benches which load mushrooms. "Get all bench" to gather shitaki mushrooms.
    3. to give 4 of a spiced apple to the gnomish cook (1 hour)
      Loads in Trellor on the weary peddlers near recall.
    4. to give a small clump of blue berries and a small clump of green berries to the gnomish cook (1 hour)
      In Ruellia, on the shrubs. From the zone entrance, go D, all N, W, N, N, D, E, N, E to "Next to the Waterfall." Go U, 6N, then all east to "Beside the Valley Walls." Then go:
      green berry: Search then go E. Go U, N.
      blue berry: S, W.
    5. to give 2 of a bottle of FretherField White from the Wytherwind Winery and 2 of a bottle of BristoleField Red from the Wytherwind Winery to the gnomish cook (1 hour)
      In Wytherwind on the underground level. From the zone entrance, go all S (to "Deep in the Mire"), W, W, W, S, S, S, search, D, D. (Be sure you're breathing water.) Go W, N, N, W, S, W, W, N, N, W. Get the crow bar. Go down to a room called "An Underwater Wine Cellar." Unlock crate, open crate, and get all crate; unlock 2.crate, open 2.crate, get all 2.crate.

    Help the Dean with His Collection [Needs Detail]

    Level: 28, 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Academy of Braneri
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find the dean of the academy (4 hours)
      In Braneri. From entrance to zone ("Before a Grand Iron Gate"), go: 5N, W until D, D, kill the fish, then loot all the fish for "a small bronze key." Then go U, 4E, unlock door N, open door N, go north.
    2. to give several white dragon scales, several scales from a copper dragon, and some scales from an onyx dragon to the dean of the academy (no limit)
      These items load (respectively) in Berkovic, Ruellia, and Spires of Kirys.

    Help the Derah Citizen Lift the Curse [Complete]

    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Derah
    Total Time: 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the citizen (30 minutes)
      In Derah. Enter zone and go N along the main street.
    2. to kill the hag (10 minutes)
      This loads in the room as soon as you find the citizen. Be prepared to fight!

    Help the Elderly [Complete]

    Additions by: Milekan
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderately difficult
    Locale(s): Castiack, Tharhalas, Karlisna
    Total Time: 3 hours, 55 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an elder raven (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Castiack (hidden and wanders).
    2. to find the librarian (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Tharhalas. From @, go all W, N, all W, U, all N, E, U, all N, E, all S, D, all S. Note: 2 more aggro librarians will pop.
    3. to give a dirty pair of glasses to an elder raven (25 minutes)
      These pop on one of the above librarians.
    4. to give a shadow cloak to an elder raven (30 minutes)
      Loads on mage of the king in Karlisna. Note: this is find-original.

    Help the Herald [Complete]

    Level: 19
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Mellorian Citadel
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find the herald (no limit)
      In Mellorian. From zone entrance, go all N to "An Intersection in the Hallway," then go W, N, 2U, S, W.
    2. to give a brass trumpet to the herald (no limit)
      Purchase in Med City Mages' Quarter. Recall, enter mage, then go 4W, S, E to purchase from the elderly music teacher. Alternatively, recall, enter mage, then go S, E, 2S, E, D. Kill the trombonist.

    Help the Hermit [Complete]

    Contributed by: Bhalodus
    Additions by: Clawyer
    Level: 27
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Catacombs
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a wise hermit (no limit)
      Located randomly in the Catacombs. Note: this is solo and no-death.
    2. to kill 5 of a giant centipede and 10 of a giant centipede(6 killed so far) and 20 of a bloody, mangled centipede(10 killed so far) and 40 of a centipede segment
      Essentially, this involves killing 5 different Catacombs centipedes and all the mobs they split into. Note: this is solo and no-death.
    3. to find a wise hermit (no limit)
      As above.

    Help the Judge Solve the Wall Argument [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Helitus
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate (CPK)
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the judge (30 minutes)
      In Trellor. From recall, go 2E, 2S.
    2. to find the oak slab (1 hour)
      In Verigaard Keep. From @, go 3N, 4W, 2N, search, W, and kill Keeper to get key of faith. Then go 2E, 2N, pick door E, E, all N, E, pick door S, all S, all E, 2N, search, W, close wall E, lock wall E, 12U. Note: this is solo and no-death.

    Help the Keymaster [Complete]

    Contributed by: Xeanne
    Level: 26, 29, 30
    Difficulty: easy (if you can sneak and pick/ethereal) to moderate
    Locale(s): Mystical Forest, Citadel of NaeraMae
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the keymaster (30 minutes)
      In Mystical. From recall, go 3S, E.
    2. to find 2 of a multi-colored key ring (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      In NaeraMae. From entrance, go 2U, 2S, 4E (using pick/ethereal) and look at the minotaurs, who load them. Note: these are NOT find-original.
    3. to give 2 of a multi-colored key ring to the keymaster (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Help the Knights of the Emerald Plume Keep Warm [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Antdos
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: very hard
    Locale(s): Elnissa, Toshi, New Ashton
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Guyard Nallah, of the Emerald Plume (40 minutes)
      In the Fortress of Elnissa, at the entrance.
    2. to find the pelt of a Winter Wolf and the scarf of warmth (3 hours)
      AQ Decide step.

      Here are your options:
      1: Obtain the pelt of a Winter Wolf for Guyard Nallah.
      2: Obtain the scarf of warmth for Guyard Nallah.
      3: Obtain both the pelt of a Winter Wolf and the scarf of warmth for Guyard Nallah.

      Scarf of warmth: in New Ashton. Search for a boy with a pump handle. Kill for the handle (key). From New Ashton recall, then go S, D, 4E, 4S, W, S, E, search, S, search, 2D, 2N, E, N until you see the old woman (who loads the scarf.)
      The pelt of a Winter Wolf: in Toshi on Shen Lung. From eastern @, go D, all N, 3W, all N, all D, all N, all E, N, E, 2D, all N, U. Kill Shen Lung (note: this is extremely hard solo).

    3. to give the pelt of a Winter Wolf and the scarf of warmth to Guyard Nallah, of the Emerald Plume (40 minutes)
      As above.

    Help the Lonely Ogre [Incomplete]

    1. to find Daroctwil, the lonely ogre (1 hour, 30 minutes)

    2. to give a small doll and a child's doll to Daroctwil, the lonely ogre (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      small doll: in good Derah.
      child's doll: in Enara.

    Help The Parents Of The Bride Get Ready [Complete]

      In Med City. From recall, enter thief, 2E, 2S
    3. to find 1 of: a pair of black cufflinks, a black bowtie, a black tuxedo jacket, a pair of black dress pants, and a pair of dress shoes and socks (15 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, 3S, W. Buy at Bridal Shop.
    4. to give a piar of black cufflinks, a black bowtie, a black tuxedo jacket, a pair of black dress pants, and a pair of dress shoes and socks to Lord Agimon of House Shinosu (15 minutes)
      In Med City. Loads with Lady Arabella (As above.)
    5. to find a black silk dress, hemmed in silver thread (2 hours)
      In Ryvaera on a hematite naiad. From westernmost @, D, 2S, D and look around. (breathe water)

    Help the Tinkering Professor with His Honey-Do List [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Antdos
    Additions by: Anonymous, Takphius

    Level: 27
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): City of Medievia, Esacha Fen
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a tinkering professor (30 minutes)
      In Med City Mage Quarter.
    2. to find a saw and an awl and a hammer and an adze and a metal toolbox (1 hour)
      In Esacha Fen:
      a saw, an adze, and an awl: in a metal toolbox on an apprentice in the eastern part of zone.
      a hammer: on a bargeowner in the western part of zone. He appears as "A gypsy husband smiles as he moves over his barge, making minor repairs."
      Note: this is find-original.
    3. to give a saw and an awl and a hammer and an adze and a metal toolbox to a tinkering professor (15 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to give Pixie's Pure Spirits to a tinkering professor (30 minutes)
      Pixie's Pure Spirits can be found in Med. From recall, enter mage, then go all W, search, D.

    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Spirited Heights, Palace of Yldari
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find a gargantual eagle (30 minutes)
      In Spirited Heights. From northern @, go S till 4-way intersection.Then go W, 2N, U, W, U; continue following the path till the W exit, then go allW and all U.

    Help the Young Instructor [Complete]

    Level: 29
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Braneri, Crime Underground, E'urdin Zilartzen
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a young instructor (30 minutes)
      In the Academy of Braneri. From entrance, go 2N, all W, U, E, open door S, S.
    2. to find a book of spells (no limit)
      Loads on Spider in the Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N until you are in "An Antechamber," then N again. Spider loads here (hidden.) Note: this is find-original.
    3. to give a book of spells to a young instructor (30 minutes)
    4. to find 2 of a fragment of femur, some red seaweed, and bits of fungi (no limit)
      fragment of femur: In Dark Escarpment. From entrance to zone, go 6 W, S (hidden), S, 2E. You've just entered a 3x3 area of rooms; there's a fragment of femur in at least two of them. Move from room to room and type "Get all mound" until you have them.
      red seaweed: Loads on Amphritrite in Lattyrna (as well as the nereids). From zone entrance, go all D, 2E, all north to herald, kill herald for the dolphin-shaped key, go N, unlock door, go U then N to Amphritrite.
      bits of fungi: in E'urdin Zilartzen. Loads on a forked fungus darkling. From entrance to zone, go E (until you teleport), then S and E along the carpet until you find this mob. (You'll want to find 2 -- one for the next objective, and one to eat to leave the zone.)
    5. to give 2 of a fragment of femur, some red seaweed, and bits of fungi to a young instructor (30 minutes)

    Help Threzdi with Research [Incomplete]

    Level: 27

    Help Tiatanus Impress the Ladies [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Phu
    Additions by: Sarros
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Tiatanus, the Graceful (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, then go 4E, 2S, 2W, N.
    2. to find 3 of either a zagamite dagger, a dagger of accuracy, the dagger of Venom, the crystal dagger of Enlightening, or a shadowy dagger (3 hours)
      a zagamite dagger: in Dark Escarpment.
      a dagger of accuracy: in Crime Underground.
      the dagger of Venom: in Cliffs of Berkovic.
      the crystal dagger of Enlightening: in Lyryanoth.
      a shadowy dagger: on sludge mephits in the Catacombs.
      Note: this is find-original.
    3. to give 3 of either a zagamite dagger, a dagger of accuracy, the dagger of Venom, the crystal dagger of Enlightening, or a shadowy dagger to Tiatanus, the Graceful (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Help Varanexus Create a Legendary Warrior [Complete]

    Contributed by: Antdos
    Additions by: Takphius
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: hard (challenging AQ medal)
    Locale(s): Goland's Tower, Quinstone's keep, Underground Shafts, Alcordian Battleground
    Total Time: 10 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Calsinc, the caretaker (1 hour)
      In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go N to "Before Goland's Tower." Then go 2E, 4N, 2W, D. Kill a pond dweller for key, U, 2E, 2S, search, D, 2W, S, 2W, 2N. You are given a dragon's tooth.
    2. to find Varanexus (1 hour)
      From Calsinc, go all S, N, 2W, unlock door N, N.
    3. to find a legend's presence and locks from a true warrior and the eyes of an archer (4 hours)
      eyes of an archer: In Quinstone's Keep. From zone entrance (@), go N to the room "The Foyer of the Keep," all E, U, all E, all S, U. Kill Sintarus, captain of the arches, and loot eye from him.
      a legend's presence: and locks from a true warrior: in Underground Shafts on ghost of a legendary warrior. From entrance, go D, all N, all E, 3N, W and look around.

      Note: this is find-original.

    4. to find Varanexus (40 minutes)
      As above.
    5. to give a legend's presence and locks from a true warrior and the eyes of an archer to Varanexus (5 minutes)
      As above.
    6. to find the armor of Halsenar, golden chainmail leggings, and golden chainmail sleeves (3 hours, 30 minutes)
      In Alcord. From entrance, go S and look around for Halsenar, who wanders. His EQ loads as "a forgotten piece of history"; use the keywords "sleeves, leggings, armor" to identify them properly.
    7. to find Varanexus (40 minutes)
      As above.
    8. to give the armor of Halsenar, golden chainmail leggings, and golden chainmail sleeves to Varanexus (5 minutes)
      As above.

    Help Weaponsmith with Sword Study [Complete]

    Contributed by: Afiniti
    Additions by: Ganzuuth
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Vark Outpost
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Detritius, the weaponsmith (30 minutes)
      In Med City. In the Warrior Quarter, 2S, W of the portal.
    2. to find a standard issue vark shortsword, a vark guard's longsword and a black steel bastard sword with the image of a dragon worked into the crosspiece (2 hours)
      In Vark Outpost. Difficult aggro mobs here. The shortswords load on the scouts, and the longswords load on the guards. Then find the guard with the bone key. Search around the northern part of the area; you'll find a search room north which crumbles the key. The commander who loads the bastard sword lies to the doors on west side.
    3. to give a standard issue vark shortsword, a vark guard's longsword and a black steel bastard sword with the image of a dragon worked into the crosspiece to Detritius, the weaponsmith (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Contributed by: Neru, Sulin
    Level: 12, 13
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Animated Chessboard
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find the white king (30 minutes)
      In Animated Chessboard. From @ all N, follow path to Pitchman. Give 100 coins pitchman. U, E, U, E, S, D, all N, all E, all N, all E, all N, 5W, S, E.
    2. to kill the black queen and 2 of a black knight (30 minutes)
      From above, go all S, W to queen, then 2W and 3E to knights.
    3. to find the white king (10 minutes)
      As above.

    Helping A Hero [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Pawana
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Mystical, Vark, Demonforge
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a hero thingy (no limit)
      In Mystical. From recall, go 2E, all S.
    2. to find a small bracelet of braided mithril (1 hour)
      Loads on a Vark arch-magi in Vark Outpost. From @, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever. Then go 2N, 2E, N to Vark arch-magi. Warning: This mob has permanent fireshield and is in a cold room; it is very difficult to solo.
    3. to [hidden] (no limit)
      Find the Demonforge smith.

    Helping a Wounded Warrior [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Ontare
    Level: 27
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Vark Outpost, Crypt Of Vatos
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Toronfyr ()
      In Lyryanoth. From recall, go all W, kill protestors, all W, search, D, N.
    2. to give a blade of pure energy and a dead Amber Blaze fish and the robe of ether to Toronfyr, the guard captain ()
      Blade: In Vark Outpost. From entrance, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever, 2N. Look for the bleached bone key which loads on scout, usually a few east. From above, with key, go all W, all N, 3E, search, N. Sword loads on the sentries.
      Amber blaze: a random result of fishing.
      robe of ether: found in Crypt of Vatos.

    Helping Captain Abnart [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Arayis
    Level: 16
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Medievia, Great Tree
    Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Captain Abnart ()
      In Med City. From recall, S to wharf and look around.
    2. to give a raft to Captain Abnart (30 minutes)
      Have a mage make you one.
    3. to give 3 of a yellow potion and 2 of a swiring potion and a wand of invisibility to Captain Abnart (30 minutes)
      Buy 5 Yellow potions, 2Swirlings, and wand at the Great Tree. From center of tree, go all U, 2W, N.
    4. to find a sailor (10 minutes)
      They are all over the docks.
    5. to find a dockworker (10 minutes)
      They are all over the docks as well.

    Helping Madame Isramala Break the Hex [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Tiego
    Additions by: Elagneros
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Gypsy Camp, Enara, Lyngaeli
    Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Isramala (1 hour)
      In Gypsy Camp. From @ go D, E, 3S, W, S, Search, 2S, all W, 2S.
    2. to find the gypsy Dunossa (1 hour)
      In Enara. From entrance, follow Enara Road W and N; go through scullery and out the back of the kitchen. Enter NPK, go 2N all E and follow path E to Gypsy Village. Dunossa is in the middle northern room.
    3. to find a shimmering eye pendant on a silver chain (2 hours)
      In Lyngaeli's Nightmare. From entrance, go: all N, sleep, N, enter box, 2N, all W, kill grandma for key (amulet of fear protection.) Then go all E, all N, W, hold amulet, D, 2N, kill Helvyra for key (hairpin needle.) Go 2S, U, E, S, hold needle, search. Then go 2E, enter box, 3N, W. Note: zone might load pendants that have a maximum level lower than the player, preventing player fromlooting pendant. This could possibly cause the AQ to fail if a pendant with too low a level is always loaded on zone repop.
    4. to give a shimmering eye pendant on a silver chain to Isramala (30 minutes)
      As above.

      The first 2 items load on Captain Amos Trask on the Pirate Ship. From @ entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, E, E.

    Helping the Hopelessly Lost [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Trystian
    Additions by: Kethric, Jurgen, Renli
    Level: 20, 22
    Difficulty: easy to difficult
    Locale(s): Grove of Verthandi, Rydhordel
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a hopelessly lost adventurer (30 minutes)
      In NE part of Verthandi (wanders.)
    2. to find a woodsman (30 minutes)
      In Rydhordel woods: from northern @ follow path till "A Path Through the Park", go all S till "A Small Clearing in the Wood" and look around.
    3. to give a primitive sextant to a hopelessly lost adventurer (2 hours)
      Loads on top of the astronomy building in Braneri. From zone entrance, go N, W, N, W into the astronomy building. Go all W, U, then E until you are in the room "Beside a Window." Search, then go up.

    Helping the Little Boy Find His Special Marble [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Awnuk
    Additions by: Draykilas, Takphius
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Trellor, Lyngaeli
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a little boy" (1 hour)
      In Trellor.
    2. to find a shiny glass marble (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Lyngaeli's Nightmare. See walkthrough (link not available). The marble loads on Cyhaeck, the freak. Note: this may not be able to be looted. If you get a message that the item's aura is too weak: the item has a 'max level' restriction. For example, if it pops with a max level of 23 and you're level 24, you can't pick it up.
    3. to give a shiny glass marble to a little boy (1 hour)
      As above.

    Helping the Vagrant [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Elagneros
    Additions by: Xallath
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: easy to moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Crystal Lake
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a wandering vagrant (30 minutes)
      In Trellor, W of the fountain.
    2. to find a painted canoe and a staff made of stripped elmwood (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      The painted canoe can be purchased in Trellor. From the west gate, go 6W, N. The staff loads in Crystal Lake on Wandering Damage.
    3. to give a painted canoe and a staff made of stripped elmwood to a wandering vagrant (20 minutes)

    Helping the Wedding Party [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Cipactli, Krieven
    Level: 29, 30
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a lovely water nymph (35 minutes)
      In Dragmire. From @: go W, U, N, D, W, to Tyrnog Way. Then go all N, S, all E, all S, 2E.
    2. to give a ceremonial headdress and 2 of a tarnished wedding band and a beautiful orchid to a lovely water nymph ( )
      headdress: in Tomb on priestess.
      wedding band: in Brookhaven on villagers.
      orchid: in Derah.

      4. In Stornaway.

    Henry's Garden [Complete]

    Contributed by: B C
    Level: 19, 20, 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Graveyard, Gnomenel
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
      In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle," then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
    2. to give a yellow metal garden spade, a sample of rare grass seed, and a burlap bag of compost to Henry, the cathedral gardener (1 hour)
      A yellow metal garden spade: On the gardener in the Mage's Quarter in Medievia. From recall, enter mage, then go 4N, E, N, E, 2 N, 2E.
      A sample of rare grass seed: Loads in Gnomenel in Number 6 Main Street. From zone entrance, go 9E then 2N. Get the key from Gennon Serry in this room. Then unlock drawer, open drawer, and get all drawer.
      A burlap bag of compost: Loads on Oliade Saecyn in Gnomenel. She may be found wandering randomly on Jorenel Street (2E and N of zone entrance) or in her home, Number Four Jorenel Street.
      Note: this objective is solo, find-original, no-summon, no-phase, and no-phase-to.

    Henry's New Career [Complete]

    Additions by: Miraessa
    Level: 19, 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Graveyard
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
      In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle," then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
    2. to give a rusty garden hoe, or a small garden spade, or the sharpest tool in the shed to Henry, the cathedral gardener (2 hours)
      A rusty garden hoe: Loads on an orcish farmer in Dragmire.
      A small garden spade: Loads on Wehndil the gardener in Rydhordel Wood.
      The sharpest tool in the shed: Found in the gardener's shed in Enara, north of the palace. From zone entrance (@), go: N, N, all W, N, W, all N, E, all N, E, E, then N. BLOCKQUOTE>

    Herb for Healer [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Mandroth
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: easy (some NPK)
    Locale(s): Riverton, Riverton Mines
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a priestess of the sun ( )
      In Riverton. From northern entrance, go S, 8 W and look around the temple.
    2. to find the healer ( )
      In Riverton Mines. From the western entrance to Riverton, go 4S, 5E, D, 6N, 2W, S, W.

    Herbs for Victor's Stew [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: PR
    Additions by: Zaphot
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Coliseum
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Brother Victor (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 7E, S.
    2. to give 2 of an exotic-looking neem leaf or 23 of a three leaf clover to Brother Victor (1 hour, 10 minutes)
      Both of these items load in Coliseum (fly from CT 80.) The former load invisible in the broken wagons in the zone (locked, but pickable.) The latter can be picked up off the ground; each weighs 20 lbs, so be sure to have loot mode on.

    Heretic Removal [Complete]

    Additions by: Mospolo, Anonymous
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Tomb of Oblivion
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Cendrelia, high priestess of the tomb (50 minutes)
      In Tomb of Oblivion. To get to the entrance, portal 98, then fly about 7N and 3E. From the zone entrance, go 2D, all W, E, all N. Cendrelia loads here. Note: This is a solo objective.
    2. to kill a heretical priestess (50 minutes)
      From above, go all S, all E, open door E, E, all S, open door E, E, S, search, D.
    3. to find Cendrelia, high priestess of the tomb (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Heucher's Request [Complete]

    Additions by: Mandroth
    Level: 24, 26
    Difficulty: easy (medium to hard without sneak)
    Locale(s): Ruellia, Eldrick's Tomb
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Heucher, an elderly custodian (2 hours)
      In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N, all W, S, W, W, W, W, S, S, S. Heucher is hidden in this area.
    2. to kill 10 of either a large rat, a giant maggot, or a leech (2 hours)
      To get to Eldrick's zone, either enter 7 and fly east and a little north, or fly lighthouse and travel a short distance north. The mobs themselves load randomly throughout the front part of the zone (graveyard area) and are fairly easy kills.

    Hidden Toys for the Children of E'nat'dae [Complete]

    Contributed by: Sulin
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): E'Nat'Dae, Talirond's Travelling Carnival
    Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a lovely teacher (40 minutes)
      In E'nat'dae. From @ go N, W, 9N, W, N.
    2. to find a clicker, a stuffed horse, a stuffed dragon, a tin whistle and a stuffed tiger (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Talirond's Travelling Carnival. To find the zone, go to Derah. From Derah entrance, go 6N, W then type "where carnival". It's a holo outside city zones, which shows up on the survey as "a tall, colorful wheel rises over a hastily erected fence."Inside the carnival, walk around and "play" the different games to win all the prices.
    3. to give a clicker to a young girl (30 minutes)
      In E'Nat'Dae in the same room as the teacher above.
    4. to give a stuffed horse to a playful child (10 minutes)
      Wanders in E'Nat'Dae.
    5. to give a stuffed dragon to a young boy (10 minutes)
      Wanders in E'Nat'Dae.
    6. to give a tin whistle to a little girl (10 minutes)
      From E'Nat'Dae recall, go 3E, S.
    7. to give a stuffed tiger to the little princess, Ita (10 minutes)
      From E'Nat'Dae recall go all N, all U, 4S. Look for "A beautiful child dances happily here, perfectly content."

    Contributed by: Helitus
    Level: 11
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a young boy (45 minutes)
      In Trellor, on Merchant Circle.
    2. to find a room called Post Office of Trellor (15 minutes)
      From recall, 3N, 2W, N.
    3. to find a room called Office of the Duke of Trellor (15 minutes)
      From recall, 2E, 2N, U.
    4. to find a room called Bank of Trellor (15 minutes)
      From recall, 5N, 5W, N.
    5. to find a room called the High Altar (15 minutes)
      From recall, U, 2N, U, 2N, U.
    6. to find a room called Trellor's Donation Room (15 minutes)
      From recall, 3N, 2E, N.
    7. to find a room called Trellor Locker Storage (15 minutes)
      From recall, 5W, 3N, W.

    High Commodities for Sardhara [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Lurline
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Med City, Mystical
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Sardhara, the jeweler (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go N, 2W.
    2. to give a glimmering ruby ring and the Jeweled Rose to Sardhara (6 hours)
      Ruby ring: in Thunderhoume.
      Jeweled rose: in Mynoric Garrison. Note: this objective is not find-original.
    3. to give a sparkling emerald gemstone to Sardhara (no limit)
      Loads on the green dragon in Mystical Forest.

    High Sea's Revenge / High Seas Revenge [Complete]

    Contributed by: Ogrim
    Additions by: Kamma
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: hard (popular NPK zone)
    Locale(s): Mystara, Pirate Ship
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Asterius, Captain of the Mystara (30 minutes)
      From zone entrance (@), go all W to "The Main Deck, Port Side, of the Mystara," then S and U to the Captain's deck. Asterius may be found here.
    2. to kill 5 of the angry pirate, 5 of the drunk pirate, 5 of the pirate and 5 of the midshipman (2 hours, 30 minutes)
      May be found all over the main deck of the Pirate Ship.

    Holy Artifact of Riverton [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Kernighan
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Riverton
    Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the town crier (20 minutes)
      In Med City, S of recall.
    2. to give the Light of the Sun to a guardian of the Sun (3 hours)
      Light of the Sun loads in the Temple of the Sun (NW corner of Riverton) on the Solar Entity. From the altar, unlock door W (key loads on a guardian), open door W, W. This is a tough mob to kill solo, so get help. The guardians also load in this area. Note: this is solo, no-dragon, no-portal, and no-death.

    2. to find a sash of the Creator (3 hours)
      Note: this is not find-original.
    3. to give a sash of the Creator to a priest of Trell (30 minutes)

    Holy Hunting Festival [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Morluis
    Additions by: Ceresir
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: easy (with sneak; solo, no-summon, no-phase)
    Locale(s): Dragmire, Akenuas Glade
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an orc whelp (1 hour)
      In Dragmire, on the main streets.
    2. to find the orcish trapper (20 minutes)
      In Dragmire. From @, go W, U, N, D, 11W, 3S, W.
    3. to find a room called Before Akenuas Glade (10 minutes)
    4. to kill 15 of either a golden bear, a black bear, an angry golden bear, a small fox, or a young golde n bear (30 minutes)
      Located randomly in Akenuas.
    5. to kill 10 of either a moose, a golden stag, or a golden deer (30 minutes)
      In the "lost in the forest" part of Akenuas.

    Honey Lover [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Tophet
    Additions by: Zasildar, Renli
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Akenuas, Hives of the Giants
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a golden bear (1 hour)
      In Akenuas Glade. Follow path to the west.
    2. to give a huge section of honeycomb to a golden bear (1 hour)
      Honeycomb is found in the Hives of the Giants (it's easier if you're invisible).

    Honor Lost Sailors [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Lynxe
    Additions by: Sulin
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor, Gypsy Camp, Med City
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Baskille (1 hour)
      In Trellor. From recall, go all N, W.
    2. to find a dozen long-stemmed roses (1 hour)
      In Gypsy Camp, on a young man who's wearing an engagement ring. From @ go D, E, all S, W, S, W, buy ticket, S, 2W, all N, give ticket gypsy, all W, D.
    3. to find a room called the memorial of sunken ships (1 hour)
      In Med City. From the wilderness southwest of Med City, approach the city from the southwest along the shoreline. The most southwest corner of the city has a @ on the wilderness map, which is the room in question.

    Horneg's Attack [Complete]

    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Labyrinth/Goblin Castle, Spirited Heights/Horneg's Keep
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Goblin King (30 minutes)
      From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all W, all N, E, all S, U. The Goblin King loads here.
    2. to kill 3 of the grem-lin, 3 of the homunculus, 3 of the gargoyle, and 2 of the large grem-lin (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      These load in Horneg's Keep. From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S and start looking around. These four mobs load in the 4 corridors which form a square in this area.

    Humanoid Invasion [Complete]

    Contributed by: Bezolod
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Shadmire, Underground Tunnels
    Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
      See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to kill 20 of a mutated humanoid (1 hour, 15 minutes)
      In Shadmire. From @, go W, then follow path N until you find a down exit. Mutated humanoids load in the five mud pools down here. They are aggro, as are the talisars you have to walk past, so proceed with some caution.
    3. to find room On the River Courrain on the banks of Medievia (15 minutes)
      Go back to Med City. Go out the east gate and walk north along the wall of the city until you reach the river, then go S.
    4. to kill 20 of a mutated humanoid (30 minutes)
      These pop in the above room.
    5. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (15 minutes)
      As above.

    Humbert's Feast [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Yelm
    Additions by: MG
    Level:
    Difficulty:
    Locale(s): Mellorian, Enara, Wilderness
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Humbert, the kitchenmaster ( )
      In Mellorian. From zone entrance (@), go N to the northern hallway, then E, N, U, S to the intersection, then 3W and N to the scullery.
    2. to give 4 of a slimy squid to Humbert, the kitchenmaster (no limit)
      First, go to Enara and get a net from a young gypsy man mob. Then go to a coast in the wilderness, hold the net, and use net until you get 4Squid. (This will take a while.) Then return to Humbert as above.

    Contributed by: Peb
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor, Med City
    Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Guildmaster (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter your current class' guildhall.
    2. to find the defendant (30 minutes)
      In Trellor. From recall, go 2E, S.
    3. to kill 12 of a juror ( )
      Go W from the defendant.
    4. to find the defendant ( )
      As above.

    Hunt Down Escaped Criminals [Complete]

    Level: 19, 21, 23
    Difficulty: medium
    Locale(s): Trellor, Crime Underground
    Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Prison Warden (20 minutes)
      In Trellor. Prison is on the northwest portion of the Serpent Circle.
    2. to kill Chalemvir the Watcher and Dwunmyre, a novice thief (1 hour)
      See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From here:
      Chalemvir: 2N, D, N (he's "An enormous hulk...")
      Dwunmyre: S, W.

    Hunt Exotic Animals [Complete]

    Contributed by: Grezat
    Additions by: Mospolo, Alstron
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Dragmire, Med City, Celestia, E'nat'dae
    Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an exotic animal tamer (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In E'nat'dae. From recall, search and go D. Kill the burly guard (blocker mob) and go N.
    2. to kill a tiny, talking lizard and a lesser spotted baenlyr and a giant blue parrot (3 hours)
      a tiny, talking lizard: Loads in Celestia in the daytime. From zone entrance, go N, all E, all N till west exit, then go 2W, N (hiden exit.)
      a lesser spotted baenlyr: In Med City. From recall, enter mage, go 4E, 2N, W, pick grille S, open grille, S. Mob appears to be perma-fireshielded.
      a giant blue parrot: In Dragmire. From zone entrance, go W, U, N, D, 4W, 4N, 3E, 2N, E, 3N, U, and look around.

    Hunt the Manticore [Complete]

    Level: 26, 27
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Preserve, Berkovic
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a hunter (25 minutes)
      See hunter in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to kill 2 of a manticore (40 minutes)
      In Cliff of Berkovic, in an NPK area. From entrance ("Foot of the Cliff"), go W, W, W, U, E, E, N, N, U. Two manticores usually load here in "A Cavernous Lair."
    3. to find a hunter (35 minutes)
      As above.

    Locale(s): Derah
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:

      In good Derah. From recall, go N, W.
    2. to kill 2 of a ferocious wolf, 4 of a werewolf, and 3 of a werewolf [sic] (1 hour)
      In evil Derah. Kill 4 of the werewolves whith description that starts with "Once the citizen..." and 3With "The werewolf is ...".
    3. to find the innkeeper (45 minutes)
      As above.

      Located randomly on the "ground floor" of Forest of the Alendora.
    2. to kill 6 brown wargs (1 hour)
      These load in Condemned Arena, in the first part of the zone.

    Hunting Bears for Jorme [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Xianra
    Level: 27
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Tharhalas, Hive Of The Giants, Akenuas Glave
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Jorme, the Huntmaster (1 hour)
      In Tharhalas. From zone entrance, go all W, N, 3W, U, 2E, 2N, 2E, N.
    2. to find 6 of a brown bear pelt and a black and gold pelt ()
      Black and gold load in Akenuas on the young bears. From @, go N, 2W, N and look around.
      Brown: load in Hive of the Giants. From @, go E, N, 2E, all U, S, all U,
      E, all D, E and look around. Then go (from last direction), E until N, N, 2U,
      E, 2U, N, all D and look around.
    3. to find Jorme, the Huntmaster (1 hour)
      As above.
    4. to give 6 of a brown bear pelt and a black and gold pelt to Jorme, the Huntmaster (5 minutes)

    Ice Rose for Amacia [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: DC
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Celestia, Castiack
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Lady Amacia, Icy Beauty (40 minutes)
      In Palace Celestia. From entrance, go N, 2E, N until you reach "A Gold and Marble Staircase," then go all U, all N.
    2. to find a perfect white rose, shrouded in ice (no limit)
      Loads on Queen Fiona in Castiack.

    If You Do the Crime... [Needs Detail]

    Level: 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Lyranoth, Crime Underground, Ulhazzen
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Prison Warden (30 minutes)
      In Trellor. From recall, go 3W, 2N, W.
    2. to kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves and the Spider and the criminal mastermind and 10 of an escaped prisoner and 3 of a disguised figure (no limit)
      the Spider: In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N to "The Royal Chamber of the Three Masters." (Be sure you have sense life!) The Spider loads here. Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves:N from the Spider.
      the criminal mastermind: In Lyryanoth. From recall, go 3 S, 3E, N, E (the last two exits are hidden).
      3 of a disguised figure: Two load at a time with the criminal mastermind above.
      10 of an escaped prisoner: in Ulhazzen.

    Difficulty: very hard
    Locale(s): Med Castle, Asnor
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the dwarven dungeon guard (1 hour)

    2. to give a black steel torch, ablaze with bluish flames to the dwarven dungeon guard (3 hours)
      In Asnor Mountains on the Troll Warden. Bring (lots of) help.

    Imported Magic from Haven [Complete]

    Contributed by: Altisa
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Haven for New Adventurers
    Total Time: 1 hour
    Objectives:
    1. to find a bored salesgirl (30 minutes)
      In Med City Mage Quarter in The Shop of the Minor Enchanter. From recall, enter mage. Go W to Street of the Mellow Enchantment, then 4S, W.
    2. to give a rosy-scented potion filled with a thin pink liquid and a milky-white potion filled with multicolor specks and a parchment scroll stained indigo blue and a green scroll made from kelp pulp to a bored salesgirl (30 minutes)
      All can be bought in Haven:

      From zone entrance, go 5N, 2W, N. Buy rosy and milky white here. Then go S, W, N and buy indigo and green scroll.

    Imported Tea for Serving Girl [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Helitus, Shaedehart
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Alps
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the serving girl (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter mage, N, 2W.
    2. to find 5 of a steaming mug of mint tea and 5 of a steaming mug of hot chocolate (2 hours)
      These both load in Alps CPK.
    3. to give 5 of a steaming mug of mint tea and 5 of a steaming mug of hot chocolate to the serving girl (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Contributed by: Kernighan
    Level:
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Riverton, Riverton Mines, Trellor
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:

      See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to find a mine foreman (no limit)
      See Mines in Frequent Pathways.
    3. to find a tavern minstrel (no limit)
      In Heron's Tavern in Trellor. From recall, go 5E, 3N, E, 2S and look around.
    4. to find a mine foreman (no limit)

    Improve the Business of a Gypsy Merchant [Complete]

    Contributed by: Faraday
    Level:
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Enara
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a gypsy merchant (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go E along Market Street and look around.
    2. to find several of Drake's green scales (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Enara. From @, go N, all W, N, W, all N, open door, N, all E, open door, all E, open door, E, S, all E, 2S, open door, all E, search, E.
    3. to give several of Drake's green scales to a gypsy merchant (20 minutes)
      As above.

    In Need of Streamers [Complete]

    Level: 24
    Difficulty: very hard
    Locale(s): Mystara, Ruellia
    Total Time: 6 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a purser (1 hour)
      In Mystara. From the entrance to the zone ("A Wide Cobblestone Street"), go all W until D, then D, N, E. Purser will load in rooms around that area.
    2. to give some festive streamers to a purser (5 hours)
      Festive streamers load in the Village of Ruellia on Heucher. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N, all W, S, W, W, W, W, S, S, S. Heucher is hidden in this area.

    Incense for the Storm in a Teacup [Complete]

    Contributed by: Awnuk
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, El Cantara
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a serving girl (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter mage, W, N, W.
    2. to give a wand of incense to a serving girl (1 hour)
      In El Cantara. Go N, U, N, W (hidden), 4N, 2W, 2N. Loads on fortune teller's assistants.

    Increase Morale in the Mines [Complete]

    Level: 23
    Difficulty: medium
    Locale(s): Riverton, Riverton Mines, Trellor
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find the mayor (no limit)
      See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to find a mine foreman (no limit)
      See Mines in Frequent Pathways.
    3. to find a tavern minstrel (no limit)
      In Trellor in Heron's Tavern. From Trellor recall, go 5E, 3N, E, 2S, U.
    4. to find a mine foreman (no limit)
      Return to the mine as before, but no-dragon, no-summon, no-phase (portalling is ok.) I recommend portalling to CT 70 and then walking south.

    Infiltrate Ulhazzen [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Level: 11, 21
    Difficulty: easy (but tedious)
    Locale(s): Ulhazzen, Med City
    Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a priest (25 minutes)
      In Cleric's quarter of Med City.
    2. to find the ringleader (2 hours)
      In Ulhazzen. From the eastern entrance @ to the zone, go U, 4W to "Center of the Rock Quarry." Note: this is a no-dragon, no-magic objective; you'll have to walk or ride here.

    Ingredients for Mathaelda [Complete]

    Contributed by: Bhalodus
    Level: 17
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Rydhordel, El Cantara
    Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Mathaelda the witch (40 minutes)
      In Rydhordel Woods, from north @, go N, W, S, W, all S, 8W, all S
    2. to give some goat berries to Mathaelda (1 hour,10 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From @, go U, N, W, U, S, W, 2S, U.. The berries load on the ground around here.

    Ingredients for Pizza [Complete]

    Contributed by: Mortalengine
    Additions by: Kirgan
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): New Ashton, Brookhaven
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Gabriel (45 minutes)
      In New Ashton. From @, go 3W, N, W.
    2. to find a round of cheese and a carton of eggs (45 minutes)
      These items can be bought in Brookhaven's "Butter Cross" shop. From @, go N, W.
    3. to give a round of cheese and a carton of eggs to Gabriel (30 minutes)

    Ingredients for Shandril's Resurrection [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Eleazar
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 3 hours, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the small imp (30 minutes)
      In Horneg's Keep. Note: you receive an amulet.
    2. to find Horneg (25 minutes)
    3. to find a pair of eyes and a flask of holy water and a human heart and a lock of golden hair (2 hours)
      a human heart:in evil Derah. After entering evil Derah from entering "A Destroyed House" (in the southwest part of good Derah), go E, N, E, E, N, N, E, U. Get the heart from the corpse of the girl.
      a pair of eyes: in Crime Underground on Chalemvir. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From here, Chalemvir is N, N, D, N (he's "An enormous hulk...").
      A flask of holy water:Loads on a quiet monk in the cathedral. From Med recall, go 11E, all N, all E, N, W/E, U, look around.
      lock of golden hair: in Quinstone on the archers
    4. to give a pair of eyes and a flask of holy water and a human heart and a lock of golden hair to Horneg ( )
      As above.

    Ingredients for the Blood Witch [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Kyars
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Condemned Arena, Akenuas Glade
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a blood witch (40 minutes)
      In Condemned Arena. From zone entrance, go all E, N, 2E, 3S, E, S, E, S, all E,N, 2E (hidden exit), S, E.
    2. to give fangs of a water snake to a blood witch (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      In Akenuas Glade. From @, follow the eastern path until you come to a stream. Mob should be in one of the adjacent rooms.

    Ink for Head Scribe [Complete]

    Contributed by: Antdos
    Level: 18
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Braneri
    Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (30 minutes)
      In the City of Medievia. From recall, go 4W, N, W, N, U, N.
    2. to find 3 of a small container filled with ink (30 minutes)
      In Academy of Braneri. 2 containers load in the building 2N, 2E from the @; at least 1 container loads in the building 2N, 3W from the @.
    3. to give 3 of a small container filled with ink to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Ink for the Innkeeper's Wife [Complete]

    Contributed by: Mortalengine
    Additions by: Pleen
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Riverton, Braneri
    Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an innkeeper's wife (30 minutes)
      In Riverton. From northern @, go 10 S, W.
    2. to give a small container filled with ink to the innkeeper's wife (1 hour, 10 minutes)
      Ink loads in Academy of Braneri. From @, go N, E, N, 2E, S, W, and get container. (You can now recall back to Riverton.)

    Innkeepers' Union Price Hike [Complete]

    Contributed by: Ceresir
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Riverton, Trellor, Mystara
    Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the innkeeper (30 minutes)
      In Riverton. From northern @, go 10S, W.
    2. to find Silor the Innkeeper (20 minutes)
      From recall in Trellor, go 5W, 2N, W.
    3. to find Lady Moira, the Innkeeper (45 minutes)
      From @ in Mystara, go 4W, 2S, U.
    4. to find the innkeeper (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Insecticide [Complete]

    Contributed by: Ogrim
    Additions by: Elagneros
    Level: 25, 27, 29
    Difficulty: easy (if you can find the insects)
    Locale(s): Riverton, Wilderness
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a muddy-faced girl (1 hour)
      In Riverton, at or near recall.
    2. to kill 7 of a swarm of insects (no limit)
      These are found in the wilderness, for example in the area around Pirate Ship and Lyryanoth. The mobs are anti-melee, so a non-caster will need to equip him- or herself with wands. Wands of fireball and oak staves can be found in the magic shop in Riverton.

    Inspire Artistic Talents [Complete]

    Contributed by: Innui
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Arcadia
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a lovely teacher (30 minutes)
      In E'nat'dae. From @, go N, 5W, 2N, D, open grate, N, U, N, W, 5N (to Cherry Blossom Boulevard), 3E, N.
    2. to give 3 of a paintbrush made from a horse's mane to a lovely teacher (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Arcadia on "a lovely horse." From @, go all U, all S, all E, all S, enter whirlpool, W, S, E, E. You should be able to find the mobs here or by following the path east.

    Interdimensionary Diplomacy [Complete]

    Level: 26, 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): NaeraMae, Derah
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Hrendar (1 hour)
      In Naera Mae in a room called "Large Living Quarters." From entrance to zone, go all U, 2S, all E, then S. Other walkthroughs list him as being elsewhere: from entrance to zone, go all U, 2S, 4E, 5S, W through locker door.
    2. to kill 6 of a werewolf (2 hours)
      In evil Derah. To "activate" evil Derah, go D, E, S, S, W into "A Destroyed House." Exit the house and kill the werewolves, who load randomly on the streets of the town. Note: This AQ actually asks you to kill 3 of a werewolf and 3 of a werewolf (go figure.)

    Intoxicate the Drunken [Complete]

    Contributed by: Afiniti and Deschain
    Additions by: Mospolo
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Tharhalas
    Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the drunken pirate (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      In Pirate Ship, located randomly.
    2. to find a mug of frosty spirits and a pint of mountain stout (1 hour, 40 minutes)
      a mug of frosty spirits: In Tharhalas. From zone entrance, go all W (following the path), U, 2E, all N, kill dwarf.
      a pint of mountain stout: In Brookhaven. From the @, go 3N, W, buy pint.
    3. to give a mug of frosty spirits and a pint of mountain stout to the drunk pirate (40 minutes)
      As above.

      In Mystical Forest. From recall, go all N, all W, N, U, 5S, 5E, all N.
    2. to kill Andulain the Archmage (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Thunderhoume.

    Investigate Beaver Problem [Complete]

    Additions by: Cipactli
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Ryvaera
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Delaia, the naiad empress (50 minutes)
      In Ryvaera. From southern entrance to zone, go N, 2W, 2N, 6W, 3D, 3N.
    2. to find Bavanna, the beaver queen (30 minutes)
      From Delaia, go 2S, all E, N, all E, U, S, search, E, all N, all E, S, all W, D, S, W, all N, 2E, all S, E, S, all W, kill guards for key, unlock door, W.
    3. to kill Bavanna, the beaver queen (10 minutes)

    Investigate Rumors [Complete]


    Additions by: Anonymous, PleenLevel: 20
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Rydhordel
    Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the elven ranger (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, E, 2S.
    2. to find a room called At a Large Golden Tree (20 minutes)
      In the Rydhordel Woods, just north of the zone entrance.
    3. to find Hamryck (20 minutes)
      In the Rydhordel Woods. From @, follow the maze path in to the park. (It is a 4x4Square with a simple path curving through it.) You'll end up in a room called "The Beginning of the Hedge Maze." Then go W, 4S, 2E.
    4. to find Wehndil, the gardener (20 minutes)
      From the above, go 2W, 4N, W, N and look around.
    5. to find Hamryck (20 minutes)
      As above.
    6. to kill a wolf with mottled fur (10 minutes)
      Pops in the room with you. Note: this is no-death.

    Investigate Stellar Disturbance [Complete]

    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Academy of Braneri
    Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the High Priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
      See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to find an astronomer (15 minutes)
      In Academy of Braneri in the astronomy building, N, W, N, W from zone entrance.
    3. to find a room called The Observatory (10 minutes).
      Go west in building, up the stairs, then east until in the room "Beside a Window." Search, then go up.
    4. to find a room called The High Altar (15 minutes)
      The altar room in Trellor.
    5. to find a room called the Highest Point of Medievia (20 minutes)
      This is the button-pushing room in Mount Vryce. From Medievia City, fly north along the river (about 15Screens) until you reach the 2nd @ you see. Land then follow the past U, E, S then at a fork go all E then all U.
    6. to find an astronomer (15 minutes)

    Invisibility for a Spy [Complete]

    Level: 18, 20
    Difficulty: medium
    Locale(s): Underground Shafts, Karlisna
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a spy (45 minutes)
      In the Underground Shafts. From zone entrance, go D, N, E and follow path E and S until you find one.
    2. to give a shadow cloak to a spy (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Karlisna, some of the "mage of the king" mobs (located randomly in the streets) load the shadow cloak.

    Invitations for Chyst's Summer Festival [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Anadolyn
    Additions by: Sonjya, Turnbul, Miltonio
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: hard (if single) to easy (if multi)
    Locale(s): Arcadia
    Total Time: 5 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Chyst, the Essence of Summer (1 hour)
      In Arcadia. From @, go all U, N, all E, all S (need levitation), enter whirlpool. Recall and repeat until you reach the part of the zone called "Symbol of Chyst's Arcadia." Go 2D, N, open curtain, E, all S..
    2. to find Jhulud, the Master Musician (40 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From @, follow path north to "The Gate of El Cantara," then go N, W, N.
    3. to find Mister Mastir (40 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From above, go S, 2E, N.
    4. to find Madame Chantra (40 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From above, go S, W, 4N, W, N.
    5. to find Kashad ( )
      In El Cantara. From above, go S, W, N.
    6. to find Zora, Mistress of Dance (40 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From above, go S, 4E, N.
    7. to find Chyst, the Essence of Summer (1 hour)
      As above.

    Invitations for Multi-Trainer Forum [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Rovylern and Bhalodus
    Additions by: Ansfrid
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med Castle, Graveyard, Trellor, Bloodstone
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find the wizard ( )
      See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to give a small, rolled-up note to the Ancient Golden Wyrm ( )
      See Wyrm in Frequent Pathways.
    3. to give a small, rolled-up note to the High Priest of the Church (20 minutes )
      In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
    4. to give a small, rolled-up note to Doligoth, the Master Thief (45 minutes)
      In Trellor. From recall, go D, all E, 2S.
    5. to give a small, rolled-up note to an adventurer (2 hours)
      In Bloodstone. From CT 41, fly all W. Enter zone from the second @ from top. Enter portal.
    6. to find the wizard ( )
      As above.

    Invite the Spiritual Being [Complete]

    Contributed by: Jaztari
    Additions by:Antdos
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Braneri, Aeketh
    Total Time: 3 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an old theology teacher (30 minutes)
      In Braneri. From @, go 2N, E, N, 2E, S, W.
    2. to find Andiron (1 hour)
      In Aeketh. From @, go 2W, N, W, N, W, N, 7W, 2N, 5W, 3S, W.
    3. to find an old theology teacher (30 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to find Andiron (30 minutes)
      As above.
    5. to kill Andiron (10 minutes)

    It's in the Cards [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Mandroth
    Additions by: CB
    Level: 18, 20
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): DeRah, Enara
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Madam Zash (30 minutes)
      In DeRah. From entrance, go 6N, W.
    2. to give a deck of marked cards to Madam Zash (no limit)
      In Enara. From entrance, go 4N, W, N. The cards load on the mob called the tavern customer. Note: This is find-original.
    3. to give a diamond wedding ring, a human heart, a yellow, metal garden spade, and a wooden club to Madam Zash (no limit)
      a diamond wedding ring: Found in the western part of Alcordian Battleground on the hand corpses.
      a human heart: Found on the corpse of a child in evil DeRah, or in Crime Underground.
      a yellow, metal garden spade: Found on the gardener in the northeastern part of Mage Quarter of Med City
      a wooden club: Found on the stage manager in the theater in the Mage Quarter.

    Items for a Jeweler [Complete]

    Additions by: Romsek
    Level: 20, 25
    Difficulty: medium
    Locale(s): Med City, Spirited Heights
    Total Time: 4 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Sardhara, the jeweler (30 minutes)
      In Med City, just northwest of recall.
    2. to give 2 of a small sack of gems to Sardhara, the jeweler (1 hour, 15 minutes)
      In Horneg's Keep. These load on the homunculus. From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S and start looking around. The homunculus seems to usually be in the southernmost of the 4 corridors which form a square in this area.
    3. to give a lopsided pale pink pearl to Sardhara, the jeweler (3 hours)
      In E'urdin. From recall, go 2E, 2N, W, N (some rooms are cramped.) There will be a pickable locked trapdoor up; go U, and the pearl loads here.

    Ivory Rebellion

    Contributed by: Helitus
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locales: Castle Med, Animated Chess Board
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
      See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to kill [all 16 black pieces] (2 hours)
      In Animated Chess Board.

    Janitor's Issues [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Anique, Vaicrin
    Level: 21, 22
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): medievia, graveyard
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find a janitor (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, look around.
    2. to find a gravedigger ()
      In Graveyard.
    3. to find the High Priest of the Church (20 minutes)
      In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
    4. to give a flask of holy water to the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
      These load on priests in the church. NOTE: This is find-original.

    Jar For Sharlana [Complete]

    Contributed by: Vashka
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Enchanted Oak Graveyard, Crime Underground
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Sharlana, the Mortician (30 minutes)
      In The Enchanted Oak Graveyard. From entrance go N, 3W, S, E, D, pick door D, open door D, D, all S, get book (no need to kill Solarious!). Then go N, 3E, all N, W (no magic room), unlock door S, open door S, S.
    2. to give a clear jar to Sharlana, the Mortician (1 hour)
      On Chalemvir in the Crime Underground. From the CU Crossroads go 2N, D, N (he's "An enormous hulk...").

    Jaroslava's Fate [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Maligo
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Esacha Fen, Gypsy Camp
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Jaroslava (1 hour)
      In Esacha Fen, on Jaroslava. From entrance to the fen, go 3N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E, N (hidden exit), E, N, 2E, S, E, S, E, 2S, 2E, 4N, open gate, 2N and look around.
    2. to find an ornamented gypsy tarot deck (1 hour)
      Loads on Madame Isramala in Gypsy Camp.From @, go D, E, 3S, W, search, 3S, all W, all S.Note: this is find-original.
    3. to give an ornamented gypsy tarot deck to Jaroslava (30 minutes)
      As above.
