    Jealous Mages [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Yaire
    Level: 16
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Underground Tunnels
    Total Time: 1 hour
    Objectives:
    1. to find the magician (30 minutes)
      In Underground Tunnels. Go east and south towards Gloomy Staircase. Get into the Beautiful Glass Hallway and go north into the Library Hall.
    2. to kill the magius Shorn Cavar (30 minutes)
      He is one room to the right of the magician, in the Quarters of the Magius.

    Jewel Finder [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Garatjax
    Additions by: Torwin, Arrumar
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Shadowclaw
    Total Time: 3 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Sardhara, the jeweler (40 minutes)
      In Med City.
    2. to give 2 of a red eye gem to Sardhara, the jeweler (40 minutes)
      Red eye gems load on the Red Eye mob in Shadowclaw. From zone entrance to Shadowclaw (@), go S, E, all U, then W and S along that level.
    3. to to give a black diamond and a multi-colored stone and a ld trimmed topaz stone to Sardhara, the jeweler ()
      These load on Pirate Ship, in the chest. Kill Amos for key.
    4. to give the Jeweled Rose to Sardhara, the jeweler ()
      In Mynoric Garrison.

    Jewels for a Noble [Incomplete]

    Level: 29
    Difficulty: hard (CPK)
    Locale(s): Riverton
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a gentleman of Riverton (1 hour)
      In Riverton. From the north entrance to Riverton (@), go S to Topaz Avenue then W. This mob is hidden so be sure you have sense life turned on.
    2. to give a jewel-encrusted egg and a jewel-encrusted helm and a jewel-encrusted staff to a gentleman of Riverton (no limit)
      Jewel-encrusted helm: Loads in Thanos on the High Priest of Thanos.

    Jewels for Silthia [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Haddin, Vashka, Anonymous
    Level: 25, 28, 29
    Difficulty: hard (CPK)
    Locale(s): New Ashton
    Total Time: 10 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Silthia (50 minutes)
      In New Ashton, in the northwest corner. From recall, go D.
    2. to find a ring set with an uncut timmerite and a gorgeous pale blue sapphire (no limit)
      ring: In Dray'mar. Collect 6 pieces of timmerite from the mines, then take them to Drek in marketplace and buy ring.
      sapphire: In Elnissa, in an intricately decorated clock in Elnissa's boudoir (at end of zone.)
    3. to give a ring set with an uncut timmerite and a gorgeous pale blue sapphire to Silthia (20 minutes)

    Jewels for the Wyrm [Complete]

    Level: 22, 24
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med Castle, Trellor
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Ancient Golden Wyrm (1 hour)
      See Wyrm in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to give 10 of either an obsidian gem, an amethyst, a large ruby, a brilliant sapphire, a deep blue lapis lazuli, a fiery green emerald, a large black diamond to the Ancient Golden Wyrm (2 hours)
      The emerald, ruby, sapphire, and lapis lazuli can be bought in the gem shop in Trellor. From Trellor recall, Khal's Jewelry is W, W, W, W, W, N, N, N, N, W.

    Johansva Needs Emergency Supplies [Complete]

    Contributed by: Anonymous
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Medievia City, Gloumewood Farm
    Total Time: 3 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Johansva, the stable keeper (45 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, then 2W, S.
    2. to find Thotus, the hay baler (1 hour)
      In Gloumewood Farm. From entrance, go all E, and look around. Note: he gives you a hay baler's knife.
    3. to give 2 of a bale of hay and a hay baler's knife to Johansva, the stable keeper (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Knife: As above. Bale of hay: In Gloumewood Farm, go all E, all N, U, D, get needle, U, 3S, W until the doors, unl doors, all S, N, E, get bale, W, S, U, all N, get bale.Note: bales are 100 stones each; get it in holding mode.

    Johansva's Whip [Complete]

    Level: 26, 27, 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Gdangus, Dark Escarpment
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find the young Kaaduk (30 minutes)
      Kaaduk is the stable boy in Gdangus. Enter zone, go 2N, 3W.
    2. to give the tunnelmaster's whip to the young Kaaduk (no limit)
      In Dark Escarpment. From entrance to zone, go U, 6W, S (hidden), S, 2E. You've just entered a 3x3 area of rooms; there's a key called "a finger bone" in at least one of them. Move from room to room and type "Get all mound" until you have the finger bone key. Then return to the first room you entered in 3x3 area. From here, go 5W, N, 3W (use the finger bone key to unlock the door.) The tunnelmaster (and whip) load here.
    3. to kill the young Kaaduk (15 minutes)
      As above.

    Joining Clan Thanos [Incomplete]

    Additions by: Nara
    Level: 26, 27
    Difficulty: very hard (CPK)
    Locale(s): Rhaiaden, Thanos
    Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a Talarths clansman (30 minutes)
      In Rhaiaden, just inside CPK area. From entrance to zone, go S, S, E, 3S, 3E, S into CPK area.
    2. to find a room called The Well (1 hour)
      In Thanos.
    3. to find a Talarths clansman (30 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to kill the Lich of Thanos (90 minutes)

    Jolly Roger for Ramarke [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Anonymous
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Fury, Pirate Ship
    Total Time: 2 hours, 55 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour)
      From the entrance to the Fury, go all N/E/W/S (depending on orientation) then go U, U, E, 7S, W, D, E, N, 3W, 2S.
    2. to find a pirate flag (1 hour)
      On Pirate Ship, on the lookout.
    3. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (45 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to give a pirate flag to Ramarke, captain of the Fury (10 minutes)
      As above.

    Kaaduk's Whip [Complete]

    Additions by: Phu
    Level: 26, 27, 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Gdangus, Dark Escarpment
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find the young Kaaduk (30 minutes)
      Kaaduk is the stable boy in Gdangus. Enter zone, open gate N, then go N, W.
    2. to give the tunnelmaster's whip to the young Kaaduk (no limit)
      In Dark Escarpment. From entrance to zone, go U, 6 W, S (hidden), S, 2E. You've just entered a 3x3 area of rooms; there's a key called "a finger bone" in at least one of them. Move from room to room and type "Get all mound" until you have the finger bone key. Then return to the first room you entered in 3x3 area. From here, go 5W, N, 3W (use the finger bone key to unlock the door.) The tunnelmaster (and whip) load here.
    3. to kill the young Kaaduk (15 minutes)
      As above.

    Keep Ar'Dal's Wives Entertained. [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Elagneros
    Level: 24
    Difficulty:
    Locale(s): El Cantara, E'nat'dae
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Ar'Dal, Sharif of El Cantara (40 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From zone entrance, go U, 2N, E, all N, U, 5E, all S, search, U.
    2. to find a long pointy knitting needle, a book of romantic verse, a painted silk ladies' fan portaying the imperial palace, a bunch of grapes, a lily-shaped barette made of mother of pearl, a silk headband embroidered with flowers and a bright pink ribbon (no limit)
      needle: In Lyngaeli. From @, go all N, sleep, N, enter box, N, all W, open door W. Loads on grandma.
      book: In El Cantara. From @, go U, 2N, E, 4N, 2W, N. Loads on Madame Miriam.
      fan: In E'nat'dae. From @, go all N, W, N, open gates, 6N, E, and buy here.
      grapes: In Riverton. From north @, go S, 9W, all S, look around in vineyard (they load randomly on ground.)
      barette: in Celestia. headband: In Dragmire. From @, go W, U, N, D, 6W, S, W and purchase here.
      ribbon: In Rydhordel. From golden tree, look around the E part of hedge maze; loads on Jaymie.

    Keep Chamanara Cool [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Zasildar
    Additions by: Kernighan, Antdos
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): El Cantara
    Total Time:2 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:

      In Cantara. From zone entrance, follow path, all N, U, 7E.
    2. to give a hand-held fan, painted with a demonic image to Chamanara (2 hours)
      In Czareran, on the queen.

    Keeping Peace in Mystical Forest [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Chimpza, Hybri
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: very hard
    Locale(s): Mystical Forest
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the peacemaker (30 minutes)
      In Mystical Forest, at recall.
    2. to [hidden objective] (30 minutes)
      Go to stone village area of Mystical Forest. From southern entrance to zone, follow path north to A Forest Glade, then all E, all N to On the Flatlands, then follow path N and W, then E and N.
    3. to kill 3 of a jungle giant (1 hour, 15 minutes)
      Hard - try using shield room and traps to your advantage.

    Keros' Sister [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Level: 19, 23, 24
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Dark Escarpment
    Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the ghost of Keros (1 hour)
      In Dark Escarpment. From the entrance to the zone ("At the Mouth of a Dark Tunnel"), go 6 W, 2S (hidden exit), 2E. There is a 3 x 3Square of 9 rooms that load "a finger bone" key. Look in the mounds in these rooms for this. Then go all W, N, all W. Unlock the second door with the finger bone key. Go W to the tunnelmaster; get the spiral stone key from the tunnelmaster. (Be sure to remove your light so you don't set the oil on fire!) Then go all E, all N, 2W, N, U. At the top of the stairs is a door to the E that needs the key. Go all E into the group of rooms called "Keros' Workshop." He loads in this set of rooms.
    2. to find Madam Zash (45 minutes)
      In DeRah. From entrance (@), go 6N then W.

    Kerwagen Preparation [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Dagras
    Level:
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Mellorian, Trellor
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Kerwagen, the warden ( )
      Loads in Mellorian. From zone entrance, approximately 4W, 3N, E, 2S.
    2. to give 6 large traps to Kerwagen ( )
      These can be purchased in Trellor's general store.

    Kidnapping of the Empress of E'nat'dae [Complete]

    Contributed by: Veyaza
    Additions by: Jabae
    Additions by: Lilrae
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Crime Underground, E'nat'dae
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (30 minutes)
      In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
    2. to kill a guard commander, the captain of the imperial guard, a burly guard, 7 of a member of the imperial guard, and 3 of an imperial guardsman (1 hour)
      In E'nat'dae:
      guard commander: From recall, go all N, W, S.
      captain of the Imperial Guard: From recall, go 2N, E.
      burly guards: From recall, search, D for one. Then go all N, E for the second.
      member of the Imperial Guards and Imperial guardsman: located randomly in zone.
    3. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Kill Ants [Complete]

    Contributed by: Jadeyn and Zelmix
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Labyrinth Toshi
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a lost adventurer (40 minutes)
      From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Look around here for lost adventurer.
    2. to kill 5 of a giant ant (30 minutes)
      In the Labyrinth nearby.
    3. to find a lost adventurer (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Kill Crows for Scarecrow [Complete]

    Additions by: Timonous, Kirgan
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Riverton, Vark
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find an animated scarecrow (1 hour)
      In Riverton, from "North Entrance to Riverton," go S, all west until "Hall in the Temple of the Sun," then all S until you see the scarecrow.
    2. to kill a large black crow (1 hour)
      In Vark Outpost. From zone entrance, go N and U. Crows load along this path.
    3. to kill 18 of a large black crow (2 hours)
      As above.
    4. to kill a large black crow (30 minutes)
      As above.
    5. to find an animated scarecrow (30 minutes)

    Kill Devious LIzards [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Carisman
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: easy to moderate
    Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Vark Outpost
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Ingnaya, the watchman ( )
      In Lyryanoth. Obtain a pair of lizardfolk claws from a lizardfolk commoner. Next, from Lyryanoth recall, go all E into the castle, then all U (wear lizardfolk claws to climb), then W.
    2. to kill 10 of a kryschik ( )
      In Vark Outpost. From zone entrance, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever, N. Kryschik pop randomly inside.
    3. to find Ingnaya, the watchman ( )
      As above.

    Kill Drunk Dwarves [Complete]

    Contributed by: Thaspian
    Completed by: Kirgan
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Riverton Mines
    Total Time: 1 hour
    Objectives:
    1. to find Bonk the Cleaver (20 minutes)
      In Trellor. From recall, 5E, 3N, E.
    2. to kill 10 of a dwarven miner (40 minutes)
      In the Riverton Mines, found randomly. From entrance to mines, go all S, all E till D, D and look around.

    Kill Ethereal Lord For Mandaleus [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zeela
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lost Civilization, Goland's Tower
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Mandaleus (no limit)
      In Lost Civilization. From zone entrance follow path to "Road in the Forest". From here go 2S, W, 2S, 2E, 2S, E, 3S, W, 2S, E, S, W, 6S, 2W, 2S, 3W, 2N, search and pick lock, W, S, W, N, W, 2S, W, N, U.
    2. to find the Ethereal Lord (no limit)
      In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance go 3N, 2E, 2N, search and pick trapdoor, D, 4W, S, W. Look around here and north of here for Calsinc, kill him for key to get to Varanexus. He is S, 2W, and N of last direction. Kill him for key to get to Ethereal Lord. From Varanexus, go S, 2E, all N, 2W, and unlock portal. Ethereal Lord is 2N, 2E, N, W, N, 2W, 2N, E, and 2N from here.
    3. to kill the Ethereal Lord (no limit)
      As above.

    Kill Evil Spirits for Marigeld [Complete]

    Contributed by: Unithrar
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Wytherwind,
    Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the ghost of Marigeld (40 minutes)
      In Wytherwind. From @, go 3W, N, 2W, 3S, U, 2N, all W, S, U, N, pick west, W, S.
    2. to kill Antygon, the Master Enchanter and the Silver Serpent (3 hours)
      To get to Antygon from Marigeld go: N, E, S, D, N, all E, all S, all W, S, U, S, E, U, E, N, 2W, N, W, N, 2W, S, D. The Silver Serpent is also located in Wytherwind. From @, go 3W, N, 2W, 3S, U, N, 2E, all S (including a hidden S exit), W, all U (hidden U exit), N.

    Kill Evil Zash [Complete]

    Completed by: Lyesainer
    Level: 22, 26
    Difficulty: moderately easy to hard (if you don't have invisible or sneak) (solo)
    Locale(s): Derah and evil Derah
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Madam Zash (1 hour)
      In DeRah. From entrance (@), go 6N then W.
    2. to kill (evil) Madam Zash (2 hours)
      In Evil Derah. From above, go: N, 5W, S, W (entering evil Derah), E, N, 4E, S. Note: It must be the Zash in evil Derah. Killing the (easier) Zash in good Derah won't satisfy the AQ.

    Kill Fire Demon [Complete]

    Level: 24, 26
    Difficulty: medium (the time limit is challenging)
    Locale(s): New Ashton
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Quota the Meditator (1 hour)
      In New Ashton. From "South Gate of New Ashton," go all N to "North Gate of City Hall Square and Town Line," then all W, N, U.
    2. to kill the Fire Demon (2 hours)
      In New Ashton CPK. Search for a draug with the Gate key, and kill him or steal it. From New Ashton recall, go D, S, all E until you see a locked exit north. Unlock gate, N, then follow path. You'll have to kill Ro to get by. After him, go up and look around: the demon will be hidden.

    Kill Fish for Grumpy Man [Complete]

    Additions by: Xalinax, Elagneros
    Level:
    Difficulty: medium (the time limit is challenging)
    Locale(s): Crystal Lake
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a grumpy old man (1 hour)
      In Crystal Lake. From @, go N, all E.
    2. to kill 40 of either an enlarged guppy, an immense minnow, a lovely, giant angelfish, a long, lanky cottonmouth, a grotesque mudpuppy, a daring dragonfly, a boldly striped tigerfish, a puffed-up blowfish, a sharp swordfish, or a long freshwater eel (2 hours)
      These are all located in Crystal Lake.

    Kill Gasherbrum [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Level: 25, 28, 29
    Difficulty: hard (NPK, popular zone)
    Locale(s): Warrens
    Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a burrow wizard (30 minutes)
      Just inside the zone, in virtually any direction.
    2. to find the Moshata (45 minutes)
      From zone entrance (@), go 6E, D, S, 5W, N, W, 3 D, N, 3W, 2 S, D, E, 2S, 2W, D, 2N, D, 2E, 3S.
    3. to kill Gasherbrum (40 minutes)
      Go a few rooms north and west of where the Moshata is. Gasherbrum is hidden.
    4. to find the Moshata (45 minutes)
      As above.

    Kill Githalios [Complete]

    Level: 19
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Alendora, Githyanki
    Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an elven scout (25 minutes)
      Just inside northern entrance of Forest of the Alendora. From zone entrance (@), go all S then all E. Look around in this area for the elven scout (be sure you have sense life on.)
    2. to find an elite guard (30 minutes)
      In Githyanki. From entrance to zone (@), go all N, search, all D, then all N until you see the 2 guards.
    3. to kill 2 of an elite guard (10 minutes)
    4. to kill Githalios the High Lord (1 hour)
      After killing the guards, go all N, E, search, U, all S, all W, all N, all E, then N into portal. Then go all U. Kill the princess and get the key. Then go down, N (to "Before a Magic Portal"), all W, all S, E, E. Unlock the northern door, go N, N, N, U, U. Githalios loads here.
    5. to find an elven scout (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Locale(s): Thanos, Alcord

    2. to kill 8 of a roaming soul ( )
      In Alcordian Battleground.

    Kill Pests for Hasanya [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Bhalodus
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Hasanya (40 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From @, go U, 2N, E, all N till "The Avenue of Symmetry, an Intersection." Then go 2W, N to "Hasanya's Bakery."
    2. to kill 3 of a nomad dove and 4 of a goldfinch (40 minutes)
      Look for rooms named "An Elevated Garden."

    Kill Pests in Fire Giants' Keep [Complete]

    Contributed by: L
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: hard (CPK)
    Locale(s): Trellor, Fire Giants Keep
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a congenial bard in Trellor (30 minutes)
      In Trellor, south of recall, on Merchant Circle.
    2. to Kill 2 meazels, 2 giant two-headed meazels, 2 firenewts, and 2Wemics (1 hour 30 minutes)
      In CPK in Fire Giants' Keep. From entrance to zone, go U, all S, E, all S, E (yes for CPK), and look around. Some of these mobs are hidden.

    Kill Pickpocket for Citizen [Complete]

    Level: 19
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Trellor
    Total Time: 1 hour, 5 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a citizen of Trellor (20 minutes)
      On the main streets of Trellor, located randomly.
    2. to kill an accomplished pickpocket (30 minutes)
      On the main streets of Trellor, located randomly. Be sure you have sense life on.
    3. to find the Trellor Cityguard (15 minutes)
      On the main streets of Trellor, located randomly.

    Kill Quasimodo for Beggar [Incomplete]

    Level: easy
    Difficulty:
    Locale(s): Graveyard
    Total Time:
    Objectives:

    1. Quasimodo is found at the top of the cathedral's bell tower. From the Cathedral Foyer (NE corner of the Graveyard), go W, U, W, then all U.

    Kill Queen Toshi for Shen Lung [Complete]

    Completed by: Karekano
    Level: 25, 26
    Difficulty: very hard
    Locale(s): Toshi
    Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Shen Lung (1 hour)
      In Toshi, in the Underground Lake area. From south entrance, go all N, E till N, all N, all D, all N, all E, W, 2D, 2N, U.
    2. to kill Queen Toshi (1 hour, 25 minutes)
      Queen Toshi is in the Ant Farm part of zone. From Shen Lung, follow path out of lair to the Underground Lake. Then go all W, all S, all U, all S, all E, all D, all E then follow the path to Queen Toshi.

    Kill Rats for Poor Lady [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Additions by: Miltonio, CP
    Level: 23, 25
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Lost Civilization
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the poor woman (30 minutes)
      In Lost Civ in a room called "A Crumbling House." From zone entrance, follow the trail around (the first 12 rooms or so curve around but no branches.) At the first intersection ("Road in the Forest") go 2S, W, 2S, 2E, 2S, E, 3S, W, 2S, E, S, W, all S.
    2. to kill 15 of a rat from the pack (1 hour)
      From this room, search. Then go S, search, E, S, 2E, 2S.

    Kill Riverton Foremen [Complete]

    Level: 21
    Difficulty: very hard
    Locale(s): Riverton
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the mayor (20 minutes)
      See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to give 3 of a chunk of freshly mined crystal to the mayor. (40 minutes)
      Mine foremen in Riverton Mines carry the crystal. Enter mines by going S from Western Entrance to Riverton (you may need to pick the lock to the mine), follow the tunnel, then go down one level. Lots of foremen load at random; they are aggressive mobs.
    3. to give an amulet of the Sun to the mayor (1 hour)
      On one of the priests in the Temple of the Sun in the northwest corner of Riverton. It should be visible on the mob when it loads. (This is a very tough mob to kill without help.)

    Kill Soldiers for Poor Woman [Complete]

    Level: 24
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lost Civ
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the poor woman (30 minutes)
      In Lost Civ in a room called "A Crumbling House." From zone entrance, follow the trail around (the first 12 rooms or so curve around but no branches.) At the first intersection ("Road in the Forest") go 2S, W, 2S, 2E, 2S, E, 3S, W, 2S, E, S, W, all S.
    2. to kill 2 of the guardian and 6 of the deformed figure (45 minutes)
      Both these mobs load in the streets outside. The guardians are relatively tough; the deformed figures not as bad.
    3. to find the poor woman (no limit)
      As above.
    4. to give a locket made from obsidian to the poor woman (no limit)
      From the poor woman, go all N, E, N, W, 2N, E, 2N, W, S. Get locket corpse. Then reverse your path back to the woman.

    Kill Spider Queen [Complete]

    Level: 16
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Underground Shafts
    Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Kayla, the head waitress (25 minutes)
      In Med City's Ye Daemon's Forge pub. From Med recall, enter warrior, then 4E, 2S, W, N and look around.
    2. to find a decrepit old adventurer (20 minutes)
      At the entrance to the Underground Shafts.
    3. to kill the Spider Queen (25 minutes)
      In the Underground Shafts. From entrance, go D, then 5 N, all E, N, U, W, N.

    Kill Ten Baenlyrs [Complete]

    Contributed by: Kernighan and Antdos
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Wilderness
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the elven ranger (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go E, 2S.
    2. to kill 10 of a baenlyr (1 hour)
      Try near CT 54.
    3. to find the elven ranger (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Kill the Dwarves! [Needs Detail]

    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Goblin Castle, Thunderhoume
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Goblin King (30 minutes)
      From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all W, all N, E, all S, U. The Goblin King loads here.
    2. to kill 2 of a dwarf and 2 of a shabby dwarf and 2 of a Dwarven sentry and 2 of a Dwarven cleric (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Thunderhoume.

    Kill the Fairy Queen for the Goblin King [Complete]

    Level: 17
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Labyrinth/Goblin Castle, Preserve
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Goblin King (20 minutes)
      From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all W, all N, E, all S, U. The Goblin King loads here.
    2. to find the Fairy Queen (50 minutes)
      In the Preserve. From zone entrance (@), go: 3W, N, E, N, 3W, S, W, S, E, search, S, D, all E (you will have to ethereal through a door.) Kill the Consort for his key. Unlock the door to the E then go E. The Fairy Queen loads here.
    3. to kill the Fairy Queen (20 minutes)
    4. to find the Goblin King (50 minutes)
      As above.

    Kill the Fungus for the Fisherman's Wife [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Railker
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Crystal Lake
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a disgruntled fisherman's wife ( )
      In the Campgrounds (NE part) of Crystal Lake. Note: she is aggro, but don't kill her -- you need her for step 3.
    2. to kill 4 of a foot fungus ( )
      Located around the edge of the lake. They appear as "Some green mold froths out of a large foot imprint on the ground."
    3. to find a disgruntled fisherman's wife ( )
      As above.

    Kill the Goblin King for the Fairy Queen [Complete]

    Contributed by: Kirgan
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: easy to moderate
    Locale(s): Labyrinth/Goblin Castle, Preserve
    Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Fairy Queen (20 minutes)
      In the Preserve. From zone entrance (@), go: 3W, N, E, N, 3W, S, W, S, E, search, S, D, all E (you will have to ethereal through a door.) Kill the Consort for his key. Unlock the door to the E then go E. The Fairy Queen loads here.
    2. to find the Goblin King (50 minutes)
      From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all W, all N, E, all S, U. The Goblin King loads here.
    3. to kill the Goblin King (20 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to find the Fairy Queen (40 minutes)
      As above.

    Kill the Goblins [Complete]

    Contributed by: JJC, Jadeyn
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Thunderhoume, Goblin Castle
    Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a dwarven sentry (45 minutes)
      In Thunderhoume. From entrance, go N and follow the path. At a 3-way exit, wander around until you find the sentry.
    2. to kill 2 of a hobgoblin, 2 of a goblin, 2 of a goblin [evil aligned], a Goblin King and 2 of a mountain goblin (45 minutes)
      From entrance to the Goblin Castle (The Goblin Castle Gates) you can find each one of these as follows:
      Goblin: go all W, all N, U, all E, U and look around.
      Hobgoblin: go all W, all N, U, and look around.
      Mountain Goblin: go 5W, 3S, W and look around. Goblin King and goblin (evil aligned): go all W, all N, E, all S, open door, S, U.

    Kill the Hostages of Vonliege [Complete]

    Contributed by: Krevitch
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Crime Underground
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the criminal mastermind (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      In Lyryanoth. From recall, go 3E, 2S (hidden), E.
    2. to kill Elthmara, Baron's Daughter and to kill Melhoran, Son of the Baron (40 minutes)
      In Crime Underground. From entrance: E, open trapdoor, 2D, pick wall, open wall, E, S, kill thief, get key corpse, unlock grating, open grating, D, 2W, N, kill Dorlion, get key corpse, 2N. The cage north is Elthmara, the cage west is Melhoran.
    3. to kill 3 of a thief and to kill 3 of a thief (10 minutes)
      These pop in the room with you, so be sanc'd. Conversely, you can flee out, go outside zone to tick up, and take them out one at a time (or find other thieves, but they have to be a thief, not a novice).
    4. to find the room named On the Porch of an Old House (10 minutes)
      This is the first room of the zone. Just go to the entrance and you're done.

    Kill the Keeper of the Preserve [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Additions by: Pleen
    Level: 22, 23, 26
    Difficulty: moderately easy
    Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Preserve
    Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the village market owner (25 minutes)
      In the Forbidden Forest. From the zone entrance (@), go 2E, 2 N, W.
    2. to find the Keeper (25 minutes)
      In the Preserve. From zone entrance ("The Entrance to the Preserve"), go W, W, N, E, N, W, W, W, W, W, W, N, D, E, E, N, E, S.
    3. to kill the Keeper (10 minutes)
      Note: he summons 5Wolves to help.
    4. to find the village market owner (15 minutes)

    Kill the Lookouts [Complete]

    Additions by: Randalf
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Mellorian Citadel
    Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a pirate invader (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Mellorian Citadel, on the first level, right after you have "activated" the zone. Do this as described in the Mellorian walkthroughs (see New Atlantis (link not available) for a good one.) After doing this, go down to the first level and look for a pirate invader.
    2. kill 15 of either a Citadel soldier, a tower sentry, one of the Baron's elite, a Mellorian bowman (50 minutes)
      Wait for the Citadel to reset, or quickly kill these mobs before the pirates kill them all.
      Note: the sleeping Citadel soldiers don't count.

    Contributed by: Anonymous
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Lost Civilization
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the poor woman (30 minutes)
      In Lost Civ in a room called "A Crumbling House." From zone entrance, follow the trail around (the first 12 rooms or so curve around but no branches.) At the first intersection ("Road in the Forest") go 2S, W, 2S, 2E, 2S, E, 3S, W, 2S, E, S, W, all S.
    2. to kill 7 of a rat from the pack (1 hour)
      From this room, search. Then go S, search, E, S, 2E, S, S.
    3. to find the poor woman (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Contributed by: Isolde
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Underground Shafts
    Total Time: 1 hour
    Objectives:
    1. to find an imp guard (30 minutes)
      In Underground Shafts. From @: D, N, 2W, all N, W.
    2. to kill the spider queen (30 minutes)
      From guard: E, all S, 2E, 4N, all E, N, W, U, W, N. Note: She is fireshielded.

    Kill the Vhartogs [Complete]

    Contributed by: Faelicya
    Additions by: Kernighan
    Level: 26, 27
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Brookhaven
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Dramous, the Mayor of Brookhaven (30 minutes)
      In Brookhaven. From recall, all W, E, 2N, W, kill messenger and loot key. Then recall, E, unlock door S, open door S, S, U, drop key, all E.
    2. to kill 12 of either a snarling vhartog, an armored vhartog, or a bloodthirsty vhartog (2 hours)
      In Brookhaven NPK. From recall, go 2N, pick gate, open gate, N, 2W, N and look around.
    3. to find Dramous, the Mayor of Brookhaven (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Kill the Wombats [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Magtheridon
    Level: 16, 17
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med Graveyard, Wilderness
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
      In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
    2. [hidden objective] to kill 10 [or 11] wombats (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Found in the Wilderness, located randomly.
    3. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the idiot (1 hour)
      Found in Dragmire Stronghold. From "At the Checkpoint," go 5W, all N and look around.
    2. to kill a thing (2 hours)

    Kill Troll King [Complete]

    Additions by: Tellahane, Aiden, Phu
    Level: 27, 28, 29
    Difficulty: moderate to hard
    Locale(s): Asnor
    Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a grumpy old man (2 hours)
      In Asnor. From southern zone entrance, go N, U, 4N, U, N, 3W.
    2. to kill Garlik (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      From southern entrance, go U, 2N, all E to Garlik.

    Kill Vanlarra Ghouls for Citizen [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Level: 26, 27, 28
    Difficulty: hard (CPK)
    Locale(s): Vanlarra
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a haggard citizen (30 minutes)
      In Vanlarra, in the Shrine of Love. This mob appears as "A suspicious looking citizen glances about nervously."
    2. to kill 4 of a withered ghoul (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Vanlarra, hidden under the Tower. From western entrance to Vanlarra (@), go 6E, N, search, D, S. The four ghouls are W, E, S then W, and S then E of this room.

    Kill Vanlarra Mages [Incomplete]

    Additions by: Milekan
    Level:
    Difficulty:
    Locale(s): Vanlarra
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find a failed tower applicant ( )
      In Vanlarra. From western entrance to zone, go all E until you see one.
    2. to kill 5 of a high mage of Vanlarra and 5 of a Vanlarra apprentice and 5 of a journeyman mage (30 minutes)
      In the tower part of Vanlarra. From the above, continue E into the tower and look around.

    Kill Vonliege for Viper [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Talein, Kernighan
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: medium
    Locale(s): Crime Underground
    Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Nephalis, the Viper (2 hours)
      See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. Be sure you have "sense life." From here: go 3S.
    2. kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (1 hour)
      Go all N, then 3W, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
    3. to find a dagger of accuracy ( )
      On Vonliege's corpse.
    4. to give a dagger of accuracy to Nephalis, the Viper (55 minutes)
      As above.
    5. to kill 4 of a thief and Nephalis, the Viper (30 minutes)
      The thieves can be found randomly in the zone.

    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): New Genesia
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes

    3. to find a local townswoman (30 minutes)

    Kill Werewolves [Incomplete]

    Level: 24
    Difficulty: somewhat difficult
    Locale(s): Derah
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the mayor (30 minutes)
      From entrance into Derah, go all N until "The Towne Fountain," then all W until "The Business Square," then N, open door west, W, U.
    2. to kill 8 of a werewolf (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      To "activate" evil Derah, go D, E, 2S, W into "A Destroyed House." Exit the house and kill the werewolves, who load randomly on the streets of the town.

    Killing Old Ghosts [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Level: 22,23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): New Ashton, Med City
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the town crier (33 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go S.
    2. to kill the undead Town Crier of Ashton (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In New Ashton. Search for a boy with a pump handle. Kill for the handle (key). From New Ashton recall, then go S, D, 3E, 4S, W, S, E, search, S, search, 2D, E, N.

    Knight of Heart's Rest [Complete]

    Updated by: Rarazona
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Vanlarra
    Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a knight of Heart's path (30 minutes)
      In Vanlarra. From the eastern entrance, go 3W, S (hidden exit in room called "Trust Street"), E, S.
    2. to find a room called "A Sparring Ring" (15 minutes)
      From the above room, go 4W, N.
    3. to kill 4 of a haggard citizen (15 minutes)
      These load randomly in the City streets. (Four pop in the Chapel with you, but the room is no-violence!)
    4. to find a knight of Heart's path (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Knight's Roses[Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Dagz
    Level: 28, 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Verigaard Keep, Gypsy Camp, Bloodstone, Braneri
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a Salirian knight (2 hours, 30 minutes)
      In Verigaard Keep. From zone entrance, go all N, then wander E.
    2. to give a perfect white rose, shrouded in ice to a Salirian Knight (no limit)
      Loads on Queen Fiona in Castiack.
    3. to give a silky, black rose to a Salirian knight (no limit)
      Loads on Death Knight in Bloodstone.
    4. to give a dozen long-stemmed yellow roses to a Salirian Knight (no limit)
      In the Gypsy Camp. From entrance, follow the path until you reach the ticket vendor. Buy a ticket to enter the carnival. These load on a young man in the tunnel of love.
    5. to give a beautiful, lonely rose to Salirian Knight ()
      In Academy of Braneri. From entrance, go N, W, 4N, W, S.

    Kregora Needs Protection From Evil Eyes [Complete]

    Contributed by: Velsara
    Additions by: Antdos, Infinian
    Level: 23, 24
    Difficulty: Hard
    Locale(s): Med Graveyard, Nightmare, Shadowclaw
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
      In Med Graveyard, Cathedral is in NE corner, go N until "the cross aisle," then 3W, open door if needed, N.
    2. to find Kregora, High Priest of Shadowclaw (45 minutes)
      In Shadowclaw. From zone entrance, go E, all U, W, all S, search and go S.
    3. to find a shimmering eye pendant on a silver chain (1 hour)
      In Lyngaeli's Nightmare. From entrance, go: all N, sleep, N, enter box, 2N, all W, kill grandma for key (amulet of fear protection.) Then go all E, all N, W, hold amulet, D, 2N, kill Helvyra for key (hairpin needle.) Go 2S, U, E, S, hold needle, search. Then go 2E, enter box, 3N, W. Kill Madam Elayniel for eye pendant.PK yourself or finish the zone.
    4. to give a shimmering eye pendant on a silver chain to Kregora, High Priest of Shadowclaw (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Kregora the Ambitious [Complete]

    Level: 29
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Shadowclaw
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Kregora, High Priest of Shadowclaw (1 hour)
      On entry to the zone ("Undergate"), go E, all U, and all S. Search and go S one more time if necessary.
    2. to kill Shadowclaw and Hamentor the Ageless (1 hour)
      From Kregora, go 3N, E, search, N, 2U.
    3. to find Kregora, High Priest of Shadowclaw (30 minutes)
      When you return, the AQ will be completed, although then 8 soldiers will pop and attack, along with Kregora.

    Krista's Teddy Bear [Complete]

    Additions by: Vashka, Ghulardi
    Level: 23, 24, 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Wytherwind, Dragmire, Crime Underground, Forbidden Forest, Med City, Braneri
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Krista (1 hour)
      In Wytherwind. From zone entrance, go all S, 3W, N, 2W, 3S, U, 2N, 3W, N.
    2. to give a pair of eyes, a set of preacher's robes, a wooden needle, and a fluffy towel to Krista (4 hours)
      a pair of eyes: Found in Crime Underground. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From here, Chalemvir is N, N, D, N (he's "An enormous hulk...").
      a set of preacher's robes: Found on the preacher at the altar in Academy of Braneri: all N, then all U, then all N from zone entrance.
      a wooden needle: Found underneath Med City. From the northern @ to Med City ("On the River Courrain, on the Banks of Medievia"), go 4S, E, S, 2W, 4S, 2W, 3S, E and follow path until you get to the room "The Secret Prison." Then search, U, open crate, E, and look around. . The mob with the large leather bracer, which has 5Wooden needles in it, loads here.
      a fluffy towel: Can be purchased from Yarla, the orcish tailor in Dragmire. From @, go W, U, N, D, 8W, S, W.

    Ladle for Dipwaun [Complete]

    Contributed by: Yandyr
    Additions by: Aiizaman
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Quinstone, Enara
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Dipwaun (1 hour)
      In Quinstone. From zone entrance, go N, all E, 2U, all E, N, all E, all S.
    2. to give a heavy steel ladle to Dipwaun (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      Loads on the cook in Enara. From zone entrance, go N, all W, N, W, all N, open door, all N to cook.

    Lassili's Revenge [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Thaspian
    Additions by:Elyria
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Sceptrum, Seanstrean Reef
    Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Lassili ( )
      In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 11W, N.
    2. to find 3 of a poisonous thorn and a wilted black rose (3 hours)
      rose: loads in Sceptrum Ishachi. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror. From there, go all D and all N (there is a phantom exit to walk through) and kill Welsh for key. From Welsh, go S, D, U, all N, and search well. Get key then go E, unlock/open door, E, U, unlock/open trapdoor, U and kill Amelia for her key. From Amelia go all D, W, N, W, unlock/open door, W. To get into the Emperor's tower you have to "talk mistress magnum malum". From the room you are transferred to, the Emperor is all U. Kill him and loot the rose.

      thorn: loads in Reef on man-traps scattered throughout zone. While walking to entrance of zone, don't provoke mobs.

    3. to find a young lady (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From southeasternmost entrance to Med City (@), look around.
    4. to give a wilted black rose to a young lady (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Laundry Help for Soapy Soldier [Complete]

    Additions by: Mospolo
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate to hard (if solo in Sceptrum)
    Locale(s): Shadowclaw
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a soapy soldier of Shadowclaw (30 minutes)
      In Shadowclaw. From @, E, 2U, 2W.
    2. to find a large bar of soap and a wet, soapy dishrag and a bucket of water and a wire scrub brush (2 hours)
      a large bar of soap: This loads in Braneri in a crate in a room called "Crates of Dry Goods." From zone entrance, go all N to "A Small Well," then N, 2W, D, N, W, S.
      a wet, soapy dishrag: in Enara. From entrance, go N, all W, N, W, all N to the Scullery. Two scullery maids carry dishrags in their inventory ("trash.")
      a bucket of water: in the Fury. "A young girl disguised as a deckhand" and "a young deckhand" sometimes load with this object, on the Main Deck level.
      a wire scrub brush: in Sceptrum on a village boy. From entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, go all D, all N to "An Intersection Bathed in Crimson," then W and look around.
    3. to give a large bar of soap and a wet, soapy dishrag and a bucket of water and a wire scrub brush to a soapy soldier of Shadowclaw (30 minutes)

    Leading the Blind [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Barvyon
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Wittermark
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Horak (1 hour)
      In Wittermark. From entrance, go 2W, S, W, S, 4W, N, 5W to a dead end. Then go N (hidden exit), 2W, S, W, 2N, W, N, 2E, N and look around.
    2. to give a brass sextant to Horak (2 hours)
      The brass sextant loads on the Navigator in Pirate Ship. From the entrance to the zone (@), go E, 4N, E, U, S, 2E, search, D, E, S. Kill the navigator (a level 20+ warrior.)

    Leaky Ship [Complete]

    Contributed by: Buey
    Level: 27
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Mystara, Dark Escarpment, Derah (good)
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the ship's carpenter (30 minutes)
      On the Mighty Cutter Mystara. From the zone entrance (@), go all W onto the ship until D, then all D, all S, W, all N.
    2. to give a rotting support timber and a nail to the ship's carpenter (2 hours)
      Nail loads in Derah, on the village carpenter. Rotting support timber loads in the Sealed Caves on beetles.

    Leather-Bound Books for Gremmon [Complete]

    Contributed by: Melidia
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Medievia, The Academy Of Braneri, The Forest Of Alendora, Quinstone Keep
    Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (30 minutes)
      In Medievia City. From recall, go 4W, N, W, N, U, N.
    2. to find Werni, the librarian (45 minutes)
      In Quinstone Keep, from entrance, N, 2E, 2U, 2E, 3N, W, S, W. Note: he gives you a heavy, leather bound book.
    3. to give a heavy, leather bound book to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (15 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to find a very bad elven minstrel (30 minutes)
      In Forest of the Alendora. From the western entrance to Forest of the Alendora, go S, S, E, then all S until you see him.Note: he gives you a leather-bound song book.
    5. to give a leather-bound song book to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (15 minutes)
      As above.
    6. to give a well-bound book to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (45 minutes)
      In Braneri. From entrance, go 8N, all W (two doors are closed, one is locked, have to pick it), N, W and find a well-bound book on the floor.

    Leaves for the Forest Giant [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Milekan, Dunar
    Additions by: Grimrow
    Level: 28
    Difficulty:
    Locale(s): Horneg's
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a gneiss (1 hour)
      In Horneg's Keep. From northern entrance to Spirited Heights: go 4S, W, 2N, U, then follow the path. Once in NPK, go S, open stone, D, N.
    2. to give 4 of a small stone leaf to a gneiss (1 hour)
      Loads in Sealed Caves.

    Leaving New Ashton [Complete]

    Contributed by: Mandroth
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): New Ashton
    Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an Ashtonian child (30 minutes)
      In New Ashton, wandering about the City streets just N of zone entrance.
    2. to find a room called A Miniature Stable (15 minutes)
      On the western side of town. From the southern entrance (@), go 5 W, 2N, E.
    3. to find 5 of a chicken wing (16 minutes)
      From above, go W, 2N, 2E, S, and "buy wing."
    4. to find a room called A Miniature Stable (15 minutes)
      From above, go N, 2W, 2S, E.
    5. to give 5 of a chicken wing to an Ashtonian Woman (4 minutes)
      She pops in this room. Just "give wing woman" 5 times.

    Leg for Deshiavani [Complete]

    Contributed by: Leiya
    Additions by: Kirgan
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Pirate Ship
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Deshiavani, the Unforgiven (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, then go 4W, 2N, W, U.
    2. to give a pegleg to Deshiavani, the Unforgiven (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Pirate Ship. Loads on a couple of pirates. (Hint : make sure you get the “A hazy blue aura joins you to a pegleg.” Because this is a common item looted, players will loot and drop the peg legs, which will be picked up by other mobs -- but then they will not be original any more.)

    Legs for a Mermaid [Complete]

    Contributed by: Liadhan
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Lattyrna, Braneri, Goblin Castle
    Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a mermaid (30 minutes)
      In Lattyrna, outside of the castle. From zone entrance, 3D, 2E, 3N (inside the great gates of Lattyrna), then go east or west along Ivory Road and its intersections looking for a mermaid (usually hidden.)
    2. to find a crazy alchemist (40 minutes)
      In Braneri. From zone entrance, N, E, N, open door E, 3E, U, W. The alchemist's library is north. Note: you receive a glass vial.
    3. to give a small vial of bubbling salt water and a glass vial to a mermaid. (1 hour)
      Bubbling salt water loads in Goblin Castle on the lost adventurer. From "The Entrance to the Labyrinth," go 3E, S, 3E, 3S, 3E, 3S, 3W, 4S, E, 5S, 3W, 6N, 2W. Kill grue, loot his key, and open the down exit. Then D, E, 2S, E, 2S, U, 6W and look for the lost adventurer ("An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless").

    Life For An Emerald Knight [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Mitho
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Elnissa, Mystical Forest, Mynoric Garrison
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an emerald knight ( )
      In Elnissa, at entrance (center @.)
    2. to find the elixir of life and a black and white scroll ()
      Elixir is in Mystical: reset only.Black and white scroll loads in upstairs chest at Mynoric.
    3. to give the elixir of life and a black and white scroll to the emerald knight ()
      As above.

    Light for a Twisted Soul [Complete]

    Contributed by: Dunar
    Level: 30
    Difficulty: moderate (with help) to hard (without help)
    Locale(s): Riverton, Riverton Mines
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a twisted soul (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      On the bottom level of Riverton Mines. From the entrance to the Riverton Mines (south from the West Entrance to Riverton), go all S, all E, and then N until there is a down exit. Go D, W, all S, W, all N, E, S, D to "Beneath the Gladiators' Arena." Go 3W, all S, all E, all N, W, all S, W, N, N, D to "A Mined-Out Shaft." Go E, N, and look around.
    2. to kill Malevich (1 hour)
      Also on the bottom level of Riverton Mines. From "A Mined-Out Shaft," go E, N, W, N, E, 2N.
    3. to find a twisted soul (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to find the Light of the Sun (no limit)
      Loads in the Temple of the Sun (NW corner of Riverton) on the entity. This is a tough mob to kill solo, so get help.
    5. to give the Light of the Sun to a twisted soul (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Light the Lighthouses [Complete]

    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Dark Escarpment, Lighthouse
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find the lookout (1 hour)
      In Pirate Ship. From zone entrance, all N, then E, U, 2E, N, N, then all U.
    2. to find 4 of a flask of venomous oil (no limit)
      Oil loads on zagamites in Dark Escarpment (but not always: upon entry to the zone, "c locate oil" to make sure there is some. Otherwise you will have to wait for repop.) Zagamites are hidden and load in the "oil rooms" of the zone. From entrance to the zone, go all W until you can go N, go all N, then E or W. Be sure to remove your light before entering the oil rooms!
    3. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (40 minutes)
      In the Abandoned Lighthouse. From @, open door S, S, all U.
    4. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
      From above, enter portal.
    5. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
      From above, enter portal.
    6. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
      From above, enter portal.

    Light Up Duke's Day [Complete]

    Contributed by: Bhalodus
    Additions by: Raenyn
    Level: 27, 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med, Sceptrum Isachi
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor. (30 minutes)
      See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to give a fat cigar to Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (2 hours, 30 minutes)
      In Sceptrum Isachi on Lord Akarez. From zone entrance go all N, E, enter mirror. Then all D, all N and look around (he wanders).

    Level:

    Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes

    1. to find Jessin the shopkeeper (15 minutes)
      Jessin is found in the Sea Tack Shop in Med, east of the Fish Market. From Med recall, go 11S, 2E, S.
    2. to give some fishing line and tackle to Jessin the shopkeeper (1 hour)
      Line and tackle is found on the citizen mobs on the Mighty Cutter Mystera.

    Level: 22

    Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Trellor

      These can be purchased at Fitch's Woodworking in Trellor. From Trellor recall, go 5W, 2S, W.

    Locating the Charity Shipment for the High Priest [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Bhalodus
    Additions by: Vaproth, Danstaad
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, Graveyard
    Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
      In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
    2. to find Captain Abnart (15 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go all S to the Wharf. Go east along the Wharf, and south and north along the piers, if necessary, to find the Captain.
    3. to find Charleon, the Guildmaster (1 hour)
      In Gdangus. From recall, go 3N, W, all S, D, 2E, S, 2D, all S, E, 2S, 2W. (Note: last two rooms are no-magic.)
    4. to find a room called The Sitting Room ( )
      From recall, go 3N, 4E, all N.
    5. to find the Bourgermeister ( )
      From above, go E.
    6. to kill the ice servant ( )
      Note: this loads in the room with you.
    7. to give a sack of gems to the High Priest of the Church ( )
      As above.

    Long Sword for Vark Guard [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Kernighan
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Vark Outpost, Kalata
    Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a Vark guard (50 minutes)
      At Vark Outpost. From @, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever, north, and look around.
    2. to find the master's longsword ( )
      In Fort of Kalata.
    3. to give a master's longsword to a Vark guard ( )
      As above.

    Looter's Pouch for Thief [Complete]

    Contributed by: Antdos
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Gypsy Camp
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find an apprentice thief (30 minutes)
      In the Thieves Quarter of Med City.
    2. to find a looter's pouch (1 hour)
      On the master of the guards in Gypsy Camp. Follow path from entrance until the exits are "a ticket booth" to the west and "a concession stand" to the east. From this room, search, S, 2W, 3S, E, N to a room called "Protector of the Gypsy Camp."
    3. to give a looter's pouch to an apprentice thief (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Looting Equipment for a Young Pickpocket [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Vorador
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor, Gypsy Camp
    Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a young pickpocket ( )
      In Trellor, located randomly (hidden.)
    2. to find a dagger of felony and a looter's pouch ( )
      These load on the master of the guards in Gypsy Camp. Follow path from entrance until the exits are "a ticket booth" to the west and "a concession stand" to the east. From this room, search, S, 2W, 3S, E, N to a room called "Protector of the Gypsy Camp." Note: this is find-original and solo.
    3. to find a young pickpocket ( )
      As above.
    4. to give a dagger of felony and a looter's pouch to a young pickpocket ( )
      As above.

    Loranelle's Birthday Cake [Incomplete]

    Level: 26, 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Alendora, Catacombs, Egriel, Med City, Hives
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find a female cook of the Malindora (1 hour)
      In Alendora. From western entrance to zone, go all S, E, all S, E
    2. to find 5 of an egg recovered from deep within the catacombs and a sack of flour and 10 of a saucer of milk and 3 of a large mass of honey (no limit)
      egg: in Catacombs.
      sack of flour: in Egriel. Enter the zone during daytime hours (after 6 am.) Go 2E, 3S, 2E, 2S, E, D.
      a saucer of milk: in Med City. From Med recall, enter mage, all W, search, D.
      honey: in Hives of the Giants.

    Lost Grandson, Please Help Find [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Eriathan
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Sceptrum Isachi
    Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find an elderly man ()
      In Sceptrum Isachi. From @, go N and look around.
    2. to find Danny (1 hour, 10 minutes)
      In Sceptrum Isachi. From @, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, 2N, W, N.
    3. to [unknown] ()
      From Danny's room, S, E, 2S, all U, enter mirror. Danny will run away to his Grandpa as soon as you exit NPK.
    4. to find an elderly man (25 minutes)
      As above.

    Lost in the City of Medievia [Complete]

    Contributed by: Leiza
    Level:
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Medievia
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a Medievia Guardsman (1 hour)
      In Med City.
    2. to find a room called The Gates to the Poor Quarter and Dragon Court (20 minutes)
      From recall, enter thief, 4N.
    3. to find a woman in Vandal's Alleyway (10 minutes)
      From The Gates to the Poor Quarter and Dragon Court, go 2E, S. Keep on going S (beware of ambushes) until you find the woman. You will have to fight 2 apprentice thieves.

    Lost in the Mine [Complete]

    Level: 24, 26
    Difficulty: moderately easy
    Locale(s): Riverton, Riverton Mines
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a Greycap (30 minutes)
      Found at the north, south, and west entrances to Riverton.
    2. to find a mine foreman (20 minutes)
      See Mines in Frequent Pathways.
    3. to find a room called A Room Littered with Bones (30 minutes)
      This is one level down from the level you're on. Getting to the stairway down will depend on where you are when you locate the foreman. Hopefully, the following tree will help (but is not all inclusive):
      • From "A Tunnel of Sparkling Blue": all E, 3S, W, 2N, D.
        • From "A Tunnel of Emeralds and Sapphires": go all N to "A Tunnel of Sparkling Blue," then continue as above.
          • From "A Tunnel of Emeralds and Garnets": go all S to "A Brilliant Green Tunnel," W, N, then continue as above.
            • From "A Tunnel Glowing Dull Red," go all W then S to "A Tunnel of Emeralds and Garnets," then continue as above.
          • From "An Iridescent Tunnel": go all S, W, 2S, W, N to "A Tunnel of Emeralds and Sapphires," then continue as above.
          • From "A Tunnel of Amethysts": go all W, then all S to "A Tunnel Flashing with Amethysts and Emeralds," then 2W, S, W, N to "A Tunnel of Emeralds and Sapphires," then continue as above.
            • From "A Tunnel of Amethysts and Topaz": go all N to "A Tunnel of Amethysts," then continue as above.
        • From "A Tunnel of Aquamarines": go north one to "A Tunnel of Sparkling Blue," then continue as above.

      After going down, go 3S, W, 2S.

    4. to kill 8 of a warg (30 minutes)
      There are many wargs in rooms on either side of this one. This element is no-death.
    5. to find a room called A Room Littered with Bones (10 minutes)
      As above.

    Loyal Adversaries [Complete]

    Contributed by: Elagneros
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: easy to moderate (NPK)
    Locale(s): Medievia, Pirate Ship
    Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Captain Abnart (30 minutes)
      In Med City, in the Fisherman's area. From recall, go all S until you get to the wharf. Go E and W along the wharf and in the shipbuilding area to find Captain Abnart.
    2. to find Captain Amos Trask (45 minutes)
      Located on the Pirate Ship. From @ entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, 2E. You receive a talkative parrot, which is cursed, but also a scroll of remove curse.
    3. to give a talkative parrot to Captain Abnart (10 minutes)
      As above.

    Lucky Horseshoe for Takenos [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Krylar
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Forest Of Alendora, Sevoseth
    Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (1 hour, 40 minutes)
      See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there go, S, E, N.
    2. to give a lucky horseshoe to Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (2 hours)
      In Sevoseth.

    Madame Isramala's Dilemma [Complete]

    Contributed by: Liadhan
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Gypsy Camp, Trellor, Lyryanoth
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Madame Isramala (30 minutes)
      In Gypsy Camp. From @, D, E, 3S, W, S, search, 2S, 6W, all S.
    2. to find Emma the Weaver (20 minutes)
      In Trellor. From recall, 5W, 3S, W.
    3. to find Melnshara Daenar (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Lyryanoth. From recall, go all W and kill the four angry protestors. Go W, S, 3W, U, E, S, U.
    4. to kill Melnshara Daenar (10 minutes)
      As above. Note: this is no-death.
    5. to give a long, sumptuous dress of green velvet to Madame Isramala (30 minutes)
      Loads on Melnshara.

    Mage Eq from Spider in Crime Underground [Complete]

    Level: 26, 28
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Crime Underground, Med City
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Abinonius the Guildmaster (30 minutes)
      In Mage Quarter in Med City.
    2. to find a book of spells (3 hours)
      Loads on Spider in the Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N until you are in "An Antechamber," then N again. Spider loads here (hidden.) Note: this is find-original.

    Mage Equipment in Crime Underground [Complete]

    Contributed by: Lithena
    Additions by: Dae
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Crime Underground, Med City
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Abinonius the Guildmaster (30 minutes)
      In Mage Quarter in Med City.
    2. to find a winged helmet of white steel and a golden ring, set with a sparkling emerald and a ring of wizardry (2 hours)
      helmet and ring of wizardry: These load on Imrah in the Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, W, S, W. Imrah is here (hidden).
      a golden ring, set with a sparkling emerald: Loads on Spider in the Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N until you are in "An Antechamber," then N again. Spider loads here (hidden.) Note: this is find-original.

    Magic Collar for a Panther [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Milekan, Eriathan
    Level: 29
    Difficulty:easy to hard
    Locale(s): Mystical Forest, Goland's Tower
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
      In Mystical Forest. From recall, go all E, all N, all W, N, U, 5S, 5E, all N.
    2. to give a jewel-studded leather collar to the bellboy (3 hours)
      Loads in Goland's Tower on Lady Goland's pet dragon. Bellboy is in Mystical: from recall, go S, W, U.

    Magic Ingredients for Varanexus [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Milekan
    Additions by: Ravir
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Goland's Tower, Trellor, Mystical Forest
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Varanexus (no limit)
      In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go N to "Before Goland's Tower." Then go 3W, all N, all E till down exit, D, kill dweller for key ("a narrow bone which might serve as a key"). Then go U, S, 2E, search, D. Then go 2E, 2N, D, 2W, S, 2W, N to Calsinc the caretaker. Kill him for a key. Then go all S, N, to locked door west. Unlock the door and go W; unlock the door and go N.
    2. to find 3 of a bright pink potion and 2 of a cloudy white potion and a clear glass wand and a mystical scroll ( )
    3. to find Varanexus ( )
    4. to give 3 of a bright pink potion and 2 of a cloudy white potion and a clear glass wand and a mystical scroll to Varanexus (no limit)
      Cloudy white potion: In Trellor. From recall, go N to the Merchant Circle then all E.
      Mystical scroll, bright pink potion and clear glass wand: In Mystical Forest. Fom zone recall, go W until the N and S exits are 2Shops; enter the magic shop.

    Magical Components for a Crone [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Krage
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): New Genesia, Gloumewood Farm
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find the crone ()
      In New Genesia. From recall, go all D, all W, and look around.
    2. to find the eyes of a waterlizard,the eyes of a newt,a wart of a toad, and the tongue of a snake (2 hours, 40 minutes)
      In Gloumewood Farm:
      Eyes of a newt: From @, pick/open gate E (or get key from farmhand.) Go E tothe bridge, then E, N, W onto the river. Kill river newt, search corpse, get eyes corpse.
      Eyes of a waterlizard: As above, except on the waterlizard.
      Wart of a toad: As above, except on the toad.
      Tongue of a snake: From entrance, go E and look for the room"Under a Large Apple Tree." From here, go U, kill snake, search corpse, get tongue corpse.
    3. to find the crone ()
      As above.
    4. to give the eyes of a waterlizard,the eyes of a newt,a wart of a toad, and the tongue of a snake to the crone ()
      As above.

    Magical Items for Alizar the Dark [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Vashka
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Mystara, Akenuas Glade, Cloud Giants
    Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Alizar the Dark (30 minutes)
      In Mystara.
    2. to find the bracelet of twins and fur of a golden deer (1 hour, 40 minutes)
      Bracelet of twins loads (but not always) on Ceseracades in Realm of the Cloud Giants. From zone entrance go N, 2U, 5E, S, open door U, U, W, S, E, S, all U, kill Ceseracades. She is hard and this is a solo objective.
      Fur of a golden deer loads on deer in Akenuas Glade. From zone entrance, go E, N, 2E, 3 N, W, N, 2W, N, 4W (including hidden exit), S, 2W, S, 5E (hidden), S (hidden), S, E and look around.

    Magician's Missing Shoes [Complete]

    Contributed by: Xeanne
    Updated by: Ariakus
    Level: 29, 30
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): City of Medievia, Spiderwode, Tharhalas
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find an unger dwarf magician (30 minutes)
      The unger dwarf magician is in Tharhalas. From entrance, go all W, U, all N, E, U, all N, E, all S, D, all S, open door S.
    2. to find the shoes of the mage (2 hours)
      In Spiderwode, on Lusek in the Candali Encampment. From zone entrance, go 4N, all W,N, W, N all W till 4Way intersection ("Chandali Encampment, Before Two Wagons") then go all N. Lusek loads here.
    3. to give the shoes of the mage to an unger dwarf magician (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Mahgnus the Giant Jeweler [Needs Detail]

    Completed by: Kitran
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Cloud Giants, Med City
    Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Mahgnus the Jeweler (1 hour)
      In Cloud Giants. From entrance (@), go N, 2U, 4E, S, search, D, S.
    2. to find Sardhara, the jeweler (20 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, go N, W, W.
    3. to find the wilderness room at 1001 x 1049 (30 minutes)
      This is a branch on a path in the wilderness not far from the City of Medievia, to the south (actually, probably SSE). From the eastern gate of Medievia, go south. The first branch point will be a statue of a golden dragon. Keep going south. The actual room is marked with a maroon "U" just north of a branch point and another inn.
    4. to kill 3 of a winged fire devil (15 minutes)
      These pop in the room with you.
    5. to find Sardhara, the jeweler ( )
      As above.
    6. to give the Jewel to Mahgnus the Jeweler ( )

    Makalu's Baenlyr Troubles [Complete]

    Contributed by: Antdos
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Wilderness
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a travelling dwarf (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Can be found randomly in major cities, including City of Medievia, Trellor, New Ashton, Riverton, New Genesia, G'dangus, Derah Villedom, Lyranoth, Vanlarra.
    2. to kill 8 of a baenlyr (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In the wilderness. Around Clantown 77Seems to be a good place.

    Make Fishing Trip Safe [Complete]

    Contributed by: Tulkan
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Gnomenel, Lagoon Of Menace
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Jelit Maranid (30 minutes)
      In Gnomenel. from @, go E, 2S, E and look around
    2. to kill 16 of a tiny red and blue piranha (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Lagoon of Menace. From western @, go S to cabin. Get key rug. Go N, E, search until ladder falls. Then go D (breathe water) and look around.
    3. to find Jelit Maranid (20 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to kill 2 of a tiny red and blue piranha (10 minutes)
      These load in the room when you find Jelit.

    Make the Ocean Safe Near Mystical [Complete]

    Contributed by: Yandyr
    Additions by: Klerity
    Level: 30
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lattyrna, Mystical Forest
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
      From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 5 N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, U, W. You are given a carving of a mermaid.
    2. to kill the dragon turtle (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In the southern border of Mystical Forest. Wander the bottom row of @@@@@ looking for one.
    3. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Make Trellor Safe From Pickpockets [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Zoraux
    Additions by:Mospolo
    Level: 13
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a Trellor cityguard (30 minutes)
      From recall of Trellor, go S and look around.
    2. to find 3 amber potions and 3 misty potions (20 minutes)
      amber potion: In Trellor. From recall, go 5N, 6E and buy them here.
      misty: Purchase in Labyrinth. Misty potions must be purchased, they cannot be looted. From @ go 3E, S, 3E, 3S, 3E, 3S, 3W, 4S, E, 3S, E.
    3. to kill 2 of a young pickpocket and 2 of an accomplished pickpocket (30 minutes)
      In Trellor, randomly (hidden.)
    4. to find a Trellor cityguard (20 minutes)
      As above.

    Manure Sacks for Homfer [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Malandria
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Gloumewood Farm, Ruellia
    Total Time: 4 hours, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Homfer (20 minutes)
      In Gloumewood Farm, near entrance.
    2. to give 5 fertilizer sacks to Homfer (2 hours)
      In Ruellia, in NPK area. They load on fertilizer haulers.
    3. to find a room called the chicken coop (10 minutes)
      It is in the SE part of Gloumewood.
    4. to kill 6 of a short-tempered rooster (30 minutes)
      They will be near the chicken coop. Note: This is the toughest part of the AQ.

    Marble for Khal [Complete]

    Contributed by: Alyxe, Peb
    Additions by: Antdos
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor, Med City, Forbidden Forest
    Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Khal the Jeweller (30 minutes)
      In Trellor. From recall, go W, W, W, W, W, N, N, N, N, W.
    2. to find 5 of a heavy block of marble (1 hour)
      In Forbidden Forest in the quarry (SE part.) From Med recall, enter mage, then go 4W, 2S, 2W, approximately 4N, then all E through the gate. Look around for the blocks. Note: pick up blocks and then drop them until you have picked up five different blocks (this completes this objective), then take as many as you can (3 at a time?) to Khal in Trellor.
    3. to give 5 of a heavy block of marble to Khal (20 minutes)
      As above. Note: Blocks are 50 lbs each, so you won't be able to carry more than 4 probably. Plan to make two trips: carry 3 blocks (150lbs) on your first trip, 2 on your second. (You get 50,000GP for each, so take 3 more if you can.)

    Mead for Prytel

    Contributed by: Tasia
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: moderate (solo, find-original)
    Locales: Brookhaven
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Prytel, the bartender (1 hour)
      In Brookhaven. From entrance, go 3N, W
    2. to give 4 of a flask of mead to Prytel, the bartender (2 hours)
      Mead is on the revelers in Verthandi (can be stolen.)

    Medicine for Tabytha [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Zanthrin
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: hard (NPK; may involve CPK) to very hard (without help)
    Locale(s): Rydhordel, Spiderwode, Cloud Giants
    Total Time: 4 hours, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Mathaelda, the witch (40 minutes)
      From northern entrance to Rydhordel, go N, W, S, W, all S, 8W, all S.
    2. to find a vial of distilled spider venom and an aloe leaf and a ball of pollen (3 hours)
      a vial of distilled spider venom: Found in the Spiderwode on several mobs (e.g. wolf spider, jumping spider.)
      an aloe leaf: Loads on the bath boys in Cloud Giants. From "Floating Atop an Island Of Clouds," go E, E, E, S, open door, U, E, S, W, S.
      a ball of pollen: in Hives of the Giants on pollen-covered bees, larvae, and in cells in rooms.
      Note: these are find-original.
    3. to give a vial of distilled spider venom and an aloe leaf and a ball of pollen to Mathaelda, the witch (40 minutes)
      As above. You receive a green potion.
    4. to give a green potion to Tabytha, Mathaelda's pet (5 minutes)
      From above go N, W.

    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Labyrinth, Pirate Ship, Goland's Tower
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes

    1. to find The Mad Alchemist (30 minutes)

    2. to give a spy-glass, the mirror of the ages, and a crystal timepiece of Time Resistance to The Mad Alchemist (2 hours)
      a spy-glass: On the lookout in the Pirate Ship.

    Missing Instruments [Complete]

    Contributed by: Yandyr
    Level: 14, 15
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor,
    Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the High Priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
      See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to give a flute worked in silver and trimmed with gold and a rosewood mandolin and a conch shell to High Priestess of Trell (1 hour, 15 minutes)
      mandolin: Found on a congenial bard on the Merchant Circle in Trellor.
      flute: In Mage Quarter. From Med recall, enter mage, then go 4W, S, E, buy flute
      conch shell: In Med City. From recall, go all S to The Wharf and look around for a muscular sailor.

    Contributed by: Elagneros

    Locale(s): Medievia, Esacha Fen/Enara

    2. to find a gypsy musician (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Esacha Fen. From entrance to the fen, go 3N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E. Take the hidden exit north. From there go E, N, 2E, S, E, S, E, S, E, 2S, open door west, W.

      As above.

    Mister Mastir's Nightmare [Complete]

    Contributed by: Giba, Zeela
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): El Cantara, Lyngaeli's Nightmares
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Mister Mastir (30 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From entrance, go all N, E, 4N, E, N.
    2. to kill 20 of either a bouncing red ball, a bouncing green ball, a bouncing blue ball, a bouncing yellow ball (2 hours)
      In Lyngaeli's Nightmare, in the Ball Pit. From @ to zone, go all N and sleep. You will awaken in another room. Go 1N and enter box. Go 2N, 3W, open door, W, ice grandma for amulet (key). Go 5E, 2N, hold amulet, D, 2N, ice Helvyra for needle (key). Go 2S, U, S, E, N, hold needle. Search until the door opens. Go 2E and enter box. Find the stilt-walking clown with a pair of tall stilts and kill him and loot the stilts. From box, go 4N, W and wear stilts. Go 1N and kill the cows for cowbell (key). Go S, E, N, E, S and search. Then go E and kill Cyhaeck for the safe key. Unlock and open safe and get the toothpick from it. Go W, N, W, unlock door toothpick, open door and go north. Go W, kill marionettes (they will block if you don't), 1U and kill puppet master. Wear cowbell and go 1W. Dispel/ice Gigglesworth for figure(key). Go E, D, E, 4N and hold figure. Search until the western wall opens, go 2W and enter box. You will now be in the Ball Pit, wander around and kill bouncing balls.
    3. to find Mister Master (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Money Troubles[Complete]

    Level: 19, 24
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Goland's Tower, Mynoric Garrison
    Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Kuukle (45 minutes)
      In Goland's Tower. Enter the zone and go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle.
    2. to find Kaurdag (45 minutes)
      In Mynoric Garrison. From zone entrance (@), go N, N, N, N, search, U, open door S, S.
    3. to find a bar of gold (30 minutes)
      This can be purchased in Med City. From recall, go W, N, W.
    4. to give a bar of gold to Kuukle (45 minutes)

    Contributed by: V
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Ryvaera, El Cantara
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes

    1. to find a moonstone naiad (40 minutes)
