    2. to find 10 of a moon leaf (60 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From @ , go U, N, N, E, 10N, W, N, "buy 10 moon" (55 gold each.)
    3. to give 10 of a moon leaf to a moonstone naiad (40 minutes)
      As above.

    Mother's Feather Collection [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Morrrad (with special thanks to Galvin)
    Additions by: Elagneros, Krevitch
    Level: 30
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): El Cantara
    Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a nomad girl (30 minutes)
      In El Cantara. From zone entrance, go U, N, W, U, 4N, W (there are some hidden exits.)
    2. to find a nomad woman (15 minutes)
      Look around.
    3. to give a tiny red feather, a raven feather, or a speckled feather of a hawk to a nomad woman (1 hour)
      tiny red feather: in Esacha Fen on a hunter mob.

    Mountain Boots for Malki [Complete]

    Contributed by: Naevax and Ogrim
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: easy (with sneak) to hard
    Locale(s): Asnor, New Ashton
    Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Malki (30 minutes)
      In New Ashton. From "The South Gate of New Ashton," go E, E, N.
    2. to find a mountain climber (30 minutes)
      In Asnor Mountains. From the southeast @ entrance, go N and U. In the first few rooms, mountain climbers load hidden.
    3. to kill 6 of either a hairy troll, or a troll guard (30 minutes)
      These may be found a few more levels up.
    4. to find a mountain climber (8-10 minutes)
      As above.
    5. to give mountain climbing boots to Malki (30 minutes)

    Mountain Stout for a Dwarven Traveler [Complete]

    Contributed by: Takphius
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Castle Medievia, Brookhaven
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a dwarven traveler (30 minutes)
      In Castle Med. From Med City recall, go all U, 9N, all E, all N, 2W, U, all E, all S, 2W, U, all S.
    2. to find 4 of a pint of mountain stout (1 hour)
      In Brookhaven. From recall, go N, W, and buy them from the owner of the Thirsty Hog. Note: this is find-original.
    3. to give 4 of a pint of mountain stout to a dwarven traveler (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Moustache Trimming [Complete]

    Level: 19
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Enara, Shadowclaw, Med City
    Total Time: 1 hour, 48 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the town crier (33 minutes)
      In Med City, just south of recall.
    2. to find a timid manservant (30 minutes)
      In Shadowclaw. Enter the zone, go E to the "Spiral Stairway" and then up a level (or two.) Timid manservants load in the corridors.
    3. to give 4 of a child's doll to a timid manservant (45 minutes)
      A child's doll loads on the "little girl" mob in Enara. From the zone entrance, go all N, then west or east along the streets (which form a square) in the central part of the zone.

    Mr. Guard the Seamstress? [Complete]

    Contributed by: Epik
    Level: 26, 28, 29
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Enara, Asnor
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find an Enara guard (50 minutes)
      On the towers in Enara. From zone entrance, go all N, W to Verhaden Street, all N, W, U. U.
    2. to find 2 of an animal hide (no limit)
      Animal hides load on hairy trolls in Asnor. From southern @ entrance, go U then follow the path all N and U until you see hairy trolls (about 6-7 levels up.)
    3. to give 2 animal hides to an Enara guard (35 minutes)
      As above.

    Mud Magic [Complete]

    Additions by: Kernighan
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Vanlarra, Warrens
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a high mage of Vanlarra (30 minutes)
      In Vanlarra. Enter west entrance then go all E (through gates and doors) until you are inside a building. Move around inside the cube shaped building until you find a mage.
    2. to find 4 of a clump of mud (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Warrens of the Moshata. Loads on mudmen, which appear as "A figure of mud shuffles along the tunnel." From @, go D, all N (into NPK) and look around.
    3. to give 4 of a clump of mud to a high mage of Vanlarra (15 minutes)
      As above.

    Mushroom Omelette For Chanterelle [Complete]

    Contributed by: Elagneros
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): The Grove Of Verthandi
    Total Time: 5 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Chanterelle, the mushroom connoisseur (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Verthandi. From entrance, go N, 2E, all N, W, all N, E, all N, all E, all N, all W, N, W, all N, E, all N, W. This will take you to the Ruins of Hallistan. Chanterelle wanders in this area.
    2. to give a morel, a clump of oyster mushroom, a shaggy mane mushroom, an orange milk mushroom, and a meadow mushroom to Chanterelle (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      These mushrooms load in the Ruins of Hallistan area.
    3. to find Holda, the cook (30 minutes)
      From the entrance of the Runis of Hallistan, go all W, N, E, N, all W.
    4. to give garlic to Chanterelle (30 minutes)
      As above.
    5. to find a room called On a Supple Branch (30 minutes)
      From the entrance to the Ruins, go 3E, all N, E, N, D, N, all E, S, all E, 2N, all E, 2N, search, all U, 2E, all U.
    6. to give a phoenix egg to Chanterelle (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Mushroom Shortage [Complete]

    Contributed by: Rasreb, Murdoch
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med City, Lyryanoth, Ruellia
    Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the town crier (15 minutes)
      In Med City, S of recall.
    2. to find the wilderness room at 648 x 1549 (30 minutes)
    3. to find 2 of a shitaki mushroom (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N. Go E, all N, E, E, all N, W, W, N, U. In 2 of the 6 rooms in this section, there are benches which load mushrooms. "Get all bench" to gather shitaki mushrooms.
    4. to find the wilderness room at 648 x 1549 (30 minutes)
      As above. This is the Trade Post outside of Lyryanoth.

    Mushroom Stew [Complete]

    Contributed by: Thaspian
    Additions by: ABronsonM, Aideen, JDT
    Level: 27, 30
    Difficulty: moderate to very hard
    Locale(s): Crime Underground, Yldari, Great Tree
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Chelkon, the cook (30 minutes)
      In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, 4S, 2W, N.
    2. to give a splotchy mushroom and a small mushroom and a mushroom to Chelkon, the cook (3 hours, 30 minutes)
      a splotchy mushroom: In Sealed Caves, Fungi Cavern. From zone entrance, go 2E, S, E, D, E, D, S, E, S (The Bat Cave). Then search, go 2S, 2E, S (Glowing Chamber) and cast teleport (Crystal Cavern). Then go 2W, N, all W, N, 2W, all S, 2W, 3S, W, 5S, W, S, 2W, all S, W, 3S, E, S, E, 2S, E, S, E, 2S, 2E, S, 9E (An Intersection) then 3S. (Fungi Cavern). Loads on the ground here.
      a small mushroom: in Yldari, on the ground. From @, go 2N.
      a mushroom: Mushrooms load on the first level of the Great Tree. The first level is a square of 5 x 5 rooms and mushrooms can be found on the ground.

    Mushrooms for the Connoisseur's Talk [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Belizar
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Chanterelle, the mushroom connoisseur (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Verthandi. From entrance, go 2N, 2E, 2N, W, 2N, E, 2N, 2E, 2N, 2W, N, W, N.
    2. to give 4Shiitake mushrooms to Chanterelle, the mushroom connoisseur (2 hours, 10 minutes)

    Mustache for Mayor [Complete]

    Completed by: Alec
    Level: 22, 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Brookhaven
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Dramous, the Mayor of Brookhaven (1 hour)
      In Brookhaven. From recall, go all N, all W, get the key from the messenger. From recall, go east, unlock door S, S, U, 2E. (You have to drop key to get to mayor -- can't enter room with slippery key.)
    2. to find a thin, black mustache (1 hour)
      Loads in El Cantara on Patimir the Acting Coach in "The Rapturous Thespian." From entrance, go N, U, E, 8N, E, 2N. This is find-original.
    3. to give a thin, black mustache to Dramous, the Mayor of Brookhaven (1 hour)
      As above.

    Mutiny at Mellorian [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Thaspian
    Additions by: Nimbulaxan, Aideen
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Mellorian Citadel
    Total Time: 5 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Citadel Baron (2 hours)
      In Mellorian. From zone entrance, go all N to "An Intersection in the Hallway," then go W, N, 2U, S, 2W, N.
    2. [hidden] to find a guardsman (30 minutes)
    3. to kill a guardsman (10 minutes)
      As above.
    4. (hidden) to find a Citadel soldier (30 minutes)
      Found in "A Guard Barracks" south of "A Carpeted Hallway."
    5. to kill a Citadel soldier (10 minutes)
      As above.
    6. (hidden) to find a tower sentry (30 minutes)
      In "The Battlement of the Southeastern Tower."
    7. to kill a tower sentry (10 minutes)
      As above.
    8. (hidden) (30 minutes)
      On the Battlements, Above the Citadel Doors
    9. to kill a Mellorian bowman (10 minutes)
      As above.
    10. (hidden) to find a servant (30 minutes)
      In "Entrance to the Southeastern Tower."
    11. to kill a servant (10 minutes)
      As above.
    12. to find the Citadel Baron (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Mutiny on the Pirate Ship [Complete]

    Contributed by: Antdos
    Level: 29
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Pirate Ship
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the First Mate (1 hour)
      In Pirate Ship. From zone entrance, go E, 4N, E, U, S, 2E, search, pick/open floorboard, D, W (open door), S.
    2. to kill 3 of a cursing pirate and 4 of the pirate and 2 of the angry pirate and 2 of a very drunk pirate and 4 of the buccaneer and 5 of the swashbuckler (2 hours)
      Look around.

    NaeraMae's Light Work [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Updated by: AnonymousLevel: 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Citadel of NaeraMae, Preserve
    Total Time:1 hour, 35 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find NaeraMae (35 minutes)
      In the Citadel. From zone entrance (@), go S, 2U, 2S, 7 E, search, 2E, S. Pick, or kill guards for keys if you can't pick locks.
    2. to kill 15 of a beaver and 15 of a rabbit (1 hour)
      These load just inside the Preserve.

    Nails for Fitch [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Miranar
    Additions by: Angulain, Bhalodus
    Level: 18
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find Fitch the carpenter (30 minutes)
      From Trellor recall, go 5W, 2S, W.
    2. to find the carpenter (no limit)
      In Derah. From recall, go 3W, S, W, U. You receive 12Nails that bond to you.
    3. to give 12 of a nail to Fitch the carpenter (30 minutes)
      As above.

    Navigate the Labyrinth [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Kirgan
    Level: 15
    Difficulty: very easy
    Locale(s): Labyrinth
    Total Time: 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a room called The Entrance to the Labyrinth (30 minutes)
      This is the first room in the zone.
    2. to find a room called The Goblin Castle Gates (15 minutes)
      From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle.

    Necromancy Training for Solarious [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Jefry

    Level: 30
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Oak Graveyard (Trellor), Spiderwode

    Objectives:

    2. to give the Beginners' Guide to Necromancy to Solarious ( )
      Found at Spiderwode on the apprentice mage in the camp. From entrance, go all N to door, all W, N, W, N, all W, E, N.

    Needle and Thread for Grandma [Complete]

    Contributed by: Ceresir
    Additions by: Pleen
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Lyngaeli's Nightmare
    Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a crotchety old grandma (30 minutes)
      In Lyngaeli. From @, go all N, sleep, N, enter box, 2N, all W, open door, W.
    2. to give a spool of black thread and a wooden needle to a crotchety old grandma (1 hour, 20 minutes)
      thread: In Enara, on the gypsy woman sewing. From zone entrance, go 2N, then all E, following the path N/E. Enter NPK zone. Then go all E, N, E, 2N, 6W, N.
      wooden needle: Found underneath Med City. From the northern @ to Med City ("On the River Courrain, on the Banks of Medievia"), go 4S, E, S, 2W, 4S, 2W, 3S, E and follow path until you get to the room "The Secret Prison." Then search, U, open crate, E, and look around. The mob with the large leather bracer, which has 5Wooden needles in it, loads here.

    Needle for Dunossa [Needs Detail]

    Additions by: Lyanna
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Enara, Sceptrum
    Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the gypsy Dunossa (40 minutes)
      In Enara.
    2. to give a sharp embroidery needle to the gypsy Dunossa (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Loads in Sceptrum on Gatyasa, first of the royal wives. From entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, 3D, 5N, 2E, N.

    Neireid's Anniversary [Complete]

    Contributed by: Zynix
    Level: 22, 24, 26
    Difficulty: moderate (CPK, no-comm, no-death)
    Locale(s): Lattyrna, Crime Underground, Labyrinth
    Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a nereid (30 minutes)
      In Lattyrna, in the palace grounds. From zone entrance, go all D, E, E, N, N, N, E, E, then all N until you find one. (Use sense life.)
    2. to give 2 of a sword of water to a nereid (30 minutes)
      These load on the "your watery double" mobs that load in the north, east, and west CPK zones of Lattyrna.
    3. to give the boots of Water Walking to a nereid (35 minutes)
      These load on Janwel the apprentice in Crime Underground. From entrance to Crime Underground (@), go E, 2D, E (kill the thief for a key), S, D (kill the thief for a key), 4S (or so.)
    4. to give a pair of thick soled boots to a nereid (35 minutes)
      In the Armor Shop in the Labyrinth. From entrance to zone (@), go: 4E, S, E, 3S, 5E, 3S, 3W, 4S, E, 2S, W.

    New Armor for Langundo [Complete]

    Level: 12, 19
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Med, Karlisna
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Langundo, the armorer (45 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter cleric. Then go 4E, 2N, then W.
    2. to find 3 of a polished golden breast plate, 3 of a pair of polished golden sleeves, and 3 of a pair of polished golden leggings (1 hour)
      In Karlisna. Sleeves can be purchased in "The Armor Shoppe" (from @, 8 E then N.) All equipment can be found on "A heavily armored guard," who loads randomly in the zone. (This equipment is heavy to carry: actually wearing it temporarily can give you increased strength to transport all the pieces, if your strength is low!) Note: this objective is marked as find-original.
    3. to give 3 of a polished golden breast plate, 3 of a pair of polished golden sleeves, and 3 of a pair of polished golden leggings to Langundo, the armorer (30 minutes)
      As above.

    New Arrows For Sintarus [Complete]

    Contributed by: Dima
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s):
    Total Time: 5 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to Sintarus, captain of the archers (1 hour, 45 minutes)
      In Quinstone's Keep. From zone entrance (@), go N to the room "The Foyer of the Keep," all E, U, all E, all S, U.
    2. to find 2 of a gaily painted arrow and 2 of a black-feathered arrow and 2 of a long, thin arrow, tipped with a smooth slate head (4 hours)
      A gaily painted arrow:Loads on Imp Guards in the Underground Shafts. From entrance, follow path W and N, and you'll find two imp guards, each with one arrow (invisible).
      A long, thin arrow, tipped with a smooth slate head: Loads at Wittermark on the Wittermark elves. From entrance go all N, all W (through hidden exit), all S, and you'll see one on the way. If not, go all U and look around the village. Each elf loads 3 arrows and a bow worth eq points.
      A black-feathered arrow:loads on Exyaxen archers, in The Home of the Winds. From entrance, go 2N, 2E, and continue N, Exyaxen archers load here, each with one arrow (fire rooms, so come healed.
    3. to give 2 of a gaily painted arrow and 2 of a black-feathered arrow and 2 of a long, thin arrow, tipped with a smooth slate head to Sintarus, captain of the archers (30 minutes)
      As above.

    New Bait for Fisherman [Complete]

    Additions by: Airla
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Crystal Lake, Riverton, Quinstone's
    Total Time: 3 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a quiet fisherman (15 minutes)
      Found in Crystal Lake. From entrance, go 2N, 3E, N, E, N, 2E, N, E, 7N and look around.
    2. to give a sliver of cured eel to a quiet fisherman (45 minutes)
      In Riverton. From northern @, go 5S, 2W, N and buy it here.
    3. to give the hide of an eel to a quiet fisherman (1 hour)
      In Lattyrna, on an electric eel. From zone entrance, go all D, 2 E and look around.
    4. to give a slimy eel's tail to a quiet fisherman (1 hour)
      This loads on the slimy eels in Quinstone's Keep moat. From zone entrance go 2W or 2E and look around.

    New Book for Lady Mariarin

    Contributed By: Helitus
    Additions by: DG
    Level: 18
    Difficulty:
    Locales: Med, Riverton/Braneri
    Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Lady Mariarin (30 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter thief, then go 2E, 3S, W.
    2. to find a large book of short stories ( )
      In Riverton. From northern entrance, go S, 4W, N. Alternatively, if you are too high level to buy it, get it from Academy of Braneri.
    3. to give a large book of short stories to Lady Mariarin ( )
      As above.

    New Books for Quinstone Keep's Library

    Contributed By: Helitus
    Additions by: Thoron
    Level: 19
    Difficulty:
    Locales: Quinstone Keep, Academy of Braneri
    Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Werni, the librarian (30 minutes)
      In Quinstone Keep, from entrance, N, 2E, 2U, 2E, 3N, W, S, W. Note: Werni will give you a small sack of gems.
    2. to find the dean of the academy (30 minutes)
      In Braneri, from entrance, 5N, 3W, D, kill fish, loot key, U, 5E, unlock door, 2N
    3. to give a small sack of gems to the dean of the academy (20 minutes)
      As above.
    4. to find a dusty book, a well-bound book, a large book of short stories, a condensed holy book, a treatise on "the good," and a religious treatise ( )
      In Braneri.

      dusty book: From entrance, go 8N, 3W, pick door, 2W, N to Fictional Works.
      well-bound: From Fictional Works, go W to Mythology.
      short stories: From Mythology, go 3E to Biographies.
      holy book: From entrance, go 10N, U, N, loads on a deeply religious man (may have to go E or W to find him).
      "the good": From entrance, go 2N, 3W, U, E, S.
      religious treatise: From entrance, go 3N, 3E, N to a rather messy office.

    5. to give a dusty book, a well-bound book, a large book of short stories, a condensed holy book, a treatise on "the good", and a religious treatise to Werni, the librarian ( )
      as above.

    New Boots for Mountain Climber [Complete]

    Contributed by: Afiniti
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Asnor, Riverton
    Total Time: 1 hour
    Objectives:
    1. to find a mountain climber (30 minutes)
      In Asnor Mountains. From the southeast @ entrance, go N and U. In the first few rooms, mountain climbers load hidden.
    2. to give butter-soft leather boots to a mountain climber (30 minutes)
      In Riverton, on Topaz Avenue in "Malgaron's Leatherworks.". Buy boots.

    New Career for the Town Crier [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Wegris
    Additions by: Neru
    Level: 17
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Med City, El Cantara, The Village of Gnomenel
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Famar, the town crier (2 hours)
      In Med City, S of recall.
    2. to find a broad-brimmed felt hat and a green glass ball and a blue glass ball and a red glass ball (2 hours)
      balls: in El Cantara on the juggling instructor. From @ go U, 2N, E, 4N, E, N. May have to kill juggling instructor several times for all balls to load.
      Mareth Tinolle in Gnomenel has the hat.

    New Cleaning Supplies for the Elven Merchant [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Humbado
    Level: 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Enara, Sceptum
    Total Time: 6 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find an elven merchant (1 hour)
      Varies; loads in one of the major cities of Medievia.
    2. to find a wire scrub brush (3 hours)
      Loads on a village boy in Sceptrum. From @, all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N till room "An Intersection Bathed in Crimson", then W until you see the mob.
    3. to find a bucket of washwater (3 hours)
      In Esacha Fen.From entrance to the fen, go 2N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E, N (hidden), E, 2N, open door N, N, then look around for Xandia Jeypaz, who carries the bucket of washwater.

    New Dresses for Mika [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Jonuv
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Aeketh, Lyryanoth, Forbidden Forest
    Total Time: 5 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Mika, the mistress of the tavern (30 minutes)
      In Trellor, off Merchant Circle.
    2. to find a long, sumptuous dress of green velvet (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Lyryanoth, on Melnshara Daenar. From recall, go all W. Kill the four angry protestors. Go W, S, 3W, U. Go E, S, U, W.
    3. to find a tight, fire red dress and a beautiful silk and dragonskin dress and the elven queen's dress (3 hours)
      a tight, fire red dress: On the servant. In Aeketh, go all W, E, then N through wilderness. Then go all W, 2N, 3W, all N, all W, N, E, search, pick hatch, open hatch, D.
      a beautiful silk and dragonskin dress: Kuukle in the upper level of Goland's tower has this item. Enter the zone and go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle.
      the elven queen's dress: on the elven queen in Forbidden Forest.
    4. to give a long, sumptuous dress of green velvet and a tight, fire red dress and a beautiful silk and dragonskin dress and the elven queen's dress to Mika, the mistress of the tavern (30 minutes)
      As above.

    New Drink for Heron [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Zasildar
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Enara/Esacha
    Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Heron the Bartender (30 minutes)
      In Trellor. From Trellor recall: go E, E, E, E, E, N, N, N, E, S, S, U.
    2. to find 3 of a stoppered crock of stevania (1 hour, 40 minutes)
      In the Esacha Fen. From entrance to the fen, go N, following the path north. Go through a hidden N exit and look for crate in a room Among Moored Barges.
    3. to give 3 of a stoppered crock of stevania to Heron the Bartender (30 minutes)
      As above.

    New Equipment for Minotaur [Complete]

    Contributed by: Jadeyn
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderately easy
    Locale(s): Labyrinth, NaeraMae
    Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Minotaur (30 minutes)
      In the Labyrinth, near the entrance. Go all E, then S and look around.
    2. to find a red steel helm and visor and a pair of red steel greaves and a pair of red steel vambraces and a minotaur glaive and a steel breast plate (1 hour)
      All are found on Minotaur Sentinel in NaeraMae. From @., go S, 3U, S, all E, pick gate, open gate, all E and look around.
    3. to a red steel helm and visor and a pair of red steel greaves and a pair of red steel vambraces and a minotaur glaive and a steel breast plate to the Minotaur (15 minutes)
      As above.

    New Eyeglasses [Complete]

    Level: 23, 29
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Goland's Tower, NaeraMae, Fury
    Total Time: 6 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Calsinc, the caretaker (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      From entrance to Goland's Tower, go N, N, N, E, E, N, N, D (if it's locked, get the key by going N, N, W, W, D then killing the pond dweller.) Then go W, W, W, S, W, N, N.
    2. to give either a pair of silver spectacles or a pair of wire-rimmed spectacles to Calsinc, the caretaker. (5 hours)
      In NaeraNae, wire-rimmed spectacles load on Threzdi the archmage. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the east.
      Silver spectacles load in the Fury.

    New Fashion for the Leader of the Bandits [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Nannia, Shaedehart
    Additions by: Bhalodus, Awnuk
    Level:
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Underground Shafts
    Total Time: 7 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the leader of the bandits (30 minutes)
      In Underground Shafts. From @, go D, 2E, 2N, 2E, 4S, 4E and look around. Will be hidden.
    2. to find a crimson red bandana, a simple cloth bandana, a red bandana, a fiery red bandana, and a colorful bandana (5 hours)
      crimson red bandana: in Tharhalas.
      a simple cloth bandana: in Reclasta.
      a red bandana: in Enara on Dorlath the gypsy mother in the gypsy camp.
      a fiery red bandana: in Mellorian.
      a colorful bandana: in Lagoon of Menace.

    New Gloves and Pruning Shears for Henry [Incomplete]

    Contributed by: Uamak
    Additions by: Zeela
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Graveyard,
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Henry, the Cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
      In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle," then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
    2. to give deerhide gloves and pruning shears to Henry, the Cathedral gardener (2 hours)
      In Verthandi on Jerrold the gardener. From entrance, go all N, 2E, 2N, W, 2N, E, 2N, 2E, 2N, 2W, N, W, 5N, E, 2N, 3W, 6N, N (hidden), E, 2N, 2W, S.

    Contributed by: Thaspian
    Additions by: Yasujiro, Mospolo
    Level: 30
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Catacombs, Reclasta
    Total Time: no limit
    1. to find a sprite (no limit)
      In the Catacombs.
    2. to give the sparkling gown of a tiny sprite to a sprite (3 hours)
      In Tower of Reclasta. The sprites are in the forest outside the tower, the east side, but still in the zone.

    Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes

      In Ruellia. From the zone entrance, go all N, W, N, N, D, E, N to "Next to the Waterfall". Go U, 6N, then all E to "Beside the Valley Walls". Search, then go E. Go U, N, N, W, U to "A Faint Trail". Go N, W, W, N, N, E, N, U to "Traversing the Glacier". Trolls load here.
    2. to find a glacial hand (3 hours)
      In Alps. Note: not find-original.
    3. to find an ice troll ( )
      As above.

    New Holy Book for Friar Jean John [Complete]

    Contributed by: Pontori

    Total Time: 1 hour, 10 minutes

    New Hymn For The Holy Cathedral [Complete]

    Contributed by: Ceresir
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Graveyard, Esacha Fen
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
      In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
    2. to find a gypsy musician (1 hour)
      In Fen by the deck. Note: you receive a sheaf of sheet music.
    3. to give a sheaf of sheet music to the cathedral organist (30 minutes)
      In the Graveyard cathedral. From cathedral foyer, go 7N, E, U, W.

    New Instrument for a Bard (new version)[Complete]

    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Trellor, Fire Giants Keep
    Total Time: 3 hours
    1. to find a congenial bard (1 hour)
      In Trellor, south of recall, on Merchant Circle.
    2. to give a satyr's flute to a congenial bard (2 hours)
      Satyr's flute loads in Fire Giants Keep. See Satyr/Satyr's Flute in Frequent Pathways.

    New Instrument for a Bard (old)[Complete]

    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderately easy
    Locale(s): Trellor, Forest of the Alendora
    Total Time: 3 hours
    1. to find a congenial bard (1 hour)
      In Trellor, south of recall, on Merchant Circle.
    2. to give an elven flute to a congenial bard (2 hours)
      From the western entrance to Forest of the Alendora, go S, S, E, then all S until you see "A very bad elven minstrel," who loads with the elven flute.

    New Instrument for a Jolly Bard [Complete]

    Contributed by: Thaspian
    Additions by: Admanthis, Lyanna
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Asnor, Trellor, Alendora, Fire Giants, G'dangus
    Total Time: 5 hours
    1. to find a jolly bard (1 hour)
      In Asnor. From southern entrance to zone, go all N/U to the temple gate. If locked, get the ram key off one of the troll guards. From gate, go all N, U, all S, U, N, U to a room called the Music Chamber.
    2. to find a rosewood mandolin and a lute and an elven flute and the satyr's flute and a brass trumpet (3 hours)
      a rosewood mandolin: on a congenial bard in Trellor, south of recall, on Merchant Circle.
      a lute: in G'dangus. From entrance (@), open gate N, then go 3N, W, S, W. The minstrel with the lute is at the bar.
      an elven flute: From the western entrance to Forest of the Alendora, go S, S, E, then all S until you see "A very bad elven minstrel," who loads with the elven flute.
      the satyr's flute: In Fire Giants' Keep. See Satyr/Satyr's Flute in Frequent Pathways.
      a brass trumpet: In Med City. Recall, enter mage, then go S, E, 2S, E, D. Kill the trombonist.
    3. to find a jolly bard (1 hour)

    New Minotaur Weapon [Complete]

    Contributed by: Afiniti
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Labyrinth/Goblin Castle, NaeraMae
    Total Time:
    Objectives:
    1. to find the Goblin King (1 hour)
      From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all W, all N, E, all S, U. The Goblin King loads here.
    2. to find Naeramae's great axe (2 hour, 30 minutes with extension)
      From zone entrance, go 2U, 2S, all E to gate. Get key or pick gate to continue E. Go all E, search, then E and open door E (key is on guardian or again, it is pickable.) Go 2E, S and kill NaeraMae for axe. This is find-original.
    3. to give Naeramae's great axe to the Minotaur (1 hour)
      Minotaur loads just inside the Labyrinth. From entrance, go all E, S and look around.

    Contributed by: Miranar

    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Dragmire, Enara
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes

      Loads in Dragmire in shop on Barracks Road. From @, go W, U, N, D, 8W, S, W.
    2. to give strips of brightly colored cloth, green plaid pants, a blue polka dot shirt, and bright red striped socks to Yarla, the orcish tailor (1 hour)
      Load on Yaxley in Enara. From zone entrance, go 2N, then all E, following the path N/E. Enter NPK zone. Then go all E, N, E, 2N, 5W, S.
    3. to find a gypsy woman (30 minutes)
      From above, go N, W, N.
    4. to give a silver sewing needle to Yarla, the orcish tailor (30 minutes)
      As above.

    New Pickaxe For Miner [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Angeliqa
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Thunderhoume, Spirited Heights
    Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a dwarven miner ()
      In Thunderhoume. Randomly pops on dwarven miners (hidden mobs). From @, go N, 3D, N, 3D, search, D, E, N, 3E, 2D, 2N, 6W, 4N, 3D, search, D, 2N, D, 2N, E. The miners pop here. There is a passage north which leads to another lower area where miners pop (note dwarven guards and casters are aggressive and see through invis)
    2. to find one of a pickaxe ()
      Located in Spirited Heights. from northern @, go 5S, S, all N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, W into NPK, and North. Stone golem loads here with pickaxe.
    3. to find a dwarven miner ()
      As above.
    4. to give a pickaxe to dwarven miner (4 minutes)
      As above.

    New Potions for Alchemist [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Miranar
    Level: 23, 25
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Braneri, Quinstone
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a crazy alchemist (30 minutes)
      In Braneri. From zone entrance, go 2N, E, N, open door E, 3E, U, W, and look around.
    2. to find a corked vial of yellow liquid, a corked vial of green liquid, a corked vial of blue liquid, a corked vial of red liquid, a corked vial of black liquid, and a corked vial of rainbow-colored liquid (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      In Quinstone; essentially requires you to run the zone (link not available). Note: this is find original.

    New Potions for Ariid [Complete]

    Additions by: Bhalodus
    Level: 25, 28
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Brookhaven, Sonedal
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Ariid, the magician (50 minutes)
      In Brookhaven. From recall, go N, W.
    2. to find a room called A Magician's Shop (10 minutes)
      From above, go E, N, W, S.
    3. to give a vial of jade potion and a vial of scarlet potion and a vial of golden potion and a vial of crimson potion and a vial of lavender potion and a vial of emerald potion to Ariid, the magician (2 hours)
      In Sonedal. To get to the shack, from east @, go all down, all W, down, all W, down, W, S, W, S, S to Yelkan's Laboratory. (On the way, find Dulen the Wandering Peddler and buy 6 vials. Then enter the shack nearby.) Make the potions individually by holding an empty vial, then typing "pour [color]" 3 times in the following combinations:
      jade potion: blue, yellow, blue.
      scarlet potion: red, red, yellow.
      golden potion: yellow, yellow, red.
      crimson potion: blue, red, red.
      lavender potion: red, blue, blue.
      emerald potion: blue, yellow, yellow.

    New Quill For Jeren [Complete]

    Contributed by: Neru
    Level: 24
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Hidden City Of E'nat'dae, Riverton
    Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Jeren, the Empress's Consort (30 minutes)
      In E'nat'dae. From @, go all N, W, all N, all U, 5S, E. He is hidden.
    2. to find the mayor of Riverton (25 minutes)
      From north entrance of Riverton, go 3S, W, S, U. Note: Mayor gives you a quill.
    3. to give a quill to Jenen, the Empress's Consort (30 minutes)
      As above.

    New Seedlings For Llaen [Complete]

    Contributed by: Kirgan
    Level: 28
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Arcadia, Gnomenel
    Total Time: 4 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Llaen, the Essence of Spring (1 hour)
      In Arcadia.From @, go all U, all S, W, all S, E, all S, and enter whirlpool. If you do not exit the whirlpool at the room "A Beautiful Arch, Leading to Llaen's Arcadia", cast word of recall (back to the @) and follow the directions above to go through the whirlpool again. Do this until you get to the room above. Then, from “A Beautiful Arch, Leading to Llaen's Arcadia”, go all S, all E, S, open door S, S, U.
    2. to find a tray of seedlings and the seedling of a silverwood tree (2 hours)
      >A tray of seedlings: in Gnomenel. Loads on Adwen Tinolle. From recall, go 6S, 4E, N (or 2N).
      The seedling of a silverwood tree: Loads in Spiderwode on the red, green, brown, and blue zhayven mobs. From zone entrance, go 3N then W and look around.
    3. to give a tray of seedlings and the seedling of a silverwood tree to Llaen, the Essence of Spring (1 hour)
      As above.

    2. to find a shovel (3 hours)
      Found on the east side of Condemned Arena on a dirty bandit. From the @, go 2E, N, 2E, all N, E, N, E, N, all E, S, 3E (hidden), all N, W. The shovel loads on the bandit worker found here.

    New Spatula For Dipwaun [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Angulain
    Additions by: Katsuyia, Dweia, Aiizaman
    Level: 22
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Quinstone's Keep, Gloumewood Farm
    Total Time: 2 hours
    Objectives:

      In Quinstone's Keep. From @ go N, 2E, 2U, 2E, N, E, S.
    2. to find a sizzling-hot spatula ( )
      In Gloumewood. on Aitrilla. From @, kill farmer and loot key. Unlock gate. Go 4E, S. Search pants (may not see pants) and get key. Then go 2N, 3E, N, W. Kill Aitrilla and loot spatula.

    New Textbooks For The Academy [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Swiftmoon, Thespian
    Level: 19
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Academy of Braneri, Crystal Lake, City of Medievia, Crime Underground, Forbidden Forest
    Total Time: 3 hours, 14 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find the dean of the academy (1 hour)
      In Braner. Fromi @, open gate, 5N, 3W, D, kill fish for little bronze key. Go U, 5E, unlock door N, open door N, N (watch for aggro.)
    2. to find a leather-bound book entitled "The Adventures of Huen the Knight, the book of elven thoughts, a book of spells, and a student's thesaurus (2 hours)
      a leather-bound book entitled, "The Adventures of Huen the Knight": In Med City. From recall, enter poor, 2E, all S, W. Kill Lady Mariarin.
      the book of elven thoughts: In Forbidden Forest. From Medievia entrance, go 8N, 4E, 2N, 4E (to Elven Woods ), E, 2N, 3D, kill guards for key, W, unlock door, find Elven King.
      a book of spells: In Crime Underground, from "The Den of the House," go 2D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go 2E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, all N until you are in "An Antechamber," then N again. Spider loads here (hidden.)
      a student's thesaurus:In Crystal Lake, in the NW and SE corners (camping grounds) a Peeping Tom (hidden) has it. (Note: doesn't pop on him often.)
    3. to give a leather-bound book entitled "The Adventures of Huen the Knight, the book of elven thoughts, a book of spells, and a student's thesaurus to the dean of the academy ()
      As above.

    New Tools for Poto [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Sagitron
    Level: 23
    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Quinstone's Keep,Gloumewood Farm,
    Total Time: 4 hours, 45 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Poto, the groundskeeper (15 minutes)
      In Quinstone's Keep. From entrance, go N, all W, S, W, S.
    2. to give a sharp pair of gardening shears and a long-handled shovel to Poto,the groundskeeper (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      Both load in Gloumewood Farm: shears on Rofyle, the head gardener, and shovel on Homfer. They wander around near the entrance.
    3. to give the sharpest tool in the shed to Poto, the groundskeeper (1 hour)
      In Enara. From entrance, follow path W and N to the scullery door. Open door, 2N, E, all N, E, N. Kill groundskeeper.
    4. to give a small gardening rake and long hedge clippers to Poto,the groundskeeper (1 hour)
      In Gnomenel. From the gate, go 14E, 2N, E, get clippers wall, get rake rack.
    5. to give a yellow,metal gardening spade to Poto, the groundskeeper (45 minutes)
      In Med City. From recall, enter mage, 4N, E, N, E, 2N, 2E, kill gardener.

    New Toys for Fluffy [Complete]

    Contributed by: Anonymous
    Level: 20
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Cantara, Gnomenel, Lagoon of Menace, E'nat'dae
    Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a grandmotherly housekeeper (40 minutes)
      In The Hidden City of E'nat'dae. From zone entrance, go N, W, all N into palace, all E and look around.
    2. to find a golden eagle's feather and a dove feather and a small bronze ball and a ball of twine (2 hours)
      dove feather: In Cantara. From zone entrance, go U, 2N, E, N till U, U, kill dove.
      golden eagle's feather: In Cantara. From Dove, D, all N, U, 5E, N and look around.
      twine: In Gnomenel. From zone entrance, go 10E, 2N.ball: In Lagoon of Menace. From entrance, all W, N, W till you see a playful kitten.
    3. to give a golden eagle's feather and a dove feather and a small bronze ball and a ball of twine to Fluffy, the housekeeper's persian cat (50 minutes)
      In The Hidden City of E'nat'dae. From zone entrance, go N, W, all N, all E and look around.

    Old Baskille's Story [Needs Detail]

    Level: 18
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor
    Total Time: no limit
    Objectives:
    1. to find Baskille, the retired sailor (1 hour)
      See Baskille in Frequent Pathways.
    2. to give a gryphon stew and a bottle of wine to Baskille, the retired sailor ( )
      Buy in Lunch's Restaurant and Kryor's Wine and Spirits, respectively. Both shops are found on Merchant Circle.
    3. to give a painted canoe to Baskille, the retired sailor ( )
      Buy in Trellor. From portal, go N, 3W, N.

    Old Instrument for a New Bard [Complete]

    Contributed by: Ceresir
    Additions by: Kirgan
    Level: 21
    Difficulty: easy
    Locale(s): Trellor, Talqaxtyl's Pyramid
    Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find a congenial bard (30 minutes)
      In Trellor, south of recall, on Merchant Circle.
    2. to give a qakzan to a congenial bard (2 hours)
      In Pyramid. From zone entrance, go all N until the pyramid, then go all W. Then go all N until you see "a rope" in the room description. Then go 2U, S, 4E to the Dark Antechamber. Go N to A Reception Room. Continue E past the hall with the tombs and open door E. Look for "an old grave robber," who loads the qakzan, in the adjacent rooms (sense life needed)

    Ore for a Dray'mar Miner [Complete]

    Level: 28
    Difficulty: medium (hard if you can't sneak)
    Locale(s): Dray'mar, Brookhaven
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a Dray'mar miner (1 hour)
      From zone entrance (@), go 2E, 2N, 2W, S, D, 5N, D.
    2. to give 12 of auonium ore to a Dray'mar miner (2 hours)
      Ore is found in Brookhaven. From zone entrance (@) go 2N, 3W and buy pickaxe. Now, look around on the streets of town for a mob labeled "A smiling man is here, looking for misplaced litter" who carries "a long bar made of iron." Kill him and loot the bar. Next, go to recall (the fountain at the center of town) and unlock grate, then go D, W, 5N, 3W. (There are tough aggro mobs through here -- sneak if you can!) Then hold pickaxe and use pickaxe repeatedly; soon a piece of ore will 'fall' to the floor, pick it up and continue until you have 12.

    Ore for a Riverton Miner [Complete]

    Contributed by: Barvyon
    Additions by: Imperator, Draykilas
    Level: 22, 26, 28
    Difficulty: medium (hard if you can't sneak)
    Locale(s): Riverton, Brookhaven
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find a dwarven miner (1 hour)
      In Riverton Mines, located randomly.
    2. to give 12 of auonium ore to a Riverton miner (2 hours)
      Ore is found in Brookhaven. From zone entrance (@) go 2N, 3W and buy pickaxe. Now, look around on the streets of town for a mob labeled "A smiling man is here, looking for misplaced litter" who carries "a long bar made of iron." Kill him and loot the bar. Next, go to recall (the fountain at the center of town) and unlock grate, then go D, W, 5N, 3W. (There are tough aggro mobs through here -- sneak if you can!) Then hold pickaxe and use pickaxe repeatedly; soon a piece of ore will 'fall' to the floor, pick it up and continue until you have 12.

    Ore for a Spire Miner [Complete]

    Contributed by: Aolani
    Additions by: Kirgan

    Difficulty: moderate
    Locale(s): Riverton Mines, Brookhaven
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:

    2. to give 12 auonium ore to a dwarven miner (2 hours)
      Ore is found in Brookhaven. From zone entrance (@) go 2N, 3W and buy pickaxe. Now, look around on the streets of town for a mob labeled "A smiling man is here, looking for misplaced litter" who carries "a long bar made of iron." Kill him and loot the bar. Next, go to recall (the fountain at the center of town) and unlock grate, then go D, W, 5N, 3W. (There are tough aggro mobs through here -- sneak if you can!) Then hold pickaxe and use pickaxe repeatedly; soon a piece of ore will 'fall' to the floor, pick it up and continue until you have 12.

    Ore for Polythenis [Complete]

    Contributed by: Elagneros
    Additions by: Shauku
    Level: 23, 24
    Difficulty: hard to very hard
    Locale(s): Cloud Giants
    Total Time: 3 hours
    Objectives:
    1. to find Polythenis, the silver miner (1 hour)
      In Cloud Giants. From entrance (@), go N, 2U, E, S, 2W, S, W, 2 S, W, D, N, E, D, W, D, E.
    2. to give 12 of auonium ore to Polythenis the silver miner (2 hours)
      Ore is found in Brookhaven. From zone entrance (@) go 2N, 3W and buy pickaxe. Now, look around on the streets of town for a mob labeled "A smiling man is here, looking for misplaced litter" who carries "a long bar made of iron." Kill him and loot the bar. Next, go to recall (the fountain at the center of town) and unlock grate, then go D, W, 5N, 3W. (There are tough aggro mobs through here -- sneak if you can!) Then hold pickaxe and use pickaxe repeatedly; soon a piece of ore will 'fall' to the floor, pick it up and continue until you have 12.

    Organize the Defense of the Wittermark Forest [Needs Detail]

    Contributed by: Jefry
    Level: 26
    Difficulty: hard
    Locale(s): Wittermark
    Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
    Objectives:
    1. to find Ebbinert, the ancient hermit (30 minutes)
      In Wittermark. From @, go 4N, 2W (including hidden exit.)
    2. to find Ensatia, the dryad queen (15 minutes)
      From above, go 2E, 4S, 2W, S, W, 3S, 2W, S, 6W.
    3. to find Horak (30 minutes)
      In Wittermark. From entrance, go 2W, S, W, S, 4W, N, 5W to a dead end. Then go N (hidden exit), 2W, S, W, 2N, W, N, 2E, N and look around.
    4. to find Yenar, the war mage (15 minutes)
      keep following path from objective three
    5. to find a room called "A Path Diverging into a Dark Wood" (15 minutes)
      This is the entrance to the zone
    6. to find the wilderness room at 1262x1425 (5 minutes)
      Go E from entrance.

      Otis the Wimp [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Hamadan
      Additions by: Vlar, Awnuk, Ruthok
      Level: 26, 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Mellorian, NaeraMae
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Otis, the dungeon guard (no limit)
        In the northwest part of the ground floor of Mellorian Citadel. From entrance, go 6N, 3W, S, 2E and look around.
      2. to give some huge spiked brass knuckles to Otis, the dungeon guard (no limit)
        Found in NaeraMae, on the minotaur with keys. From entrance, go S, all U, 2S, all E, pick gate, open gate, 2E, 2S.

      Outfit for an Elven Queen [Incomplete]

      Level: 18
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Githyanki
      Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the elven queen (50 minutes)
        In Forbidden Forest. From Med recall, enter mage, go 4W, 2S, 2W, 4N, 2E, all N, 2E, all N, 4E, S, E, 3D, W, S, kill guard for key or pick door, 4S, kill a female elven keep servant for key, S, E, S, unlock door E, open door E, E. (She's aggro.)
      2. to find a diamond ring, a diamond necklace, and an emerald green dress (2 hours)
        Diamond ring: Loads on Myosilla in the Githyanki. From zone entrance (@), go all N, search, all D, all N, E, search, all U.
        Diamond necklace: Loads on Myosilla in the Githyanki.
        Emerald green dress: Loads on Myosilla in the Githyanki.
      3. to give a diamond ring, a diamond necklace and an emerald green dress to the elven queen (50 minutes)
        As above.

        a white satin gown, edged with freshwater pearls and diamonds: Loads in Tharhalas.

      Outfit the Faerie [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Kaycee, Cirtheck
      Additions by: Mandroth, Dorodai, Cildanor
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Yldari, Ryvaera
      Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a dancing faerie (45 minutes)
        In Yldari. From entrance, go 2N, 2W, N.
      2. to find a black silk dress, hemmed in silver threads and golden chains with blue lapis beads and the wings of a sodalite naiad and a braided gold bracelet and long, dangling earrings with golden beads and a silver ankle bracelet (50 minutes)
        In Ryvaera, on the naiads. From western @, go E until D, then D and look around for:
        a black silk dress, hemmed in silver threads: on hematite naiad
        a golden chains with blue lapis beads: on lapis naiad
        the wings of a sodalite naiad: on sodalite naiad
        a braided gold bracelet        : on carnelian naiad
        long, dangling earrings with golden beads: on carnelian naiad
        silver ankle bracelet: on moonstone naiad.
      3. to give a black silk dress, hemmed in silver threads and golden chains with blue lapis beads and the wings of a sodalite naiad and a braided gold bracelet and long, dangling earrings with golden beads and a silver ankle bracelet to a dancing faerie (45 minutes)
        As above.

      Oven Mitts for Uvian [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zasildar
      Additions by: Xercan
      Level: 24
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Brookhaven
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Uvian, the baker (1 hour)
        In Brookhaven. From zone entrance, go 2N, E.
      2. to give a pair of quilted oven mitts to Uvian, the baker (2 hours)
        Loads in Dragmire. From "At the Checkpoint," go W to Barracks Road then S until there's an E exit called "A Muddy Road." Then go all E to the barracks, open door, E, N, E, S. Mitts load on the cook.

      Overthrow the Master [Complete]

      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Dark Escarpment
      Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a rebel klastakor (1 hour)
        In Dark Escarpment. From entrance to zone, go U, 6 W, S (hidden), S, 2E. You've just entered a 3x3 area of rooms; there's a key called "a finger bone" in at least one of them. Move from room to room and type "Get all mound" until you have the finger bone key. Then continue passing through the 3x3 area by going all E, 2S, all W until you see this mob.
      2. to kill Tastaniumus, the Tunnelmaster (2 hours, 40 minutes)
        Go back the way you came: all E, 2N, all W. Go N, then all W through 2Doors. (Use the bone key.) The Tunnelmaster loads here.

      Overthrowing the Empress [Complete]

      Additions by: Pleen
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate (solo)
      Locale(s): E'nat'dae
      Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a member of the council (30 minutes)
        In E'nat'dae. From recall, go 8N, 3W.
      2. to kill the Empress, J'Inaere il'Rafie and a guard commander and the captain of the Imperial Guard (1 hour)
        All in E'nat'dae.

        Commander: from recall, go 8N, 2W, S.
        Captain: from recall, go 2N, E.
        Empress: from recall, go all N, all U, all S and look around.

      3. to find a member of the council (30 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to kill 4 of a member of the council (30 minutes)
        These pop in the above room.

      Pain In The Actor! [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Bost
      Additions by: Sutanal, Vashka
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Medievia
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find an actor portraying Lyrya Lan'y'nal (no limit)
        In Lyryanoth. From recall, go 3S, 3W, open door, 2N.
      2. to give a firebreather to an actor portraying Lyrya Lan'y'nal (30 minutes)
        Buy at Fine Wines and Cheesy Nibbles in Med City. Fromrecall, go 5E, all N.
      3. to give a strip of jerked wormhide to an actor portraying Lyrya Lan'y'nal (1 hour)
        In Rhaiaden. Loads in a cabinet in a room called "Inside a Hidden Talarths Refuge."
      4. to give bits of fungi to an actor portraying Keine Noth (1 hour)
        Bits of fungi are found in E'urden Zilartzen on fungus darkling mobs. Enter the zone; you'll be immediately transported to a room called "On Top of a Thick, Crinkled Silver Carpet." Go S, then E. There should be several fungus darkling mobs in the area. (Be sure to get at least two bits of fungi: one to give to the actor, and one to exit when you are ready to exit the zone!)
      5. to give 8 of steak on a stake to a member of the audience (30 minutes)
        In New Ashton. From southern @, go N, 3E, N.

      Paint for Ruellia Artist [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Disiku
      Additions by: Jonuv
      Level: 25, 26, 29
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Ruellia
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a village artist (1 hour)
        In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N, then E to Dragondale Drive. The artist loads here.
      2. to find a village trader (20 minutes)
        Go 4W, S, 3W, 2N to the market area.
      3. to find a room called A Massive Cache (1 hour)
        out of village follow path s along fissure to e exit walk e walk e d kill serpant search w til n all n. Note: a polished wooden staff loads in your inventory.
      4. to give a polished wooden staff etched with frost to a village trader (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Paint Needed for Kitchen Remodeling [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Neverra
      Additions by: Sulin
      Level: 18, 19
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a retired ship captain (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go 7S, 4E, 2S, W.
      2. to give a can of yellow paint to a retired ship captain (1 hour)
        Loads in Enara on Yaxley. From entrance of Enara, go 2N, 4E, 4N, E, N, E, N (into NPK), 3E, N, E, 2N, 3W to "Before A Village of Wagons." Then go W and S to find Yaxley.

      Painting of Medievia [Complete]

      Additions by: J R
      Completed by: Rarazona
      Level: 24, 26
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Ruellia, Mt. Vryce, Med City, Dragmire
      Total Time: 4 hours, 55 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a village artist (1 hour)
        In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N, then E. The artist is usually found on Dragondale Drive.
      2. to find a room called The Highest Point of Medievia (30 minutes)
        In Mt. Vryce. From the zone entrance, go N, all U, N, all E, S, all E, N, all E, 3S, all E, all U, S, all U.
      3. to kill 3 of an assassin of the Veiled Society (10 minutes)
        These spawn automatically in the room.
      4. to find an assassin of the Veiled Society (30 minutes)
        From Med recall, enter warrior and go 2W, 2S, D and find a room named "The Secret Prison." Search in this room, then go U and search, then all E to assassin (mob is hidden).
      5. to find Kengil, the crime baron (30 minutes)
        From Med recall, enter thief, then go 3S, then D. Go N, W, 4N, E, 2N, 2W, D, W, U. Get the key ("an iron key, stamped with a large "K") which loads on "a puny halfling thief." Then go D, E, U, 2E, 2S, W, 2S, W, D, 3W. (Note: a few of the exits are invisible; you have to search first. The last door is locked.)
      6. to kill a disguised orc (5 minutes)
        This pops in the room with you.
      7. to find Filwar (1 hour)
        From entrance to Dragmire, go W, U, N, D, 4W, 2N, W, N.
      8. to kill Filwar and 20 of a disguised orc (10 minutes)
        These pop in the room with you (be ready!)
      9. to find a room called The Highest Point of Medievia (30 minutes)
        As above. You will receive a parchment.
      10. to give a parchment to a village artist (30 minutes)

      Paladin's Holy Quest Against Horneg [Needs Detail]

      Level: 24
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Horneg's
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a paladin guard (30 minutes)
        In Med City, Clerics' Quarter.
      2. to give a shirt of flayed daemon skin or a band of human flesh to a paladin guard (1 hour)
        Load in Horneg's Keep. Note: this is solo, find-original, and no-death.

      Palette for the Painter [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Ceresir
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): The Village of Ruellia, Esacha Fen
      Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a village artist (40 minutes)
        In Ruellia in the town section. See ">Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N, then E to Dragondale Drive. The artist loads here.
      2. to find an ethereal paintbrush and a ghostly painter's palette (1 hour)
        Both pop in the Esacha Fen on the ghost of Alphonse.

        From entrance to Esacha Fen, go 3N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E, N (hidden exit), E, N, 2E, S, E, S, E, 2S, 2E, 4N, open gate, N, W, 2N, W. Look for "The ghost of a middle-aged man gazes into the fen with a critical eye." Note: he is no-melee and does not leave a corpse; get the items off the ground after killing him.

      3. to give an ethereal paintbrush and a ghostly painter's palette to a village artist (40 minutes)
        As above.

      Panpipes for a Satyr [Complete]

      Contributed by: Akinic
      Additions by: Bhalodus
      Level: 19, 24
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Mystical Forest, Preserve
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a satyr (1 hour)
        In Mystical Forest. From south entrances, go 3N and look around.
      2. to find pan pipes (2 hours)
        Loads in Preserve. From zone entrance (@), go: W, W, W, N, E, N, W, W, W, S, W, S, E, search, S, D, all E (you will have to ethereal through a door.) Kill the Consort for the panpipes.
      3. to give panpipes to a satyr (1 hour)
        As above.

      Parchment for Gremmon [Complete]

      Contributed by: Helitus, Shaedehart
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Sonedal Ravine
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go 4W, N, W, N, U, N.
      2. to give a bundle of parchment to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (1 hour)
        In Sonedal Ravine. From western @, follow path east and down. The crazy old man running around is Dulen, the peddler. Buy it from him.

      Party at the Altruistica [Complete]

      Contributed by: Afiniti
      Additions by: Bhalodus
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Ruellia, Gnomenel
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a barmaid (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter mage, then go N, W, N.
      2. to find 3 of a piece of vanilla cake and some festive streamers and 3 of a fizzy drink in a tall mug (2 hours)
        a piece of vanilla cake: In Med City. From recall, enter thief, then go 4E, 2N, W.
        some festive streamers: Festive streamers are found in Ruellia on Heucher in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N, all W, S, W, W, W, W, S, S, S. Heucher is hidden in this area.
        a fizzy drink in a tall mug: In Gnomenel. In a tray in "Number One Ceranel Street." From zone entrance (@), go all E till the intersection of Main and Ceranel Street. Then go 4S, 2W, get all tray.
      3. to give 3 of a piece of vanilla cake and some festive streamers and 3 of a fizzy drink in a tall mug to a barmaid (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Party Drinks for Kryor [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Level: 22, 24, 25
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Trellor, Wytherwind, Med City, Dragmire
      Total Time: 4 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Kryor, the wine merchant (10 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go E, E, E, E, E, S, E.
      2. to give a bottle of FretherField White from the Wytherwind Winery, 4 of a saucer of milk, 3 of Pixie's Pure Spirits, and 6 of a bottle of Dragmire Stout to Kryor, the wine merchant (4 hours)
        a bottle of FretherField White from the Wytherwind Winery: In Wytherwind on the underground level. From the zone entrance, go all S (to "Deep in the Mire"), W, W, W, S, S, S, search, D, D. (Be sure you're breathing water.) Go W, N, N, W, S, W, W, N, N, W. Get the crow bar. Go down to a room called "An Underwater Wine Cellar." Unlock crate, open crate, and get all crate.
        a saucer of milk: in Med City. From Med recall, enter mage, all W, search, D.
        Pixie's Pure Spirits: in Med City. From Med recall, enter mage, W, N, N.
        a bottle of Dragmire Stout: in Dragmire. From zone entrance (@), go W, U, N, D, 7 W, 4N, E.

      Party for a Princess [Complete]

      Contributed by: Venesia
      Additions by: Makadar, Antdos
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Ryvaera, Ruellia, Gypsy Camp,Med City, El Cantara, Trellor, Riverton
      Total Time: 3 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Nyxaia, the daughter of the empress (30 minutes)
        In Ryvaera. From zone entrance ("On the Surface of the River"), go 2S, D, E, D to "A Palace Balcony," then go N, W, N.
      2. to give brightly colored streamers or some festive streamers to Nyxaia, the daughter of the empress (1 hour)
        some festive streamers: Festive streamers are found in Ruellia on Heucher in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N, all W, S, W, W, W, W, S, S, S. Heucher is hidden in this area.
      3. to give 5 of a slice of butter cream cake and 5 of a dish of strawberries and cream and 5 of a chocolate chip cookie and 5 of a chunk of almond brittle to Nyxaia, the daughter of the empress (45 minutes)
        Cake and Strawberries: from Gypsy Camp. From entrance, D, E, all S, W, S, E to A Concession Stand.
        Cookie: from Med City. From recall, enter thief, 4E 2N W to The Bakery
        Almond Brittle: from El Cantara. From entrance, U, 2N, E, 6N, 2W, N to Hasanya's Bakery.
      4. to give 5 of a tall glass of lemonade to Nyxaia, the daughter of the empress (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter thief, 4E, S, 3W, S, W and buy them.
      5. to give 5 of a topaz and ruby necklace or 5 of the Tiger Jewel or 5 of a fiery green emerald to Nyxaia, the daughter of the empress (30 minutes)
        Emerald and Tiger: from Trellor. From recall, 5W 4N W to Khal's Jewellery
        Necklace: from Riverton. From N entrance, go 4S, W to Riverton's Fine Jewels. Note: these are 10,000 gold each, so it's cheaper to get the jewellery from Trellor instead.

      Party Supplies for Desarius [Incomplete]

      Additions by: Klerity
      Level: 24
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Quinstone, E'nat'dae
      Total Time: 1 hour
      Objectives:
      1. to find Desarius, Commander of Division A (1 hour)
        In Quinstone's Keep. You need the tarnished crucifix key to open his hatch.
      2. to find a candle lantern made from a hollow gourd and 10 of a tiny vanilla cake, with pink frosting and red sprinkles (2 hours)
        a candle lantern made from a hollow gourd: In Gnomenel. From recall, go 2W, S, and look around for a mob who loads it.
        a tiny vanilla cake, with pink frosting and red sprinkles: buy in the Imperial Bakery in E'nat'dae.
        Note: this is find-original.

      Patching the Bell Tower's Bells [Incomplete]

      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Graveyard, Goland's Tower, Tharhalas
      Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the bellringer (30 minutes)
        In the top level of the Church in the northeast corner of the Graveyard. From "The Cathedral Foyer," go W, U, W, 3 U.
      2. to find Harash (30 minutes)
        Harash is found in Med City, in the market area. From recall, go E, E, E, N, N, N.
      3. to give a set of tiny, metal tools, a bronze breastplate, a bronze helmet, and bronze axe to Harash (2 hours)
        Tuthluth in Goland's Tower has the first; the last 3 are found in Tharhalas.

      Peace Treaty from the Fairy Queen [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Eleazar, Krieven
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Preserve, E'urtzen
      Total Time: 5 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Fairy Queen (1 hour)
        In the Preserve. From zone entrance (@), go: W, W, W, N, E, N, W, W, W, S, W, S, E, search, S, D, all E (you will have to ethereal through a door.) Kill the Consort for his key. Unlock the door to the E then go E. The Fairy Queen loads here.
      2. to find Amulttssu, the Scribe Weaver ()
        In E'urtzen. From zone entrance, go S, E, all S, E, S, 2E,S, E, N (CPK).
      3. to kill 5 of a winged Ioio (1 hour)
        These pop in the room with you.
      4. to find Amulttssu, the Scribe Weaver ()
        As above.
      5. to find the Fairy Queen ()
        As above.

      Pearl for Amphritrite [Complete]

      Contributed by: Ceresir
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): The Lost City of Lattyrna, Pirate Ship
      Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Amphritrite (30 minutes)
        From zone entrance, go all D, 2E, all north to herald, kill herald for the dolphin-shaped key, go N, unlock door, go U then N to Amphritrite.
      2. to find a giant pearl (1 hour, 40 minutes)
        Pearls load in Pirate Ship, on the lookout, ship's cook, and navigator mobs. Dirs to lookout: From @, ALL N, E, U, 2N, 2E, 3U.
        Dirs to Cook: From @, All N, E, U, 2N, 2E, 3N, pick hatch D, D, All S.
        Dirs to Navigator: From @, All N, E, U, S, 2E, search, D, E, S.
      3. to give a giant pearl to Amphritrite (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Contributed by: Zasildar
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Sardhara, the jeweler (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, N, 2W.
        2.
      2. to give a luminous black pearl and a gleaming plate of mother of pearl and a lopsided, pale pink pearl to Sardhara, the jeweler (2 hours)
        All load in in E'urdin. From recall, go 2E, 2N, W, N (some rooms are cramped.) There will be a pickable locked trapdoor up; go U, and the pearl loads here.

      Pellets for a Mage [Complete]

      Contributed by: Rarazona

      Level:
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Enara
      Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the ghostly image of a sorcerer (1 hour)
        In Castle Med. From the top of the dragon staircase, go: all W, all U, all S.
      2. to give an owl pellet to the ghostly image of a sorcerer (45 minutes)
        Loads in Enara on screech owls. From zone entrance, go 2N, 7W, N, W, 11N, E, 5N, E, 6N, E, search, 2N and look around (hidden exits) for owls.

      Pickaxe Shortage in Riverton [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Shanoyu

      Locale(s): Riverton, Spirited

      Objectives:
      1. to find the mayor (30 minutes)

      Pilgrimage to Mount Vryce [Complete]

      Contributed by: Urand
      Level: 22, 23
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Riverton, Mount Vryce, Wilderness
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find a devout pilgrim (30 minutes)
        In Riverton, wandering randomly.
      2. to find a room called The Northern Entrance to Riverton (5 minutes)
        Just S of the northern @ to town.
      3. to find a room called A Raging Waterfall (1 hour, 15 minutes)
        This is the first room inside the @ in Mt. Vryce, north through the wilderness from Med City. Note: this is no-dragon and no-portal.
      4. to find a room called Next to the Falls (5 minutes)
        From A Raging Waterfall, go N, all U, N, E, S, all E, S, E, E, N, 4E, 3S, all E.
      5. to find a room called A Small Landing (5 minutes)
        From Next to the Falls, go all U, S.
      6. to find a room called The Highest Point of Medievia (5 minutes)
        From A Small Landing, go all U.

      Pilgrimage to the Angel of Redemption [Complete]

      Additions by: Egani
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Alcordian
      Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a monk of Mercy Abbey (30 minutes)
        From Med City recall, enter Cleric, then go 5E and look around.
      2. to find a room called Trudging Through a Marshy Terrain (1 hour)
        This is the entrance room to Alcordian. Note: this step is no-dragon.
      3. to kill 3 of a skeletal warrior and 2 of a warrior of Ara and 2 of a minion of evil (1 hour)
        These load randomly in Alcordian.
      4. to find the angel of Redemption (15 minutes)
        From zone entrance, go all S, E, 4S, 5W, 2 N.

      Pirate Hat for Ghostly Sailor [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Bhalodus
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Fury, Pirate Ship, Enara/Esacha
      Total Time: 4 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a snarling buccaneer (1 hour)
        On the Fury, located randomly on the main deck.
      2. to kill 3 of the angry pirate and 2 of the drunk pirate and 4 of the midshipman (1 hour)
        On the Pirate Ship.
      3. to kill Captain Amos Trask (40 minutes)
        Located on the Pirate Ship. From @ entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, E, E. After you kill amos, the Pirate Captain's hat will load in your inventory.
      4. to give the Pirate Captain's hat to the ghost of a sailor (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        On Esacha Fen, in the room A Gypsy Mausoleum in the cemetery (all north from cemetery entrance). The cemetery is located in the NE part of Esacha Fen.

      Pirate Rivals [Complete]

      Contributed by: Mandroth
      Level: 28, 29
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Fury, Pirate Ship
      Total Time: 3 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Captain Amos Trask (40 minutes)
        In Pirate Ship. From zone entrance (@), go 4N, E, U, S, U, 2E.
      2. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour)
        From the base of the mast on the main deck of the Fury, go all S, W, D, E, N, 3W, pick door south, open door S, 2S.
      3. to give Captain Amos's gloves to Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        The gloves load back on Amos. He's a tough mob -- get some help.

      2. to find pink bunny rabbit pajamas (1 hour)
        Found on Danny in Sceptrum NPK. From @, go 6N, E, enter mirror, 3D, N, W, N.

      Planning Picnic Party [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Nezryth
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Brookhaven, Crystal Lake, Enara, Gypsy Camp, Gnomenel, Sceptrum Isachi
      Total Time: 11 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Kaltana (1 hour)
        In Brookhaven. From @, go N, all E, all N, E, S.
      2. to find a camper's picnic basket ( )
        In Crystal Lake. These can be found in the northwest (campground) and southeast (picnic area) parts of the zone.
      3. to give a camper's picnic basket to Kaltana ()
        As above.
      4. to find a handful of nuts and berries ()
        In the Rhaiaden, inside a cabinet in the Hashendi hidden encampment.
      5. to find a loaf of bread ()
        Loads on the citizens of Enara inside a shopping basket.
      6. to give a loaf of bread and a handful of nuts and berries to Kaltana ()
        As above.
      7. to find a butter cream cake and a dish of strawberries and cream ()
        Sold at the concession stand in the Gypsy Camp.
      8. to give a butter cream cake and a dish of strawberries and cream to Kaltana ()
        As above.
      9. to give a fizzy drink in a tall mug to Kaltana ( )
        In Gnomenel. In a tray in "Number One Ceranel Street." From zone entrance (@), go all E till the intersection of Main and Ceranel Street. Then go 4S, 2W, get all tray.
      10. to find a patchwork quilt ()
        In Sceptrum Isachi. From zone entrance, go N till U, then all U. Open chest, get all chest.
      11. to give a patchwork quilt to Kaltana ()
        As above.
      12. to find a woman's romance novel ()
        In Crystal Lake. From zone entrance, go N, W, 7N, D. Kill cat, loot claws, unlock chest.
      13. to give a woman's romance novel to Kaltana ()
        As above.

      Playing with Pirates [Complete]

      Contributed by: Asylium
      Level: 23, 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Trellor, Pirate Ship
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Stormwatch Commander in Trellor (30 minutes)
        From Trellor recall, go 6N on "The Main Road of Trellor" to the Commander.
      2. to kill 10 of either the pirate, the angry pirate, a pirate, a cursing pirate, or the buccaneer(45 minutes)
        Located on the Pirate Ship. This is a no-summon, no-phase objective.
      3. to give a cutlass to the Stormwatch Commander (46 minutes, time extended)
        Cutlasses load on the swashbuckler, or you can have one hoarded (this is not a find-original objective.) Return it to the Stormwatch Commander in Trellor.

      Polluted Waters [Complete]

      Contributed by: Geengyr
      Level:
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Trellor, Animated Chessboard
      Total Time: hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:

        In Trellor. From recall, go N to docks then all W and look around.
      2. to give a purple, crystalline periapt to a fisherman (40 minutes)
        purple, crystalline periapt: from the Animated Chessboard. From the entrance to Courrain Island, go N, E, N, W, N. For the barrel ride, "give 100 coins man." The room you land in has 2 hidden serpents who load the periapts.
