      Poseidon's Bidding [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Xianra
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Lattyrna, Pship
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Poseidon (45 minutes)
        From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 5 N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key, or pick the lock. Go N, unlock door, U, W. You are given a carving of a mermaid.
      2. to kill Captain Amos Trask and 2 of a cursing pirate and 2 of the drunk pirate and 2 of the angry pirate and 2 of a very drunk pirate ()
        In Pirate Ship.
      3. to find Poseidon ()
        As above.

      Poseidon's Fury [Complete]

      Additions by: Bhalodus
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Lattyrna
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
        In Lattyrna. From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 5 N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, U, W.
      2. to kill 3 of a carousing pirate and 3 of a dark-skinned swashbuckler and Ramarke, captain of the Fury (2 hours)
        Dark-skinned swashbuckler: the deck of Fury.
        Carousing pirate: From the entrance to the Fury, go all N/E/W/S (depending on orientation) then go U, U, E, 7S, W, D and look around.
        Ramarke, captain of the Fury: From the entrance to the Fury, go go all N/E/W/S (depending on orientation) then go U, U, E, 7S, W, D, E, N, W, W, W, S, S.
      3. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Poseidon's Nightmares [Complete]

      Additions by: Omerlax
      Level: 26, 28
      Difficulty: very hard (last step is no-death)
      Locale(s): Lattyrna
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Kisarethalsa (30 minutes, 54 minutes with extension)
        At the top of the northwest tower in Lattyrna. From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 3N to "Ivory Road, Near the Gates." Go W, W, W, all N, W, N, all U, W, S.
      2. to find Amphritrite (30 minutes)
        Return to "Ivory Road, Near the Gates." Go N, N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, U, N.
      3. to find Kisarethalsa (30 minutes
        As above.
      4. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
        As above to Amphitrite, except go U, W at the end of the sequence. Poseidon will give you a key.
      5. to kill Leviathan (2 hours)
        From Poseidon, go E, D, unlock grate, go all D then S. Leviathan is a very tough aggro mob. This is a no-death step, but you can have help.
      6. to find a room called A Ladder (10 minutes)
        From above, N, then all U.

      Potion Components for the Ageless [Complete]

      Contributed by: Pleen
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Rydhordel, Wytherwind
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Antygon, the Master Enchanter (40 minutes)
        In Wytherwind. From entrance ("A Roofless Entryway"), go 3W, N, 2W, 3S, U, 2S, 5W, S, U, S, E, U, E, 3W, S, D. Note: You are teleported to Rydhordel Woods.
      2. to find the braided mane of an alabaster unicorn and the shimmering hooves of an alabaster unicorn (30 minutes)
        From entrance, go N, then follow the maze to "An Entrance into the Park" (if you exit the maze at "A Monumental Fountain Carved of Amber," go 4S.) From "An Entrance to the Park," go 3S, 5W, N.
      3. to find Antygon, the Master Enchanter (30 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give the braided mane of an alabaster unicorn and the shimmering hooves of an alabaster unicorn to Antygon, the Master Enchanter (5 minutes)
        As above.

      Potions for Figgen [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Necaras
      Level: 18
      Difficulty: moderate (solo)
      Locale(s): New Genesia, Med City, Labyrinth, Trellor
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find Figgen the Hermit (30 minutes)
        In New Genesia. From recall, go D, 4E, 2S, open door W, W.
      2. to find a green potion and a godlike potion and a menthol potion and a golden potion (40 minutes)
        Green potion: in Labyrinth. Godlike: In Med City. From recall, go 3E, 2N. Golden: In Trellor. From recall, go 5N, 6E, N. Menthol: In Trellor. From recall, go 5N, 6E.
        Note: These potions have to be purchsed at shops and cannot be looted
      3. to give a green potion and a godlike potion and a menthol potion and a golden potion to Figgen the Hermit ( )
        As above.

      Potions for Medievia Health Services [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Shaedehart
      Additions by: Kethric
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Medievia, Riverton, Sonedal Ravine
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a room called Medievia Health Services (30 minutes)
        In Med City: from recall, enter cleric, 2W, N.
      2. to find 6 of a greenish potion and 24 of a green potion and 12 of a golden seal potion (2 hours)
        greenish potions: load in Sonedal on the cynomies. From @,go D, E, D, E, D, E, D, S, E, S, S to the laboratory. From here, go 2N and look for Dulen the Wandering Peddler. Buy vial from Dulen and return to the laboratory. Type "pour blue, pour blue, pour red" to end up with a lavender potion. Quaff potion. Then go N, D, and look around for cynomies.
        green potions: load in Sonedal and in most clantowns on random mobs. They can also be purchased in the Labyrinth.
        golden seal potions: buy in Riverton at the Chemist Shop. From northern @, go S, 5W, S, E.
      3. to find a room called Medievia Health Services (20 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give 6 of a greenish potion and 24 of a green potion and 12 of a golden seal potionto a clergyman (4 minutes)
        He loads in the room with you.

      Potions for Wounded Guard [Complete]

      Contributed by: Alyxe, Sulivan
      Additions by: Amarante
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Yldari, Haven
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a wounded guard (45 minutes)
        In Yldari. From zone entrance, go all N, W, all N, W, U to guard.
      2. to give 5 green potion and 5 golden seal potions to a wounded guard (45 minutes)
        From Trellor recall, go 4E, all N, E, N, buy 5 gold seal potions.
        From Labyrinth entrance, go 3E, S, 3E, 3S, 3E, 3S, 3W, 4S,E, 3S, E, buy 5 green potions.

      Poto's Stolen Tools [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Helitus
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Quinstone, Esacha
      Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:

        In Quinstone Keep. From @, go 3W, S, W, S.
      2. to find a saw and an adze and an awl and a hammer and a coil of mossy rope (2 hours)
        in Esacha Fen.
        a saw, an adze, and an awl: in a metal toolbox on an apprentice in the eastern part of zone.
        a coil of mossy rope: in the drydock in the eastern part of zone.
        a hammer: on a bargeowner in the western part of zone
      3. to give a saw, an adze, an awl, a hammer, and a coil of mossy rope to Poto, the groundskeeper (1 hour)
        As above.

      Powers For The Hedge Witch [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Ororuque

      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Karlisna, Thunderhoume
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:

        In Karlisna. From entrance go all E.
      2. to find the earth crystal (no limit)
        Loads in Thunderhoume on Master Thief. From @ go N, 3D, N, 3D, search, D, E, N, 3E, 2D, 2N, 3W, 3N, search, D. Note: Master thief is pretty tough and is !flee and !backstab; at least 2 heroes/elementals is recommended.
      3. to find the hedge witch ()
        As above.

      Prayer Book Stolen from the Trellorian Museum [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Antdos
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Trellor, Sonedal
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the high priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From Trellor recall, go U, 2N, U, 2N, U.
      2. to give a prayer book to the high priestess of Trell (3 hours)
        In the Sonedal Ravine, on a cleric gnome. See Sonedal walkthrough (link not available) if you need help.

      Preparations [Complete]

      Level: 27
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Fury
      Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Ramarke, Captain of the Fury (1 hour)
        From the entrance to the Fury, go E, N, U, U, E, 7S, W, D, E, N, W, W, W, S, S.
      2. to kill 9 of the Trellor gate watchman (50 minutes)
        Located at the gates of Trellor in groups of three.
      3. to kill 10 of the Stormwatch Mercenary and the Stormwatch Commander (25 minutes)
        Randomly in Trellor.
      4. to kill 8 of the Trellor Cityguard (25 minutes)
        Randomly in Trellor.

      Preparations for Janitor's Big Date [Complete]

      Contributed by: Pleen
      Level: 22
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Crystal Lake, Braneri, Gypsy Camp
      Total Time: 5 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a cheerful janitor (30 minutes)
        In Med City Mage Quarter.
      2. to give a woman's romance novel to a cheerful janitor (2 hours)
        In Crystal Lake. From zone entrance, go N, W, 7N, D. Kill cat, loot claws, unlock chest.
      3. to give 2 of a glass of red wine and 2 of a glass of white wine and 2 of a lobster to a cheerful janitor (1 hour)
        Buy these in the Pipe Bowl and the Fish Market in Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 11W, N to the Pipe Bowl. Then go S, 3W to the Fish Market.
      4. to give 3 of a tall candle to a cheerful janitor (1 hour)
        In Braneri. From zone entrance, go N, W, 7N, W, D, N, W, S and look in crate for first one. Then go N, E, S, U, E, N, E, N, U, N, give coin usher, N and get all candle for 2 more candles.
      5. to find a dish of strawberries and cream (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Gypsy Camp. From entrance, go D, E, 3S, W, S, E, buy dish.
      6. to find a room called Entrance to the Tunnel of Love (30 minutes)
        From above, go 2W, S, 2W, 3N, give ticket collector, 2W, D.
      7. to give a dish of strawberries and cream to a cheerful janitor (5 minutes)
        The janitor loads in the room with you.

      Preparations for Yaxley's Birthday [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Antdos, Willowbrooke
      Level: 20, 22
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Enara/Esacha, Braneri, Gnomenel
      Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Yamka (40 minutes)
        In Esacha Fen. On Yamka's barge.
      2. to give 2 of a bunch of bananas and a small pile of oranges and a small pile of apples and a coconut bra and a pair of pink satin ballet slippers and some blackberries to Yamka (2 hours)
        a bunch of bananas: in Braneri.
        a small pile of oranges: in Braneri.
        a small pile of apples: in Braneri.
        a coconut bra: in Gnomenel, Number One Ceranel Street (SE part of zone.)
        a pair of pink satin ballet slippers: in E'nat'dae, on the ballerina. From entrance, go N, W, 8N, W, D (during daytime hours. At nighttime, go to her cottage off A Wooded Lane, Lined with Cottages.)
        some blackberries: in Rydhordel Woods.

      Presents for a Lady [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Trilok
      Additions by: Dima
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Riverton, Barbegazian Alps, The Preserve, Medievia city
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find a lady of Riverton (30 minutes)
        In Riverton, on Emerald Avenue. From northern @, go S to Emerald Avenue then W.
      2. to find a pair of razor-sharp ice skates, a chocolate brownie, and a small child's toy (no limit)
        razor-sharp ice skates: Load in Alps. After going down the slope, look for an ice skating faerie.
        Chocolate brownie: On a brownie in the Preserve. From the zone entrance (@), go 2W, N, E, N, 2W, S, 2W ("Crossing a Wooden Bridge"), S, E, search, S (hidden opening), D, E, search, S. The brownies will be in these rooms.
        a small child's toy: In Med City. From recall, go all west to Dragon Court, go north to Street of Artisans, go 2W, S, and buy toy.
      3. to give razor-sharp ice skates, a chocolate brownie, and a small child's toy to a lady of Riverton (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Contributed by: Altisa

      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Labyrinth, Goblin Castle,
      Total Time: 1 hour, 25 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
        In Frequent Pathways.
      2. to kill the Goblin King and 7 of a mountain goblin and 4 of the goblin guard and 1 of a gray goblin and 2 of a hobgoblin and 2 of a hobgoblin (40 minutes)
        From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E(first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S,all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all 5W, 6S, U, 4W, U.

      Protect Kengil from the Curse [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Archamidis
      Level: 13
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Underground Tunnel, Trellor
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find Kengil, the crime baron (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter thief. Then go 3S, go D, N, W, 4N, E, 2N, 2W, D, W, U. Kill "a puny halfling thief" and get "an iron key" from it. Then go D, E, U, 2E, 2S, W, 2S, W (invisible exit, search), D (invisible exit, search), 2W, unlock door W.
      2. to get 5 of "a pitch-black scroll" (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 5E, 4N, E, U at Beldarin's Magic Shop. Buy here.
      3. to give 5 of a pitch-black scroll to Kengil, the crime baron (30 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to kill Kengil, the crime baron, and 4 of a minion of the crime baron (45 minutes)
        Note: these load in the room with you.

      Protect the Fairies [Complete]

      Level: 14
      Difficulty: easy-moderate
      Locale(s): Preserve
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Fairy Queen (1 hour)
        In the Preserve. From zone entrance (@), go: W, W, W, N, E, N, W, W, W, S, W, S, E, search, S, D, all E (you will have to ethereal through a door.) Kill the Consort for his key. Unlock the door to the E then go E. The Fairy Queen loads here.
      2. to kill 8 of either a wolf or a cougar (1 hour)
        These load on the upper level of the zone. From the Fairy Queen's room, go W until you can go U, then U, N, W, N, E, N, all W, U then follow the path E.
      3. to find the Fairy Queen (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Protect the Guard! [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Lurlia
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Medievia Guardsman (30 minutes)
        In Med City.
      2. to find the gauntlets of protection (no limit)
        At Eldrick's Tomb on the mud golem.
      3. to give the gauntlets of protection to a Medievia Guardsman (30 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to find a ring of protection (no limit)
        In Crime Underground on Vonliege. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!) Vonliege loads here.
      5. to give a ring of protection to a Medievia Guardsman (30 minutes)
        As above.
      6. to find a belt of protection (no limit)
        Loads on Horneg in Horneg's Keep. From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here.
      7. to give a belt of protection to a Medievia Guardsman (30 minutes)

      2. to give a horseman's whip to Johansva, the stable keeper (30 minutes)
        Horseman's whip loads on the stableboy in good Derah. From Derah recall, all W to business square then S to the stable.

      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): good Derah, evil Derah

        Located in Derah.

      Protect Young Raven [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Afiniti
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Castiack
      Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a frightened young raven (1 hour)
        In Castiack. From @, 3N, 3E, S, pick trapdoor, open trapdoor, U.
      2. to kill 5 of a small lynx kitten (2 hours)
        In the western part of the zone. Go E from the non-CPK dead end.
      3. to kill 10 of a lynx hunteress (40 minutes)
        They pop in room with you. This is no-death.

      Protecting the Innocent [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Shaedehart
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Brookhaven, Med City
      Total Time: 4 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a frightened villager ( )
        In Brookhaven. From entrance, 2N, 2W, S, ethereal/pick E.
      2. to find a mercenary (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go east a bit. If not loaded on Market Street, try the Warrior Quarter.
      3. to kill 20 of either an armored vhartog, a snarling vhartog, a bloodthirsty vhartog, a vhartog commander (2 hours) (2 hours)
        In Brookhaven. From zone entrance (@), go all N to the gate. The 2.guard has an invisible key; kill him and loot it. Unlock door, open door. Commander is super aggro so invis, sneak, spam N, W, etc until you have an empty room to shield in. Shield room. Try to fight mobs one at a time in shielded rooms. Bringing help is advised.

      Contributed by: Jefry

      Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes

      2. to give a blade of pure energy to the Stormwatch Commander (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Vark Outpost. From entrance, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever, 2N. (Look for the bleached bone key which loads on scout, usually a few E.) From above, with key, go all W, all N, 3E, search, N. Sword laods on the sentries.

      Pub Crawl [Complete]

      Contributed by: VO
      Additions by: Danvil, Xveckthorn, Kadarin
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: easy (but long)
      Locale(s): Med City, Trellor, Medlink, Wilderness, Mystara, Alendora, Kirys Ayr, Derah
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Scruff (no limit)
        In Med City, 3S of recall.
      2. to find Olaffson, the head bartender (no limit)
        In Med City. From Med recall, enter warrior, then go E, E, E, E, S, S, W, W.
      3. to find Pite (no limit)
        At the Pitch Bucket in Med City. From recall, go 11S, 4W, 2N, E.
      4. to find Shorril (no limit)
        Near the docks in Med City. From the previous step, go W, 4S, E.
      5. to find the bartending golem (no limit)
        From Med recall, enter mage. Go all W, search, D.
      6. to find Heron the Bartender (no limit)
        In Trellor. (Note: this step is no-portal.) From recall, go 5E, 3N, E, 2S.
      7. to kill the drunken brawler (no limit)
        Located in Heron's Tavern.
      8. to find the drinkmaker (no limit)
        Located in any inn in which morgan horses are sold.
      9. to find Surgund (no limit)
        In Mystara. From the entrance, go 3W, S, W.
      10. to find Torranus, barkeeper of the Prized Boar (no limit)
        See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, S.
      11. to find Tomaras the bartender (no limit)
        In Kirys Ayr. From entrance, go E until you can go U, then go all U until you see the tavern.
      12. to find the bartender (no limit)
        In good Derah. From entrance, go 6N, W, N, 2W, all N.
      13. to find Scruff (no limit)
        As above.
      14. to find The Whaler's Inn (no limit)
        In Med City. From recall, go 15S, 3W, N.

      Pup Magnet [Complete]

      Level: 19, 22, 24
      Difficulty: easy-moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Shadowclaw

      1. to find Scruff (20 minutes)
        In Med City, 3S of recall.
      2. to give a red eye gem to Scruff (45 minutes)
        Red eye gems load on the Red Eye mob in Shadowclaw. From zone entrance to Shadowclaw (@), go S, E, all U, then W along that level.

      Purity for the Forest [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Mielle
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Wittermark, Asnor
      Total Time: 5 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a poor, lost knight (1 hour)
        In Wittermark, NW part.
      2. to find a paladin guard (1 hour)
        In Asnor. Follow the path up and north, go past the gates and look around.
      3. to kill 8 of a roaming giant, 3 of a gigantic woman, 4 of a barbarous-looking giant, and Garlik (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Asnor. From the guard, backtrack to the entrance. The hill giant lair is past one of the east exits, near the entrance to the zone.
      4. to find a paladin guard (30 minutes)
        As above. He will give you the blade called Purity.
      5. to give the blade called Purity to a poor, lost knight (1 hour)
        As above.

      Put Down the Renegade Mermen Revolt [Complete]

      Contributed by: Ymire
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: easy (unpopulated CPK)
      Locale(s): Lattyrna
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
        From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 5 N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, U, W.
        You are given a carving of a mermaid.
      2. to kill 14 of a renegade merman (45 minutes)
        In CPK. From Poseidon go: E, D, 3S, 3W, 6N, 2E, N, E (Common Grounds) then: N for first CPK entry
        S, 3E, S, 2E, then E for (second) CPK entry.
      3. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Putting Lost Souls to Rest [Complete]

      Contributed by: Crazto
      Additions by: Moxaux
      Level: 22
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Trellor, Lost Civilization
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a high priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. See Frequent Pathways.
      2. to kill 12 of a lost soul and 12 of a minion of the damned (1 hour)
        In Lost Civilization. From @, go 2S, D, E, S, D, S, 2W, D, W, S, E, S, D. Wander around to find them (careful, minions are aggro.)

      Queen Rivalry [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Thaspian
      Additions by: Kethric
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Toshi
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Queen Ant Toshi (30 minutes)
        In Toshi. From zone entrance (@), go all N, then follow the path east into the ant area. Go all E, all D, 2N, all E till D, D. Then go all E, up,up
      2. [hidden, presumably] to kill the queen bee and the queen bee's daughter (2 hours)
        In Hives of the Giants.

      Quill for Gremmon [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Sephro
      Level: 26, 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Mellorian Citadel
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall ( )
        From Med recall, go W, W, W, W, N, W, N, U, N.
      2. to give an eagle feather quill to Gremmon, head scribe of City Hall (no limit)
        The quill is found on Captain Oeil in The Mellorian Citadel.

      Quill for the Alchemist [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Maneak, Kernighan

      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Lyngaeli's Nightmare
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a room called The Residence of the Alchemist (1 hour)
        In Med City. From recall, enter mage, then go 4N, 5E.
      2. to give an azure dragonspine quill to a belligerent firedrake (2 hours)
        In Nightmare on the dragon.

      Quill Removal [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Urand
      Level:
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Sceptrum
      Total Time: 3 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a member of the Imperial Guard (30 minutes)
        Load in E'nat'dae, randomly around the zone.
      2. to find the city doctor (25 minutes)
        From entrance, go N, W, N, 7N, W, N.
      3. to give a shining surgeon's scalpel to the city doctor (2 hours)
        These load in Sceptrum on Malsot. From entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, 5N, all E. Search for hidden E exit, then E and look around.
      4. to find a tall citizen (10 minutes)
        From above, go S, E to the room "The Intersection of E'niqae Street and Cherry Blossom Boulevard." Search for hidden exit D, then go D and all N.

      Rabbit Costume for a Masquerade [Complete]

      Contributed by: Devornin
      Additions by: Helitus, Shaedehart

      Level: 11, 13
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Trellor
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a ragamuffin (30 minutes)
        From recall in Med City, enter thief and look around.
      2. to find a pair of rabbit ears (45 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 5S, 2E, S, and buy ears (216 coins.)
      3. to give rabbit ears to ragamuffin (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Rain Summoning Ritual [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Shaedehart
      Additions by: Thralin
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Talqaxtyl's Pyramid, Gloumewood
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find the witch doctor ()
        In Talqaxtyl's Pyramid. From zone recall, go N, 3E, 6N, 2W, 5N, 2E, N, E, 2N (A small dark hut.)
      2. to give a small jar of rainwater to the witch doctor ( )
        In a wooden crate in Gloumewood Farm. From @, go all E to locked gate, then 2N, W, enter ring, "pray." Look around for a black cat. Kill it 9 times, which pops Osiquine. Kill her and get the key to her shack. Look around for a hidden E exit (there are two or more). After going E, go N, unlock door, N, search, U, open crate, get rainwater crate.

      Rat Poison for Danet[Complete]

      Contributed by: Tasia
      Additions by: Zyng, Dweia
      Level: 18, 21
      Difficulty: NPK
      Locales: Gloumewood Farm
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Danet, the stableman (30 minutes)
        In Gloumewood Farm. From @, go all E, all N, U, D (hidden), get needle (key), get to barn door on south side of farm, unlock/open door, S, look around.
      2. to give some rat poison to Danet (2 hours)
        Buy in Mystara Souvenir Shop. From entrance to Mystara, go all W until D, then S, E.

      Reagents for Kregora [Complete]

      Level: 23
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Shadowclaw, Med, Graveyard
      Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Kregora, High Priest of Shadowclaw (55 minutes)
        In Shadowclaw, on the topmost level, W then all south, then search, then south.
      2. to get 3 Yrani roots and 1 vial of holy water
        Yrani roots can be purchased in Medievia in Desigra's Delicatessen. From recall: E, E, E, E, E, N, N, N.
        Vial of holy water is on monk in Graveyard Cathedral.
      3. to give 3 Yrani roots and 1 vial of holy water to Kregora ( )

      Reagents for Marious [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Norgath, Antdos
      Level:       24
      Difficulty: moderate to very hard
      Locale(s): Med City, E'urden Zilartzen, Horneg's, Trellor
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
        See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to give bits of fungi to the wizard (2 hours)
        Bits of fungi are found in E'urden Zilartzen on fungus darkling mobs. Enter the zone; you'll be immediately transported to a room called "On Top of a Thick, Crinkled Silver Carpet." Go S, then E. There should be several fungus darkling mobs in the area. (Be sure to get at least two bits of fungi: one to give to the wizard, and one to exit when you are ready to exit the zone!)
      3. to give eyes of the unborstid to the wizard (1 hour)
        Loads in Horneg's Keep, on the caged mobs near the laboratory.
      4. to give 10 of a menthol potion to the wizard (30 minutes)
        Can be purchased in Trellor. From recall, go 5E, 5N, E.

      Rebuild Mud Golems [Complete]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Additions by: Ceresir and Kovad
      Level: 23, 24, 25, 26
      Difficulty: easy to hard
      Locale(s): Eldrick's, Warrens
      Total Time: 4 hours, 55 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a mud golem (2 hours, 20 minutes)
        In Eldrick's Tomb. From zone entrance, go 7N.
      2. to find 3 of a clump of mud (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Warrens of the Moshata. Loads on mudmen, which ap as "A figure of mud shuffles along the tunnel." From @, go D, all N (into NPK) and look around.
      3. to find a mud golem (1 hour)
        As above.
      4. to give 3 of a clump of mud to a mud golem (5 minutes)
        As above.

      Rebuilding of Karlisna [Complete]

      Additions by : Elagneros, Kernighan
      Level: 19
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Karlisna, Dray'mar
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (23 minutes)
        See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find a hedge witch (30 minutes)
        In Karlisna, all east (The Fountain) from zone entrance.
      3. to find King Kalklinor (15 minutes)
        From the Fountain room, go: 6 W, 3S, all E, search, D, E, E, S, S, E, E, N, E, E, E, N, N ,N, U, U, W, N, N, E, E, S.
      4. to find Ves'pre the First One of Dray'mar (25 minutes)
        In Draymar in the central tower.
      5. to find Drek, the master of timmerite (15 minutes)
        In the Proud Durgeon in Dray'mar, on the north side of the Ring of the Krudar.
      6. to kill 8 of a Ramentor (25 minutes)
        Underneath Dray'mar in the mines.
      7. to find 4 of a small quantity of radiant blue timmerite (10 minutes)
        The small quantities of timmerite load in the mines below Dray'mar. From the mine entrance, go N and E to find the first (loads on the floor.) Go N, E, S to get another one. Then go N, W, S, W, N. The mine is flooded here, so the player will either need a boat or levitation (or can simply wait for repop, and pick up the first two again). Go 2N, E for the third, then S, 2W, S, W for the fourth. There's a fifth one N, W, N from the fourth one.
      8. to give 4 of a small quantity of radiant blue timmerite to King Kalklinor (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Rebuilding Town Using an Earth Spell [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Urand
      Additions by: Jona
      Level: 25, 27, 28
      Difficulty: moderate to hard
      Locale(s): Karlisna, Med
      Total Time: 1 day, 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a hedge witch (1 hour)
        In Karlisna. From zone entrance, go all E and look around.
      2. to give a cobblestone to a hedge witch (1 hour)
        In Med City in Mage Quarter, found on "a burly laborer." From recall, enter mage, then go 4W, 3N.
      3. to give an earth crystal to a hedge witch (1 day)
        Note: this is NOT find-original.
      4. to give a dull grey stone to a hedge witch ( )
        Note: this is NOT find-original. Note: the earth crystal pops back in your inventory, in case you need to borrow someone else's for the above step.

      Contributed by: Saracen
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find Captain Amos Trask ( )
        Located on the Pirate Ship. From entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, E, E. Note: you receive a rolled-up note.
      2. to give a small, rolled-up note to a pirate invader ( )
        In Mellorian.
      3. to give a small, rolled-up note to a carousing pirate ( )
        In Fury.

      Red Crystal For Basalan [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Petros
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Riverton, Riverton Mines
      Total Time: 2 hours, 55 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (20 minutes)
        See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find the mayor (20 minutes)
        See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.
      3. to find a mine foreman (20 minutes)
        See Mines in Frequent Pathways.
      4. to kill 8 of a crystal viper (40 minutes)
        Crystal vipers load randomly in the tunnels nearby.
      5. to find a mine foreman ( )
      6. to kill Malevich (35 minutes)
        At the bottom of the Riverton Mines. From the entrance to the Riverton Mines (south from the West Entrance to Riverton), go all S, all E, and then N until there is a down exit. Go D, W, all S, W, all N, E, S, D to "Beneath the Gladiators' Arena." Go W, W, W, all S, all E, all N, W, all S, W, N, N, D to "A Mined-Out Shaft." Go E, N, W, N, E, N, N. Malevich is here; it may take several passes to kill him (especially if he is fireshielded.)
      7. to give a crystal stained red to Basalan, the Mayor of the City ( )
        As above.

      Reduce Cat Population [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Kirgan

      Additions by: Romsek
      Level: 13
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a fish vendor (30 minutes)
        In Med City, 13S from recall.
      2. to find a thoughtful scholar (15 minutes)
        In Med City's Mage Quarter on Enterprise Avenue.
      3. to find a room called Taverna Altruistica (10 minutes)
        In Med City. From Med recall, enter mage, N, W, N.
      4. to find a saucer of milk (1 hour, 5 minutes)
        Buy in this location.
      5. to give a saucer of milk to a black cat (10 minutes)
        Black cat loads near the fish vendor above.
      6. to find a fish vendor (10 minutes)
        As above.

      Refresh the Vampire [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Zasildar
      Additions by: Yandyr
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): cities, Goland's Tower
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find a wandering vampire (no limit)
        In cities of Medievia, often Med City, Trellor, or Riverton. Listen for his shout, "Mirrors for sale!"
      2. to give a vial of pure dragon blood to a wandering vampire (no limit)
        Loads on Lady Goland. See Goland's Tower (link not available) walkthrough. Note: this is find-original.

      Reinforce the Mellorian Citadel [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Ardon
      Level: 22, 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Trellor, Mellorian Citadel, Fortress Shadowclaw
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Citadel Baron (1 hour)
        In Mellorian. From zone entrance, go all N to "An Intersection in the Hallway," then go W, N, 2U, S, 2W, N.
      2. to find the Commander of the Stormwatch Unit (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 6N.
      3. to give 8 red eye gems to the Commander of the Stormwatch Unit. (1 hour)
        These load on Red Eyes in Fortress Shadowclaw. From zone entrance, go S, E, then all U to the top floor. They are hidden all around it. (For a massive load of them, from the top of the spiral staircase go W, S, E, search and there is an opening in the north wall) (directions above)
      4. to find the Citadel Baron (1 hour)
        As above.

      Reinforcements for Skye Temple [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Helitus, Shaedehart
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Med City, Asnor
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the abbot ()
        In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 7E, N.
      2. to find a paladin guard ()
        In Asnor Mountains. From @, follow path N and U.
      3. to kill 6 of a hairy troll and 5 of a ravaging lion and 2 of a troll guard ()
        In Asnor Mountains:
        a hairy troll: found in a cave to the west of the path.
        a ravaging lion: found along the path and in campsite west of path.
        a troll guard: found along the path.
      4. to find a paladin guard ()
        As above.
      5. to find the abbot ()
        As above.

      Release the Wizard Gaelor [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Destant
      Level: 16
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Graveyard
      Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the spirit of the wizard Gaelor ( )
        In the main part of the Graveyard, between the central and eastern paths.
      2. to kill 8 ghosts of a soldier, 8 animated skeletons, 4 apparition of a mists, and 8 spectral wraiths (45 minutes)
        Located randomly in the Graveyard.
      3. to find the High Priest of the Church (20 minutes)
        In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
      4. to find the spirit of the wizard Gaelor ( )
        As above.
      5. to find the High Priest of the Church (15 minutes)
        As above.

      Relieve Warrior's Stress [Complete]

      Contributed by: Antdos
      Level: 18
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med Castle, El Cantara
      Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a member of the Kerstian Elites (30 minutes)
        In Medievia Castle. From Medievia City recall, go 3U, 9N. The Kerstian Elite loads around here but wanders.
      2. to find a small stone planter, holding a miniature tree and 2 of some goat berries (40 minutes)
        In El Cantara.
        A small stone planter, holding a miniature tree: from the @, go U, 2N, E, 10N, E, N. Buy tree.
        Some goat berries: from the @, go U, N, W, U, S, W, 2S, U. The berries load on the ground around here.
      3. to give a small stone planter, holding a miniature tree and 2 of some goat berries to a member of the Kerstian Elites (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Reminders of the Sea [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Additions by: Kernighan
      Level: 19
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Lattyrna
      Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a retired sea captain (45 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go 7S, 4E, 2S, W.
      2. to find a sculpture of coral and a bunch of brightly colored seashells (1 hour)
        In Lattyrna. These are found on the merchant and a seashell peddler (approx. level 15 cleric). From zone entrance, go all D, all E, 3N (to Ivory Road), all E to first N, then 2N, 2E, and look around.
      3. to give a sculpture of coral and a bunch of brightly colored seashells to a retired sea captain (?)
      4. to give a lobster and 2 of a king crab to a retired sea captain (20 minutes)
        These can be purchased in Med City in the Fish Market, 11S of recall. Note: You get a King Crab (food) for completing quest.

      Remove Curse from the Gypsy Clan [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Aolani
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Madame Isramala (30 minutes)
        In the Gypsy Camp. Follow path from entrance until the exits are "a ticket booth" to the west and "a concession stand" to the east. From this room, search, all S until W exit, then all W, all S until The Fortune Tellers Wagon.
      2. to kill a black cat (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Gloumewood Farm NPK. You must "kill" the cat 9 times to kill it.

      Remove Lybicats From The Forest [Complete]

      Contributed by: Darkwind
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Gloumewood
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a terrified forest fairy (45 minutes)
        In Gloumewood Farm. From zone entrance, go 5E, 2N, 2E to "Behind the Farmhouse." Enter ring and pray; you will be teleported to NPK part of the zone. The fairy wanders around here.
      2. to kill 10 of either a bloodthirsty lybicat, a wild mountain lybicat, a feral lybicat (1 hour, 15 minutes)
        Lybicats wander around the same area as the terrified forest fairy; they can be pretty tough so make sure to shield room often.
      3. to find a terrified forest fairy (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Remove Spies from Dragmire Stronghold [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Jefry
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): dragmire
      Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find General Baazt (50 minutes)
        In the Grandstand of the Arena at Dragmire. From just inside the start of the zone ("At the Checkpoint"), go W, W, W, W, W, N, N, W, W, W, W, W, U, E, N, N, D, W.
      2. to kill 2 of a goblin spy (30 minutes)
        In Dragmire (hidden).
      3. to find General Baazt (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Remove the Bears from the Honey [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Garatjax
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Preserve, Hives
      Total Time: 3 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a hunter (1 hour)
        In the Preserve. See hunter in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to kill 4 of a hungry bear and a grizzly bear and a mother bear and 2 of a bear cub and 4 of a curious bear (2 hours)
        In Hives of the Giants. From @, go E, all U, E (hidden), all D. Bears wander here. Note: only one cub loads per repop; this has been reported. A secret W exit will take you to CPK, go W into CPK, follow the north wall, 2W, search, N (hidden.). Then go N, 2E, N (hidden) and kill grizzly bear.

      Reopen the New Moon Inn [Complete]

      Contributed by: Dragalis
      Additions by: Takphius
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Brookhaven, Mystara
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the innkeeper (1 hour)
        In Brookhaven. From zone entrance, go all N until you see the E exit for the New Moon Inn, then go E.
      2. to give some rat poison to the innkeeper (1 hour)
        Buy in Mystara Souvenir Shop. From entrance to Mystara, go all W until D, then S, E.

      Repair the Mining Shop in Brookhaven[Complete]

      Contributed by: Teufeli
      Additions by: Juliesse, Phu
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Brookhaven, Gloumewood Farm
      Total Time: 5 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a bored shopowner (1 hour)
        In Brookhaven. From @, 2N (Town Square), then 3W into the Mining and Excavating Shop.
      2. to find a room called The Intersection of Sendoa Avenue and West Fork Road (5 minutes)
        From above, go E.
      3. [hidden] (5 minutes)
        From above, go W.
      4. to find a room called The Thirsty Hog (5 minutes)
        From above, go 3E, N, W.
      5. to find a room called A Table in the Thirsty Hog (5 minutes)
        From above, go S.
      6. to find a fistful of nails (3 hours with extension)
        In Gloumewood Farm. From @, go E. Nails load on the strapping farmhand.
      7. [hidden] (30 minutes)
        Kill the farmhand and loot the nails.
      8. [hidden] (5 minutes)
        Get back to Brookhaven and give nails to man at The Thirsty Hog. From @, 3N, E, S. Note: you receive a pint of mountain stout of dark ale.
      9. [hidden] (5 minutes)
        Go N and drink the ale.

      Repentance for Gasherbrum [Complete]

      Completed by: Murdoch
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Warrens of the Moshata
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Gasherbrum (40 minutes)
        At the bottom level of Warrens. From entrance, go D, all N, D, all E, 7S, all W, N, D, D, D, N, W, W, W, S, S, D, E, S, S, W, W, D, N, N, D. This level is a small rectangle of about a dozen rooms, and Gasherbrum loads here (or occasionally on the way here.)
      2. to find Lear, the leader of the Elders (40 minutes)
        In Wittermark. From entrance, go all N, all W (even into hidden exit), all S, all U, S, all W, all S, W, S.
      3. to find Gasherbrum (40 minutes)
        As above.

      Replace Jewelry For Queen [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Arrumar
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Githyanki, Lattyrna
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Melnshara Daenar (1 hour)
        In Lyryanoth. From recall, go all W. Kill the four angry protestors. Go W, S, 3W, U. Go E, S, U, W.
      2. to give an ivory bracelet and a diamond ring to Melnshara Daenar ()
        Bracelet: in Lattyrna. From entrance, go all D, all E; go N until a room called Ivory Road, Near the Gate. From here go all W, all U, S (sanc) E and kill Alexander..
        diamond ring: Loads on Myosilla in the Githyanki. From zone entrance (@), go all N, search, all D, all N, E, search, all U.

        In El Cantara. From @, go N, U, 2N, E, all N, follow path to door. Then open door E, E, then go N.

      Replacing Stolen Church Supplies [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Kjeldar
      Additions by: Gtalmond
      Level: 22
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med Graveyard, Derah, Braneri
      Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the High Priest (29 minutes)
        In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
      2. to find the mortified priest ()
        In evil Derah. From good Derah recall, go all N to the fountain in evil Derah, then 3W, 2S, open door W, W, U.
      3. to give a silver cross to the High Priest of the Church ()
        As above.
      4. to give a condensed holy book and 4 tall candles to High Priest ()
        In Braneri. From zone entrance, go N, W, 7N, W, D, N, W, S and look in crate for first one. Then go N, E, S, U, E, N, E, N, U, N, give coin usher, N and get all candle for 2 more candles. Book should be there also.

      Replant Trees After Tornado [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Elecruse
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Spiderwode
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Miranlo, the royal gardener (1 hour)
        In Lyranoth. From zone recall, go 6 W then 2N.
      2. to find 3 of the seedling of a silverwood tree (2 hours)
        In Spiderwode on red, green, brown and blue zhayvens. Note: This is find original.
      3. to give 3 of the seedling of a silverwood tree to Miranlo (1 hour)
        As above.

      Replenish the Stock of the Gypsy Merchant [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Bashuu
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Medievia, Enara/Esacha Fen
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a gypsy merchant (30 minutes)
        In Med City, near the east gate.
      2. to find the temporary distillery foreman (1 hour)
        In Esacha Fen. From entrance to the fen, go N and follow the path until you see the distillery. Look around for the foreman.
      3. to find a gypsy merchant (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Report from the Prison [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Illitic
      Additions by: Anonymous
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Trellorian Penitentiary, Castle Med
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        See Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find a Trellorian noble (1 hour)
        In Trellor Penitentiary. From @, go all W, all N, kill guard, get key.Then go E, all U, kill guard, get key. Then go all D, W, unlock gate, open gate,2N, E, 2N, E (hidden.) Kill both guards; get 2 keys. Unlock gate, open gate.E, N, all E, all N, unlock door, open door. Enter CPK. Close and lock door.Then go N, U, N. Note: you receive a scroll.
      3. to give a scroll to Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor ( )
        As above.

      Rescue Amelia and Devika for Sornos [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: PH
      Additions by: Juliesse
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Sceptrum
      Total Time: 3 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Sornos (45 minutes)
        In Sceptrum Ishachi. From zone entrance, go 4N then look around.
      2. to find Amelia (45 minutes)
        In Sceptrum Ishachi. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror. From there, go all D and all N (there is a phantom exit to walk through) and kill Welsh for key. From Welsh, go S, D, U, all N, and search well. Get key then go E, unlock/open door, E, U, unlock/open trapdoor, U.
      3. to kill Emperor Ishachus (45 minutes)
        From Amelia, go all D, W, N, W, unlock/open door, W. To get into the Emperor's tower you have to "talk mistress magnum malum". From the room you are transferred to, the Emperor is all U. Kill him, loot key.
      4. to find Devika (30 minutes)
        From Ishachi, go all D, all E, all S, W, all S, D, U, all S, all U, enter mirror, W, S to wilderness, 2N, E, search. Then go D, N.
      5. to find Sornos ( )
        From Devika, go S, U, W, 2N, and look around.

      Rescue Blue Parrot's Children [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Kethric
      Additions by: Elecruse
      Level: 27, 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Dragmire
      Total Time: 3 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the sailor (1 hour)
        In Pirate Ship.
      2. to kill the sailor ( )
        As above.
      3. to find 3 of a talkative parrot ( )
        In Pirate Ship on the pirates. They often are cursed.
      4. to give 3 of a talkative parrot to a giant blue parrot (45 minutes)
        In Dragmire. From entrance go W, U, N, D, 4W, 4N, 3E, 2N, E, 3N, U, and look around.
