      Rescue Shadowclaw From Hamentor [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Skinter
      Additions by: Teufeli
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Medievia, Fortress Shadowclaw
      Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Famar, the town crier (30 minutes)
        From Med recall, S.
      2. to find a room called the Undergate (30 minutes)
        This is the entrance to Fortress Shadowclaw.
      3. to find Athugavia, war chief of Shadowclaw's forces (15 minutes)
        From entrance, go E, 3U, 1W, 1N, 1E
      4. to kill Hamentor, the Ageless (1 hour)
        From Athugavia, go W, S, E, all U, W, S, E, search for hidden exit north, N, all U.

      Rescue The Baron's Children [Complete]

      Contributed by: Ardon
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 3 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Citadel Baron (1 hour)
        In Mellorian. From zone entrance, go all N to "An Intersection in the Hallway," then go W, N, 2U, S, 2W, N.
      2. to find Elthmara, the Baron's daughter (1 hour)
        In Crime. From @, go E, D, E, S, kill thief for key, Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go 2E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, 2W, N, kill Dorlion, the guardsman and get the key to the prison from his corpse. Now go 2N, unlock cage N, open cage N, N.
      3. to find Melhoran, the son of the Baron (10 minutes)
        From the cell where you found Elthmara, go S, unlock cage W, open cage W, W.
      4. to kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (30 minutes)
        From Melhoran, go E, all S, 2E, all N. Note: this is no-death.
      5. to find the Citadel Baron (1 hour)
        As above.

      Rescue the Duke's Niece and Nephew [Complete]

      Contributed by: Helitus
      Additions by: Antdos
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med Castle, Crime
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (45 minutes)
        In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
      3. to find Elthmara, the Baron's daughter (30 minutes)
        From Vonliege, go 5S (to The Center of the Underground Tunnel Network), 2W, N, kill Dorlion, the guardsman and get the key to the prison from his corpse. Now go 2N, unlock cage N, open cage N, N.
      4. to find Melhoran, the son of the Baron (15 minutes)
        From the cell where you found Elthmara, go S, unlock cage W, open cage W, W.
      5. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Rescue the Missing Hamryck [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Neru
      Level: 18
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Fortress Shadowclaw, Rydhordel Woods
      Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Schlossar, the Terrible ()
        In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, go 4E, 2S, 2W, and look around.
      2. to find Hamryck ()
        In Rydhordel Woods. From @, follow simple maze west, then 2S,E, and look around.
      3. to kill a vine-roped bear and 2 of a wolf with mottled fur (10 minutes)
        Look around.

      Rescue The Moshata [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Antdos
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med Castle, Warrens Of The Moshata
      Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
        See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find a room called Lair of the Creator (30 minutes)
        In Warrens of the Moshata. From Warrens entrance, go all N, D, 4E, all S, all W, N, all D, N, 3W, 2S, D, E, 2S, 2W, D, 2N, D, 2E, 3S.
      3. to kill a huge octopus and a mind phantasm and a sludge mephit and cave blood-weed and a cave bear (30 minutes)
        These appear in the room. Note: this objective is no-death.

      Rescue Trellorian Daughter [Complete]

      Additions by: Phu
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways. Note: You are given a scroll of teleport.
      2. to give a scroll of teleport to Zavie (1 hour)
        Zavie is in the southwest part of Dragmire, in the "farm" area. From @, go W, U, N, D, 8W, 8S, W, S, S, W.
      3. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Rest in Peace [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: JN
      Level: 20, 27, 28
      Difficulty: easy (if you know sneak and sanc) to hard (otherwise - lots of PK areas)
      Locale(s): Van Kyln's Estate, Rhaiaden, Eldrick's Tomb, Swamp and Forest of Thanos
      Total Time: 6 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a worm-infested corpse (2 hours)
        In Van Kyln. From zone entrance (@), go N, 2E, N, all D, pick chest, open chest, get all chest. Return to zone entrance (@). From there, go N, all W, 4N, unlock gate W, W. Nearby there is a down exit. Go down, Y (for CPK), and corpse is in the next room.
      2. to kill 6 wild worms ( )
        In Rhaiaden. From zone entrance (@), go all S, E, all S to the worm breeding farms. Kill the worms in the 2x3 area of rooms. After you kill all 6, you'll get the following message: "The undead corpse telepaths you, 'I'm going to teach them all. Kill six giant maggots! Slaughter those tombdwellers for me!' "
      3. to kill 6 giant maggots ( )
        In Eldrick's tomb, around the gravesites. After you kill all 6, you will get the following message: "The undead corpse telepaths you, 'They won't be eating MY corpse anymore, hahaha! The flies must PAY. Kill four of those disgusting swamp-dwelling mammoth dragonflies and I will be able to rest in peace!' "
      4. to kill 4 mammoth dragonflies ( )
        In Thanos, a PK zone. From zone entrance (@), go all N, E, N until you find the dragonflies.

      Restock Medievia Castle's Magic Store [Complete]

      Level: 13
      Difficulty: moderate (time limit)
      Locale(s): Med Castle, Labyrinth
      Total Time: 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the ghostly image of a sorcerer (30 minutes)
        In Castle Med. From the top of the dragon staircase, go: all W, all U, all S.
      2. to give 20 of a green potion to the ghostly image of a sorcerer (25 minutes)
        Unless you have another way to get them rapidly, go purchase them from the Alchemist in the Labyrinth. From "The Entrance to the Labyrinth," go E, E, E, S, E, E, E, S, S, S, E, E, E, S, S, S, W, W, W, S, S, S, S, E, S, S, S, E.

      Restock the Bar [Complete]

      Level: 20, 21, 24
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora
      Total Time: 6 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Torranus, barkeeper of the Prized Boar (1 hour)
        See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, S.
      2. to give 2 of either a bottle of BristoleField Red OR a bottle of FretherField White from the Wytherwind Winery to Torranus, barkeeper of the Prized Boar. (1 hour)
        In Wytherwind on the underground level. From the zone entrance, go all S (to "Deep in the Mire"), W, W, W, S, S, S, search, D, D. (Be sure you're breathing water.) Go W, N, N, W, S, W, W, N, N, W. Get the crow bar. Go down to a room called "An Underwater Wine Cellar." Unlock crate, open crate, and get all crate.
      3. to find 3 of a frosty mug full of "Olaffson's Special", 7 of a bottle of Ashton Lager, and 4 of a jug of hard cider (4 hours)
        a frosty mug full of "Olaffson's Special": in Med City. From recall, enter warrior, then E, E, E, E, S, S, W, W.
        a bottle of Ashton Lager: in New Ashton. From entrance to zone (@), go: N, E, E, N.
        a jug of hard cider: in Dragmire. From entrance to zone (@), go: W, U, N, D, 6 W (to intersection), 4N, E.
      4. to give 3 of a frosty mug full of "Olaffson's Special" and 7 of a bottle of Ashton Lager and 4 of a jug of hard cider to Torranus, barkeeper of the Prized Boar (40 minutes)

      Restock the Classroom [Needs Detail]

      Level: 19
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Belisaria, the gypsy teacher (40 minutes)
        In Enara, in the gypsy camp. She's in the SW corner.
      2. to find 4 of a piece of chalk and 4 of a slate writing tablet and a book titled "Medievian History; One Historian's Version" (2 hours)
        Chalk and writing tablets are found in Brookhaven in a room called "A Secluded Schoolroom." From East Fork Road, go W, N, W. The book can be found on various mobs in Med City, including the town crier, the sailor, etc.

      Restore Peace in Lyryanoth [Complete]

      Contributed by: Afiniti
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Lyryanoth
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the mayor of Lyryanoth (50 minutes)
        In Lyryanoth. From recall, go W, N, U. Note: this is no-portal; you'll need to fly there.
      2. to kill 5 of a brother of the Purification Society (1 hour, 40 minutes)
        In Lyryanoth, in a "Small Lizardfolk Dwelling" on Unity Street. This objective is no-death and solo.

      Restoring Pride [Complete]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Level: 18, 19
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Forest of Alendora, Preserve
      Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Havensdora hunter (1 hour)
        In Alendora. You receive a long spear.
      2. to kill 6 rabbits, 6 opossums, and 2 cave bears (45 minutes)
        In the Preserve.
        Rabbits: They're right inside the entrance of the zone.
        Opossums: They're found on the animal trail in the zone from the entrance, go 3W, N, E, N and look east and west.
        Cave bears: From the zone entrance, go 3W, N, E, N, 6W, N, D. At this level, fight the bears one at a time.
      3. to find a Havensdora hunter (45 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give a long spear to the Havensdora hunter (5 minutes)
        This is the same spear you received in the first step.

      Restrain the Prisoners [Complete]

      Contributed by: Pleen
      Level: 24
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Trellorian Penitentiary, Brookhaven
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a prison guard (40 minutes)
        In Trellorian Penitentiary. From entrance, go W, 3N. Note you must defeat the guards and get TWO (identical) keys to open the gate.
      2. to give 5 of either a coil of sturdy rope or a long coil of rope to a prison guard (1 hour, 20 minutes)
        Buy in Brookhaven. From entrance, go 2W, 2N, W.

      Resupply Baker [Complete]

      Additions by: Kovad and Yasujiro, ZakeKernighan
      Level: 26, 27, 30
      Difficulty: easy (NPK if done during daytime; CPK if done at night.)
      Locale(s): Med City, Egriel
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Winchel, the baker (30 minutes)
        In Med City, in bakery in Thieves' Quarter. From recall, enter thief, then go 4E, 2N, W.
      2. to find Aleib the baker (no limit)
        In Egriel. Enter the zone during daytime hours (after 6 am) to avoid CPK. Go 2E, 3S, 2E, N. You receive a rolling pin.
      3. to find a sack of flour and a sack of grain (1 hour)
        These load on the ground in the root cellar of the windmill. From the above, go 3S, E, D.
      4. to give a rolling pin and a sack of grain and a sack of flour to Winchel, the baker (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Resurrecting the Chief's Daughter [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Tyunsorcio
      Additions by: Takphius, Nefhar
      Level:29
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Pyramid, Catacombs
      Total Time: 12 hours, 16 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the chief (30 minutes)
        In Talqaxtyl's Pyramid.
      2. to find the witch doctor (30 minutes)
      3. to find a handcrafted drum carved with ancient symbols (6 hours)
        Loads on dream weavers in Catacombs.
      4. to find the witch doctor (18 minutes)
        As above.
      5. to give a handcrafted drum carved with ancient symbols to the witch doctor (5 minutes)
        As above.
      6. to find the eyes of a river newt and the forked tongue of a snake and a chicken's foot and a fiery talon (3 hours)
        eyes and tongue: In Gloumewood. Kill lizards or newt under bridge and search corpse
        foot:In Gloumewood, on hens. Search corpses to reveal feet.
        talon: loads on roc in Spirited Heights. From northern @, go 4S, E and look around.
      7. to give the eyes of a river newt and the forked tongue of a snake and a chicken's foot and a fiery talon to the witch doctor ( )
        As above.
      8. to kill an angry spirit ( )
        Also in Pyramid. From zone entrance, go all N until the pyramid, then go all W. Then go all N until you see "a rope" in the room description. Then go 2U, S, 4E to the Dark Antechamber. Go S, then N, and the room will change. Kill guardians for key. Unlock N, go N until you see the "angry spirit" mob.
      9. to find the chief ( )
        As above.

      Retribution for a Priest [Complete]

      Level: 22, 25, 26, 27, 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Graveyard, Crime Underground
      Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
        In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle,: then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
      2. kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves; Ordion, a novice thief; Fothwin, a novice thief; Hissalt, a novice thief; Dwunmyre, a novice thief; and Harald, the novice thief. (50 minutes)
        See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways.
        Be sure you have "sense life." From here:

        Vonliege: N, W, W, W, then all N.
        Ordion: S, E.
        Fothwin: S.
        Hissalt: S, W.
        Dwunmyre: S, W.
        Harald: S, S, E.

      Retribution for the Fairy Queen's Sister [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: A Russian Player Additions by: Juliesse, Zeela

      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Preserve, Gloumewood
      Total Time: 4 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Fairy Queen (1 hour)
        In the Preserve. From zone entrance (@), go: W, W, W, N, E, N, W, W, W, S, W, S, E, search, S, D, all E (you will have to ethereal through a door.) Kill the Consort for his key. Unlock the door to the E then go E. The Fairy Queen loads here.
      2. to find 12 of the tiny corpse of a forest fairy and Tyssa's bloody heart (2 hours)
        In Gloumewood. From entrance, go E, all N, all E, W, enter ring, pray. Look around for a room with N/S/W exits; go through hidden E. Then go all E, U for Tyssa; kill her; search corpse; loot heart. Fairies will load on the way.
      3. to give 12 of the tiny corpse of a forest fairy to Ohnalia, the fairy queen ( )
        From Tyssa, go D, all W, look for D exit, go D, S, W, N (hidden).
      4. to give Tyssa's bloody heart to the Fairy Queen ( )
        As above. You may have to kill Tyssa again depending on repop times.

      Retribution on Ramarke for the Church Shipment [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Aivanther
      Additions by: Vashka
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate (no summon, no phase)
      Locale(s):
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Burgomeister (1 hour)
        In G'dangus. From entrance, go 4N, 4E, 2N, and look around.
      2. to kill 19 of (various pirates in the Fury) (2 hours)
        In the Fury.
      3. to find Ramarke, Captain of the Fury (40 minutes)
      4. to find the Burgomeister (45 minutes)
        As above.

      Retrieve a Book for Sahale [Complete]

      Contributed by: Senadra, Ravir
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Gloumewood Farm
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find Sahale, the shopkeeper (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 4W, N, W.
      2. to find the librarian (15 minutes)
        From Med recall, W, S, S.
      3. to give the book "The Joy of Potions" to Sahale, the shopkeeper (no limit)
        In Gloumewood Farm (must kill Osiquine first). From @, go all E to locked gate, then 2N, W, enter ring, "pray." Look around for a black cat. Kill it 9 times, which pops Osiquine. Kill her and get the key to her shack. Look around for a hidden E exit (there are two or more). After going E, go N, unlock door, N, open door E, E, open drawer, search drawer, get key drawer, W, search, U, unlock chest, open chest, get book chest.

      Retrieve Cloak For White Queen [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Zym, Jsuelieta
      Level: 18
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): The Animated Chessboard, Karlisna
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the white queen (1 hour)
        In Animated Chessboard. From @, go all N, follow path to pitchman, give 100 coins pitchman, U, E, U, E, S, D, all N, all E, all N, all E, all N, 5W, S.
      2. to give a shadow cloak to the white queen (1 hour)
        Shadow cloaks are located in Karlisna on a mage of the king. From zone entrance, 5E, 5S, and they wander around this area.

      Retrieve Collar for Nandee [Complete]

      Level: 15
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Trellor, Crystal Lake
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Nandee (1 hour)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 5S, 4W, S, U.
      2. to give a pink kitty collar with a noisy silver bell to Nandee (1 hour)
        Loads on the cat Purrsious (irregularly) in Crystal Lake. From zone entrance (@), go all N till barge, then W, then N till D, then D. Note: this is find-original.

      Retrieve Crystal for Talqaxtyl [Complete]

      Contributed by: Afiniti
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Talqaxtyl's Pyramid, Thunderhoume
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find Talqaxtyl (1 hour)
        See the Pyramid walkthrough (link not available) for details.
      2. to find the Master Thief of Thunderhoume (2 hours)
        See the Thunderhoume walkthrough (link not available) for details.
      3. to kill the Master Thief of Thunderhoume (30 minutes)
        Note: this room is no-flee; to leave, you'll have to recall. You receive a bonded earth crystal upon completion of this step.
      4. to find Talqaxtyl (30 minutes)
        As above.
      5. to give the earth crystal to Talqaxtyl (5 minutes)
        As above.

      Retrieve Diary for Worried Mother [Complete]

      Contributed by: Thaspian
      Additions by: Ymire
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Zuldahun
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a grandmotherly housekeeper (30 minutes)
        In E'nat'dae. From zone entrance, go N, W, all N into palace. Then go all E and look around.
      2. to find the stranded adventurer (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Zuldahun's Glacial Cathedral. From zone entrance, go 3S (watch out -- these rooms do cold damage), 2E, 2S. Note: you receive a diary.
      3. to give a small diary, with several torn pages to a grandmotherly housekeeper (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Retrieve Horn [Complete]

      Level: 26, 29
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Preserve, Mystical Forest
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a hunter (30 minutes)
        In the Preserve. See hunter in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to kill a unicorn (30 minutes)
        In Mystical Forest. Unicorns (and horns) load in the southern side of Mystical Forest. From southern entrance to zone ("An Ocean Harbor"), go N, W, N, then E along the path and look around. Be sure you attack a unicorn with a horn!
      3. to give a unicorn's horn to a hunter (2 hours)
        As above. This is solo, find-original.

      Retrieve Missing Knife [Needs Detail]

      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Celestia
      Total Time: 5 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a harried cook (45 minutes)
        In Celestia. From zone entrance, go N, 2E, and 16N till you see the harried cook (daytime load only.)

      Retrieve Stolen Sunstone [Complete]

      Contributed by: Faelicya
      Level: 26, 27, 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Riverton, Lyryanoth
      Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a priestess of the Sun (40 minutes )
        In Riverton. From northern entrance, go S, 8 W and look around the temple.
      2. to give the Sunstone to a priestess of the Sun (2 hours)
        In Lyryanoth. First, find any lizardfolk commoner that loads "a pair of Lizardfolk claws." Kill him and get the claws. Next, from Lyryanoth recall, go all E. Kill the 2 lizardfolk warriors blocking the way. Go all E, wear the claws on your hands to climb, then all U till W, then go W. The mob here loads the Sunstone.

      Retrieve the Forbidden Book for the High Priestess [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Helitus
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the High Priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
        See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find a forbidden book of the Black Art (2 hours, +1 hour extension)
        In Fortress of Elnissa, on Elnissa. Note: this is find-original.
      3. to give a forbidden book of the Black Art to the high priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Retrieve the Tale for an Imp Child [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Anonymous
      Level: 22
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Underground Shafts
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find an imp child ()
        In Underground Shafts. From @, go D, N, W, W, 4N, W and look around the Imp Village (note: have sense life on.)
      2. to find the ghost of a legendary warrior ()
        From Entrance to an Imp Village, go 4S, 2E, all N, 2E, 3N into Catacombs, and look around.
      3. to kill the Guardian of the Catacombs ()
        At entrance to Catacombs in the Underground Shafts. Should only be a few rooms away.
      4. to find the ghost of a legendary warrior ()
        As above. You receive a [tale.]
      5. to give [a tale] to an imp child ( )
        As above.

      Return a Stolen Flute [Complete]

      Contributed by: Antdos
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: easy to hard (depending on PKers in FGS)
      Locale(s): Mystical Forest, Fire Giants' Keep
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a satyr (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Mystical Forest. Enter the southern entrance of the zone ("An ocean harbor"), go N, W, N, E, N, and perhaps a few more rooms in any direction to find the satyr.
      2. to find 2 of the satyr's flute (1 hour)
        In Fire Giant's Keep. See Satyr/Satyr's Flute in Frequent Pathways.
      3. to give the satyr's flute to a satyr (25 minutes)
        Return to the satyr in Mystical Forest.
      4. to give the satyr's flute to a satyr (5 minutes)
        As above.

      Return Fire to Ruellia Village [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Phu
      Additions by: Zordon
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Ruellia
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Agalinis, the village foreman (no limit)
        In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go N, N, W, W, N, W, N, W, W, W, W, S, S, S, W. (Be careful: Agalinis is aggro!)
      2. to give a smoldering log to Agalinis, the village foreman ( )
        On the Fire Giant King in Fire Giants. From @, go U, all S, E, all S, E (yes for CPK), all E, all N, search, N, all W, N, all U.

      Return the Family Heirloom [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Phu
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Mystical Forest
      Total Time: 5 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
        In Mystical Forest. From recall, go all E, all N, all W, N, U, 5S, 5E, all N.
      2. to find an ivory scrollcase (3 hours)
        In Verthandi.

      Return the Textbook to the Professor [Complete]

      Contributed by: Railker, Pavanti
      Additions by: Cildanor
      Level: 23, 25
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Braneri, Brookhaven
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a distinguished professor (30 minutes)
        In Braneri. From the entrance, go 2N, W, N, W, and look for 'A stately, distinguished looking professor is preparing a lecture.
      2. to give a psychology textbook to a distinguished professor (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        Textbook can be found in Brookhaven. From the entrance, go 3N, W, S and look for "A studious woman is at one of the tavern's tables," who loads the book.

      Return Zavie to Her Gypsy Home [Complete]

      Contributed by: Cipactli
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Gypsy Camp, Dragmire
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a gypsy mother (30 minutes)
        In Gypsy Camp. From @, go D, E, all S, W, S, search, 2S, E.
      2. to find Zavie (1 hour)
        Zavie is in the southwest part of Dragmire, in the "farm" area. From @, go W, U, N, D, 8W, 8S, W, S, S, W.
      3. [hidden objective] to get (the key that Dramlok loads) (2 hours with extension)
        From entrance to Dragmire ("At the Checkpoint"), go all W to Blognar Street, then N and look around for "An orcish man wearing a wolf fur coat stands here." (Key doesn't load every time.)
      4. to find Zavie (30 minutes)
        As above.
      5. to find a gypsy mother (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Reuniting Brothers [Complete]

      Contributed by: Phu
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Trellor, Crime Underground
      Total Time: 3 hours, 25 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (1 hour)
        In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N (Be sure you have sense life!)
      2. to find a novice thief (30 minutes)
        In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, all E, all S
      3. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (10 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to find a room called Magical Passage (20 minutes)
        From Vonliege, go N.
      5. to find a room called A Dimly Lit Sanctuary (5 minutes)
        From above, go N.
      6. to find Doligoth, the Master Thief (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go D, all E, 2S and look around (he wanders.)
      7. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (30 minutes)
        As above.
      8. to kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves and 4 of a novice thief (20 minutes)
        Note: mobs spawn in this room, so be ready.

      Revenge Against Sea Lions for Talesin [Complete]

      Contributed by: Magnussen
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Lattyrna
      Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Talesin (30 minutes)
        In Lattyrna. From "Ivory Road, Near the Gates," goall E, S, all U, and look around.
      2. to kill 3 of a sea lion (50 minutes)
        In the arena. From above, go all D, N, all W to "An Intersection in The Road." Then go 2N, W.
      3. to find Talesin (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Revenge for A Retired Captain

      Contributed by: Ardon
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med, Fury
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a retired ship captain (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go 7S, 4E, 2S, open door W, W.
      2. to kill Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        From the entrance to the Fury (varies) follow the path to the main deck, then go all S and either W or E until S. Then go all S and look around for a buccaneer with a key if you cant pick. Then go W, D, E, N, all W, pick/unlock door S, all S. Note:you receive a severed hand.
      3. to give a severed hand to a retired ship captain (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Revenge for an Elf [Complete]

      Contributed by: Talein
      Level: 24
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Alendora, Wittermark
      Total Time: 3 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Malindora elf (30 minutes)
        Located in Forest of the Alendora, near the north entrance.
      2. to find a dark Wittermark elf (1 hour)
        In Wittermark. From entrance, go all N, all W, all S, 2U and look around.
      3. to kill Da'raen, son of Celianestu (1 hour, 20 minutes)
        In Alendora. First, find Takenos, a Havensdora gambler. See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N. Kill Takenos and get the key from Takenos' corpse. Go S, W, N, N, N, W, W, W, W, S. Unlock then open the strongbox. Get the harp (plus whatever else you want) from the strongbox (if the harp's not there, you won't be able to complete the AQ.) Go N, E, E, D, S, E, E, E, S, S, S. Go south again (it's a hidden exit), then S, W, S, W, S. There will be a few "sentry" mobs in these rooms. Hold the harp, then use harp. Go S, S, E, S, S, E, E. Da'raen is here.
      4. to find a dark Wittermark elf (45 minutes)
        As above.

      Revenge for Caretaker [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Helitus
      Additions by: Ravir
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Graveyard, Trellor (Enchanted Oak) Graveyard
      Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the caretaker (30 minutes)
        In the Graveyard. From Med recall, go 11E, 3N, all W, 2S and look around.
      2. to kill 3 of a ghost of a mercenary and 3 of a lost spirit of a Trellor guard and 3 of a zombie of a gate watchman (45 minutes)
        In Trellor Graveyard.

      Revenge for Jandaly? [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Jabae
      Level: 24, 26, 28
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Hidden Village of Aeketh
      Total Time: 3 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Jandaly (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Aeketh, go all west then north through wilderness. Then go all west, N, N, W, W, W, N, N, N, U. Search (multiple times if necessary) and go south.
      2. to kill the Aekethi Chief and the servant (1 hour)
        In Aeketh, go all west then north through wilderness. Then go all W, 2N, 3W, all N, all W, N, E, search, pick hatch, open hatch, D. These two mobs load here.
      3. to give a fire red dress to Jandaly (45 minutes)
        The dress loads on the servant. Return to Jandaly as above.
      4. to kill 3 of an Aekethi mage scout and Jandaly (30 minutes)
        Note: these pop in the room with you.

      2. to give a pair of ethereal shackles to Jaroslava ( )

      3. to kill Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        In Med Castle. Look at Frequent Pathways.

      Revenge For Ramarke [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Malandria
      Additions by: Antdos
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Fury, Xanthal
      Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour)
        From entrance to the Fury, enter zone and go all N/E/W/S (depending on orientation of Fury), then go U, 4S, 3W, 2S.
      2. to find 5 of object a bone club (45 minutes)
        In Xanthal, carried by goatmen. From zone entrance, go N, 2W, open door N, N and look around. Also (from zone entrance), go N, 3W, 2N, W and look around in the 4x4 area of the shelter.
      3. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour)
        As above.
      4. to give 5 of a bone club to Ramarke, captain of the Fury (5 minutes)
        As above.

      Revenge for Scruff [Complete]

      Contributed by: Ymire
      Additions by: Pleen
      Level: 26, 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Med Castle
      Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Scruff (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, 3S.
      2. to kill Sequoia (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Med Castle. From recall, go 3U, 9N, 3W, 2N, 2E. Go U, 2E, 2S, 2W, U (to The Top of a Curved, Marble Staircase). Go 4S, 2W, N. Go W (hidden exit), U, open window, W, open window W, W, 2U, pick trapdoor, open trapdoor, U, S, U, S.
      3. to find Scruff (15 minutes)
        As above.

      Revenge for the Caretaker [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Kernighan
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Graveyard, Trellor Graveyard
      Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the caretaker (30 minutes)
        In SW corner of the Graveyard.
      2. to kill 3 of a ghost of a mercenary and 3 of a lost spirit of a Trellor guard and 3 of a zombie of a gate watchman (45 minutes)

      Revenge for the Chief [Complete]

      Level: 24, 27, 28
      Difficulty: moderate (very hard without sneak/invis)
      Locale(s): Hidden Village of Aeketh
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Aekethi chief (1 hour)
        In Aeketh, go all west then north through wilderness. Then go all W, 2N, 3W, all N, all W, N, E, search, pick hatch, open hatch, D.
      2. to kill Jandaly and Jundu (1 hour).
        From the chief, go U, S, 9E, S, U. Jundu loads here. Then search (several times if necessary) and go S. Jandaly loads here.
      3. to find the Aekethi Chief (30 minutes)
        Essentially reverse your steps from the last objective.

      Revenge for the Insane [Complete]

      Contributed by: Ayshee
      Additions by: Takphius
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Karlisna
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find an insane mage (30 minutes)
        In Karlisna. From @, go all E and look around.
      2. to find a black cloak embroidered with a torch and a six banded ring (1 hour)
        ring: loads on high mage of Vanlarra. From recall, go all N, U, and look around.
        cloak: loads on questors. From recall, go all N, S, 4W, all N, and look around.
      3. to give a black cloak embroidered with a torch and a six banded ring to an insane mage (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Revenge for the Priest [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Daethan
      Additions by: Antdos
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Medievia Graveyard, Ulhazzen Mines
      Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the High Priest of the Church (1 hour)
        In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
      2. to kill the avatar of a dark goddess and 10 of the huge cave lizard (35 minutes)
        In Ulhazzen Mines. From western @, go 2E, D, 2W, N, W, N, D, 2N, U, N, D, 3 N to find the Avatar of a Dark Goddess. Kill her, then go S, D to find the 10 huge cave lizards. Note: no spells may be cast in this room.

      Revenge of Captain Abnart [Complete]

      Additions by: Barvyon, Kernighan
      Level: 29, 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Pirate Ship
      Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Captain Abnart (20 minutes)
        In Med City, in the Fisherman's area. From recall, go all S until you get to the wharf. Go E and W along the wharf and in the shipbuilding area to find Captain Abnart.
      2. to kill Captain Amos Trask (40 minutes to 1 hour, 40 minutes with extension)
        Located on the Pirate Ship. From @ entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, E, E.
      3. to find Captain Abnart (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Revenge on Ro [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Loere
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): New Ashton
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Draug (30 minutes)
        In New Ashton. Draugs wander all over the city. From southern @, go W along thecity wall and look around.
      2. to kill Ro the Bastard (1 hour)
        This mob loads in CPK New Ashton, but it is a quick and relatively easy objective if you have sneak. Enter from south entrance of Ashton. Find Draug with [a gate key]. This is key to the gate all north from south entrance. Once you have key go all north to gate, unlock. Follow path up. You will encounter blocker mob, Ro, the bastard, near top. Ro is a no-backstab mob that bashes, but doesn't have many hp. Note: you receive a gem-studded bastard sword.
      3. to give a gem-studded bastard sword to a City Elder (15 minutes)
        City Elders are found all over the city, just like Draugs, so there should be plenty along the walls if you can't find any near Ashton recall.

      Reverend Welsh's Dirty Work [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Thralin
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Sceptrum Isachi
      Total Time: 2 hours, 55 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Reverend Welsh (1 hour)
        In Sceptrum. From @, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D,all N.
      2. to find Quinex ()
        From Reverend, go 3S, 3W, N, 2W, 2N.
      3. to find Reverend Welsh ()
        As above.
      4. to give a stack of official documents to Reverend Walsh ()
      5. to find Jathi (1 hour, 5 minutes)
        From reverend, go all S, all U, enter mirror, W, 5S, E, all U.
      6. to kill Jaithi and 3Enslaved village boys (15 minutes)
        These pop in the room with you.

      Rid Alendora of Da'raen [Complete]

      Level: 23
      Difficulty: hard (if zone has been run recently) or moderate (if not)
      Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Abaneus, the Malindora elven philosopher (1 hour)
        From western entrance to zone, go S, S, E, S, S, S, S, W, W (just walk right through closed door), W, N, W, N, N.
      2. to find Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (40 minutes)
        See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N.
      3. to kill Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (5 minutes)
      4. to kill 6 of either a follower of Da'raen or a Malindora sentry (25 minutes)
        Get the key from Takenos' corpse. Go S, W, N, N, N, W, W, W, W, S. Unlock then open the strongbox. Get the harp (plus whatever else you want) from the strongbox (if the harp's not there, you won't be able to complete the AQ.) Go N, E, E, D, S, E, E, E, S, S, S. Go south again (it's a hidden exit), then S, W, S, W, S. There will be a few "sentry" mobs in these rooms. Hold the harp, then use harp. Go S into the last part of the zone. You'll find the other mobs here.
      5. to kill Da'raen, son of Celianestu (10 minutes)
        From where you used the harp, go S, S, E, S, S, E, E. Da'raen is here.
      6. to find Abaneus, the Malindora elven philosopher (40 minutes)
        As above.

      Rid Derah of Werewolves [Complete]

      Contributed by: Rarazona
      Additions by: Takphius, Bhalodus
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Derah (good and evil)
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a vampire (40 minutes)
        From recall in good Derah go 5W, N, W, U and get key from desk in Mayor's office. From here, go D, E, 2S, E which will take you to evil Derah. The vampire can be found behind barrier west and north of Business Square. (You can walk through the barrier if you're holding the Mayor's desk key.)
      2. to kill 9 of either a werewolf or the wolfwere or the guard (40 minutes)
        These are located randomly in evil Derah.
      3. to find a room called A Cul-de-Sac (10 minutes)
        As above, where the vampire loads.. (He will attack.)

      Rid Forest of Lost Knights [Incomplete]

      Level: 26, 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Wittermark
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Ensatia, the Dryad Queen (1 hour)
        In Wittermark. From zone entrance, go all W, all S, all W, all S, all W, all W, all S, then all W to "A Throne of Bone and Wood." Ensatia loads here.
      2. to kill Horak and Yenar, the war mage and 3 of a poor, lost knight (1 hour)
        In Wittermark. From entrance, go 2W, S, W, S, 4W, N, 5W to a dead end. Then go N (hidden exit), 2W, S, W, 2N, W, N, 2E, N and look around. Horak and the poor, lost knights load here in a 2x3 rectangle of rooms.

      Rid Mausoleum of Pests [Complete]

      Contributed by: Volkerii
      Additions by: Timotheus, Thaspian
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Eldricks, Med City
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the undead corpse of a soldier (30 minutes)
        In Eldrick's Tomb, inside zone. Generally loads north but wanders anywhere outside the NPK part.
      2. to find 15 of a hunk of smelly cheese (1 hour)
        In Med City. From recall, go 5E, all N and buy it here.
      3. to find a room called "Entrance to the Mausoleum" (1 hour)
        In Eldrick's Tomb. From entrance, go all N, loot the gate key from the mud golems, and N.
      4. to kill 20 of a rat (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        These load in the above room.

      Rid Riverton of Ghosts [Complete]

      Level: 22
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Riverton
      Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the mayor (30 minutes)
        See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find the ghost of a slain miner (15 minutes)
        From entrance to Riverton mines (just inside west entrance to Riverton), go all S, all E until you can go D, then D, then N and look around until you find this mob.
      3. to find the mayor (10 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to find a mine foreman (15 minutes)
        You will be given a chunk of freshly mined crystal each time, to pass back to the ghost. (Try to find a ghost and foreman close to each other!)
      5. to give a chunk of freshly mined crystal to the ghost of a slain miner (15 minutes)
      6. to find a mine foreman (15 minutes)
      7. to give a chunk of freshly mined crystal to the ghost of a slain miner (18 minutes)
      8. to find a mine foreman (18 minutes)
      9. to give a chunk of freshly mined crystal to the ghost of a slain miner (21 minutes)
      10. to find a mine foreman (21 minutes)
      11. to give a chunk of freshly mined crystal to the ghost of a slain miner (24 minutes)
      12. to find a mine foreman (24 minutes)
      13. to give a chunk of freshly mined crystal to the ghost of a slain miner (27 minutes)
      14. to find a mine foreman (27 minutes)
      15. to give a chunk of freshly mined crystal to the ghost of a slain miner (30 minutes)
      16. to find a mine foreman (30 minutes)
      17. to find the mayor (10 minutes)

      Rid Trellor of Master Thief [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Maximillus
      Additions by: Yandyr
      Level:
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 1 hour, 55 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the high priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
        See Priestess in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find Doligoth, the Master Thief (45 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go D, all E, 2S.
      3. to kill Doligoth, the Master Thief (10 minutes)
      4. to find the high priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Rings for Randall's Pawn Shop [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Mospolo
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Trellor, Githyanki, Gypsy Camp, Graveyard, Courrain Island, Underground Tunnels
      Total Time: 5 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Randall the Pawnbroker (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 5S, 2E, S.
      2. to find a diamond ring and a golden ring and an engagement ring (2 hours)
        Diamond ring: Loads on Myosilla in the Githyanki. From zone entrance (@), go all N, search, all D, all N to gate, open gate, all N, 1 E, search, 1 N, all U, all S, all W, all N, all E, 1 N, thru hidden door, all U, and kill Myosilla who loads the diamond ring.
        Engagement ring is on the tunnel of love guy in Gypsy Camp. (It's invisible, so won't show up on locate.)
        Golden ring is on the caretaker in Graveyard, SW portion of zone.
      3. to give a diamond ring and a golden ring and an engagement ring to Randall the Pawnbroker (30 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to find an opal ring, an amethyst band, and a small emerald ring (2 hours)
        Opal ring is on a dark zombie in Graveyard.
        Emerald ring is many places. Kianie the drake in Courrain Island loads it, and is easy to find. From @, follow path north until you can can go up into the nest.
        An amethyst band loads on the members of the Veiled Society. Exit eastern Med City, north around the city, enter the Underground Tunnels by way of the river into Med. The Members of the Veiled Society are here.
      5. to give an opal ring, an amethyst band, and a small emerald ring to Randall the Pawnbroker (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Rites to Renew the Protection of the Shrine [Complete]

      Contributed by: Tasia
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Celestia, Med City, El Cantara
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the spirit of Kaelymonii, the Princess Goddess (1 hour)
        In Palace Celestia. From entrance, go 2E, 12N, 3U, E, U.
      2. to find a darkmoon root and a moon leaf (1 hour)
        darkmoon root: In Med City. From recall, enter thief, then go 3S, D, N, 2E, 2S, E, N, W, S, E, N, 2E, D, and look around.
        moon leaf: In El Cantara. From entrance, go U, 2N, E, 10N, W, N, and buy moon.
      3. to give a darkmoon root and a moon leaf to Kaelymonii, the Princess Goddess (30 minutes)
        As above. You receive a jewel-encrusted chalice of gold.
      4. to find a room called A Large Courtyard Before the Palace (15 minutes)
        From the above, go D, W, 3D, 4S.
      5. to give a jewel-encrusted chalice of gold to the spirit of Kaelymonii, the Princess Goddess (15 minutes)
        As above. Note: you receive a carved staff.

      Roots for a Beggar[Complete]

      Level: 13
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Graveyard
      Total Time: 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a barefoot beggar (20 minutes)
        In the Graveyard, go all N, then W, W, W, W, W.
      2. to give some Yrani roots to a barefoot beggar (30 minutes)
        Yrani roots: can be purchased in Medievia in Desigra's Delicatessen. From recall: E, E, E, E, E, N, N, N.

      Rose for Kaltana [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Ceresir
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate (CPK)
      Locale(s): Brookhaven
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Kaltana (1 hour)
        In Village of Brookhaven. From zone entrance @, go 2E, all N, E, S. Ettar and his mother, Kaltana load here.
      2. to give a perfect white rose, shrouded in ice to Ettar, the son of Kaltana (3 hours)
        From Queen Fiona in Castiack. Note: this is NOT find-original.

      Rose for Sendaria [Complete]

      Contributed by: Alara
      Level: 17
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Trellor
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Lunkira (30 minutes)
        In Med City's Mage Quarter, in "The Shop of the Ritualist." From recall, enter mage, then go 4N, 2E, 2S.
      2. to find Sendaria (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, 5N, 6E.
      3. to give a beautiful, lonely rose to Lunkira (30 minutes)

      Roses for the Innkeeper [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Rarazona
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: extremely easy to hard
      Locale(s): Derah, Sceptrum, Braneri
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find the innkeeper ( )
        In good Derah. From recall, go W, N.
      2. to find a wilted black rose and 2 of a beautiful, lonely rose ( )
        Wilted black rose: In Sceptrum Ishachi. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror. From there, go all D and all N (there is a phantom exit to walk through) and kill Welsh for key. From Welsh, go S, D, U, all N, and search well. Get key then go E, unlock/open door, E, U, unlock/open trapdoor, U and kill Amelia for her key. From Amelia go all D, W, N, W, unlock/open door, W. To get into the Emperor's tower you have to "talk mistress magnum malum". From the room you are transferred to, the Emperor is all U. Kill him and loot the rose.
        Beautiful, lonely rose: In Braneri, in the garden. From zone entrance, go all N until "A Small Well," then W, S, S, W (open gate.) Only one loads in the zone per repop. So it's best to get one first, then find the wilted black rose and go back for the second lonely rose.
      3. to give a wilted rose and 2 of a beautiful, lonely rose to the innkeeper ( )
        As above.

      Run Errand For Girl [Incomplete]

      b>Contributed by: Sulin
      Level: 13
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Crystal Lake, Castle Medievia
      Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a girl in a bathing suit (30 minutes)
        In Crystal Lake. From @ go N, all E into the picnic area, then look around. NOTE: AQ goes NOCOMM after you've found the girl.
      2. to find a room called A Servant's Quarters (20 minutes)
        In Castle Medievia. From The Top of the Dragon Staircase, go 2E, 2S, 4W, N.
      3. to give a pair of blue lace panties to a girl in a bathing suit (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Run Shopping Errands [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Otoine
      Level: 12
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Medievia
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the bored salesgirl(30 minutes)
        In Med City Mage Quarter in The Shop of the Minor Enchanter. From recall, enter mage. Go W to Street of the Mellow Enchantment, then 4S, W.
      2. to give 3 of a bowl of hot stew and a cup of iced tea and a generous portion of ham and 2 of a glazed pastry and a mug of black coffee and 4 of a raisin muffin and a a saucer of milk and 2 of a slab of salami and 2 of a tall glass of lemonader and 5 of a waybread and 3 of a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese to the bored salesgirl (2 hours)
        a bowl of hot stew: In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, then go 11W, N.
        a cup of iced tea and a mug of black coffee: In Med City. From recall, enter mage, then go N, 2W.
        a generous portion of ham and a slab of salami: In Med City. From recall, go 5W, 3N.
        a glazed pastry and a raisin muffin: In Med City. From recall, enter thief, 4E, 2N, W.
        a tall glass of lemonade: In Med City. From recall, enter thief, all S, all E, 3N, all W, all S, all W.
        a waybread: In Med City. From recall, 9S, W.
        a wedge of Trellorian goat's cheese: In Med City. From recall, go 5W, 4N.

      Run the Gauntlet [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Reona
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Crime
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the guildmaster (30 minutes)
        In Med City.
      2. [to run the gauntlet in Crime Underground] (2 hours)
        From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D.go all E, N, D, 2N, E, S. Kill novice for key. Go N, W, all S, U, all W, unlock N, N to enter "The Gauntlet." Kill the mob in each room, loot the key, and unlock/open the door to the N to get to the next room. Continue through all the rooms.

      Sacrifice Preparation [Needs Detail]

      Completed by: Rarazona
      Level: 23, 25, 26
      Difficulty: easy to moderate (one room of CPK)
      Locale(s): Githyanki, Goland's Tower
      Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the High Priest (40 minutes)
        In Githyanki. From zone entrance, go all N.
      2. to find the Book of Dark Rituals (2 hours)
        In Goland's Tower, in CPK area. From Goland's entrance, go all N to the front door of the tower. From their, go 2E, 3N, W, N, W, D and kill pond dweller for key. From here go U, S, 2E, S, and search with key in inventory. Then go D, 2W, S, W, open door, W, S, open door W, W, open door N, N, search, 2N, search D, N. West of this altar is 1 room of CPK with the priest that loads the book. This objective is flagged as find original.
      3. to give the Book of Dark Rituals to the High Priest ( )
        As above. Note that he will summon xezadha worshippers to kill you.

      Samples for Mirisia [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Jadeyn
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Medievia, Gnomenel, Aeketh
      Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Mirisia, the seamstress (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, then go 3W, N.
      2. to find Koera Elliman (40 minutes)
        In Gnomenel. From zone entrance, go 3E, 2S.
      3. to find a tight, fire red dress (40 minutes)
        On the servant in Aeketh. From zone entrance, go all W, E, then N through wilderness. Then go all W, 2N, 3 W, all N, all W, N, E, search, pick hatch, open hatch, D.
      4. to give a tight, fire red dress and a fine red silk dress to Mirisia, the seamstress (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Samrah Scales [Complete]

      Completed by: Mandroth
      Level: 21, 25, 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Shadmire, Shadowclaw
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Calime, mage of the fortress (30 minutes)
        In Shadowclaw. From zone entrance, go E, 6U, W, 2S (open door), 2E, S. Calime loads here, or in the 2x2 area of rooms near here.
      2. to give the golden scales of Samrah to Calime (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        Scales are found in Shadmire. From entrance to zone ("Beneath a Canopy of Interwoven Tree Branches," go W, N, N, W, W, N, N, W, N, N, N, N, N, D, E, E, E, E, E, E, E, S, D, W, N, N, N, N. You'll have to kill Samrah to get her scales, as this is find-original.

      Sanctuary Potions for the Duke [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Additions by: Maneak
      Level: 24
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s): Castle Medievia, Graveyard, Fortress of Elnissa
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to give a flask of holy water and a silver goblet filled with thick purple wine to Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        Holy water: loads on a quiet monk in the Graveyard. From recall point in Med City, go 11E, 3N, 6E, 12N to the church entrance. From the entrance of the church, go either east or west, and then up to get to the galleries. Monks don't always load holy water, so several may have to be killed.
        goblet: Loads in Elnissa, in the tactical room. To open the main doors, go to the northwest corner of the outer walls and search. There is passage east, and a ladder that leads up. Aggro mobs are on the crosswalks, but there is a lever on the south end of the catwalk that, when pulled, will open the doors. Inside the fortress are storm soldiers or something, but there is an overturned wagon with a key inside. (more to follow)

      Save a Stolen Sapling [Complete]

      Contributed by: Tazio
      Level:
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): The Dark Forest of Wittermark, El Cantara
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Lear, the leader of the Elders (30 minutes)
        In Wittermark. From entrance, go all N, all W (even into hidden exit), all S, all U, S, all W, all S, W, S.
      2. to find a small stone planter, holding a miniature tree (2 hours)
        In El Cantara. From @, go U, 2N, E, 10N, E, N and buy it here.
      3. to give a small stone planter, holding a miniature tree to Lear, the leader of the Elders (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Save Albanus (2.0)[Incomplete]

      Additions by: Kernighan
      Updated by: Wyndryk, Trystian
      Level: 24, 27
      Difficulty: hard (keys and repop issues)
      Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Abaneus, the Malindora elven philosopher (1 hour)
        From western entrance to zone, go S, S, E, S, S, S, S, W, W (just walk right through closed door), W, N, W, N, N.
      2. to find an inscribed oak key ( )
        Go to the Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N. Kill Takenos and get the "inscribed oak key" from Takenos' corpse.
      3. to find a harp ( )
        Go S, W, N, N, N, W, W, W, W, S. Unlock then open the strongbox. Get the harp (plus whatever else you want) from the strongbox (if the harp's not there, you won't be able to complete the AQ.)
      4. to kill 6 of either a Malindora guard or a Da'raen follower (25 minutes)
        Go N, E, E, D, S, E, E, E, S, S, S. Go south again (it's a hidden exit), then S, W, S, W, S. Hold the harp, then use harp. Go S and look around.
      5. to kill Da'raen, son of Celianestu ( )
        From where you used the harp, go S, S, E, S, S, E, E. Da'raen is here.

      Save Albanus [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Kernighan
      Updated by: Wyndryk, Trystian, Pleen
      Level: 24, 27
      Difficulty: moderate (keys and repop issues)
      Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Albanus, the Malindora elven philosopher (1 hour)
        From western entrance to zone, go 2S, E, 4S, 2W (just walk right through closed door), W, N, W, 2N.
      2. to find a room called The Top of the Tree Tower (30 minutes)
        From above, go 2S, E, S, 4E, N, 2E, S, E, N, 2U, 3S, E, S, 4E, S, 2U.
      3. to kill Da'raen ( )
        Go to the Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N. Kill Takenos and get the "inscribed oak key" from Takenos' corpse. Go S, W, N, N, N, W, W, W, W, S. Unlock then open the strongbox. Get the harp (plus whatever else you want) from the strongbox (if the harp's not there, you won't be able to complete the AQ.) Go N, E, E, D, S, E, E, E, S, S, S. Go south again (it's a hidden exit), then S, W, S, W, S. Hold the harp, then use harp. Go S, S, E, S, S, E, E. Da'raen is here.
      4. to give the blood of Jai'nesgar to Albanus, the Malindora elven philosopher (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Save Baskille from Boredom [Complete]

      Level: 20
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Trellor, Preserve
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes

      3. to give a fly fishing rod to Baskille, the retired sailor (30 minutes)
        The hunter gives it to you so just FedEx it back.

        Ditto.

      Save Brina [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Additions by: Antdos
      Level: 22, 24
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Med Castle, Horneg's Keep
      Total Time: 3 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (25 minutes)
        See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to kill Horneg (2 hours, 20 minutes)
        From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here.
      3. to find Brina, the niece of the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        You need the key from the gargoyle commander to unlock the door at the bottom of the ladder. See walkthrough (link not available) for more information. From Horneg, go d, e, d, n, w, n, d, e, n, 2w, s, 7d, 2s, 2w, 2n, e, 2s, e.
      4. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Save Our Blue Feathers [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Leaya
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Dragmire, Goland's
      Total Time: 8 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a giant blue parrot ()
        In Dragmire. From just inside the start of the zone ("At the Checkpoint"), go W, W, N, N, N, N, E, E, E (watch for aggro mobs), N, N, E, N, N, N, U.
      2. to find Kuukle (2 hours)
        In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go all north until "Before Goland's Tower." Enter the tower by going north (killing the tower guard to get the key to go inside if not already done recently by someone else in the zone.) Go N, N, N, all E (search if necessary), all U, then W to find Kuukle.
      3. to kill Lady Goland (3 hours)
      4. to find a giant blue parrot (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Save Our Feathers [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Level: 22, 24, 27, 28
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Dragmire, Med City
      Total Time: 5 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a giant parrot hatchling (2 hours)
        In Dragmire. From just inside the start of the zone ("At the Checkpoint"), go W, W, N, N, N, N, E, E, E (watch for aggro mobs), N, N, E, N, N, N, U, all north then east.
      2. to kill 4 of the cleaning lady and 3 of a maid (3 hours)
        Cleaning lady: See Dragon Staircase in Frequent Pathways. From there, go: 2E, 2S, 2W, U, 4S, 2 W, N, W, U, 2W, 3 U (if no key, can ethereal or pick), S and look around.

      Save Queen from Dragons [Complete]

      Contributed by: Krieven
      Additions by: Takphius, Pawaka
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Goland's Tower
      Total Time: 2 hours, 44 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the elven king (39 minutes)
        In the Forbidden Forest. From Med City recall, enter mage, then go 4W, 2S, 2W, 4N, 2E, all N, 2N, all N, 5E, 2N. Look for rooms called "A Forest of Dark and Gnarled Trees." One of them will have a hidden exit east, into room "In A Strange Colored Mist" with no exits. From "In a Strange Colored Mist" go E, S, E, 3D, W, 2S, kill guard for key or pick door S, open door S, 3S, kill male elven servant for key, 2S, E, S, unlock door S, open door S, S. The king loads here. He's aggro, so leave right away or plan to kill him.
      2. to give a pair of galcine arm plates or bracers emblazoned with a bloody dragon's tail insignia or Lord Goland's battle plate or a pair of galcine leg plates to the elven queen (2 hours)
        Load in Goland's Tower on guards. From entrance to Goland's Tower, go:all N, ice guard for key, unlock, N, E, ice Dornloth for key, W, all N, E, search, E, 3U, W, ice girl for key, E, all D, all W, unlock N, N, U, look in hallway for guards. The elven queen is N, E from the king above.
      3. to find the elven king ( )
        As above.

      Save Sendaria's Business [Complete]

      Contributed by: Helitus
      Additions by: Cipactli
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Egriel, Trellor
      Total Time: 12 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, 5N, 6E.
      2. to give a translucent yellow potion to Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (6 hours)
        In Egriel (daytime only) on Draelin. From @, go E, all S, open door S. (Draelin is difficult to solo; we recommend elemental stones.)
      3. to give a vial of lavender potion to Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (6 hours)
        In Sonedal Ravine. From @, go D, E, D, E, D, E, D, S, E, S, S to the laboratory. From here, go 2N and look for Dulen the Wandering Peddler. Buy vial from dulen and return to the laboratory. Here, hold vial, type "pour red", "pour blue", "pour blue" to make the vial of lavender potion.

      Save Shefasa from Sceptrum Ishachi [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Clarisa
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Sceptrum of Ishachi
      Total Time: 5 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find an elderly man (1 hour, 39 minutes)
        In Sceptrum. From @, go N and look around.
      2. to find Shefasa, the village healer (2 hours, 25 minutes)
        In Sceptrum. From @, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, N, pick bars W, W, N. F
      3. to kill 2 of a mistress of pain, 2 of a mistress of agony, 2 of a mistress of the inferno, 3 of a mistress of torment (1 hour, 40 minutes)
        In Sceptrum.

      Save the Apprentice From Punishment [Complete]

      Contributed by: Viathan
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Enara, Gloumewood
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find an apprentice (30 minutes)
        In The Esacha Fen. From "On a Precarious Walkway," go E, N, 2E, S, E, S, E, 2S, 2W and look around.
      2. to find a fistful of nails (1 hour, 50 minutes)
        In Gloumewood Farm. From @, go E. Nails load on the strapping farmhand.
      3. to give a fistful of nails to an apprentice (40 minutes)
        As above.

      Saving a Criminal [Complete]

      Contributed by: Krevitch
      Additions by: Neverra
      Level: 24
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Crime Underground, Med City
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Nephalis, the Viper (1 hour)
        See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. Be sure you have "sense life." From here: go S, S, S.
      2. to find Illverin, the shopkeeper (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter cleric, 4N, 2W, N.
      3. to give a deep, blue potion to Nephalis, the Viper (35 minutes)

      Scare Annoying Coyotes [Needs Detail]

      Scarecrow [Complete]

      Contributed by: Belgord
      Level: 22
      Difficulty: medium
      Locale(s): Riverton
      Total Time:3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find an animated scarecrow (1 hour)
        In Riverton, from "North Entrance to Riverton," go S, all west until "Hall in the Temple of the Sun," then all S until you see the scarecrow.
      2. to give a waybread or a sticky, iced bun or a bread or a piece of stale bread or half a loaf of bread to an animated scarecrow (1 hour)
        If you cast create food enough, eventually you'll make half a loaf of bread or a waybread.
      3. to kill the nightlord (1 hour)
        This pops in the room with you.

      Scout to the Ranger's Cabin [Complete]

      Level: 15, 23
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med, Wilderness
      Total Time: 5 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (1 hour)
      2. to find the wilderness room at 1128 x 1140 (3 hours)
        Just south of Crystal Lake. When in the correct room, the screen will appear like this:

        +:+++++++************
        +::+++++++***********
        ++::+++++++**@*****++
        +++::+++++++~:+~+++++
        ++++::::++++=:~~+++++
        +++++++::+++~=~++++++
        ~+++++++::#:=:+++++++
        ~~~~++++++:+~:::+++++
        +++~~+++++:+~++::++++
        ++++~~++++:+~+++::::+
        +++++~++~~=~~++++++:+
        +++++~~~~+:+~~~++++:+
        ++++++++++:+++~~+++::

      3. to find the wilderness room at 1123 x 1151 (1 hour)
        This is 5W, 11S of the previous room.

      Scout to Wizard's Cart [Complete]

      Contributed by: Peb
      Additions by: Kernighan, Sulin
      Level: 15
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Med, Wilderness
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (1 hour)
        See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find the wilderness room at 887 x 1053 (2 hours)
        From Med City, head E out of the City and ask "where enara" at each crossing to lead you to these coordinates.
      3. to find the wilderness room at 883 x 1025 (1 hour)
        Ask "where e'nat'dae" at each crossing.

      Scrollcase for Marious [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Thaspian

      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:

      Scrolls for Gemmon [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Dima
      Level: 25, 27, 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (30 minutes)
        From Med recall, go W, W, W, W, N, W, N, U, N.
      2. to give 3 of a last will and testament and a scroll of create food and a scroll of red cloth and a scroll of green cloth to Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        a last will and testament: in Van Kyln's Estate. (c locate will to make sure they've loaded.) From @, go 2N, 2E, 2D, pick chest, open chest, get all chest for key to unlock gate, 2U, all W, N to closed W door, then unlock gate, open gate, 3W, 3N, E. This puts you above a grave. Now go into each down exit you find, looking at corpses, for the wills, which load randomly.
        a scroll of create food: in Island of Xanthal on Mercapto. From entrance, go N, all W, search, 2D, all E, kill Malanese for key. Go all W, all N, 3E, 3N, kill beastly servant for key. Then go 2W, U, N, W, unlock door S, open door S, S, unlock door S, open door S, S, kill Mercapto.
        a scroll of red cloth: In Dark Escarpment, on the saultancas mages.
        a scroll of green cloth: In Dark Escarpment, on the tunnelmaster, the saultancas underling mages, and Keros.

      Scrub Brush for the Manservant [Complete]

      Contributed by: Grezat
      Additions by: Maneak, Dragzida, Draeke
      Level:
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Yldari, Cloud Giants
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a well-dressed manservant (45 minutes)
        In Yldari. From @, go all N, W, 2N, open gates, 2N and look for "A snobbish man carries a silver tray."
      2. to give a wooden scrub brush to a well-dressed manservant 1 hour)
        In Cloud Giants; loads on the bath boys. From "Floating Atop an Island Of Clouds," go E, E, E, S, open door, U, E, S, W, S.

      Scruff's Stolen Bone [Complete]

      Level: 19
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Rydhordel Woods
      Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Scruff (30 minutes)
        In Med City, S of recall.
      2. to kill a scruffy dog (1 hour)
        Loads in Rydhordel Woods. From zone entrance, go N and follow the hedge maze path around. Within 5 or so rooms you will start to see the scruffy dog mobs. When you kill one, you will receive a well-chewed bone.
      3. to give a well chewed bone to Scruff (40 minutes)
        As above.

      Search for a Secret of Medievia [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: easy to moderate (NPK)
      Locale(s): Med City, Pirate Ship, Great Tree, Mt. Vryce
      Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a traveller (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go all E to gate and look around.
      2. to find a room called the Crow's Nest (45 minutes)
        In Pirate Ship. From @, go 4N, E, U, 2E, 2N, all U. (Note: aggro mobs loads here.)
      3. to find a room called The Highest Point in Medievia (45 minutes)
        In Mt. Vryce. From the zone entrance, go N, all U, N, all E, S, all E, N, all E, 3S, all E, all U, S, all U.
      4. to find a room called The Magic Cloud (30 minutes)
        In the Great Tree.
      5. to find a traveller ( )
        As above.

      Search for a Suitable Replacement [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Belizar
      Level:
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Riverton Mines, Crime Underground
      Total Time: 5 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the dwarven dungeon guard (1 hour)
        In Med City. From recall, go 3U, N to the indoor forest, open boulder, D, follow path to cells.
      2. to find a water boy (1 hour)
        In Riverton Mines, on the first 2 levels.
      3. to find a mine foreman (20 minutes)
        See Mines in Frequent Pathways.
      4. to find an alchemy jug (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        Loads on Nephalis, the Viper in Crime Underground. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. Be sure you have "sense life." From here: go S, S, S.
      5. to find a mine foreman (45 minutes)
        As above.
      6. to give an alchemy jug to a mine foreman (5 minutes)
        As above.
      7. to find a water boy (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Seashells for Elves [Complete]

      Completed by: Loere
      Level: 23, 27
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Alendora, Lattyrna, Pirate Ship
      Total Time: 3 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Havensdora male (45 minutes)
        In Forest of the Alendora. From northern entrance (@), go S, S, E, E, S, S, S into "An Illuminated Meadow." The Havensdora male will load randomly in this rectangle of rooms.
      2. to find a seashell necklace and a belt made of seashells (2 hours)
        The belt loads on Amphritrite in Lattyrna, and the necklace is on the navigator or first mate in the Pirate Ship.
      3. to give a seashell necklace and a belt made of seashells to a Havensdora male (45 minutes)
        As above.

      Sextant for Quartermaster [Complete]

      Completed by: Mihu
      Level: 25, 26, 29
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Mystara, Pirate Ship
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:

        In Mystara. From the zone entrance (@): All W, E, S, U, E, S.
      2. to give a copper sextant to the quartermaster (2 hours)
        The copper sextant is found on Merrick, the navigator of the Fury, on the upper deck at the south end.

      Sextant of Brass for Astronomer [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Yelm
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Braneri
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find the astronomer (1 hour)
        In Braneri, in the west academic building. From zone entrance, go 2N, 3 W, N, open door W, and look around in the building.
      2. to find a brass sextant ( )
        Brass sextant loads on the navigator in Pirate Ship. At the back of the main deck, search, open floorboard, D, E, S.
      3. to give a brass sextant to the astronomer ( )
        As above.

      Shady Drunken Deeds [Complete]

      Contributed by: Magtheridon
      Level: 16
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Medievia
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Jorrard the Drunk (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, 4E, S, W.
      2. to kill Basalan, the Mayor of the City; Gremmon, the head scribe of City Hall; 5 of a busy scribe, and 10 of a Medievia guardsman (1 hour)
        In Med City. From recall, go 4W, N, W, N, U; Basalan is south, and Gremmonis north. The scribes wander inside city hall. The guardsmen tend to stick to major thoroughfares in Med City.
      3. to find Jorrard the Drunk (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Shandril's Resurrection [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Kethric, Ryntrax
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Horneg's Keep
      Total Time: 5 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. o find the small imp (30 minutes)
        In Horneg's. From entrance, go 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S, pick gate (or kill golem for key), open gate, 2S, open door S, S and look around.
      2. to find Horneg (15 minutes)
        From the gate above, go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Shandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U.
      3. to give a band of human flesh to Horneg ( )
      4. to find a butchered piece of human carcass and a flask of sacred oils (Armor, Det Evil, Prot from Evil) and a candle decorated in gold leaf ()
        butchered piece of human carcass: Found in Asnor in the freezer. From entrance, go Nu, U, 3N, U, 5N, U, 2W, D, all W, 2E, 2S, E, N, W, N, open freezer, get all freezer.
        flask and candles: In G'dangus on monks in church.
      5. to give a butchered piece of human carcass and a flask of sacred oils (Armor, Det Evil, Prot from Evil) and a candle decorated in gold leaf to Horneg ()
        As above.

      Shawls for Xandia [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Dolph, Kernighan
      Level: 23, 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Esacha Fen
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Pater Jeypaz (1 hour)
        In Esacha Fen. From entrance to the fen, go E, 3N, 2E, 3N, W, N, W, N, W, N, 2W, 4N, 2E, N.
      2. to give a black silk shawl, embroidered with red roses and a black lace shawl, interwoven with tiny ice crystals and a dusty blue silk shawl to Pater Jeypaz (3 hours)
        a black silk shawl, embroidered with red roses: loads in El Cantara on Jardab the Weaver at "The Weaver's Table" in the bazaar section.
        a black lace shawl, interwoven with tiny ice crystals: In Elnissa on Queen Elnissa.
        a dusty blue silk shawl: on Emma the Weaver in Trellor. From recall, go 5S, 5W, 2N, W.

      Shield the Soul [Complete]

      Additions by: Afiniti, Breetai
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Riverton Mines
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a dwarven miner (30 minutes)
        In Riverton Mines; loads randomly.
      2. to give a spirit shield to a dwarven miner (1 hour)
        Loads in Talqaxtal on the spirit of the witch doctor, just before Talqaxtal in the pyramid. From zone entrance, go all N until the pyramid, then go all W. Then go all N until you see "a rope" in the room description. Then go 2U, S, 4E to the Dark Antechamber. Go S, then N, and the room will change. Kill guardians for key. Unlock N, go N until you see the "angry spirit" mob. Note: This is SOLO NO-DEATH FIND-ORIGINAL.

      Shoes for Samrah [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Zasildar
      Additions by: Decrata
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Samrah (45 minutes)
        In Shadmire. From entrance to zone ("Beneath a Canopy of Interwoven Tree Branches," go W, N, N, W, W, N, N, W, N, N, N, N, N, D, E, E, E, E, E, E, E, S, D, W, N, N, N, N.
      2. to find Orak the smithy (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, then go 3S, W.
      3. to find several white dragon scales (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Berkovic on the White Dragon. From entrance, go all W, U, all N.
      4. to give several white dragon scales to Orak the smithy (30 minutes)
        As above. You'll receive some boots.
      5. to give boots to Samrah ( )
        As above.
