      Sight for a Hermit [Complete]

      Contributed by: Saara
      Level: 22
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Catacombs, Warrens
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find a wise hermit (no limit)
        Located randomly, in the Catacombs.
      2. to give a staff of sight OR a scroll of sight to a wise hermit (no limit)
        Staff of sight loads on Gasherbrum at the bottom level of Warrens. From entrance, go D, all N, D, all E, 7S, all W, N, D, D, D, N, W, W, W, S, S, D, E, S, S, W, W, D, N, N, D. This level is a small rectangle of about a dozen rooms, and Gasherbrum loads here (or occasionally on the way here.) Note: this is find-original.

      Sightseeing in Medievia [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Zeela
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): [see below]
      Total Time: 10 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a prim maidservant (30 minutes)
        From recall in Med City, enter mage. Go 4N, then all W.
      2. to find a room called At the Base of a Massive Waterfall (2 hours)
        In Brookhaven. From recall, go all N. Kill guards for key. Unlock gate, open gate. Then go N, 2W, N, E, N, W, U, N, D, N, 2E, U, N, D, W.
      3. to find a room called A Clearing in the Thicket ( )
        Go E from the above.
      4. to find a room called Before A Great Step Pyramid (1 hour)
        In Pyramid. From recall, go N.
      5. to find a room called A Platform Near a Ski Jump (1 hour)
        In Alps. From entrance, go E, N, all E, 4U.
      6. to find a room called Atop the Volcano (1 hour)
        In Reef. From @, follow the path to the summit of the volcano.
      7. to find a room called The Top of the Lighthouse (1 hour)
        At the Lighthouse. From @, go 2S, 3U.
      8. to find a room called Before a Ruined Gateway ()
        In Czareran, at @.
      9. to find a room called A Scenic Overlook ()
        In Village of Ruellia. From the zone entrance, go D, all N, W, N, N, D, E, N, E to "Next to the Waterfall." Go U, 6N, then all east to "Beside the Valley Walls." Search then go east. Go U, N, N, W.
      10. to find a room called Where Knowledge Meets Power ()
        In Med City. From recall, enter mage, 4N, 4W.

      Silk Collection [Needs Detail]

      Level: 30
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Enara, Esacha, Medievia, evil Derah, Celestia
      Total Time: 4 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the silkworm keeper (40 minutes)
        In E'nat'dae. From zone entrance (@), go 2N, W, 4N, W.
      2. to give a pair of white silk slippers and a cord of black silk that ties around the waist and a twirling silk circle skirt and a pair of diamond-studded silk slippers and a silk head scarf to the silkworm keeper (3 hours, 30 minutes)
        a pair of white silk slippers: Loads on the young lady in Medievia. From southeasternmost entrance to Med City (@), look around. Also can be purchased from The Spider's Web in Trellor, in the SW corner of the Merchant Circle.
        a cord of black silk that ties around the waist: Loads in evil Derah on the vampire/mayor. (This loads irregularly -- try getting this first in the list so that if it doesn't pop, you can get the others, then come back here after repop.)
        a twirling silk circle skirt: Loads on a young woman (appears as "A pretty young lady is out enjoying the day") in Enara. From zone entrance (@), go all N, then E or W and look around.
        a pair of diamond-studded silk slippers: In Celestia on Amacia. From entrance to zone, go N, 2E, all N to U exit, all U, all N. (Impossible to kill her without help!)
        a silk head scarf: in Esacha Fen, on Jaroslava. From entrance to Esacha Fen, go 3N, W, 3N, W, N, W, 2N, E, N (hidden exit), E, N, 2E, S, E, S, E, 2S, 2E, 4N, open gate, 2N and look around.

      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Braneri, Thanos

      Ski Resort Getaway [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Zasildar
      Additions by: Takphius
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Tomb of Oblivion
      Total Time: 5 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Callard, the caretaker of the tomb (45 minutes)
        From zone entrance, D, 14N.
      2. to find a bag (20 minutes)
        Create one, or buy one off auction.
      3. to find Callard, the caretaker of the tomb (20 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give a bag to Callard, the caretaker of the tomb (5 minutes)
        As above.
      5. to find a pair of skis and the scarf of warmth and a pair of masterfully woven mittens of green and red wool (2 hours, 40 minutes)
        a pair of skis: in Alps. Once inside, find hatchet, get whittling knife from the chest in the hut, wield hatchet, go to northwest corner, chop tree, wield knife, whittle lumber, get skis.
        the scarf of warmth: In New Ashton NPK. Search for a boy with a pump handle. Kill for the handle (key). From New Ashton recall, then go S, D, 4E, 4S, W, S, E, search, S, search, 2D, 2N, E, N until you see the old woman (who loads the scarf.)
        a pair of masterfully woven mittens of green and red wool: In Shadmire. From entrance to zone ("Beneath a Canopy of Interwoven Tree Branches," go W, N, N, W, W, N, N, W, N, N, N, N, N, D, E, E, E, E, E, E, E, S, D, W, N, N, N, N. The mittens load on Samrah.
      6. to find Callard, the caretaker of the tomb (45 minutes)
        As above.
      7. to give a pair of skis and the scarf of warmth and a pair of masterfully woven mittens of green and red wool to Callard, the caretaker of the tomb (3 hours, 30 minutes)
        As above.

      Skin of Stone for Protection from Fire [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Belizar
      Additions by: Dolph, Aivanther
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Dark Escarpment, Condemned Arena
      Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a klastakor (50 minutes)
        In Dark Escarpment. From the entrance to the zone ("At the Mouth of a Dark Tunnel"), go 6W, 2S, 2E and look around. Be sure to remove your light in the oily rooms!
      2. to give a rock covered skin to a klastakor (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        Located in Condemned Arena on a rock monster.

      Skull for a Skeleton [Complete]

      Contributed by: Kalliste and Ariste
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med Graveyard, Rydhordel Woods
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find an animated skeleton (30 minutes)
        In the Graveyard. From "Eastern Gate of Med City," go 4E, N, open gate, wander around till you find skeleton of a long-dead guardsman.
      2. to give a skull of bleak despair to an animated skeleton (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Rydhordel Woods. From zone entrance, go N and follow path through the hedge maze. Go west-ish to the Monumental Fountain of Amber and south on Path Through the Park. (Desperate mother mobs are aggressive to evil-aligned players). Go all S, then W to A Large Trunk. Enter trunk. Go all S, 3W to 4-way intersection. Open door west, 5W, 2S, open door, E, look around for hidden mob Quisenil. Kill him and loot key (worked piece of stone). Go W back to Underground Barracks and return to 4-way intersection, "A Crossroad in the Tunnels." Unlock door south, 3S, walk around Circular Corridor till you find an old robed man (senile conjurer). Kill him, and loot key (elliptical section of marble). Wander around corridor till you find locked east door. Unlock door, 2E to Al'Drenyth. Kill him, go S, type "pull lever." Return to 4-way intersection, then go all E, 2N to a Large Stone Door. Kill Khernol, loot key (triangular stone). Unlock door, go 3E, S, 2E, S to Dead End. There is a hidden exit down -- no need to search, just go down. The Demon is here, but note: he has perma fireshield and does not take damage from demonfire. Kill Demon and get skull.

      Skullduggery in Quinstone [Complete]

      Contributed by: Pawana
      Additions by: Vashka
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Quinstone, Riverton
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Dipwaun, the cook (1 hour)
        In Quinstone. From @, go N, 2E, 2U, 2E, N, E, S.
      2. to find a room called the Northern Entrance to Riverton (20 minutes)
        From northern @, go S.
      3. to find a room called [hidden] (40 minutes)
        This is the entrance to Sevoseth.
      4. to give a frying pan and a long wooden spoon to Dipwaun, the cook (1 hour)
        Load on a troubadour in Sevoseth. From @, go N.

      Slay Dragons [Needs Detail]

      Level: 29
      Difficulty: hard to very hard (you must have help!)
      Locale(s): Mystical Forest, Shadmire, Wytherwind, Kirys Ayr
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
        In Mystical Forest. From recall, go all E, all N, all W, N, U, 5S, 5E, all N.
      2. to kill the small blue drake (no limit)
        In Wytherwind. From zone entrance, go all S, all W, all S to foundation. From foundation, search, 2D, W, 2N, W, 3N, 2W, N, W, 2U, W.
      3. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
        As above.
      4. to kill Samrah (no limit)
        In Shadmire. From entrance to zone ("Beneath a Canopy of Interwoven Tree Branches," go W, N, N, W, W, N, N, W, N, N, N, N, N, D, E, E, E, E, E, E, E, S, D, W, N, N, N, N.
      5. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
        As above.
      6. to kill Rekhalset the onyx dragon (no limit)
        In Kirys Ayr.
      7. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
        As above.
      8. to kill a young white dragon (no limit)
        In Berkovic.
      9. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
        As above.
      10. to kill a young mud dragon (no limit)
        In Warrens of the Moshata.
      11. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
        As above.
      12. to kill a green dragon (no limit)
        In Mystical Forest.
      13. to find King Greybeard (1 hour)
        As above.

      Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes

      Slay The Heretic Of Nature [Complete]

      Contributed by: Thralin
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Akenuas Glade, Wilderness
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Aeldar (1 hour)
        In Akenuas Glade. From zone entrance, go E, N, 2E, 3N, W, N, 2W, N, all E, S, all E, S, all E, all N (hidden exit), W.
      2. to kill an elementalist (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In the wilderness around Ruellia. First cast sense presence elementalist to see if he is there, then wander around the green area until you find him.

      Slay the Thieves [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Nimbulaxan
      Additions by: Anonymous
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Trellor, Crime Underground
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Trellorian guardsman (30 minutes)
        Located in Trellor. From recall, go 2E, 2S and look around..
      2. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (45 minutes)
        In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
      3. to find the Trellorian guardsman ( )
        As above.
      4. to kill 6 of a novice thief; Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves; Ordion, a novice thief; Harald, the novice thief; Fothwin, a novice thief; 4 of a tired-looking novice; and the young pickpocket (35 minutes)
        These load in Crime Underground.

        In E'nat'dae. From @, go N, W, 17N, U. Wander around the adjacent rooms looking for a lady in waiting who loads the (invisible) slippers.

      Snake King [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Mortalengine
      Additions by: Bezolod
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: moderate to hard (without help)
      Locale(s):
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find a gigantic forest snake (1 hour)
        In Wittermark near entrance.
      2. to kill Ssslasssusss, King of Snakes (1 hour)
        Loads in Sceptrum Isachi. From @ go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, N till D (will have to go through illusionary wall at some point), then D, U, W, N, and go westish. Ssslasssusss loads in this area.
      3. to find a gigantic forest snake (1 hour)
        As above.
      4. to kill 3 of gigantic forest snake (30 minutes)

      Snake Milking [Complete]

      Contributed by: Keona
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 5 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Lucretia the Healer (1 hour)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 3 W, N, W.
      2. to find a giant snake (1 hour)
        In med graveyard. Follow central path north until you find them.
      3. to find a spitting cobra (1 hour)
        Wanders around in the Labyrinth.
      4. to find a striped water snake (1 hour)
        In Akenuas Glade. From @, follow the eastern path until you come to a stream. Mob should be in one of the adjacent rooms.
      5. to a rock serpent (1 hour)
        In The Dark Escarpment. From entrance to the zone, go all W until you can go N, go all N, and follow the east path all the way around until you come to a room named 'A Sandy Section of Tunnel'. Go north until you find the dunes area. The mob should be wandering around somewhere in these rooms.Be sure to remove your light before going through the oil rooms!
      6. to find Lucretia the Healer (1 hour)
        As above.

        In Village of Brookhaven. From zone entrance, go 2E, all N, E, S. Ettar and his mother, Kaltana load here, each with a cup of coffee.

      Solve the Bee Problem for Henry [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Afiniti
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med Graveyard
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
        In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3 W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
      2. to kill the queen bee (1 hour)
        In Hives? (CPK)

      Song Books for Congenial Bard [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Bhalodus, Ontarious
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Trellor, Alendora
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a congenial bard (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 5S, 3W, and look around.
      2. to give a leather-bound song book to a congenial bard (1 hour)
        In Alendora, carried by a very bad elven minstrel. From east @, go all S, all E, S, all W, S, and look around.
      3. to give a song book to a congenial bard (1 hour)
        Song book loads on the jolly bard in Asnor. From southern @, go N, U, all N, all U, all N, all U, all N into the Temple of Skye. Then go U, all S, U, N, U. One of the bards loads the song book.

      Souls Needed For A Ritual [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Belior
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Ulhazzen Mines, Lyngaeli's Nightmare
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Avatar of a Dark Goddess (30 minutes)
        In Ulhazzen Mines. From western @, go 2E, D, 2W, N, W, N, D, 2N, U, N, D, 3 N.
      2. to find a jar of souls (2 hours)
        In Lyngaeli's Nightmare. See walkthrough. (link not available)Apparently doesn't load every time, and I believe you have to run the whole zone to get it. Will need a form of several people to help. The zone is NPK, and you must be less that 26 current level and have less than 100 PKs to get in.

      Spears for Dread [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Alexial
      Additions by: Milekan, Cygnea, Natlar, Kernighan, Antdos
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: moderate (all no-summon, no-phase) (challenging AQ medal)
      Locale(s): Trellor, Sceptrum, Lattyrna, Stornaway, Spirited, Quinstone, Spiderwode
      Total Time: 6 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Dread the Armourer (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, 5 N, 3 W, N.
      2. to find a whalebone spear and a carved spear of oak and a long spear of steel and an elven-crafted spear and a silverwood spear and a razor-sharp spectral spear (5 hours)
        a whalebone spear: Loads in Sceptrum Isachi on a castle gate guard.
        a carved spear of oak: In Quinstone's Keep. Loads on guard all N of entrance.
        a long spear of steel: In Med. From recall, enter warrior, then go 2S, W. It also loads on the gate watchman at the west gate.
        an elven-crafted spear: Loads in Lattyrna on a sea elf.
        a silverwood spear: Loads on darklings in Spiderwode.a razor-sharp spectral spear: Loads in Stornaway Castle on an elite phantom guard.

        Note: this is find-original.

      3. to give a whalebone spear and a carved spear of oak and a long spear of steel and an elven-crafted spear and a silverwood spear and a razor-sharp spectral spear to Dread the Armourer ( )

      Special Ritual By The Avatar Of The Dark Goddess [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Ulhazzen, Spiderwode, Sceptrum Ishachi
      Total Time: 4 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Avatar of a Dark Goddess (30 minutes)
        In Ulhazzen. From western @, go E and D into the mines. Head north and west, and look for a D exit. Go D, then follow the path N, going U and D as needed to "An Altar to a Dark Goddess."
      2. to find a fang of the spider queen, 2 of a vial of distilled spider venom, and 3 of a handful of spider brains (3 hours)
        Venom, brains: load in The Spiderwode on the spiders.Fang: Loads in Sceptrum Ishachi on Trelaya, Matriarch of Spiders.

      Special Waterskin for Nhabal [Needs Detail]

      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): El Cantara
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Nhabal, the Nomad Chief (1 hour)

      2. to find a horsehide waterskin (1 hour)
        In Rhaiaden. From @, go 2S, E, 2S, W, S, W, S, W, search, 2N, get waterskin cabinet.
      3. to give a horsehide waterskin to Nhabal, the Nomad Chief ( )

      Spectacles for Fragom [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Belizar
      Additions by: Takphius
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Gloumewood Farm, NaeraMae
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Fragom, the myopic goat herder (1 hour)
        In Gloumewood Farm. From entrance go E, then N to barn and haystack.
      2. to give a pair of wire-rimmed spectacles to Fragom (2 hours)
        In NaeraNae, wire-rimmed spectacles load on Threzdi the archmage. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the east.

      Spectacles for the Architect [Complete]

      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): NaeraMae, Braneri
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find an academy architect (30 minutes)
        In Braneri, wandering around in the quad. From entrance, go 4N and look around.
      2. to give a pair of wire-rimmed spectacles to an academy architect (1 hour)
        In NaeraNae, wire-rimmed spectacles load on Threzdi the archmage. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the east.

      Spell Component For The Wizard [Complete]

      Locale(s): Med Castle, Rydhordel Woods
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Wizard (30 minutes)
        See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to give the shimmering hooves of an alabaster unicorn to the wizard (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        From entrance, go N, then follow the maze to "An Entrance into the Park" (if you exit the maze at "A Monumental Fountain Carved of Amber," go 4S.) From "An Entrance to the Park," go 3S, 5W, N. Kill unicorn, loot hooves.

      Spy Mission for the Goblins [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Yasujiro
      Additions by: Pleen
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Dragmire, Labyrinth
      Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Goblin King (30 minutes)
        From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. From here, go all W, all N, E, all S (through doors), U to Goblin King.
      2. to find a goblin spy (30 minutes)
        In Dragmire. From zone entrance, go W, U, N, D, 8W, S.
      3. to kill General Baazt (40 minutes)
        In the Grandstand of the Arena at Dragmire. From the above location, go 3N, 6W, U, 2N, D, E.
      4. to find a goblin spy (30 minutes)
        As above.
      5. to find the Goblin King (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Squeamish Deckhand [Incomplete]

      Additions by: Antdos
      Level: 26, 29
      Difficulty: moderate to hard (NPK, no death)
      Locale(s): Fury
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find a young girl disguised as a deckhand (no limit)
        Find the current location of the Fury by going to Baskille and typing "where fury." Go to and enter the zone. From zone entrance ("The Edge of a Small Plank Before the Fury"), go into the zone and U. Mob should load nearby on this level; I've seen her also W, W, S, S, S from here. (Be sure you have sense life active and beware the many aggro mobs as you look for her.)
      2. to kill 5 of a desert tarantula and 5 of a worker bee and 5 of a worker ant and 5 of a giant mutated mosquito and 5 of a giant jumping spider (3 hours)
        desert tarantula: Found in The Rhaiaden.
        worker bee: Found in The Hives of the Giants.
        worker ant: Found in The Catacombs of Toshi.
        giant mutated mosquito: Found in The Swamp and Forest of Thanos.
        giant jumping spider: Found in The Spiderwode.

        Note: This objective is flagged No-death.

      3. to find a young girl disguised as a deckhand (40 minutes)

      Squishing Ants [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Kaxx
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Fire Giants Keep (CPK), Toshi (NPK)
      Total Time: 3 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the fire giant cook ( )
        In Fire Giants' CPK. From zone entrance (@), go U, 4S, E, 3S, 4E (yes for CPK), 11N (you might have to get key for gate or pick it), 5 W, 2S, W. Note: For the key, look on the mobs in the area before the gate.
      2. to kill 24 of any of a smaller ant, an ant, winged ant, guard ant, queen ant, or worker ant ( )
        These mobs load in Toshi. From entrance (@), go all N, E, E, N, N, all E, D, D and look for each mob. Note: guard ants are tough and not recommended for quota.

      Steak for Scruff [Complete]

      Contributed by: Antdos
      Level: 13
      Difficulty: easye
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Brother Victor (15 minutes)
        In Medievia City. From recall, enter cleric, all E, S. You are given a thick, juicy dragon steak.
      2. to give a thick, juicy dragon steak to Scruff (30 minutes)
        From recall, go 3S.

      Steal Ramarke's Gold [Complete]

      Contributed by: Anonymous
      Additions by: Tomino, Barakkudha, Takphius
      Level: 25, 29
      Difficulty: hard (solo, no-death, no-dragon in step 3)
      Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Fury, Wilderness
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find Captain Amos Trask (45 minutes)
        Located on the Pirate Ship. From @ entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, E, E.
      2. to find a room called The Quarters of Ramarke, Captain of the Fury (no limit)
        On The Fury. Toward the south part of the ship is the bridge. Go S until you can go D, then go D and follow the pathway all W. Pick door S and go 2S. As soon as you enter this room, you are transported to the island in the wilderness where the Coliseum is located.
      3. to find Captain Amos Trask (no limit)
        As above. Unfortunately, this step is solo, no death, no summon, no phase, no dragon. Walk NW through the wilderness to the Lighthouse. Go U and enter portal. You'll emerge at the other Lighthouse near Eldrick's. Walk W to CT 7; enter portal closest to Pirate Ship.
      4. to kill 6 of a dark-skinned swashbuckler and 6 of a snarling buccaneer and 4 of an angry mercenary (no limit)
        On Pirate Ship.
      5. to find Ramarke, Captain of the Fury (10 minutes)
        As above.
      6. to kill Ramarke, Captain of the Fury (10 minutes)
        As above. Note: you'll receive gold bars.
      7. to give gold bars to Captain Amos Trask (1 hour)
        As above.

      Stealing Emerald for Vonliege [Complete]

      Contributed by: Miranar
      Level: 23, 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Med Castle, Crime Underground
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the criminal mastermind (1 hour)
        From Lyryanoth recall, go 3S, 3E, N, E (the last two exits are hidden). The mastermind loads here with two other mobs.
      2. to find a room called An Elegant Guest Chamber (45 minutes)
        See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways. You receive a fiery green emerald.
      3. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (50 minutes)
        In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
      4. to give a fiery green emerald to Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (5 minutes)
        As above.

      Stock Shorn's Library [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: PR
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Underground Tunnels, Med City, Trellor, Celestia, Goland's Tower, Forbidden Forest, Riverton
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find the magius, Shorn Cavar ( )
        In the Underground Tunnels. From Med recall, enter thief. Go 3S, D, N, 2E, S, and follow the path. Shorn wanders somewhere in the "Beautiful Hallway."
      2. to give a leather-bound book entitled, "The Adventures of Huen the Knight" and a scholarly tome and the Book of Dark Rituals and Malevich's Book of Vengeance and the book of elven thoughts and a book titled "Medievian History; One Historian's Version" and Clerical Anarchy : The way of the bastard and Casinos and Gambling: The Gamblers Anonymous Handbook and The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy and the Joy of Grammar to the magius, Shorn Cavar (no limit)
        a leather-bound book entitled, "The Adventures of Huen the Knight": Loads in Med City's thieves' quarter in Richmond Park on Lady Mariarin.
        a scholarly tome: Loads in Med City in the cleric quarter on the clerical scholar.
        the Book of Dark Rituals: Loads on the dark priest in Golands' tower (1 room CPK.)
        Malevich's Book of Vengeance: in Riverton.
        the book of elven thoughts: Loads in Forbidden Forest on Elven King.
        a book titled "Medievian History; One Historian's Version" : Loads in Med City on mobs such as the town crier.
        Clerical Anarchy : The way of the bastard: Loads in Med City on mobs such as the town crier.
        Casinos and Gambling: The Gamblers Anonymous Handbook: Loads in Med City on mobs such as the town crier.
        The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy: Purchase this in Trellor from Cleo's Food Market. From Trellor recall, go 5 N, W.
        the Joy of Grammar: Loads in the Palace of Celestia on Ritayn (it loads invisible so it won't show up on locate.)

      Stock Specialty Meats [Complete]

      Contributed by: Phu, Alyxe
      Additions by: Helitus, Dweia
      Level: 18, 19
      Difficulty: moderate

      Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes

        a pot of imported gryphon stew: In Trellor. From recall, go 5S, 3W, S and buy stew.
        a slab of beef: In Derah. From recall, go 5W, 2N, kill butcher.
        a slice of mutton:in Derah. From recall, go 5W, 2N, kill butcher.
        Note: this is find-original.
      3. to give a cherry-filled pastry and 2 of a pot of imported gryphon stew and a slab of beef and a slice of mutton to Raaz, the Bloody Slaughterer (20minutes)

      Contributed by: Rosethorn

        From Brina, W, 2N, 2W.

      Stop Invasion of Gdangus [Complete]

      Contributed by: Mandroth
      Level: 29

      Locale(s): Med City, Gdangus, Wilderness
      Total Time:2 hours, 5 minutes

        In Med City. From recall, go 7S, 4 W, 2S, E.
      2. to find Kaaduk, the stable owner (45 minutes)
        In Gdangus. From zone entrance ("Entrance to G'Dangus"), go N, W.
      3. to find wilderness room 1627x1275 (10 minutes)
        From above, go E, 2S.
      4. to kill 5 of a soldier of dirt (4 minutes)
        These pop in the room when you walk in (be ready!)
      5. to find Kaaduk, the stable owner (4 minutes)
        As above.
      6. to find wilderness room 1627x1275 (4 minutes)
        As above.
      7. to kill 7 of a soldier of dirt (4 minutes)
        These pop in the room when you walk in (be ready!)
      8. to find Kaaduk, the stable owner (4 minutes)
        As above.

      Stormwatch Stomp [Needs Detail]

      Level: 22
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Crime, Trellor
      Total Time: 3 hours, 10 minutes

      Stout Wanted By The Master Blacksmith [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Moxaux
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Thunderhoume, Brookhaven
      Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the master blacksmith (45 minutes)
        In Thunderhoume. From recall, go 3D, N, 3D, search, D. Then go E, N, 3E, 2D, 5N, 3W, N, 2W, N, 3D open grate, D, 2N, D, 2N, 2E, U, E, 2S, 4E, 2S, open doors W, W, S, 2W, N. Look around for the blacksmith with the key, kill for key. Unlock doors, open doors, E.
      2. to find 5Stout of dark Brookhaven ale (1 hour)
        In Brookhaven. From recall, go N, W, and buy the stout. (Be sure the blue hazymist surrounds the item; there is a similar item for sale that doesn't work here.)
      3. to find the master blacksmith (45 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give 5Stouts of dark Brookhaven ale to the master blacksmith (5 minutes)

      Strength of Gurth [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Thaspian
      Additions by: Jaskier, Khain, Vashka
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Wytherwind, Cloud Giants, Mystical, Med City
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Gurth, the Priest of Wytherwind (30 minutes)
        From entrance, go 3W, N, 2W, all S, U, all N, 2W, N.
      2. to kill Polythenis, the silver miner (1 hour)
        In Cloud Giants. From entrance (@), go N, 2U, E, S, 2W, S, W, 2S, W, D, N, E, D, W, D, E.
      3. to give a lump of raw silver to Gurth, the Priest of Wytherwind (30 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to find a unicorn's horn ( )
        In Mystical Forest. Unicorns (and horns) load in the southern side of Mystical Forest. From southern entrance to zone ("An Ocean Harbor"), go N, W, N, then E along the path.
      5. to give a unicorn's horn to Gurth, the Priest of Wytherwind ( )
        As above.
      6. to find a clump of berries ( )
        Loads on Famar, the town crier, in Med City, just S of recall.
      7. to give a clump of berries to Gurth, the Priest of Wytherwind ( )
        As above.

      Stupid Oysters [Needs Detail]

      Level: 25, 26, 27, 28
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s): Crystal Lake
      Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a quiet fisherman (45 minutes)
        Found in Crystal Lake. From entrance, go 2N, 3E, N, E, N, 2E, N, E, 7N and look around.
      2. to give 2 of a giant pearl to a quiet fisherman (2 hours)
        Pearls load in Pirate Ship, on the lookout, ship's cook, and navigator mobs. This is a find-original flag.

      Sun Hat for Young Lady [Complete]

      Contributed by: Lurline
      Additions by: Pleen
      Level: 19, 21
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Enara, Med City
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a young lady (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From southeasternmost entrance to Med City (@), look around.
      2. to give a wide-brimmed straw hat to a young lady (1 hour)
        In Enara. From @, go 3N, 3E, S and follow the road looking for "a woman traveller" who loads the hat.

      Suncatcher Solutions [Complete]

      Level: 26, 27
      Difficulty: moderate to hard
      Locale(s): Riverton, Crystal Lake, Spirited Heights
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the glassblower (1 hour)
        In Riverton. From @ ("North Entrance to Riverton"), go 5S, 3 W, N.
      2. to give some thick, slimy dogfish drool to the glassblower (1 hour)
        Drool loads on "A panting dogfish" in Crystal Lake. Enter the zone, go N until you are on the barge, and then go E or W and look around for this mob, which loads randomly in the lake.
      3. to give a pair of suction cups from a tentacle to the glassblower (2 hours)
        These load on tentacle mobs in the western (rocky) @ entrance to Spirited Heights. From the grey @, go all N to "A Half Collapsed Cavern," then all E, U, E, D, then all E until you start finding the tentacle mobs. Continue E and around the path; there are perhaps 6 different rooms that load tentacle mobs. Note: only maybe 25% of all the tentacles in this area load cups; peeking is useful to save time, if you can do it.

      Supplies for Katryni [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Elecruse, Elagneros
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Celestia
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Katryni, the loving little healer (30 minutes)
        In Celestia. From zone entrance, go N, all E, all N till U, 2U, 2N.
      2. to give 3 of either a potion of healing, a healing rod, a staff of healing, a corked vial of rainbow-colored liquid to Katryni, the loving little healer (2 hours, 30 minutes)
        a potion of healing:
        a healing rod: in Crime Underground on the hounds. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D. go all E, N, D, 2N, E, S. Kill novice for key. Go N, W, all S, U, all W, unlock N, N to enter "The Gauntlet." Kill the mob in each room, loot the key, and unlock/open the door to the N to get to the next room. The hounds in this area load the rods.
        a staff of healing: on Naeramae.
        a corked vial of rainbow-colored liquid: on general Wellantro in Quinstone.
        Note: this is find-original.

      Supplies for Scruff [Complete]

      Contributed by: Afiniti
      Additions by: Zasildar, Belizar
      Level: 24
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s): Med City, Gnomenel, Hives
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Scruff (30 minutes)
        S, S, S from recall in Med City.
      2. to find a pile of bones and 8 of a conical red hat (2 hours)
        Conical red hats load on many of the gnomes in Gnomenel.
        Bones load at Hives of the Giants. From entrance, go E, N, all U, E, S, all U to the top of the hives, then N through hidden exit to forest, where bears (who load bones) are.
      3. to give a pile of bones and 8 of a conical red hat to Scruff (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Surprise for Mebe [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Ansfrid
      Additions by: Jaztari
      Level: 23, 25
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Gnomenel, Enara
      Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Coendra Girand (40 minutes)
        In Gnomenel on south Ceranel Street (east of zone entrance.) From recall, go 6E, 4S, all W.
      2. to find the sharpest tool in the shed ( )
        Found on the gardener in the gardener's shed in Enara, north of the palace. From zone entrance (@), go: N, N, all W, N, W, all N, E, all N, E, E, then N.
      3. to give the sharpest tool in the shed to Coendra Girand (40 minutes)
        As above.

      Suspicious Packages [Complete]

      Contributed by: Tellahane
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 3 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a fat ogre (45 minutes)
        These load at random in the Wilderness.
      2. to find Varanexus (1 hour)
        In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go N to "Before Goland's Tower." Then go 3W, all N, all E till down exit, D, kill dweller for key ("a narrow bone which might serve as a key"). Then go U, S, 2E, search, D. Then go 2E, 2N, D, 2W, S, 2W, N to Calsinc the caretaker. Kill him for a key. Then go all S, N, to locked door west. Unlock the door and go W; unlock the door and go N.
      3. to give a neon blue potion to a fat ogre (1 hour)
        As above.
      4. to kill 4 of a fat ogre (20 minutes)
        These spawn in the room with you.

      Level: 16
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Crystal Lake
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes

      1. to find a grumpy man (30 minutes)

      2. to kill 5 of a large riggit bug, 5 of an enormous, dirty litterbug, 5 of a mutated lightning bug and 5 of a fat scuttlebug (1 hour)
        Wander in zone.
      3. to find a grumpy man (15 minutes)
        As above.

      Sword for Araman Soldier [Complete]

      Contributed by: Taerron
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Alcordian, Chepstow
      Total Time: 3 hours, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a skeletal soldier (50 minutes)
        In Alcordia. From @, go 2S, E, all S to gates, thenN, 4E.
      2. to find a large two-handed sword (2 hours, 10 minutes)
        In Castle Chepstow. From @, go N, all W, N, 2E and look around for a soldier with a large two-handed sword.
      3. to give a large two-handed sword to a skeletal soldier (50 minutes)
        As above.

      Sword For Araman Soldier [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Akinc
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Alcord, Chepstow Castle
      Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a skeletal soldier (50 minutes)
        In Alcord.
      2. to find a large two-handed sword (1 hour)
        Loads on a soldier of the Grey Company in Chepstow Castle. From entrance, head W from the first 4-way intersection, and wander around. The mobs load along the path outside the castle -- you do not have to enter the castle itself.
      3. to give a large two-handed sword to a skeletal soldier (50 minutes)
        As above.

      Sword for Unholy Priest's God [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: ABronsonM
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Goland
      Total Time: 4 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find an unholy priest (1 hour)
        In Goland's Tower CPK.
      2. to find a black steel bastard sword with the image of a dragon worked into the crosspiece (2 hours)
        In Vark Outpost on the Vark Commander.
      3. to find an unholy priest (1 hour)
        As above.
      4. to give a black steel bastard sword with the image of a dragon worked into the crosspiece to unholy priest (5 minutes)
        As above - then flee.

      Sword Gathering for Ramarke [Complete]

      Additions by: Mandroth
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Fury, Chepstow Castle
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour, 30 minutes)
      2. to give 4 of a large two-handed sword to Ramarke (30 minutes)
        The swords load on "a soldier of the Grey Company" in Chepstow Castle. You cannot fly to Chepstow, but it is only a short distance NE from Circle of Power CT (#1). After entering the zone, head W from the first 4-way intersection, and wander around. The mobs load along the path outside the castle -- you do not have to enter the castle itself.

        In Pirate Ship. On swashbucklers; they wander.

      Syonthilus' Quill [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Larrin
      Level: 17
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): The Citadel Of Mellorian, Wytherwind
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Syonthilus, the King's Scribe (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In the Citadel of Mellorian. Go to the third floor then S, W, N to find the Scribe.Beware the pirate battle. While the mobs aren't aggro, you will not be able to move around freely due to locked doors.
      2. to give a long, feathered writing pen to Syonthilus, the King's Scribe (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Wytherwind. The pen in on Maloc, The Scrollkeeper.

      Tackle Box for the Quiet Fisherman [Complete]

      Contributed by: Antdos
      Level: 13
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Crystal Lake
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a quiet fisherman (30 minutes)
        Found in Crystal Lake. From entrance, go 2N, 3E, N, E, N, 2E, N, E, 7N and look around.
      2. to find a muscular sailor (30 minutes)
        In Medievia City. From recall, go S to the Center of the Fish Market, then 4S and look around.
      3. to give a frosty mug full of "Olaffson's Special" and Fizzy Bubbles and a thimble of Fairy Brew and a saucer of milk to a muscular sailor (30 minutes)
        In Medievia City. A frosty mug full of "Olaffson's Special" from Ye Daemon's Forge. From recall, enter warrior, 4E, 2S, 2W. Others from Familiar Haunts. From recall, enter mage, all W, search, D. You receive a tackle box.
      4. to give a tackle box to a quiet fisherman (15 minutes)
        As above.

      Contributed by: Entrigant

      Level:

      Locale(s): Lattyrna
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Kraken (30 minutes)

      2. to kill Poseidon, Amphritrite and 5 of a nereid (1 hour)
        These load in Lattyrna.

      Takenos' Coin [Complete]

      Level: 23, 24
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora, Wytherwind
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Takenos, a Havensdora gambler (1 hour)
        See Prized Boar Tavern in Frequent Pathways. From there, continue S, E, N.
      2. to find an ancient coin from the keep of Wytherwind (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        Loads on the mob "A Spirit of the Southern Wind" which appears as "A figure flowing with yellow robes hides his face beneath a hood." From zone entrance ("A Roofless Entryway"), go all W, N, all W, then S, S, S and look around.
      3. to give an ancient coin from the keep of Wytherwind to Takenos (30 minutes)

      Talarths and Unger's [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Krevitch
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Rhaiaden, Tharhalas
      Total Time: 3 hours, 25 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a pathfinder (1 hour)
        In Rhaiaden. Enter the @ and look around (hidden.)
      2. to find the Unger Commander (1 hour, 10 minutes)
        In Tharhalas. From entrance, go all W, N, all W, U, all N, E, U, all N, all E, U, S, E, all S, E, all S, all W, U and look around. Note: You are transported to the entrance of Tharhalas.
      3. to kill 10 of a Hashendi Sand Sifter (30 minutes)
        These pop in the room with you. Note: this is no-death.
      4. to find the Secret Chamber of the Helbalas King (30 minutes)

      Talking Lizard Kidnapping [Complete]

      Contributed by: Anonymous
      Additions by: Xercan
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Crime Underground, Celestia
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a tiny, talking lizard (45 minutes)
        In the Palace Celestia. From zone entrance, go N, all E, all N till west exit, then go 2W, N (hidden exit.)
      2. to find a clear jar (1 hour)
        These load in Crime Underground, on a mob near where the first key to the gauntlet loads. See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From there, go all E, all N, D and look in that hallway for a mob who loads it.
      3. to find a tiny, talking lizard (45 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give a clear jar to Randall the Pawnbroker (30 minutes)
        In Trellor, on Merchant Circle.

      Tasty Treat for a Hoardling [Complete]

      Contributed by: Aenjeh, Ymire
      Level: 24, 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Czar, Trellor,
      Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a ravenous hoardling (30 minutes)
        In Ruins of Czarean. Get key from Morthanes. From @, go all S (opening gates along the way) until west, then go W, U, all N. Note: mob is permanently fireshielded. From here go all S, D, E til S locked exit. Unlock door, S, wander aroud hallways here.
      2. to find a mass of flesh (45 minutes)
        Loads in Trellor Graveyard. From the southern @ entrance to Trellor, go N then all W till you can go S; go 2S; all E; 2D, all E until you can go S, then all S. Get book. Then N, all E, all N, all W until you can go S, then all S. Kill Sharlana, who loads the mass of flesh.
      3. to find a ravenous hoardling (30 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give a mass of flesh to a ravenous hoardling (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Teddy Bear for Krista [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Kernighan
      Level: 23, 24, 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Wytherwind, Dragmire, Crime Underground, Forbidden Forest, Med City, Braneri
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Krista (no limit)
        In Wytherwind. From zone entrance, go all S, all W, all S to fountain. From fountain, search, 2D, W, 2N, W, S, 2W, all N, E, all U, all N, 2E, all S, U, 3W (including hidden), all N.
      2. to give a pair of eyes, a set of preacher's robes, a wooden needle, and a fluffy towel to Krista (no limit)
        a pair of eyes: Found in Crime Underground.
        a set of preacher's robes: Found on the preacher at the altar in Academy of Braneri: all N, then all U, then all N from zone entrance.
        a wooden needle: Found underneath Med City. From the northern @ to Med City ("On the River Courrain, on the Banks of Medievia"), go 4S, E, S, 2W, 4S, 2W, 3S, E and follow path until you get to the room "The Secret Prison." Then search, U, open crate, E, and look around. . The mob with the large leather bracer, which has 5Wooden needles in it, loads here.
        a fluffy towel: Can be purchased in Dragmire from Yarla, the orcish tailor.

      Telescope for Lookout [Complete]

      Level: 24
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Braneri
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the lookout (30 minutes)
        In Pirate Ship. From zone entrance, all N, then E, U, E, E, N, N, then all U.
      2. to give a small telescope to the lookout (1 hour)
        In Academy of Braneri in the astronomy building, N, W, N, W from zone entrance. Go west in building, up the stairs, then east until in the room "Beside a Window." Search, then go up. Telescope loads "loose" in the room.

      Tentacle Clean-up for Horneg [Complete]

      Contributed by: Urand
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Horneg's Keep, Spirited Hights
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Horneg (45 minutes)
        From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2 W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here.
      2. to kill 5 of a tentacle (1 hour)
        From the western (rocky) @ entrance to Spirited Heights. go all N to "A Half Collapsed Cavern," then all E, U, E, D, then all E until you start finding the tentacle mobs. Continue E and around the path they load around here find the 5 and kill them.

      Terrible Taste [Incomplete]

      Level: 26, 27, 29
      Difficulty: moderate (CPK)
      Locale(s): Fire Giants' Keep
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the fire giant cook (45 minutes)
        In Fire Giants' CPK. From zone entrance (@), go U, 4S, E, 3S, 4E (yes for CPK), 11N (you might have to get key for gate or pick it), 5 W, 2S, W. Note: For the key, look on the mobs in the area before the gate.
      2. to find 3 of an illicit mushroom and 3 of a shiitake mushroom (2 hours)
        In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go 2N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go:
        Illicit mushrooms: From the guards, go N into the village. Follow Siko Path west to Callitriche Way. Follow that path west; pass the first door south, and open the second door south you encounter ("A Simple Foyer"). Then go S, W, S, ice Agalinis and loot key. Go 2N, E, 2N, all E, N, all E, all N, 2E, all N, all E, unlock gate, all E, search, S, get all bench.

        Shiitake mushrooms: From the guards, all N. Go E, all N, 2E, all N, 2W, N, U. In 2 of the 6 rooms in this section, there are benches which load mushrooms. "Get all bench" to gather shitaki mushrooms.

      Test Alchemist's Newest Creation [Complete]

      Contributed by: Anonymous
      Level: 22, 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Braneri, Quinstone
      Total Time: 3 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a crazy alchemist (30 minutes)
        In Braneri. From zone entrance, go 2N, E, N, open door E, 3E, U, W, and look around.
      2. to find a corked vial of yellow liquid, a corked vial of green liquid, a corked vial of blue liquid, a corked vial of red liquid, a corked vial of black liquid, and a corked vial of rainbow-colored liquid (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Quinstone (see walkthrough (link not available).) Note: this is find original.
      3. to give a corked vial of yellow liquid, a corked vial of green liquid, a corked vial of blue liquid, a corked vial of red liquid, a corked vial of black liquid, and a corked vial of rainbow-colored liquid to a crazy alchemist (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Testing New Spells [Complete]

      Level: 19, 23
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Castle Med
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the ghostly image of a sorcerer (30 minutes)
        In Castle Med. From the top of the dragon staircase, go: all W, all U, all S. You are then teleported to Toshi entrance.
      2. to find a room called The Catacomb of Toshi (30 minutes)
        From Toshi entrance, go all N, E, E, N, N, all E, all D, N, N, 6 E, D, all E, U. U. You are teleported to Warrens entrance.
      3. to find a room called Lair of the Creator (30 minutes)
        From Warrens entrance, go all N, D, 4E, all S, all W, N, all D, N, 3W, 2S, D, E, 2S, 2W, D, 2N, D, 2E, 3S. You are teleported to Med City recall.
      4. to find a room called The Medievia War Room (30 minutes)
        See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways. You are teleported to the desert near Ulhazzen.
      5. to find the ghostly image of a sorcerer (1 hour)
        As above, but you must get back to Med City without portals, dragons, or magic. It's straight south through the wilderness.

      The Acolyte's Quest [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Snorri
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the acolyte ( )
        In the Labyrinth. From the entrance, go all E, S, W, S, S, E, S, all E, all S, all W, S, S, all E, S.
      2. to kill the minotaur ( )
        Also in Labyrinth. From zone entrance, go all E, all S, and look around.
      3. to find the acolyte ( )
        As above.
      4. to kill the goblin king ( )
        From the altar, go N, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all W, all N, E, all S, U.

      The Anonymous Wizard [Complete]

      Contributed by: Calisto
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Aeketh
      Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the wizard (1 hour)
        In Aeketh. From zone entrance (@), go W, all N, all W, 2N, 3W, 3N, all E, all S, all E.
      2. to kill the Aekethi chief (1 hour)
        From the wizard's room, go all W, all N, all W, N, 4W, 3S, 3 W, 3N, 3W, N, pick hatch, open hatch, D, dispel and kill chief.
      3. to find the wizard (15 minutes)
        As above.

      The Apprentice Necromancer [Incomplete]

      Level: 28, 29, 30
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Enchanted Oak Graveyard, Den of the Necromancer
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Solarious, apprentice to the Necromancer (1 hour)
        In Enchanted Oak Graveyard. Note: you receive the Advocatus Diaboli.
      2. to find a necromancer (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In the Den of the Necromancer.

      The Arch-Cleric [Needs Detail]

      Level: 27, 29
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Med City, Enchanted Oak Graveyard
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
        See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find object Ad Vitam Aeternam (2 hours, 30 minutes)
        Loads in the Trellor Enchanted Oak Graveyard in a room called "The Realm of the Undertaker."
      3. to kill Gasherbrum (1 hour)
        At the bottom level of Warrens. From entrance, go D, all N, D, all E, 7S, all W, N, D, D, D, N, W, W, W, S, S, D, E, S, S, W, W, D, N, N, D. This level is a small rectangle of about a dozen rooms, and Gasherbrum loads here (or occasionally on the way here.)

      The Assassin's Challenge [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Renli
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Pirate Ship, Catacombs
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find a hired assassin guard ()
        On Pirate Ship.
      2. to find an egg recovered from deep within the catacombs (2 hours)
        In Catacombs.
      3. to find a hired assassin guard () (40 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to find a large ruby and a glimmering diamond (1 hour, 35 minutes)
        Load on avatar of a dark goddess In Ulhazzen. From western @, go E and D into the mines. Head north and west, and look for a D exit. Go D, then follow the path N, going U and D as needed to "An Altar to a Dark Goddess." Kill her and take the key. Unlock door, go W and get all.
      5. to find a hired assassin guard () (40 minutes)
        As above.
      6. to kill the high priestess of Trell (2 hours)
        In Trellor. From recall, go U, 2N, U, 2N, U. (When you kill her, a priestess will call for guards, so be ready for 4 to 7 trellor cityguards and a priestess of Trell right after you kill the high priestess.)
      7. to find a hired assassin guard () (40 minutes)
        As above.

      The Bandits [Incomplete]

      Additions by: Sulin
      Level: 17
      Difficulty: medium
      Locale(s): Med City, Castle Medievia
      Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Medievia Guardsman (20 minutes)
        In Med City. They wander, so look around.
      2. to find Kerst (40 minutes)
        In Med Castle, in the same room as the Duke of Trellor. See Frequent Pathways.
      3. to kill 5 of a stout-looking bandit and 5 of a scout (1 hour)
        From Kerst, go N, all W, all N, d, all E, all N, 2W, D, all E, 2S, W, all S, open boulder, all D, look around.
      4. to find Kerst (20 minutes)
        As above.

      The Bathing Soldier [Complete]

      Contributed by: Xeanne
      Additions by: Yandyr, Cipactli
      Level: 19, 20
      Difficulty: fairly easy
      Locale(s):Mellorian, Braneri
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find a bathing soldier (55 minutes)
        In Mellorian. From zone entrance, go all N till you reach the 4-way intersection, "The Heart of the Citadel, at an Altar." Then go 2E, open slide, N.
      2. to give a large bar of soap to a bathing soldier (2 hours)
        This loads in Braneri in a crate in a room called "Crates of Dry Goods." From zone entrance, go all N to "A Small Well," then N, 2W, D, N, W, S.

        In Dragmire. From @ W, U, N, D, 4W, 4N, 3E, 2N, E, 3N, U

      The Belt of Power of High Lord Githalios [Complete]

      Contributed by: Raar
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Githyanki
      Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Dursto, the Bold (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, 4S, 2E, N, E, 2N.
      2. to find Lord Githalios' belt of Power (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Githyanki. From @, go all N, search, all D,all N, E to The Sergeant's Bedroom,search, N, U, S, all W, pick/ethereal N, all N, U.

      The Besieged Reverend [Complete]

      Contributed by: Neysshe
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Sceptrum/braneri
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Reverend Welsh (1 hour)
        In Sceptrum. From @, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N (through hidden wall), all N.
      2. to kill the angel (2 hours)
        In Braneri. (Note: you need a good aligned person for help.)From entrance, go 5N, 2W, search, go D (kill fish for bronze key). Then go U, 5E, unlockdoor N, N, kill Dean for silver key. Then go S, E, unlock door N, N, kill Provost for gold key.Then go S, unlock door S, S, kill secretary for wooden key. Then unlock door W, W, kill Chancellorfor huge iron key. Then go E, N, 3W, all N, U, N, give 1 gold usher, N, E, unlock door N, all U(you must have a good aligned person here if you are not), kill angel.
      3. to find Reverend Welsh (1 hour)
        As above.

      Locale(s): The Condemned Arena,
      Total Time:

      1. to find a blood witch ()
        In Condemned Arena. From zone entrance, go all E, N, 2E, 3S, E, S, E, S, all E, N, 2E (hidden exit), S, E.
      2. to kill Llaen, the Essence of Spring and Ediram, Watcher of the Year of the Mouse and Haaveth, Watcher of the Year of the Ox and Schyves, Watcher of the Year of the Tiger and Chyst, the Essence of Summer and Nyllyra, Watcher of the Year of the Rabbit and Augatis, Watcher of the Year of the Dragon and Aleni, Watcher of the Year of the Snake and Tryss, the Essence of Autumn and Craewyr, Watcher of the Year of the Horse and Saclya, Watcher of the Year of the Sheep and Ocein, Watcher of the Year of the Monkey and Lyel, the Essence of Winter and Nykim, Watcher of the Year of the Rooster and Therkin, Watcher of the Year of the Dog and Draeum, Watcher of the Year of the Pig and Et'ceri, Daughter of the Night and Ar'ete, Daughter of the Night and Gweoc, Son of the Day and Andrsol, Son of the Day (2 hours)
        In Arcadia. From zone entrance, go all S, all E, all S, enter whirlpool.

      The Boatsmaster's Brother [Complete]

      Contributed by: JW
      Additions by: Phu, Antdos

      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Trellor, Med City
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:

        From the portal to Trellor, go N, 3W.
      2. to find a gate watchman (20 minutes)
        Go S, 6 W.
      3. to find a mercenary (20 minutes)
        In Med City, wandering randomly (check warrior quarter.)
      4. to find the Stormwatch Mercenary (15 minutes)
        In Trellor, located randomly.
      5. to find the Stormwatch Commander (15 minutes)
        In Trellor, 6N of recall.

      The Book Collector [Complete]

      Additions by: Khain
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Norya, the Scarlet Knight (30 minutes)
        In Yldari. From @, go all N, W, all N, W, all U, S, 3W, N, E, N.
      2. to give a leather-bound book entitled "The Dwarven Art of Battle" and the Strategies of War to Norya, the Scarlet Knight (no limit)
        3. strategies: In Mellorian. From @, go 9N, W, N, U, all ?, 2E, 2S, E, get strategies shelf.
        art: in Tharhalas. From @, go all W, N, all W, U, all N, E, U, all N, E, all S, D, W. Kill librarian for book.

      The Bored Spirit [Complete]

      Level: 13
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Graveyard
      Total Time: 1 hour
      Objectives:
      1. to find the spirit of the wizard Gaelor (25 minutes)
        The mob appears as "A restless spirit haunts his grave, moaning softly." Mob loads in room in NE area of Graveyard. From entrance ("The Entrance to the Graveyard"), go N, N, N, N, N, N, N, N, E, E, E.
      2. to give a scribbled note on old parchment to the spirit of the wizard Gaelor (35 minutes)
        The scribbled note loads on the barefoot beggar mob. From Gaelor, go W, W, W, N, N, N, N, W, W, W, W, W. Kill the beggar and loot his corpse for the note. Return the note to Gaelor.

      The Boy's New Bird Hobby [Complete]

      Contributed by: Norgath
      Additions by: Pleen, Kernighan
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderately easy
      Locale(s): Alendora, El Cantara
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Malindora boy (45 minutes)
        In Alendora. From northern @, go 2S, 2E, 3S, 3W, N, 2W, 6S, E.
      2. to give a golden eagle's feather and a goldfinch feather and a dove feather and a goosedown feather to a Malindora boy (1 hour)
        In El Cantara. All but the goosedown feather can be stolen from their respective mobs:

        dove and finch: In "An Elevated Garden." From zone entrance, go U, 2N, E, all N until the various U exits, then go U.
        golden eagle's father: From @ go U, 2N, E, all N, U, 5E, 2N.
        goosedown feather: From @, go U, 2N, E, all N, U, all E and "get feather pillow."

      The Broken Wand [Complete]

      Contributed by: Innocentius
      Level: 17, 20
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 55 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a prim maidservant (30 minutes)
        From recall in Med City, enter mage. Go N, N, N, N, then all W.
      2. to give a gold and platinum banded wand to a prim maidservant (25 minutes)
        This may be purchased in the Shop of the Ritualist. From the above, go 7 E, 2S.

      The Butcher's Cleaver [Complete]

      Contributed by: Ceresir
      Additions by: Shanoyu
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Trellor, Derah (good)
      Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes

        In Trellor. From recall, go 5E, 3S, 1 E.
      2. to find a meat cleaver (1 hour)
        Loads on the butcher in Derah. From Derah recall, go 5W, 2N and kill the butcher.
      3. to give a meat cleaver to Morg the Butcher (20 minutes)
        As above.

      The Caretaker's Dinner [Complete]

      Level: 13-14
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Graveyard, Great Tree
      Total Time: 1 hour
      Objectives:
      1. to find the caretaker (30 minutes)
        In the Graveyard. From entering the zone, go N, N, all W, then all S.
      2. to give 2 of a mushroom to the caretaker (30 minutes)
        Mushrooms load on the first level of the Great Tree. The first level is a square of 5 x 5 rooms and mushrooms can be found on the ground.

      The Celebration [Complete]

      Contributed by: Raenyn
      Level: 19
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med Castle, City of Medievia
      Total Time: 1 hour, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Falgizio (30 minutes)
        In Med Castle. From recall, go 3U, 9N, 2E, 2S, 3D, 2N, W,all S (hidden), all E.
      2. to find Olaffson, the head bartender (15 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, 4E, 2S,2W.
      3. to find Falgizio (20 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give 5 of a frosty mug full of "Olaffson's Special" to Falgizio (5 minutes)
        Buy in Med City. From recall, enter warrior, go 4E, 2S, 2W and buy them.

      The Champion Guardsman [Complete]

      Contributed by: Kaycee and Maximillus
      Level: 21, 22
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s): City of Medievia, Abandoned Lighthouse
      Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
        See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (30 minutes)
        This is in the top of the Abandoned Lighthouse. Fly lighthouse, then S, S, 3 U.
      3. to find a room call Outside a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        Go 3 D, N.
      4. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        As above.
      5. to kill an elite durgeon (5 minutes)
        This loads when you enter the room.
      6. to find a room call Outside a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        As above.
      7. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        As above.
      8. to kill a Stormwatch Commander (5 minutes)
        This loads when you enter the room.
      9. to find a room call Outside a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        As above.
      10. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        As above.
      11. to kill a Karlisnan guardsman (10 minutes)
        This loads when you enter the room.
      12. to find a room call Outside a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        As above.
      13. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        As above.
      14. to kill a member of the Riverton Militia (10 minutes)
        This loads when you enter the room.
      15. to find a room call Outside a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        As above.
      16. to find a room called Top of a Lighthouse (5 minutes)
        As above.
      17. to kill a bonded one (10 minutes)
        This loads when you enter the room.

      The Clothes Make the Thief [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Raganon
      Additions by: Malandria, Zordon
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Riverton, Toshi, Crime, New Ashton
      Total Time: 5 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find an apprentice thief (45 minutes)
        In Riverton Mines. From western @, go E, pick/open mine, go all SS, all E till D, D all N, all W and look around.
      2. to find a red helmet of Thievery and the bracers of thievery (2 hours)
        helmet: in the Catacombs of Toshi on Shen Lung. From entrance, go all N, all W until N, all N, all D, all N, all E until D, D, all N, U.
        bracers: in Crime Underground, on Vonliege and on Shaelin, the master thief.
      3. to give the suicide knife to an apprentice thief (2 hours, 15 minutes)
        In New Ashton. Search for a boy with a pump handle. Kill for the handle (key). From New Ashton recall, then go S, D, 4E, 4S, W, S, E, search, S, search, 2D, all N, 2E, and loko around for the claustrophobic maniac, who loads it.

      Difficulty: easy

      2. to give a piece of warm apple pie to a gamin (30 minutes)

      The Crying Pixie [Complete]

      Level: 11
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Great Tree
      Total Time: 1 hour
      Objectives:
      1. to find a pixie maiden (40 minutes)
        On the first level of the Great Tree, at the South Entrance. Approach the zone's @ from the south, and enter the zone by going N. The pixie(s) will load in this, or in nearby, rooms.
      2. to find a room called Outside a Tiny Hut (15 minutes)
        Also in Great Tree. From @, go 2N, 2U, S, W.
      3. to kill 2 of a giant cockroach (5 minutes)
        These pop in the above room.
