      The Disguise [Incomplete]

      Level: 28, 30
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Lyryanoth
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find a brother of the Purification Society (no limit)
        From entrance to Lyryanoth, go N to "The Crossroads of Daenar and Unity," then all E into the lizardfolk dwelling.
      2. to find the criminal mastermind (no limit)
        Go 3W, N, E.
      3. to find Camenar, the cloth worker (no limit)
        Search, go S, 5W, N.
      4. to give a large heap of lizard scales to Camenar, the cloth worker (no limit)
        Loads on the greater lizard guardian in CPK part of zone. This is find-original.

      The Draconian Invasion [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Level: 25, 28
      Difficulty: moderate to hard (time limit, mob difficulty)
      Locale(s): Med City, Forbidden Forest, Spire of Kirys Ayr
      Total Time: 3 hours, 55 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (25 minutes)
        See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find a room called An Old Wagon Trail (20 minutes)
        In the Forbidden Forest. From Med City recall, enter mage, then go 4W, 2S, 2W, 4N.
      3. to kill 2 of a draconian scout (15 minutes)
        These will pop in this room. They're moderately easy mobs of the thief type, approximately level 20.
      4. to kill 2 of a draconian captain, 6 of a draconian soldier, 3 of a draconian guard, and 2 of a draconian scout (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        These load in Kirys Ayr. To get in the general vicinity, from the zone entrance to Kirys (@), go E, D, S, E, D, W, 3S, E, S, E, 3S, E, D, E, D and look around.
      5. to find a room called The Lair of Rekhalset (20 minutes)
        In this area, in the middle of several fireshielded rooms. The key to the room may have loaded on one of the many mobs you just killed.
      6. to kill Rekhalset (20 minutes)
        In the above room. Hard to kill: he's fireshielded, at least level 25.
      7. to find Talis, the watchman (20 minutes)
        From this room, go N, E, N, 3E, N, E, U, W, U, W, 3N, W, N, 3 N, E, U, W, N, 5 U and look around. If he's not here, look on the other stairways nearby.
      8. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (25 minutes)
        As above.

      The Drunken Brawler Proves That He Is A Real Man [Complete]

      Contributed by: Sagitron
      Additions by: Kernighan
      Level: 22, 24
      Difficulty: easy (with sneak) to moderate (without sneak)
      Locale(s): Trellor, Sevoseth
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a drunken brawler (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 5E, 3N, E, and look around.
      2. to find milk in a dirty glass (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Sevoseth. From recall, go 2E, 4N, W, all N (opening doors.) Buy milk.
      3. to give milk in a dirty glass to a drunken brawler (30 minutes)
        As above.

      The Duke's Secret [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Rarazona
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Graveyard, Trellor, Brookhaven, Cloud Giants, Goland's
      Total Time: 3 hours, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find Sendaria, Mistress of Magic (20 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 5E, 5 N, E.
      3. to give a burkenut acorn and some sparkling dust and an aloe leaf and a vial of pure dragon blood to Sendaria the Mistress of Magic (3 hours)
        a burkenut acorn: In Brookhaven NPK. From zone entrance (@), go all N to the gate. Get the key (invisible) from the second guard. The acorn is found in any of several path/trail rooms.
        some sparkling dust: Found in steamer trunk in Med Graveyard. From gate, go 2N, 6W, 5N, W, U.
        an aloe leaf: Found on bath boys in Cloud Giants. From "Floating Atop an Island of Clouds," go 3E, S, open door, U, E S, W, S.
        a vial of pure dragon blood: found on Lady Goland.

      The Elf Queen's Wardrobe [Needs Detail]

      Level: 20
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Ruellia
      Total Time: 6 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the elven queen (1 hour)
        In Forbidden Forest.
      2. to find a village trader (2 hours)
        In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N, 3W, S, 3W, 2N to the market area. The Trader loads here. Note: you receive a shirt.
      3. to give a cotton shirt embroidered with a dragon symbol to the elven queen (1 hour)
        As above. Note: you are pushed out of the room.
      4. to find a room called An Elven Royal Bedroom (5 minutes)
        Unlock the door and re-enter the room.
      5. to give a fine woven shirt to the elven queen (2 hours)
        The shirt loads in Dragmire, on a wandering orcish citizen. Note: you are pushed out of the room.
      6. to find a room called An Elven Royal Bedroom (5 minutes)
        As above.

      The Empress' New Shoes [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Zasildar, Bingyi
      Additions by: Vlar
      Level: 23, 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Ryvaera, Gnomenel, E'nat'dae
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Delaia, the naiad empress (30 minutes)
        In Ryvaera. From southern entrance to zone, go N, 2W, 2N, 6W, 3D, 3N.
      2. to give 3 of either a pair of diamond-studded silk slippers, a pair of pink and gold slippers, or knee-high white leather boots to Delaia, the naiad empress (3 hours, 30 minutes)
        Knee high white leather boots: load in Gnomenel on Rhuven Danvan.
        a pair of pink and gold slippers: load (invisible) in E'nat'dae on "a lady in waiting."
        a pair of diamond-studded silk slippers: In Celestia on Amacia. From entrance to zone, go N, 2E, all N to U exit, all U, all N. (Impossible to kill her without help!)

      The Evil Help Jorrard [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Neru
      Level: 13
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find a monk of Mercy Abbey (1 hour)
        In Med City, enter cleric, go E and look around.
      2. to give a bowl of hot stew to Jorrard ()
        From cleric, go 11W, N and buy stew. Then from recall, enter warrior, go 4E, S, W and give stew to Jorrard.

      The Exiled Minotaur [Complete]

      Contributed by: Baraz
      Level: 27, 28, 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Labyrinth, NaeraMae
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Minotaur (30 minutes)
        In the Labyrinth, near the entrance.
      2. to kill Kraden and NaeraMae (1 hour)
        Kraden: From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the west.
        NaeraMae: Go to throne room area. From the northwestern corner of throne room, search, go east, pick lock for east or kill those mobs (tough). Then go all E, then all S. The hidden mob there is NaeraMae. (If you can charm, charm the guard guarding in the hallway before Kraden.)
      3. to find the Minotaur (15 minutes)
        As above.

      The Exterminator [Complete]

      Level: 20
      Difficulty: moderate to hard (NPK)
      Locale(s): Graveyard, Toshi
      Total Time: 1 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Henry, the cathedral gardener (30 minutes)
        In Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3W (open door if needed). The gardener can be found either inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room or in the garden (usually), which are the 4 rooms to the south and west of The Priest's Kitchen.
      2. to kill 5 of an ant, 5 of a winged ant, 5 of a worker ant, and 5 of a smaller ant (1 hour)
        These mobs load in Toshi. From entrance (@), go all N, E, E, N, N, all E, D, D and look for each mob.

      The Failed Applicants [Complete]

      Level: 18
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Vanlarra
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a failed tower applicant (30 minutes)
        In Vanlarra. From the zone's western @, go E into the City. These mobs load just inside.
      2. to kill 3 of a Vanlarra apprentice (40 minutes)
        Continue E along Truth Street into the Tower of Discipline. Look around in these rooms on the ground and upper levels for the apprentice mobs.
      3. to find a failed tower applicant (20 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to kill a failed tower applicant (15 minutes)

      The Feather Collection [Complete]

      Contributed by: Sulin
      Level: 16
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): El Cantara
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a nomad girl (30 minutes)
        In El Cantara. From zone entrance, go U, N, W, U, 4N, W, look around (there are some hidden exits.)
      2. to find a nomad woman (15 minutes)
        Look around.
      3. to find a nomad girl (15 minutes)
        As above. Note: You receive a feather collection box.
      4. to give a golden eagle's feather, a goldfinch feather, a dove feather, a goosedown feather and a feather-collection box to a nomad girl (45 minutes)
        A golden eagle's feather: From @ go U, 2N, E, all N, U, 5E, 2N.
        A goldfinch feather: In "An Elevated Garden." From zone entrance, go U, 2N, E, all N until the various U exits, then go U.
        A dove feather: Same place as goldfinch.
        A goosedown feather: From @, go U, 2N, E, all N, U, all E and "get feather pillow."
        A feather-collection box: Already received.

      The Fire Demon's Flames [Complete]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): New Ashton, Ruellia
      Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Draug (45 minutes)
        In New Ashton, just inside the zone; many load.
      2. to give metallic armor etched with frost to a Draug (1 hour, 20 minutes)
        This loads on the ice trolls in Ruellia. From the zone entrance, go all N, W, N, N, D, E, N to "Next to the Waterfall." Go U, 6N, then all east to "Beside the Valley Walls." Search then go east. Go U, N, N, W, U to "A Faint Trail." Go N, W, W, N, N, E, N, U to "Traversing the Glacier." Trolls load here. Note: Player gets a blue orb in addition to the gold for completing the AQ.

      The Gambling Crier [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Firyon, Smaist
      Level: 13
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 1 hour
      Objectives:
      1. to find Famar, the town crier (30 minutes)
        In Med City, S of recall.
      2. to give a worn deck of cards to Famar, the town crier (30 minutes)
        In the Gypsy Camp, in The House of High Stakes, on mobs there.

      The Gargoyle Commander's Desire [Complete]

      Contributed by: Dima
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Horneg,Berkovic
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Gargoyle Commander (1 hour)
        In Horneg's Keep. From northern @ go 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Pick gate (if locked) or kill guardian golem for key (may wander E). Go 2S, open door, S and look around.
      2. to a war shield shaped into a gargoyle's face (2 hours)
        In Berkovic on war duke. From entrance, D, all N, E, N, E, N, E,all E, all S, all E, all N, all W, all N, U, all N, E, search, E, D and look around
      3. to give a war shield shaped into a gargoyle's face to the Gargoyle Commander (1 hour)
        As above.

      The General's Request[Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Kovad and Fozzebar
      Level: 23
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s): Dragmire, Thunderhoume
      Total Time: 2 hours, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find General Baazt (1 hour)
        In the Grandstand of the Arena at Dragmire. From just inside the start of the zone ("At the Checkpoint"), go W, W, W, W, W, N, N, W, W, W, W, W, U, E, N, N, D, W.
      2. to find an orcish marauder (1 hour)
        In Thunderhoume. From @, go N, all D, N, 2D, 2W.
      3. to find a room called A Dark Stone Passage (5 minutes)
        Tick and get ready to fight. Go 2E.
      4. to kill 2 of a Dwarven guard (10 minutes)
        When you enter "A Dark Stone Passage," kill the two Dwarven guards that pop.
      5. to find a room called A Bend in the Passage (5 minutes)
        Tick and prepare to fight again. Go 2U, S.
      6. to kill 2 of a Dwarven guard (10 minutes)
        When you enter "A Bend in the Passage," kill the two Dwarven guards that pop.
      7. to find a room called The End of the Ledge (5 minutes)
        Tick and prepare to fight again. Go all U, all S, all E.
      8. to kill 1 of a Dwarven cleric and 2 of a Dwarven guard (10 minutes)
        When you enter "The End of the Ledge," kill the Dwarven cleric and two Dwarven guards that pop.

      The Giant Wasp Queen [Complete]

      b>Contributed by: Taraya
      Level: 17
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Dragmire Stronghold
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find an orcish farmer (1 hour)
        In Dragmire Stronghold. From entrance go W, U, N, D, 4W, N and look around.
      2. to kill 5 of a giant wasp and 1 of the giant wasp queen (50 minutes)
        From an orcish farmer go all N, S, all E, N, E, E (4 giants wasps load around here), E, N (last giant wasp and queen load here).
      3. to find an orcish farmer (10 minutes)
        From the giant wasp queen go S, all W, S, 3W, S and look around.

      The Glassblower's Stolen Bottles [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Jaerse
      Additions by: Eleazar
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Lyryanoth
      Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Glassworks proprietor (50 minutes)
        In Lyr. From recall, 2E, S.
      2. to find 3 of a bottle of Eorthes Blysse Ruibir (1 hour, 20 minutes)
        In Verthandi. Go to the NW part of zone and then look for a hidden exit east into the vineyard. The vineyard is located behind a hidden exit to the east, directly across from the orchard. Maenads load the bottles. The bottles are stealable.
      3. to give 3 of a bottle of Eorthes Blysse Ruibir to the Glassworks proprietor (30 minutes)
        As above.

      The Great Race [Complete]

      Contributed by: Phu, Ceresir, Camm, Triston, Gwilym
      Level: 25, 27, 30
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Med, Derah, G'dangus
      Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a room called the Eastern Gate of Medievia (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go all E.
      2. to [hidden] [go to Derah trading post] (30 minutes)
        Enter CT 3 and go west, or fly to Derah trading post.
      3. to [hidden] [go to G'dangus trading post] (1 hour)
        Run E until you can survey Med City south of you, then run S to Riverton, then E to G'dangus. Resurrect in the city: from @, go 3N, 3W, 3S. Then enter the trading post. Note: this is no-dragon and no-portal.

      The Great Race II [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Bashuu
      Additions by: Wabyton
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Medievia, Lyryanoth, Trellor
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a room called [the Eastern Gate of Medievia] (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go all E.
      2. to find a room called [Lyryanoth trade post] (30 minutes)
        Fly to Lyryanoth and enter trade post.
      3. to find a room called [Trellor trade post] (30 minutes)
        Note: this is no-dragon, no-portal, and no death.

      The Great Race III [Complete]

      Contributed by: Decrata
      Level: 24-28
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Medievia, Sea's End Trade Post, Temple of Thanos Trade Post
      Total Time: 2 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Eastern Gate of Medievia (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go all E.
      2. to find a room called Sea's End trade post (30 minutes)
        Call a dragon and fly there.
      3. to find a room called Temple of Thanos trade post (1 hour, 15 minutes)
        Note: this is no-dragon, no-death, and no-portal.

      The Great Scavenger Hunt [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Gammals
      Level: 10
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med. City
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Olaffson the bartender (30 minutes)
        From Med City recall, enter warrior, 4E, 2S, 2W.
      2. to find a room named At Ye Daemon's Forge (5 minutes)
        Go S, N.
      3. to find a young serving girl ()
        Look around.
      4. to find a glass of water, a flute worked in silver and trimmed in gold, some kindling, a staff of mass levitation, a pair of lacy black gloves, a steel dagger with a serpent-shaped blade, an elephant mold, a wreath of jasmine, a shield of the rose, a richly baked scone, a woodworking chisel, and a king crab ()
        glass of water: from recall, enter mage, 5W, search, D, buy water.
        flute worked in silver and trimmed in gold: from glass of water, U, E, S, E, buy flute. From Med City recall, enter warrior, 4E, 2S, 2W.
        some kindling: from flute, W, 3S, 3E, S, buy kindling.
        a staff of mass levitation: from kindling, N, E, 8N, 2E, 2S, buy staff.
        a pair of lacy black gloves: from recall, enter warrior, 3W, N, buy gloves.
        a steel dagger with a serpent-shaped blade: from recall, enter thief, 2N, W, buy dagger.
        an elephant mold: from dagger, E, N, W, buy mold.
        a wreath of jasmine: from recall, enter cleric, 3S, W, buy wreath.
        a shield of the rose: from wreath, E, 3N, 4E, 2N, W, buy shield.
        a richly baked scone: from wreath, E, 2N, 2W, N, buy scone.
        a woodworking chisel: from recall, 15S, 2W, N, buy chisel.
        a king crab: from chisel, S, 2E, 4N, buy crab.
      5. to give a glass of water, a flute worked in silver and trimmed in gold, some kindling, a staff of mass levitation, a pair of lacy black gloves, a steel dagger with a serpent-shaped blade, an elephant mold, a wreath of jasmine, a shield of the rose, a richly baked scone, a woodworking chisel, and a king crab to Olaffson the bartender ()
        As above.

      The Green-Robes [Incomplete]

      Additions by: Innocentius, Alexial
      Level: 28, 29
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): NaeraMae
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Herind (1 hour, 10 minutes)
        In NaeraMae. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the east (pick or kill the guard for the key.)
      2. to kill Aeldar and Daynwyr (1 hour, 20 minutes)
        In Akenuas Glade.

      The Guildmaster's Test (Thief) [Complete]

      Additions by: Antdos
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Pirate Ship
      Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find The Guildmaster (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter guild.
      2. to find a room called A Storeroom (20 minutes)
        In Pirate Ship. From zone entrance (@), go E, all N, E, U, E, E, 5 N, D, S, S, pick door W, open door W, 3S, E. When you enter the room, you will automatically be given a long coil of rope.
      3. to kill the sleepy pirate (5 minutes)
        This will pop in this room.
      4. to give a long coil of rope to The Guildmaster (20 minutes)
        As above.

      The Guildmaster's Test (Warrior) [Complete]

      Contributed by: Neverra
      Level: 17
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Medievia, Goblin Castle
      Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Tarantull, the Warrior Guildmaster. (20 minutes)
        Before entering guild from Med recall, make sure you spell up if needed because the next objective is no-magic.
      2. to kill 5 of a mountain goblin (2 hours)
        In the Goblin Castle. From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then go all W, all N, U, all E, U, and look around.
      3. to find Tarantull, the Warrior Guildmaster. (25 minutes)
        As above.

      The Hammer of Immortality [Complete]

      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderately hard
      Locale(s): Med City, Aeketh
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Chayton, the weaponsmith (30 minutes)
        In Clerics Quarter in Med City. From Med Recall, enter cleric, then E, E, E, E, N, E.
      2. to give the warhammer of immortality to Chayton, the weaponsmith (3 hours)
        Found in Village of Aeketh on the Chief's servant. In Aeketh, go all W, E, then N through wilderness. Then go all W, 2N, 3W, all N, all W, N, E, search, pick hatch, open hatch, D. Note: this is find-original.

      The Helpless Hunter [Complete]

      Level: 22, 23
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Forest of the Alendora, Preserve, Karlisna
      Total Time: 3 hours, 25 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Havensdora hunter (30 minutes)
        Entering the zone from the north side, go S, S, E, E, S. The mob, which appears as "A pale-skinned elf walks silently through the Alendora," should load within a few rooms to the W, E, or S.
      2. to kill a hunter (55 minutes)
        In the Preserve. See hunter in Frequent Pathways.
      3. to give a blackwood longbow and a steel-tipped arrow to a Havensdora hunter (55 minutes)
        These load on the Preserve hunter in "The Hunter's Shelter." These two items should be on the corpse or sometimes "loose" in the rooms nearby (search, go down, then east.) If not, wait for the zone to repop (I had to kill the hunter 3 times before I could get both items.) Return them to Alendora.
      4. to give a shadow cloak to a Havensdora hunter (1 hour)
        In Karlisna, some of the "mage of the king" mobs (located randomly in the streets) load the shadow cloak.

      The Humming Sword [Complete]

      Contributed by: Lufffro
      Level: 19
      Difficulty: moderate (NPK)
      Locale(s): Medievia City, The Xezadha Cathedral
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Orlin the Shopkeeper (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter thief, then go 2N, W.
      2. to give a giau tzu jen to Orlin the Shopkeeper (3 hours)
        To get this item, fly Xezadha, go N until E, then follow the path E until you go D to the basement, level 1. Find the silver key on on a Xezadha Priest; kill to get key. Follow W until N; then go N, E, N, 2D. Kill wizard with the key. This key unlocks door in that area. Unlock the door, pass through, then relock. Find Xezadha Priestess with key, kill her and loot. She should be near door you unlocked. Follow the path west until Sacrificial Pit, then go D. You will enter a block of "Icy" rooms. Kill all mobs before going after Xezadha. When fighting Xezadha, blind if you can. Ice Xezadha. If she doesn’t load a giau tzu jen, repeat. Clerics can do this in about 4 passes with 500+hp.

      The Hungry Badger [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Aiden
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Spirited Heights
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Kehohtan cleric ( )
        From the northern entrance to Spirited Heights, go all S until you find one.
      2. to find a giant badger ( )
        In Spirited Heights.

      The Hungry King [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Morluis
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Forbidden Forest, Pirate Ship, Ruellia
      Total Time: 5 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find an elven keep cook (40 minutes)
        In Forbidden Forest. From zone entrance, go 2E, S, E, S, 5E, N, E, N, all D, W, S, pick/open door, 4S, W.
      2. to find the ship's cook (50 minutes)
        In Pirate Ship. From entrance, go E, all N, E, U, E, 3N, D (pick/open hatch if needed), all S.
      3. to find a shiitake mushroom (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Ruellia in the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go N, N, E. Kill the two guards here, then go all N. Go E, all N, E, E, all N, W, W, N, U. In 2 of the 6 rooms in this section, there are benches which load mushrooms. "Get all bench" to gather shitaki mushrooms.
      4. to give a shiny green apple to Estralita, the cathedral cook (45 minutes)
        Apple loads in Crystal Lake in a camper's picnic basket. These can be found in the northwest (campground) and southeast (picnic area) parts of the zone.
      5. to find a room called At the Foot of a Tall Cliff (20 minutes)
        In Forbidden Forest. From zone entrance, go 2E, S, E, 3S, 4W, N.
      6. to kill a sabertooth tiger (10 minutes)
      7. to give a shiitake mushroom and a bowl of applesauce and a packet of dried tiger to the ship's cook (30 minutes)
      8. to give a steak dinner to an elven keep cook (25 minutes)

      The Hunter Wants More Trophies[Complete]

      Additions by: Zelmix and Onark, Elagneros
      Level: 15, 22
      Difficulty: moderately easy
      Locale(s): Preserve
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a hunter (30 minutes)
        In the Preserve. See hunter in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to kill 4 of a wolf and 4 of a cougar (1 hour)
        In the Preserve. From above, go S, W, then all W (to cougars) or N along path (to wolves.)
      3. to find a hunter (30 minutes)
        As above.

      The Idiot [Complete]

      Additions by: Kernighan, Bhalodus
      Level: 26, 27, 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Dragmire, NaeraMae
      Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the idiot (1 hour)
        In Dragmire. From "At the Checkpoint," go all W to Blagnor Road then all N.
      2. to give a pair of wire-rimmed spectacles to the idiot (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In NaeraNae, wire-rimmed spectacles load on Threzdi the archmage. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the east.
      3. to find the one-legged messenger (30 minutes)
        In the Dragmire post office. From "At the Checkpoint," go all W to Tyrnog intersection, then 3N, W.

      The Invasion of Icy Beasts [Complete]

      Completed by: Grunwolf
      Level: 27, 29, 30
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Med City, Ruellia
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (20 minutes)
        See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find a militia member (40 minutes)
        In Ruellia just south of the town section. See Ruellia Crossing of Trails in Frequent Pathways. From "Crossing of Trails," go S.
      3. to kill 5 of a mahaleb, 5 of an ice troll, and an ice serpent (40 minutes)
        These load on the glacier just south of the Ruellia town section.
      4. to give a Wand of Subjugation to a militia member (no limit)
        This loads in Thanos, or can be purchased off auction as it's not find-original.

      The Janitor's New Job [Complete]

      Contributed by: Sulin
      Level: 16
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Mystara
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find a wary janitor (30 minutes)
        From Med recall, enter thief and look around.
      2. to find a room called The Foyer of City Hall (15 minutes)
        From Med recall, go 4W, N.
      3. to find a wary janitor (30 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to find a room called At the Bar in Ye Daemon's Forge (30 minutes)
        From Med recall, enter warrior, then go 4E, 2S, 2w.
      5. to find a keg of Foster's Lager (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In the Mystara Souvenir Shop. From @, go all W till D, S, E, buy keg.

      The Klastakor's Revenge [Complete]

      Level: 25, 26, 27, 30
      Difficulty: hard (time limit)
      Locale(s): Dark Escarpment
      Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a rebel klastakor (50 minutes)
        In Dark Escarpment, on the entrance level.
      2. to kill 30 of either Auranimus, the chief of the Saultancas, Tastaniumus, the Tunnelmaster, Purgineus the Reclusive, a saultancas underling mage, a saultancas cleric, a saultancas warrior, a saultancas thief, a saultancas courier, a saultancas mage, a saultancas underling warrior, a saultancas underling cleric, or a saultancas underling thief (1 hour)
        These are scattered around the zone of the Dark Escarpment. With luck, you'll find at least half of them on the first level alone (most of them are aggro anyway.)

      The Last Don? [Complete]

      Level: 26, 28, 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Crime Underground, Lyryanoth
      Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (35 minutes)
        In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go 2E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N. (Be sure you have sense life!)
      2. to kill the criminal mastermind (2 hours)
        From Lyryanoth recall, go 3S, 3E, N, E (the last two exits are hidden). The mastermind loads here with two other mobs.

      The Lesser Avatar in Training [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Laqerious
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Horneg's Keep
      Total Time: 4 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the wizard (20 minutes)
        See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find the lesser avatar of the God of Magic (1 hour, 40 minutes)
        From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search, W. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. (Horneg is here.) Then go N and look for a hidden mob (the astral gatekeeper), who holds a key. Kill him and get the key. Walk to back of the path to a locked door. Go W or E (depending on the direction of the door), then S, U. The lesser avatar loads here.
      3. to find an aurellium staff, etched with lightning bolts (1 hour, 40 minutes)
        This is find-original.
      4. to give an aurellium staff, etched with lightning bolts to the lesser avatar of the God of Magic ( )

      The Lesser Spirit of an Avatar [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Mospolo
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time:
      Objectives:

      The Little Princess's Tea Party [Complete]

      Contributed by: Arpad
      Level:
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Palace Of Celestia, El Cantara, Academy Of Braneri
      Total Time: 3 hours, 25 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Princess Ita (30 minutes)
        In E'nat'dae. From recall go all N, all U, all S.
      2. to find Katryni, the loving little healer (50 minutes)
        In the Palace of Celestia From zone entrance, go N, all E, all N till U, 2U, 2N.
      3. to find Munmi, the Chief's wife (45 minutes)
        From El Cantara zone entrance: U, N, W (hidden), U, all N and W to the NW corner of the Nomad Camp.
      4. to find an astronomer (40 minutes)
        From Braneri zone entrance: N, W, N, all W, U. (Note: He wanders, so may be anywhere in the building.)
      5. to give the small doll, feather-collection box and primitive sextant to the Princess Ita (30 minutes)
        As above.

      The Lizardfolk Revolt [Complete]

      Completed by: Kovad
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Trellor
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find a room called Northeast Corner of the Serpent Circle (1 hour)
        In Trellor. From recall, 3E, 3N.
      2. to kill Julianus Daenar (no limit)
        In Lyryanoth. From recall, go all W. Kill the four angry protestors. Go W, S, all W, U, N, all W, search, 2U. The king loads here with 2 guards. Because he is aggro, no flee, and the prior room is cramped, he's very tough to kill.
      3. to find a crown of sparkling crystal or the scepter of Daenar's legacy (no limit)
        Loot these from the king's corpse.
      4. to find a room called A Circular Overlook (no limit)
        From Lyryanoth recall, all E into the castle, then all U (wear lizardfolk claws to climb), then W.
      5. to give a crown of sparkling crystal or the scepter of Daenar's legacy to Ingnaya, the watchman (no limit)
        He loads in the above room. He's aggro, so act quickly.

      The Lonely Caretaker[Complete]

      Level: 19, 20
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Graveyard, Fire Giants' Keep
      Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the caretaker (15 minutes)
        In the Graveyard. From entering the zone, go 2N, all W, then all S.
      2. to give the satyr's flute to the caretaker (2 hours, 10 minutes)
        This is flagged as find-original. See Satyr/Satyr's Flute in Frequent Pathways.

      The Lost Artifact of Enara [Complete]

      Contributed by: Sakuya
      Level: 24
      Difficulty: fairly easy
      Locale(s): Enara
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find the librarian (30 minutes)
        In Enara. From @, go all N, all W, then follow path to "The Scullery Door." Then open door, go 3N, 5E, S, E, 2S, all E, open door, E, and look around.
      2. to find the emerald scepter of Enara (no limit)
        From "The Scullery," go 2N, E, open door N, all N, E, all N, E, search, 2N, E, N, U. Lanselius loads here with the scepter.
      3. to give the emerald scepter of Enara to the librarian. (30 minutes)
        As above.

      The Lost Knight Horak [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Jaerse
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Wittermark, Dragmire, Elnissa, New Ashton
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Horak (no limit)
        In Wittermark.
      2. to find Sootyforge, the Dwarven blacksmith (no limit)
        In Dragmire. After entering Dragmire (from the @), go 2W, U, N, D, 8W, 2S, E.
      3. to give 2 of a bar of gold to Sootyforge, the Dwarven blacksmith (no limit)
        Purchase these from Silthia in New Ashton (10000 gold apiece.) From New Ashton recall, go D.
      4. to give Domanjian's hammer of Precision to Sootyforge, the Dwarven blacksmith (no limit)
        Found in Fortress of Elnissa. From zone entrance, go N, 2W, 3N, search, E, 2U, 2S, E, pull lever. Return to entrance (essentially backtrack.) Then go N, E, get key wagon. Then go W, all N, all W, N, all E til door, all S, U, N, search, all W.
      5. to find a dragon's eyeball, encased in a glass sphere ( )
        In Goland's Tower on Varanexus.
      6. to find Ara, the apprentice ( )
        In Alcord.
      7. to give a dragon's eyeball, encased in a glass sphere and Domanjian's hammer of Precision to Ara, the apprentice ( )
        Note: you receive the golden sword of Marsaul Hon.
      8. to give the golden sword of Marsaul Hon to Horak ( )
        As above.

      The Lost Telescope [Complete]

      Level: 19
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Gypsy Camp, Wilderness
      Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Captain Abnart (30 minutes)
        In Med City, in the Fisherman's area. From recall, go all S until you get to the wharf. Go E and W along the wharf and in the shipbuilding area to find Captain Abnart.
      2. to find Madame Isramala (30 minutes)
        In the Gypsy Camp. From the entrance to the zone (@), go D, E, E, 3S, W, S, search, 2S, all W, 2S.
      3. to find the drinkmaker (30 minutes)
        In the Inn just northeast from Med City. From the entrance to this inn, go all E. You will be given the telescope.
      4. to find the wilderness room at 1019 x 987 (5 minutes)
        Go all W from where you are, until you're out in the wilderness again. This will be the first wilderness room you encounter.
      5. to kill 2 of a goblin and a hobgoblin (15 minutes)
        These 3 mobs pop in the above room.
      6. to give a small telescope to Captain Abnart (15 minutes)
        As above.

      The Magic Resistance [Incomplete]

      Level: 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Vinlos, the innkeeper (40 minutes)
        In Lyryanoth. From recall, 3W, N.
      2. to find the Aekethi Chief (40 minutes)
        In Aeketh, go all W, E, then N through wilderness. Then go all W, 2N, 3W, all N, all W, N, E, search, pick hatch, open hatch, D.
      3. to give 3 of either a silvery mirror-like shield, a ring of magic resistance, a major globe of invulnerability, or an antimagic ring to the Aekethi Chief (no limit)
        a silvery mirror-like shield, a ring of magic resistance, a major globe of invulnerability, or an antimagic ring

      The Magius Shorn Cavar [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Tellanor
      Level: 11
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Medievia City, Underground Tunnels
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find a practicing magician (30 minutes)
        In Med City Mages' Quarter. Wanders.
      2. to find a blackroot ()
        In the reagent garden in the Underground Tunnels. From the graveyard entrance, go all S, W, 2S, E, N, W, S, E, N, 2E, D.
      3. to give a blackroot to Shorn Cavar, the Magius ()
        In the "strange glass hallway" part of the Underground Tunnels. Wanders.

      The Mayor Moving His Base of Operations [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Bhalodus
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): DeRah, Riverton, Forbidden Forest
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the mayor (30 minutes)
        In DeRah Villadom.
      2. to find the mayor of Riverton ()
        See Riverton Mayor in Frequent Pathways.
      3. to kill 16 of either an elven warrior, an elven hunter, an elven guard, the elven captain of the guard, a male elven keep guard, or a female elven keep guard. (1 hour)
        Loads in Forbidden Forest. Note: This objective is no-comm and no-death.

      The Mespavian Hermit [Complete]

      Additions by: Elagneros
      Level: 15
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Dray'mar
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Ves'pre, the First One of Dray'mar (1 hour)
        In Dray'mar. From zone entrance (@), go 2E, 2N, 2W, U, 2N. You receive a note.
      2. to give a small, rolled up note to Durgo (40 minutes)
        From above, go all S, D, 2N, 2W, 2S, open door, all W, 2N, all W, S.
      3. to kill 4 of an evil Glimara (50 minutes)
        From Durgo, go N, 2E, N, W, D and look around for these aggro mobs.

      The Missing Husband [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Lost Civilization
      Total Time: 3 hours, 28 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the poor woman (1 hour)
        In Lost Civilization. in a room called "A Crumbling House." From zone entrance, follow the trail around (the first 12 rooms or so curve around but no branches.) At the first intersection ("Road in the Forest") go S, S, W, S, S, E, E, S, S, E, S, S, S, W, S, S, E, S, W, all S.
      2. to find Mandaleus (1 hour)
        From the poor woman, go N, 2W, 2S, 3W, 2N, search, unlock, W, S, W, N, W, 2S, W, N, U.
      3. to kill 8 of a twisted soldier and 2 of the guardian (1 hour)
        Return to the search point above and look around on the streets for these mobs. The guardian especially can be challenging.
      4. to find the poor woman (28 minutes)
        As above.

      The Mystara Is Sinking! [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Antdos, Raelia
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Mystara, Spiderwode
      Total Time: 2 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Asterius, captain of the Mystara (30 minutes)
        From the entrance to Mystara (village of Tanivsport), go all W then E to "The Main Deck, Port Side, of the Mystara," then S and U to the Captain's deck. Look around to find him.
      2. to find the ship's carpenter (15 minutes)
        From 'The Port Entrance of the Captain's Deck' (the NW corner of this deck), go D, N, 2E, all D, 3S, W.
      3. to find 6 of a puddle of gooey sap (1 hour)
        In the Spiderwode on trees (this is hard solo, so get some help!)
      4. to find the ship's carpenter (15 minutes)
        From the entrance to Mystara, go W to the first D exit, then go all D, 3S, W.
      5. to give 6 of a puddle of gooey sap to the ship's carpenter (5 minutes)

      The New Castle of Medievia [Complete]

      Additions by: Rarazona, Antdos
      Level: 27, 28
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, NaeraMae
      Total Time: 3 hours, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (30 minutes)
        See Basalan in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find NaeraMae's great axe (3 hours)
        From zone entrance, go 2U, 2S, all E to gate. Get key or pick gate to continue E. Go all E, search, then E and open door E (key is on guardian or again, it is pickable.) Go 2E, S and kill NaeraMae for axe. This is find-original.
      3. to find Basalan, the Mayor of the City (20 minutes)

      The New Invasion of Dark Army [Needs Detail]

      Level: 23, 25
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s): New Genesia, Ruellia
      Total Time: 3 hours
      1. to find a guard of the Dark Army (30 minutes)
        In New Genesia. From the southern gate (central @), go N, all W, N, open door E, E.
      2. to kill 5 of a militia member (40 minutes)
        In the NE part of Ruellia village, called "Rocky Training Grounds."
      3. to give a cave map to a guard of the Dark Army (1 hour, 50 minutes)
        In Ruellia Village. From "Before Some Gates" (entrance to village), go N, 2W, N, W, N, 4W, open door S, 3S, W, kill Agalinis for gate key. The gate loads near the "Rocky Training Grounds" in the above objective. Unlock gate, open gate, E, and kill tunnel excavator. (He loads the map.)

      The Orcish Spies [Incomplete]

      Additions by: Hedrin
      Level: 28, 30
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Thunderhoume
      Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Dwarven sentry (1 hour)
        In Thunderhoume. From @, go W, all N, then follow path down.
      2. to kill 3 of an orc scout, an orc mage, and 2 of an Orcish marauder (1 hour)
        3. Orc scouts can be found on first slopes. From recall, go N, 3D, N and look around. Orcish mauraders can be found nearby; from recall, go N, 3D, N, 2D, 2W. The orc mage and 2 more orc scouts are, from recall, 2S, 2E, 2U and look around. All can be plagued.

      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (45 minutes)
        See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to kill 20 of a phantom (1 hour)
        These load in the Wilderness on the east side of the continent, around Trellor.
      3. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (45 minutes)
        As above.

      Contributed by: Vlar

      2. to kill a butterfly pixie (50 minutes)
        In the Graveyard near Trellor. From entrance to Graveyard, go 3W, 3S, 3W, 3U, 3N and look around.
      3. to kill a butterfly pixie (15 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to kill a butterfly pixie (15 minutes)
        As above.

      The Raven God Sign [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Zeela, Arrumar
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Castiack, Hives
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:

        In Castiack. From zone entrance, go N, 2E, 2N, E, S.

      The Renegade Titans [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Kovad, Milekan
      Level: 27, 29
      Difficulty: hard (all no-summon, no-phase)
      Locale(s): Lattyrna
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
        From the entrance to the zone, go all D, all E, then 5 N to "The Palace of Lattyrna" where the herald loads. (Look at him to make sure he has loaded with the "dolphin shaped key." Kill the herald and get the key. Go N, unlock door, U, W.
      2. to kill The Kraken (1 hour)
        From Poseidon, go E, D, all S until "Ivory Road, Near the Gates" then all E until "The Intersection of Crystal and Ivory" then 6N until "The Intersection of Crystal and Onyx," then 2E, 2U, W, N. The Kraken loads here.
      3. to find Poseidon (30 minutes)
        As above. You will receive a key.
      4. to kill the leviathan (1 hour)
        From Poseidon, E, D, unlock grate, 4 D, S.
      5. to give a grate key to Poseidon (30 minutes)
        As above.

      The Revenge of Minotaurs [Complete]

      Completed by: Majromax
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate to hard (depending on who else is in Horneg's)
      Locale(s): Med City, NaeraMae, Wilderness, Horneg's Keep
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the wizard (30 minutes)
        See Wizard/Marious/War Room in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to find Threzdi (30 minutes)
        In NaeraMae. From zone entrance, U, U, S, S, all E to "Before the Inner Citadel of NaeraMae." Ethereal or unlock door to the E. From "Inside the Grand Gates," go E, E, S, S, S, S, then through the door to the east.
      3. to kill 6 of a renegade wizard (1 hour)
        Located in the area outside the NaeraMae zone.
      4. to find NaeraMae (30 minutes)
        In the Citadel of NaeraMae. From zone entrance (@), go S, 2U, 2 S, 7 E, search, 2E, S. Pick, or kill guards for keys if you can't pick locks.
      5. to kill Horneg (1 hour)
        From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse. (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx. level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here.
      6. to find NaeraMae (30 minutes)
        As above.

      The Riverton Butcher Needs Meat [Complete]

      Level: 23, 24
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Riverton, The Preserve, Wilderness
      Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the butcher (45 minutes)
        On Emerald Avenue, north side of the street.
      2. kill 15 of a rabbit or 5 of a baenlyr (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        The lame rabbits in Riverton don't count; rabbits in the Preserve right inside the zone do count. Baenlyrs of course can be found in the Wilderness.
      3. to find the butcher (30 minutes)

      The Sailor's Wedding [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Angulain, Kirgan
      Level: 19
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Goblin Castle
      Total Time: 1 hour, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a sailor (15 minutes)
        In Med City.
      2. to find a yellow and green ring ( )
        In the Goblin Castle. From zone entrance to the Labyrinth (@), go: all E (first two exits hidden), S, E, all S, all E, all S, all W, all S, E, all S, all W, all N, W, N. You'll fall through the floor to the next level. Then go S, E, 3S, E, S, U to the Goblin Castle. Then for mountain goblins (which pop ring), go all W, all N, U, all E, U, and look around.
      3. to give a yellow and green ring to a sailor ( )
        As above.

      The Scepter of Ill Health [Complete]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Enara,, Lyngaeli's Nightmare
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Lanselius (30 minutes)
        In Enara. From entrance, go 2N, 7W, N, W, 11N, E, 5N, E, 6N, E, search, 2N, E, N, U.
      2. to find a scepter of ill health (2 hours)
        In Lyngaeli's Nightmare, bought from the Guardian ofDreams. The Guardian can be found anywhere in thezone, so you'll have to look around for him. You have to pay for his items with nightmare tokens, which load randomly on the mobs throughout the zone. You have to search the corpses to find the tokens.
      3. to find Lanselius (25 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give a scepter of ill health to Lanselius (5 minutes)

      The Shopping List [Complete]

      Contributed by: Kovad
      Additions by: Geengyr
      Level: 24
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Enara
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a citizen of Enara (30 minutes)
        Just inside the @, to the N.
      2. to give 2 of a loaf of bread, 2 of a green apple, and 2 pears to a citizen of Enara (30 minutes)
        These load on the mobs called "citizen of Enara." Kill them, get these items from the shopping basket, then give the items to a different citizen of Enara.
      3. to give a spool of black thread to a citizen of Enara (30 minutes)
        Spool of black thread loads in the gypsy woman in the northwest part of the gypsy camp (at the north part of Enara.)

      The Silver Loving Jeweler [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Additions by: Xercan
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Cliffs of Berkovic
      Total Time: 6 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Sardhara the Jeweler (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, N, 2W.
      2. to find a silvery ring of regeneration (5 hours)
        In Rydhordel Woods. From zone entrance, go N and follow path through the hedge maze. Go west-ish to the Monumental Fountain of Amber and south on Path Through the Park. (Desperate mother mobs are aggressive to evil-aligned players). Go all S, then W to A Large Trunk. Enter trunk. Go all S, 3W to 4-way intersection. Open door west, 5W, 2S, open door, E, look around for hidden mob Quisenil. Kill him and loot key (worked piece of stone). Go W back to Underground Barracks and return to 4-way intersection, "A Crossroad in the Tunnels." Unlock door south, 3S, walk around Circular Corridor till you find an old robed man (senile conjurer). Kill him, and loot key (elliptical section of marble). Wander around corridor till you find locked east door. Unlock door, 2E to Al'Drenyth. Kill him, go S, type "pull lever." Return to 4-way intersection, then go all E, 2N to a Large Stone Door. Kill Khernol, loot key (triangular stone). Unlock door, go 3E, S, 2E, S to Dead End. There is a hidden exit down -- no need to search, just go down. The Demon is here, but note: he has perma fireshield and does not take damage from demonfire. Kill Demon and get ring. This step is find-original.

      The Soulless Priest [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Mospolo
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: hard (NPK, solo, no-comm)
      Locale(s): Trellor, Graveyard, Berkovic
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
        He will almost kill you; you wake up with 1 HP in Trellor.
      2. to find the high priestess of Trell (30 minutes)
        From above, stand, look.
      3. to find the Gem of Souls (no limit)
        In Berkovic. Note: this is find-original.
      4. to give the Gem of Souls to the High Priest of the Church (1 hour)
        As above.
      5. to find a room called the Medievia Post Office ( )

      The Souls of Czareran [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Antdos
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Czareran
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a mounted city guardsman (2 hours)
        In Med City. From recall enter thief and look around.
      2. to kill 10 of an undead corpse (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Czareran. From entrance to Czareran go all S, W, S then look in barracks.

      The Stolen Ring [Complete]

      Additions by: Zasildar
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Aeketh
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Jundu (1 hour)
        In Aeketh. Go all west then north through wilderness. Then go all W, 2N, 3 W, all N till U, then U. Jundu loads here.
      2. to find an angry merchant (1 hour)
        In Lyryanoth. From recall, go S, W.
      3. to kill 2 of an angry lizardfolk (10 minutes)
        These are in the room with you. You'll receive a bar of gold.
      4. to find an elven merchant (no limit)
        Located randomly in the cities of Medievia.
      5. to give a bar of gold to an elven merchant (10 minutes)
        You'll receive Jundu's ring.
      6. to give Jundu's ring to Jundu (1 hour)
        As above.

      The Stowaways [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Zasildar, Maneak
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Fury
      Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a dark-skinned swashbuckler (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        On the main deck of the Fury.
      2. to kill 6 of a malnourished stowaway and 5 of a sleek shark (1 hour)
        Malnourished stowaways are on the 2nd level below deck, are hidden, and usually in rooms with closed doors. Sharks are located west the Main Deck, just before the Prow, and down where the anchor appears in the room description.
      3. to find Gillet, the first mate of the Fury (15 minutes)
        4. On the 1st level below deck, in a locked room. He give 2 bars of platinum for completing the quest.

      The Students of Chakobsu [Complete]

      Additions by: Helitus
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Aeketh, Lost Civilization
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Chakobsu (1 hour)
        In Aeketh. From zone entrance, go W, W, all N, all W, N, N, U, N.
      2. to kill Korangar and Tiniopia (2 hours)
        In Lost Civilization. You'll need all 3 keys to get in temple:
        • Get small key made from obsidian from a locket made from obsidian. This loads in 1 of 3 corpses on the ground. From @, go 2S, D, E, S, D, S, 2W, D, W, S, E, S, D, S, E, S, E, 2S, E, S, E, S to the first corpse (get all corpse.) Then go N, W, N, W, 2N, W, N, W, 2S, W, 2S, 2E, 2S, E, 3S to the second corpse. Then go 3N, 2W, S, W, 2S, 2E, 2N, E to the third corpse.
        • Get small bar of black marble from Mandaleus in room House of Peace in swamp. From the third corpse, go W, 2S, E, S, W, 4S, 4W, S, W, 2S, search, W, N, W, 2N, 2E, U, kill Mandaleus.
        • Get tome of darkness from stone box in room called A Stone Archway. From @, go 2S, D, E, S, D, S, 2W, D, W, S, E, S to the Temple of Valsharia.
        • Once you have these three keys, from tome, go: D, 3S, W, 2S, 2E, 2S, W, S, W, 2S, 3E, S, W, 4S, 2W, 3S, W, search, S, unlock seal D, D, S. Kill Korangar. Then go N, 2W and kill Tiniopia (very hard to solo).

      The Town Crier's Lunch [Complete]

      Contributed by: Sulin
      Level: 10
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 4 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Famar, the town crier (15 minutes)
        In City of Medievia. From recall go S.
      2. to find a slab of salami (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        From Med recall, go 3E, 3N, 2E, buy salami.
      3. to give a slab of salami to Famar, the town crier (15 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to find a mug of ale (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        From Thief Quarters, go 10E, 2S, E, buy ale.
      5. to give a mug of ale to Famar, the town crier (15 minutes)
        As above.
      6. to find a raisin muffin (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        From Thief Quarters, go 4E, 2N, W, buy muffin.
      7. to give a raisin muffin to Famar, the town crier (15 minutes)
        As above.

      The Trellorian Deckhand [Complete]

      Contributed by: Mihu and Dunar
      Level: 29, 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Trellor, Fury, Asnor
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Heron the Bartender (40 minutes)
        In Trellor. From Trellor recall: go 5E, 3N, E, 2S, U.
      2. to find a young deckhand (1 hour)
        On the Fury, located randomly.
      3. to find a room called A Hallway Inside the Fury (20 minutes)
        From the south of the Fury, go W, D, E, N, then all W.
      4. to find a blazing warhammer (no limit)
        In Asnor. From the south entrance, go to the general direction of up then northeast. Open rock then all east. The king Garlik and/or the troll warden carry the warhammer. Plague and steal to get it.
      5. to find a room called The Main Deck of the Fury - Starboard (1 hour)
      6. to give a blazing warhammer to a snarling buccaneer (5 minutes)
      7. to kill Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour)
        From the entrance to the Fury, go go all N/E/W/S (depending on orientation) then go 2U, E, 7S, W, D, E, N, 3W, 2S.

      The Underwater Treasure [Complete]

      Level: 28, 29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Pirate Ship
      Total Time: 5 hours, 5 minutes (time extended)
      Objectives:
      1. to find Captain Amos Trask (1 hour, 20 minutes)
        Located on the Pirate Ship. From @ entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, E, E.
      2. to find some viscous black slime (3 hours)
        Loads in Riverton on the primordial ooze (in the bottom of the pond in the park). From Riverton recall, go E, 7S, D, W. The ooze is no-melee. This is no-death and find-original.
      3. to find Captain Amos Trask (40 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give some viscous black slime to Captain Amos Trask (5 minutes)

      Contributed by: Sharien
      Level:
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s): Trellor, Castle Med, Enchanted Oak Graveyard
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Trellor Cityguard ( )
      2. to find a lost spirit of a Trellor guard ( )
        Found at the eastern entrance to Enchanted Oak Graveyard. You receive a small, rolled-up note.
      3. to give a small, rolled-up note to Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor ( )
        See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
      4. to find a lost spirit of a Trellor guard ( )
        As above.

      The Wayward Reverend [Complete]

      Contributed by: Ontare
      Additions by: Lexxon
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Graveyard, Sceptrum
      Total Time: 1 hour, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
        In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3 W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
      2. to kill Reverend Welsh (1 hour)
        In Sceptrum. From @, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N, open door, N.

      The Wizard's Mercenaries [Complete]

      Level: 22
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Trellor, Aeketh
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Stormwatch Commander (30 minutes)
        In Trellor, 6N of recall.
      2. to kill 12 of the mounted mercenary (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Village of Aeketh. Poison them first if possible. This is a no-death objective.

      The Woodsman's Lantern [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Rydhordel Woods
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a woodsman (40 minutes)
        In Rydhordel Woods. From zone entrance, go through the hedge maze and then south into the woods.
      2. to give a lantern filled with phosphorescent slime residue to a woodsman (1 hour, 20 minutes)
        Loads on Khernol in Rydhordel Woods.

      The Wyvern Collection [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Level: 21, 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Dragmire, Mynoric
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Sootyforge, the dwarven blacksmith (1 hour)
        After entering Dragmire (from the @), go 2W, U, N, D, 8 W, 2S, E.
      2. to give 2 of either the flail of the Wyvern, a maroon robe embroidered with a black wyvern, or a token of a red wyvern to Sootyforge, the Dwarven blacksmith (1 hour)
        In Mynoric Garrison.
        robe: Loads on Kaurdag. From entrance to zone (@), go 4 N, U (search), S and look around.
        flail: Loads on Kaurdag.
        token: Loads on Kielanir, the bodyguard. From entrance to zone (@), go 4N, 2E, S, 2W, S. Kill Jailer for key. Go N, E, S. Kill Gekrenville for key. Go N, E, N, 4 W, unlock door N, open door N, N. Kill skeleton for lens. Go S, 2E, search for trapdoor, U. Then go 2S, 2E, hold lens, hold a ball of light, use lens. Finally, go 4 W, 3N, E, U. Note: Upon completing this AQ, you will receive a green orb.

      Things for a Boy [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Takphius
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): New Ashton
      Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find an Ashtonian child (35 minutes)
        In New Ashton, located randomly.
      2. to give a pair of blue overalls and a child's storybook and a simple cotton shirt and a slingshot and a small stone to an Ashtonian child (2 hours, 5 minutes)
        overalls: In Sceptrum on Farmer Francis, N from entrance.
        storybook: In Enara, in NPK gypsy village, on a girl.
        shirt: In Esacha Fen, in the Gemothalle on Elder Laybon.
        slingshot and stone: In Esacha Fen on a mischievous gypsy boy.

      Contributed by: Takphius

      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Brookhaven
      Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Dramous, the Mayor of Brookhaven (1 hour)
        From Brookhaven recall, go all N, all W, get key from messenger, recall. Then go E, unlock door, S, U, 2E.
      2. to find a room called A Hallway in the Mansion (5 minutes)
        From the mayor, go 2W.
      3. to find long hedge clippers (2 hours)
        From Village of Gnomenel recall, go 6E, 2S, 2W, get clippers rack.
      4. to find a room called A Hallway in the Mansion (30 minutes)
        From Brookhaven recall, go all N, all W, get key from messenger, recall. Then go E, unlock door, S, U.
      5. to give long hedge clippers to Calib, the servant (5 minutes)
        He pops here.

      Tomb Ball [Complete]

      Additions by: Milekan, Afiniti
      Level: 23, 25
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Tomb of Oblivion, Talqaxtyl's Pyramid, Lattyrna, Goland's
      Total Time: 3 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a female tomb guard (45 minutes)
        In Tomb of Oblivion. Just inside zone (down from @), go N and E a few. A female tomb guard should load in this area.
      2. to give a crown of golden palm fronds to a female tomb guard (45 minutes)
        Loads on Talqaxtyl in Pyramid. From zone entrance (@), recall, N, W, W, W, N, N, N, N, N, U, U, S, all E, W, S, N (yes, that's right.) Get the key from the snakes. Then unlock door N, open door N, N, N, pull frond, all N to kill Talqaxtyl.
      3. to give a crystal timepiece of time resistance to a female tomb guard (1 hour, 20 minutes)
        Loads in Goland's Tower on Tuthluth. From zone entrance, go 4N, E, kill Dornloth for dragon claw key, W, all N, unlock door north, N, U, 2S, 2E. Note: this is solo and find-original.
      4. to give a ring made of shells to a female tomb guard (45 minutes)
        Loads in Lattyrna on nereids. From zone entrance, go all D, 2E, 4N, 2E, then N through the garden area, where nereids are found. Note: this is solo, find-original, and no-summon/phase.

      Tools for a Farmer [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Morluis
      Level: 21, 22
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Dragmire, Med City
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find an orcish farmer (30 minutes)
        In Dragmire. From @, go W, U, N, D, 4W, N and look around.
      2. to give a rusty garden hoe and the sharpest tool in the shed to an orcish farmer (1 hour)
        rusty garden hoe: Loads on the orcish farmer in Dragmire.
        the sharpest tool in the shed: Found on the gardener in the gardener's shed in Enara, north of the palace. From zone entrance (@), go: N, N, all W, N, W, all N, E, all N, E, E, then N.
      3. to give a pair of sturdy boots to an orcish farmer (1 hour)
        Boots are found in Mage Quarter of Med City, off the Street of the Artisans in a shop called Cobblers to the Gentry. From recall, enter mage, then go 4S, 3W, S, buy sturdy.

      Tools for a Prisoner's Breakout [Complete]

      Contributed by: Symax, Omerlax
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Esacha, Ulhazzen
      Total Time: 2 hours, 35 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find an escaped prisoner (30 minutes)
        In Ulhazzen. From eastern @, go U, W and look around.
      2. to find a saw and a hammer and a coil of mossy rope (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        in Esacha Fen.
        a saw: in a metal toolbox on an apprentice in the eastern part of zone.
        a coil of mossy rope: in the drydock in the eastern part of zone.
        a hammer: on a bargeowner in the western part of zone
      3. to find an escaped prisoner (30 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to give a saw and a hammer and a coil of mossy rope to an escaped prisoner (5 minutes)
        As above.

      Tools for Brina's Escape [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Anynia
      Level:
      Difficulty: very hard
      Locale(s): Spirited Heights/Horneg, Sceptrum Isaschi, Condemned Arena
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find Brina, the niece of the Duke of Trellor ( )
        From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, S, 7D (pick door south or have key from Horneg), 2S, 2W, 2N, E, 2S, E.
      2. to find a Mal Saguni and a polished knife ( )
        Mal Saguni loads on a mistress in Sceptrum.
        Polished knife loads on either a stealthy or slender thief in the Condemned Arena.
      3. to give a Mal Saguni and a polished knife to Brina, the niece of the Duke of Trellor ( )
        As above.

      Tools for the Toolmaker [Complete]

      Additions by: Kernighan
      Level: 29
      Difficulty:
      Locale(s): Riverton, Goland's Tower
      Total Time: 2 hours, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Galstonth (30 minutes)
        In Riverton. From the western entrance, go 2E, 5N, E, N.
      2. to find a room called The Tower Forge (1 hour)
        In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go 4N, E, kill Dornloth for dragon claw key, W, all N, unlock door north, N, U, 2S, 2E.
      3. to kill Tuthluth (15 minutes)
        He loads in the above room. Get tools from his corpse.
      4. to give tools to Galstonth (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Tools to Repair a Fence [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Phu
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Gloumewood Farm, Enara Fen
      Total Time: 2 hours, 25 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a strapping farmhand (40 minutes)
        near @ of gloumewood farm, walk around
      2. to find a hammer and an adze (1 hour)
        hammer: loads on a gypsy husband. From the start of the walkway in Enara Fen, go all N, W, all N, S, E, N, and look around.
        adze loads in a leather tool belt or a metal toolbox. Belt loads on an industrious bargeowner. From the start of the walkway in Enara Fen, go all N, W, all N, S, 2E and look around. An apprentice in the eastern part of zone has the metal toolbox.
      3. to give a hammer and an adze to a strapping farmhand (45 minutes)
        As above.

      Toys for Becca [Complete]

      Contributed by: Lithena
      Level:
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, Sceptrum, E'nat'dae, Enara
      Total Time: 3 hours, 5 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Jaysa (45 minutes)
        In Sceptrum. From zone entrance, go N till U, then all U.
      2. to find a child's doll and a stuffed dragon and a stone pet kitten (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        a child's doll:In Enara. From zone entrance, go all N, then wander E or W until you find a little girl, who loads this item.
        a stuffed dragon: In Medievia. From recall, go 5E, N, 3E and buy stuffed dragon.
        a stone pet kitten: In the Hidden City of E'nat'dae. From zone entrance, go 2N, W, 7N, E to J'arga's Oddities and buy kitten.
      3. to give a child's doll and a stuffed dragon and a stone pet kitten to Becca (50 minutes)
        Becca loads in Sceptrum, D from where Jaysa was (above.)

      Toys for Tots [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Level: 24
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Lyryanoth, Enara, New Ashton
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find a benevolent priest (no limit)
        In Lyryanoth. From zone recall, go 4 W, 2N, W, 2N.
      2. to give a well-loved teddy bear, a child's doll, and 3 of a leather canteen to a benevolent priest (no limit)
        a well-loved teddy bear: In Castle Med. From Medievia recall, go 3 U, 7 N, 2E, open boulder, 3 D, 2N, W, 5S, 2E, S, E. Kill Flora for the bear.
        a child's doll: In Enara. From @, go all N and look in the surrounding rooms for "A little girl."
        a leather canteen: In New Ashton. From south entrance (@), go W, W, N.

      Track the Peeping Tom [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Cipactli
      Level: 19
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Crystal Lake
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a girl in a bathing suit (30 minutes)
        In the NW part of Crystal Lake.
      2. to kill a peeping Tom (15 minutes)
        Look nearby.
      3. to kill a peeping Tom (15 minutes)
        Repeat.
      4. to kill a peeping Tom (15 minutes)
        Repeat.
      5. to give a plain white shirt and a pair of tight-fitting, black pants and a pair of strange leather shoes to a girl in a bathing suit (15 minutes)
        Note: these pop in your inventory after you kill the last peeping Tom.

      Traders' Revenge [Complete]

      Contributed by: Hyksos
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Graveyard, Wilderness
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
        In the Graveyard. Go to the northeast corner of the Graveyard and enter the Cathedral. Go N until "The Cross Aisle", then 3 W (open door if needed). The High Priest is usually found inside the High Priest's quarters to the north from the Sitting Room.
      2. to kill (an unknown number of) baenlyrs (2 hours, 30 minutes)
        This objective is hidden. Baenlyrs load distantly from Med City; they're frequently spotted near CT 54 and Trellor.
      3. to find the High Priest of the Church (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Trading Goods [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by:
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): E'nat'dae, Enara
      Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the lockkeeper (30 minutes)
        In Enara, east from Gypsy camp.
      2. to give a loaf of bread and a pear and a green apple to Morwa, the shopkeeper (40 minutes)
        In E'nat'dae. From entrance, go N, W, 6N, E. Note: you receive these items.
      3. to give a sturdy leather satchel and a wooden raft, made of slender sapling trunks and a painted waterskin, portraying a bright waterfall to the lockkeeper (40 minutes)
        In Enara. Note: you receive these items in the previous objective.

      Training Equipment [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Afiniti
      Additions by: Clarisa
      Level: 24
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): New Ashton, Crime Underground
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Master of Novices (1 hour)
        In Crime Underground. From main intersection, go all S.
      2. to give 75 of a rusted Ashton Star to the Master of Novices (1 hour)
        In New Ashton. From recall, go D, S, 8E, N and buy 75 star.
      3. to give 6 of a shuriken to the Master of Novices (1 hour)
        These load in Crime Underground, as well as other places. (Note: this is NOT find-original.)
      4. to give 8 of a throwing knife to the Master of Novices (1 hour)
        These load on the novice thief in Crime Underground, as well as thieves in the Thieves' Quarter in Med City.

      Training Tool for Horsemaster [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Anadimen
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Wilderness Inn, Sceptrum Ishachi
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the horsemaster (1 hour)
        In any inn in the wilderness. In an inn from which you enter from the west, go 5E, N, 2E, N.
      2. to give a black leather riding crop to the horsemaster (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        On the Mistress of Pain in Sceptrum. From zone entrance, go all N, E, enter mirror, all D, all N until the three-way intersection. Then go all E and search; look around.

      Transform the Keeper [Complete]

      Level: 23, 26
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Preserve, Akenuas Glade
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Keeper (30 minutes)
        In the Preserve. From zone entrance ("The Entrance to the Preserve"), go 2W, N, E, N, 6W, N, D, 2E, N, E, S.
      2. to find a black and gold bear pelt and the claws of a gold and black bear (2 hours)
        These load in Akenuas Glade. The pelt loads on golden bears and/or young golden bears. The claws load on black bears. All three mobs are found near the entrance of the zone, to the northwest.
      3. to give a black and gold bear pelt and the claws of a gold and black bear to the Keeper (30 minutes)

        From entrance to Fire Giants Keep, go U, all S, E, all S, all W, N, all W, N.

      Treasure of the Pyramid [Incomplete]

      Additions by: Laeitin, Remulak, Teufeli
      Level: 19
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Talqaxtyl's Pyramid
      Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
      Objectives:

        In the Pyramid. From recall, go N, 3W, 5N, 2U, S, 5E, N, 4E, open door, 3E.

      Trellor Trouble [Complete]

      Contributed by: Tichonoph
      Level: 19
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Trellor
      Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Stormwatch Commander (30 minutes)
        In Trellor, 6N of recall.
      2. to kill 3 of a drunken man, 2 of a drunken brawler, 2 of a young pickpocket, and 2 of an accomplished pickpocket (45 minutes)
        Located randomly in Trellor. You should have sense life to find the pickpockets; if you can't cast it, then buy an orange potion from the apothecary in the NE corner of the Merchant Circle. When you sense a hidden life in a room, 'poke pickpocket' to see if you've got one.

      Trophy for Jandaly [Complete]

      Additions by: Aivanther
      Level: 27-29
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Aeketh, Cloud Giants
      Total Time:no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Jandaly (1 hour)
        In Aeketh. From entrance to zone, go all west then E (i.e. all W but one), then north through wilderness. Then go all west, N, N, W, W, W, N, N, N, U. Search (multiple times if necessary) and go south.
      2. to give the braided mane of Pegasus to Jandaly (no limit)
        Found in Cloud Giants. From @, go 2N, 2U, E, S, 2W, S, W, 2S, D, N, E, D, W, D, E. Dispel and kill Polythenis; get the key from his corpse. Then go W, U, E, U, W, S, U, 2N, E, N, 3E, N, all E, 2N, W, N, search, W, N, and kill pegasus for mane (doesn't always pop.)

      Troubles Down in the Mines [Needs Detail]

      Total Time: 2 hours
