      2. to kill 4 of a warg (1 hour)
      3. to find a mine foreman (30 minutes)

      Truth Potion Needed [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Godefroi
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med Castle, Sonedal Ravine
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Kerst (30 minutes)
        In Med Castle, in the same room as the Duke of Trellor.
      2. to give a potion of truth to Kerst (2 hours)
        Potion loads on a gnomish interrogator in Yelkan's room in Sonedal Ravine.

      Turkey for Beggar [Complete]

      Contributed by: Kirgan
      Additions by: Antdos, Elagneros
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City, E'nat'dae
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a filthy beggar (30 minutes)
        In Med City.
      2. to give a cold turkey leg to a filthy beggar (1 hour)
        In E'nat'dae, in A Cheerfully Decorated Kitchen. From @, go N, W, all N to "At the Foot of a Majestic Staircase", all E, N. The cold turkey leg loads in the enormous marble icebox. Note: on completion you receive a green orb.

      Turning Off the Lighthouse [Complete]

      Contributed by: Ceresir
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Pirate Ship, G'dangus
      Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Captain Amos Trask (40 minutes)
        Located on the Pirate Ship. From entrance, go all N, E, U, S, U, E, E.
      2. to kill 8 of a firefly (1 hour)
        In G'dangus. From zone entrance, go 3N, 7E, 5U. The fireflies are in this room and the one above.
      3. to find Captain Amos Trask (40 minutes)
        As above.

      Twine for Tabytha [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Cipactli
      Additions by:Kirgan
      Level: 19, 22
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Rydhordel Woods, Gnomenel
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Mathaelda, the witch (40 minutes)
        From northern entrance to Rydhordel, go 2N, W, S, W, all S, 8W, all S.
      2. to find a ball of twine (1 hour)
        Loads on Gennon Serry in Gnomenel. From entrance, go 10E, 2N. Note: This is find original.
      3. to find Mathaelda, the witch ( )
        As above.
      4. to give a ball of twine to Tabytha, Mathaelda's pet ( )
        From above, go N, W.

      Twins Reunited [Complete]

      Completed by: Rarazona
      Additions by: Milekan
      Level: 27, 30
      Difficulty: easy to moderate
      Locale(s): Cloud Giants, Crime Underground
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Ceseracades (30 minutes)
        In Cloud Giants. From zone entrance, go all U, then 3E, S, U, E, S, E, S, all U.
      2. to find Capercades (20 minutes)
        From the above, go all D, N, 2W, S, all U.
      3. to give a book of spells to Capercades (1 hour)
        Loads on Spider in the Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N until you are in "An Antechamber," then N again. Spider loads here (hidden.) Note: this is find-original.
      4. to find Ceseracades (20 minutes)
        As above. You will receive a lock of hair.
      5. to give a lock of hair to Capercades (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Tzakra Gloves for Foreman [Complete]

      Contributed by: Afiniti
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Riverton, Vark Outpost
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a mine foreman (1 hour)
      2. to give a pair of gloves made out of tzakra hide to a mine foreman (2 hours)
        At Vark Outpost. From @, go N,U, W, 2U, pull lever, north, and look around. Gloves load on a terrible-looking vark scout (aggro backstabbers -- be careful.)

      Underground Shakedown [Complete]

      Contributed by: Bhalodus
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med Castle, Crime Underground
      Total Time: 1 hour, 50 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        See Pherrance in Frequent Pathways.
      2. to kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves and the Spider and Nephalis, the Viper and 2 of a novice thief and 2 of a thief (50 minutes)
        In Crime Underground.

        Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves: See CU Crossroads in Frequent Pathways. From here, go 3S.
        novice thief and a thief: found randomly in the zone.

      3. to find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Unfortunate Fortune Told [Complete]

      Contributed by: Milekan
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Gypsy Camp
      Total Time: 2 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Madame Isramala (40 minutes)
        In the Gypsy Camp. Follow path from entrance until the exits are "a ticket booth" to the west and "a concession stand" to the east. From this room, search, all S until W exit, then all W, all S until The Fortune Tellers Wagon.
      2. to give a mirror of the ages to Madame Isramala (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        Buy from the wandering vampire or off auction. Note: this is no-portal.

      Unger Scout Fishing [Complete]

      Level: 24, 25, 26
      Difficulty: hard (CPK, no-death)
      Locale(s): Tharhalas, Warrens, Toshi
      Total Time: 5 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find an unger dwarf scout (2 hours)
        In Tharhalas. Mob is hidden and often loads just inside zone to the west.
      2. to find a palefish (1 hour)
        In Warrens of the Moshata; you'll have to pass through CPK. From "A Hole in the Ground," go D, 6N, D, 6 W, 6 S, 2D and lookaround.
      3. to find an unger dwarf scout (20 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to find a giant lungfish (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Catacombs of Toshi. From "An Enormous Statue," go D, 9 N, 4 W, 3N, 5 D, 2N, 4E and look around.
      5. to find an unger dwarf scout (20 minutes)
        As above.

      Unicorn's Stolen Horn [Complete]

      Completed by: Afiniti
      Additions by: Milekan
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate (no-summon, no-phase)
      Locale(s): Yldari, Crime Underground
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find a mourning unicorn (1 hour)
        In Yldari. From zone entrance ("A Pair of White Marble Gates"), go 2N, W.
      2. to kill 10 of a thief and Shaelin, the Master Thief and Celdspar, the Master Thief (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D. From here:
        Thieves: load in rooms nearby (hidden).
        Shaelin and Celdspar: go all E, N, D, 2N, E, S. Kill novice for key. Go N, W, all S, U, all W, unlock N, N to enter "The Gauntlet." Kill the mob in each room, loot the key, and unlock/open the door to the N to get to the next room. Celdspar loads in the first room and Shaelin in the fourth room.
        Vonliege (see below) is all N, past a few closed doors.
      3. to kill Vonliege, Overlord of the Thieves (55 minutes)
        Also in Crime Underground (see above.)
      4. to give a unicorn's horn to a mourning unicorn (1 hour)
        As above. Note: this is find-original.

      Unsolved Murders [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Xercan
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Underground Tunnels, Trellor, Castiack, Braneri, Vanlarra
      Total Time: 3 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Vanlarra guard (30 minutes)
        In Vanlarra.
      2. to find Wyvaarn (30 minutes)
        In Castiack. From zone entrance, go N until the first street E, then go E along the street and S into the Temple of Tranquility.
      3. to find a room called The Philosophy Library (30 minutes)
        In Braneri. From @, go 2N, W, open door, W, S.
      4. to find the Trellor librarian (45 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 2N, 2W.
      5. to find a member of the Veiled Society (30 minutes)
        In the Underground Tunnels below Med City. Quickest way is entering through the north entrance (the Courrain River just north of Med City.)
      6. to kill 8 of a member of the Veiled Society (30 minutes)
        As soon as you complete the 5th objective, 7 more members of the Veiled Society will pop in the room with you. Be sure you're healed first!

      Unwanted Tourists [Complete]

      Contributed by: Jonuv
      Additions by: Bhalodus
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Asnor
      Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find an elite troll guard (1 hour)
        In Asnor Mountains. From the southeast @ entrance, follow the path up the mountain N to the room (The Remains of a Rock Slide), then go 2 W, D, all W to the troll guard (the one in this room only, other troll guards you meet on the way do not count).
      2. to kill 4 of a mountain climber (1 hour)
        In Asnor. From the southeast @ entrance, go N and U. In the first few rooms, mountain climbers load hidden.
      3. to give mountain climbing boots to an elite troll guard (20 minutes)
        These load on the mountain climbers.

      Upgrading the Mage Library at Vanlarra [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Akinc
      Level: 29, 30
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Vanlarra, Spiderwode
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a failed tower applicant ( )
        In Vanlarra. From western entrance to zone, go E until you find one.
      2. to find a high mage of Vanlarra ( )
        Go all E into the tower, then 2N, U and look around.
      3. to find Lusek ( )
        In Spiderwode in the Chandali Encampment. From zone entrance, go 4N, all W,N, W, N all W till 4 way intersection ("Chandali Encampment, Before Two Wagons") then go all N. Lusek loads here.
      4. to give a beginner's guide to wilderness spells, a beginner's guide to necromancy, a beginner's guide to summoning elementals, and a beginner's guide to spells of armageddon to a high mage of Vanlarra ( )

      Uproot Thanos' Problem [Complete]

      Contributed by: Xolo
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Thanos
      Total Time: 3 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Clan Member of Thanos (1 hour)
        In Swamp and Den of Thanos. From @, go N, all W, S and get adder key.Then go N, 2E, N, W, N, unlock door, open door, all W, 6S.
      2. to kill 4 of a tree-root (1 hour)
        From above, go N till W, then go all W, all N, E, N, W, 3N, E, N,2D (careful!), all N till 4-way intersection, all E, all N, and look around.
      3. to find the Clan Member of Thanos (1 hour)
        As above.

      Vacation Gears for the Mayor [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Elagneros, Shaedehart
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): The City of Medievia, Arcadia
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Gremmon, head scribe of City Hall (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, go 4W, N, W, N, U, N.
      2. to find a pair of snow goggles, a snow shovel, and a pair of ice skates (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Arcadia. From zone entrance, go all U, N, all E, all S,enter whirlpool. This leads to NPK. NPK has 4Sections, each relating to a different season; these items load in winter. If the player doesn't get to winter, the easiest thing to do is recall to zone entrance, and go back to whirlpool until winter is reached.

        goggles: loads on snow hens. From winter entrance, W, S, D, look around.
        <shovel: loads on helpful dogs. From winter entrance, E, N or S, D, look around.
        skates: loads on mischievous Arcadian boys. Kill a snowman in area with dogs for key. Go back to winter entrance, W, unlock entrance, search for hidden exit down. D, look around.

      3. to give a pair of snow goggles, a snow shovel, and a pair of ice skates to Gremmon, head scribe of City Hall (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Varanexus' Notes [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Kaylemay
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: moderate (CPK but not frequently staked)
      Locale(s):
      Total Time:
      Objectives:
      1. to find Varanexus ( )
        In Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go N to "Before Goland's Tower." Then go 3W, all N, all E till down exit, D, kill dweller for key ("a narrow bone which might serve as a key"). Then go U, S, 2E, search, D. Then go 2E, 2N, D, 2W, S, 2W, N to Calsinc the caretaker. Kill him for a key. Then go all S, N, to locked door west. Unlock the door and go W; unlock the door and go N.
      2. to kill a rathernol ( )
        In Bloodstone. From the southern @, go 2N, 2W, search, D (into NPK) and look around for the rathernols, who wander. Trap them to kill them; do not shield room. Rathernols plague, weaken, and chill touch.
      3. to kill 2 of a rathernol ( )
        As above.
      4. to kill a rathernol ( )
        As above.
      5. to kill 2 of a rathernol ( )
        As above.
      6. to find Varanexus ( )
        As above.

      Vark Killer [Complete]

      Contributed by: Aiden
      Additions by: Milekan
      Level: 22, 26
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Mystical Forest, Vark Outpost
      Total Time: 2 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find King Greybeard (30 minutes)
        In Mystical Forest. From recall, go all E, all N, all W, N, U, 5S, 5E, all N.
      2. to kill 6 of a ferocious vark guard and 2 of a large-clawed mthati and 3 of a terrible-looking vark scout (1 hour, 40 minutes)
        At Vark Outpost. From @, go N, U, W, 2U, pull lever, north, and look around.
      3. to find King Greybeard (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Vegetables for Farmer Bobb [Complete]

      Contributed by: Dyzzie and Leiya
      Additions by: Lilopi
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Hamlet, Forbidden Forest
      Total Time: 2 hours, 20 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Farmer Bobb (no limit)
        In Hamlet of Egriel. From @, go 2E, 3S, 2E, S, 2E, S, 2E, S, E, N, E, N.
      2. to give 2 of an onion and 2 of a stick of celery and 2 of a large pumpkin and 2 of a juicy watermelon and 2 of a leafy head of lettuce and 2 of a rooty carrot and 2 of a pod of peas and 2 of a leafy cabbage and 2 of a cob of sweet corn to Farmer Bobb (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Forbidden Forest. From @, go E, 2N, W and buy them here.

      Vengeance for a Father [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Jefry
      Level: 23
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Spirited Heights, Horneg's Keep
      Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a Kehohtan cleric (50 minutes)
        In Spirited. From northern @, go S and look around.

      Vengeance for a Widow [Complete]

      Contributed by: JW and Mandroth
      Level: 26, 29, 30
      Difficulty: easy to hard (no death)
      Locale(s): Derah, Catacombs
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find the widow (1 hour)
        In good Derah. From entrance to zone, go all N until "The Towne Fountain." Go W, W, W, S, S, S, open the gate to the east (pick or ethereal), then E, S, E.
      2. to kill 7 of a cave bear (no limit)
        Located randomly in the Catacombs. Recommend going when combs aren't brand new!

      Vengeance for Keros [Complete]

      Additions by: Kernighan
      Level: 27, 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Dark Escarpment
      Total Time: 6 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the ghost of Keros (no limit)
        In Dark Escarpment. From the entrance to the zone ("At the Mouth of a Dark Tunnel"), go 6 W, 2S (hidden exit), 2E. There is a 3 x 3Square of 9 rooms that load "a finger bone" key. Look in the mounds in these rooms for this. Then go all W, N, all W. Unlock the second door with the finger bone key. Go W to the tunnelmaster; get the spiral stone key from the tunnelmaster. (Be sure to remove your light so you don't set the oil on fire!) Then go all E, all N, 2W, N, U. At the top of the stairs is a door to the E that needs the key. Go all E into the group of rooms called "Keros' Workshop." He loads in this set of rooms.
      2. to kill Purgineus the Reclusive (no limit)
        In the coral area in the north of the zone, find a room called "Atop the Dark Knoll." Get key ruins. Then go all E, all U, E, E, S, unlock door S, S, and look around. Purgineus loads here.
      3. to find the ghost of Keros (no limit)
        As above.

      Verifying Nykim's Findings [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Illitic
      Level: 25
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Arcadia, G'dangus, Mount Vryce
      Total Time: 4 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Nykim, Watcher of the Year of the Rooster (1 hour)
        In Arcadia: from the entrance, go all U, all S, W, all S, enter whirlpool. If it is the ice zone, W, S, D, S, W. If it is not the ice zone, recall and try again until you get ice. This may take a few tries.
      2. to find a brass telescope (1 hour, 40 minutes)
        In G'Dangus, on one of the Lighthouse Keepers (there are 3-4). From the entrance, go all N till fountain, then all E, all U in the lighthouse.
      3. [hidden] [to find a room called the Highest Point in Medievia] ()
        From the entrance to Mount Vryce, follow the path to the next intersection, E, follow the path to the next interesection, S, follow path to the end.
      4. to find Nykim, Watcher of the Year of the Rooster (45 minutes)
        As above.
      5. [hidden] [to give a brass telescope to Nykin, Watcher of the Year of the Rooster] (15 minutes)
        As above.

      Verse for Tiabelle[Complete]

      Contributed by: Elagneros
      Level: 16
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): E'nat'dae, El Cantara
      Total Time: 1 hour, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Petre (30 minutes)
        In E'nat'dae. From @, go N to fountain, then W along Cherry Blossom Boulevard and look around.
      2. to give a book of romantic verse to Petre (45 minutes)
        On Madame Miriam in El Cantara, in the room "The Institute of Free Verse". From @, go U, 2N, E, 4N, 2W, N

      Violin Music [Complete]

      Level: 13
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 1 hour
      Objectives:
      1. to find an elderly music teacher (30 imnutes)
        In Med City Mages' Quarter. Recall, enter mage, then go 4W, S, E.
      2. (hidden) to give a mahogany violin to an elderly music teacher (40 minutes)
        A mahogany violin loads in Med City Mages' Quarter. Recall, enter mage, then go S, E, S, S, E, D.

      Volcanic Barbeque [Complete]

      Contributed by: Prosar
      Additions by: Pictus, Fozzebar
      Level: 19, 20, 23
      Difficulty: medium to hard (CPK) - challenging AQ medal
      Locale(s): New Ashton
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Ro the Bastard (1 hour)
        In New Ashton CPK. From south entrance of New Ashton, find Draug with [a gate key]. This is key to the gate all north from south entrance. Once you have key go all north to gate, unlock. Follow path up. You will encounter blocker mob, Ro, the bastard, near top.
      2. to give a hunk of some unknown meat to Ro the Bastard (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In Talqaxtyl's Pyramid. From entrance, go N, E, N, U, S, 2U, 2E, 2N, get meat.

      War Shield For Alamar [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zeela, Helitus
      Level: 26, 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Cliffs Of Berkovic
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Alamar (30 minutes)
        In Med City, in the market area. From recall, go E, E, E, N, N, N, N.
      2. to find a war shield shaped into a gargoyle's face (3 hours)
        In Berkovic on war duke. From entrance, D, all N, E, N, E, N, E,all E, all S, all E, all N, all W, all N, U, all N, E, search, E, D and look around.
      3. to give a war shield to Alamar (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Warm Clothing for a Minotaur [Incomplete]

      Additions by: Ravir
      Level: 24, 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): NaeraMae, New Ashton
      Total Time: 8 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a ragged-looking minotaur (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In NaeraMae. From entrance to zone, go U and S.
      2. to find the scarf of warmth (4 hours)
        In New Ashton. Search for a boy with a pump handle. Kill for the handle (key). From New Ashton recall, then go S, D, 4E, 4S, W, S, E, search, S, search, 2D, 2N, E, N until you see the old woman (who loads the scarf.)
      3. to find a long, fur-lined coat or a large, yellowing coat of zuriorein fur (4 hours)
        a long, fur-lined coat : In Elnissa. From entrance, go 2W, 3N, search, E, 2U, 2S, E, pull lever. Then backtrack to entrance (W, 2N, 2D, W, 3S, 2E.) Then go 2N, W and look for Demesne ("A tall, red-haired woman...") who loads the coat.
        large, yellowing coat: found in Spirited Heights.
      4. to give the scarf of warmth to a ragged-looking minotaur ( )
        As above.
      5. to give a long, fur-lined coat or a large, yellowing coat of zuriorein fur to a ragged-looking minotaur ( )

      Warm Tea for Lizards [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zanthrin

      3. to give 5 of a warm cup to the mayor of Lyryanoth (1 hour)

      Warm the Griffon Chicks [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Level: 21
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Cloud Giants, New Ashton
      Total Time: 3 hours, 55 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the griffon keeper (55 minutes)
        After entering Cloud Giants (N, N, U, U) go: E x 7, S, E, S, E, D, S, E, D.
      2. to find a tunnel dweller (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        In New Ashton. Search for a boy carrying the pump handle, and kill for it. Then, from recall, go D, S, 3E, 4S, W, S, E, search, S, search, D, D, E and N to look for "an old woman" in a room called "The Sloping Tunnel."
      3. to kill 8 of a hollow corpse (45 minutes)
        These are 16-20th level mages, in approximately the same area.
      4. to find a tunnel dweller (10 minutes)
        As above.
      5. to give the scarf of warmth to the griffon keeper (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Warm Up the Minotaurs [Complete]

      Contributed by: Zynix
      Level: 23, 24
      Difficulty: easy-moderate
      Locale(s): NaeraMae, Vanlarra
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a ragged-looking minotaur (1 hour)
        In NaeraMae. From entrance to zone, go U and S. These are in the first part of the zone.
      2. to give 4 of a master's shawl to a ragged looking minotaur (4 hours)
        In Vanlarra; they load on the high mages. From entrance to zone (western @), go all E, open gate, E, N, E, U.

      Warming a Cold Castle [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Thaspian
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate (CPK)
      Locale(s): Goland's Tower
      Total Time: 6 hours, 15 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Dornloth (40 minutes)
        Loads in Goland's Tower. From zone entrance, go 4N (killing guards for key if necessary), E.
      2. to give a heavy woolen robe and a smoldering log to Dornloth (5 hours, 20 minutes)
        robe: on Branae in Naeramae.
        log: loads on Fire Giant King in Fire Giants Keep (stealable.)
      3. to kill 2 of a tower guard (15 minutes)
        Note: these pop in the room with you.

      Warring Wizards [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Arrumar
      Level: 27
      Difficulty: no idea!
      Locale(s): Hornegs Elnissa
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Horneg (1 hour)
        From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2 N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3 S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search, W. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse (Sandril loads here: killing her, a cleric of approx level 20, is optional.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U (Horneg is here.)
      2. to find a mage's vademecum (no limit)
        In Fortress of Elnissa. Loads on Master Mage Mosocula.

      Warring Wizards [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Vashka
      Level: 26
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Horneg's Keep, Fortress Of Elnissa
      Total Time: no limit
      Objectives:
      1. to find Horneg (30 minutes)
        In Horneg's Keep. From Spirited Heights' northern entrance (@), go: 4S, W, 2N, U, W, U, S, U, S, U, E, U, S, 2W, N, 2W, S, W, S. Kill golem for key, or pick gate. Then go 3S, U, 2E, S, W, U, S, E, S, search. Get all sar, get all corpse, drop corpse (Sandril will load here and attack you, but you can flee to avoid fighting her.) Then go E, U, W, wear amulet, U. Horneg is here.
      2. to find a mage's vademecum (no limit)
        In Elnissa, on the shelf gremlin. Note: This objective is NO-DEATH.
      3. to give a mage's vademecum to Horneg (30 minutes)
        As above. Try not to get PKed.

      Watery Deception

      Contributed by: Tasia
      Level: 22
      Difficulty: moderate to very hard (CPK)
      Locales: Lattyrna, Gypsy Camp
      Total Time: 3 hours, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. Find your watery double (1 hour, 40 minutes)
        In Lattyrna CPK, in the NE and NW parts of the zone.
      2. to find an image of yourself (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        At Gypsy Camp. From "Base of the Slope" go E, all S, W, S, W, buy ticket, S, 2W, 3N, give ticket gypsy, 2W, all N. When you kill a fun-house mirror, it will leave an image of yourself on the ground.
      3. to give an image of yourself to your watery double (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Weapons for the Invasion [Complete]

      Contributed by: Syriana
      Level: 20
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Shadowclaw, Dray'mar
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Ventaur, commander of the fortress (2 hours)
        In Shadowclaw. From zone entrance (Undergate), go E, 5U, W, N, open the door to the east and enter.
      2. to give 4 of a Ramentor's shadowy dagger to Ventaur, commander of the fortress (2 hours)
        Daggers load on Ramentors in Dray'mar. From zone entrance, go 2W, S, D. Ramentors are hidden here (they backstab!)

      Wedding Dress Needed [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Tasia
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Med City, Sceptrum
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Mirisia, the seamstress (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter warrior, then go 3W, N.
      2. to find a white silk wedding dress with a ten-foot train and a flowered wedding veil (1 hour, 45 minutes)
        In Sceptrum, in the Lavish Bedroom with the Spirit of Vengence, in a cedar wardrobe.
      3. to give a white silk wedding dress with a ten-foot train and a flowered wedding veil to Mirisia, the seamstress (15 minutes)
        As above.

      Wedding Rings for the Pawnshop [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Kernighan
      Additions by: Pleen
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Trellor, Enara, Crime, Alcordian
      Total Time: 6 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find Randall the Pawnbroker (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go 5S, 2E, S.
      2. to give a truly hideous gold ring and platinum ring set with an ugly yellow stone to Randall the Pawnbroker (2 hours)
        In Enara. From zone entrance (@), go N, 7W, N, W, 8N, open door, 2N, E, open door, 2E, open door, 2E, S, 2E, N, 2U, 2S, E, 2N, W, search, N and look around. Note: this is find-original.
      3. to find a golden ring, set with a sparkling emerald and a diamond wedding ring and a golden ring, set with an onyx gem (3 hours)
        golden ring, set with a sparkling emerald: Loads on Spider in the Crime Underground. From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, then all N until you are in "An Antechamber," then N again. Spider loads here (hidden.)
        diamond wedding ring and golden ring, set with an onyx gem: Load on the hand corpses on the western side of Alcordian Battleground.

        Note: these is find-original.

      4. to give a golden ring, set with a sparkling emerald and a diamond wedding ring and a golden ring, set with an onyx gem to Randall the Pawnbroker (30 minutes)

      Winchel's Need for Flour [Complete]

      Contributed by: Kirgan
      Level: 18
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Medievia, Trellor
      Total Time: 1 hour, 40 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Winchel, the baker (30 minutes)
        In Med City. From recall, enter thief, 4E, 2N, W.Winchel gives you two cookies.
      2. to find Cleo the grocer (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, 5N, W, N.
      3. to give 2 of a round butter cookie, adorned with a chocolate swirl to Cleo the grocer (10 minutes)
        See above. Cookies have been given by Winchel.Cleo gives you a sack of flour.
      4. to give a sack of flour to Winchel, the baker (30 minutes)
        As above.

      Wine For Sigurd [Complete]

      Contributed by: Sutanal
      Level: 13
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Mystara, Trellor
      Total Time: 1 hour, 45 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Sigurd the barkeep (45 minutes)
        In the Whale and Dolphin Tavern in the town of Tanivsport in the Mystara zone. From zone entrance (@), go 2W, S, 3W.
      2. to find Kryor the wine merchant (30 minutes)
        In Trellor. From recall, go E, E, E, E, E, S, E. (Note: Kryor will give you 10 bottles)
      3. to give 10 of a bottle to Sigurd the barkeeper (30 minutes)
        From zone entrance to Mystara (@), go 2W, S, 3W and give bottle Kryor.

        From above, go 5S, 4W, 8S and look around.
      3. to find a gambler (1 hour)

      Wyvern Eggs for Cook [Needs Detail]

      Additions by: Helitus, Shaedehart
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): moderate
      Total Time: 4 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the fire giant cook (1 hour)
        In Fire Giants' CPK. From zone entrance (@), go U, 4S, E, 3S, 4E (yes for CPK), 11N (you might have to get key for gate or pick it), 5 W, 2S, W. Note: For the key, look on the mobs in the area before the gate.
      2. to find 3 of a wyvern egg (2 hours)
        In Bloodstone CPK, in nest near astral phantom. Note: this is no-death.
      3. to give 3 of a wyvern egg to the fire giant cook ( )
        As above.

      Ye Daemon's Forge on Fire [Complete]

      Level: 18
      Difficulty: very easy
      Locale(s): Med City
      Total Time: 1 hour
      Objectives:
      1. to find Olaffson, the head bartender (30 minutes)
        In the Warrior quarter of Med City. From Med recall, enter warrior, then E, E, E, E, S, S, W, W.
      2. to find a room called Upstairs in Ye Daemon's Forge (5 minutes)
        From "At the Bar in Ye Daemon's Forge," go N, W, U, S.
      3. to find a room called The City of Medievia - Castle Square (10 minutes)

      Yellow Paint for Artist [Complete]

      Contributed by: Xianra
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s):
      Total Time: 2 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find a youthful artist (1 hour)
        In the Tower of Reclasta. From entrance ("The Intertwined Oaks"), go 2N, 5E, 4N, E (hidden), E, pick archway, 2E, S, E to Wegik Way and look around.
      2. to give a can of yellow paint to a youthful artist (1 hour, 30 minutes)
        On Yaxley in Enara. From entrance, go 2N, 4E, 4N, E, N, E, N (into NPK), 3E, N, E, 2N, 3W to "Before A Village of Wagons." Then go W and S to find Yaxley.

      Yldari's Revelation [Complete]

      Contributed by: Dima
      Level: 30
      Difficulty: hard
      Locale(s): Yldari,
      Total Time: 2 hours
      Objectives:
      1. to find the Lord of Yldari (1 hour)
        In Palace of Yldari. From entrance, go all N, W, 2N, open gates, all N, E, all N.
      2. to give the History of the Beast to the Lord of Yldari (1 hour)
        Loads on Rofocale in Yldari. From entrance, go all N, W, N till E exit seen then all E till U exit seen. Then go U, E, kill Captain for key. Then go W, D, all W, all S, 2E, S, all E, unlock doors, open doors, 2E, U, N, kill, loot.

      You Are Currently Doing AutoQuest: Turning Off The Lighthouse For Ramarke [Complete]

      Contributed by: Gauss
      Level: 29
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Fury, G'dangus
      Total Time: 4 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour)
        From the entrance to the Fury, go go all N/E/W/S (depending on orientation) then go 2U, E, 7S, W, D, E, N, 3W, 2S. Note: you receive a sack of gems.
      2. to find house servant (45 minutes)
        In G'dangus. From @, go all N, S, 4E, 2N, look around.
      3. to give sack of gems to house servant (5 minutes)
        As above.
      4. to kill 2 of a lighthouse keeper (30 minutes)
        From above, go 2S, 3E, and look around.
      5. to find a room called A Great Lantern Shining Out to Sea (5 minutes)
        From above, go all U.
      6. to kill 5 of a firefly (45 minutes)
        Look around.
      7. to find Ramarke, captain of the Fury (1 hour)
        As above.

      Zalyien's Love Confession [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Zanthrin, Shaedehart
      Level:
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): The Lagoon of Menace, Gypsy Camp, El Cantara
      Total Time: 5 hours, 10 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find Zalyien, the Castle Keeper (2 hours)
        In The Lagoon of Menace. From entrance, go W, S, W. Mob may wander.
      2. to find a dozen long-stemmed yellow roses (30 minutes)
        In the Gypsy Camp. From entrance, follow the path until you reach the ticket vendor. Buy a ticket to enter the carnival. These load on a young man in the tunnel of love.
      3. to find an elegant string of pearls (40 minutes)
        In El Cantara. These load on Madame Chantra.
      4. to give a dozen long-stemmed yellow roses and an elegant string of opals to Zalyien, the Castle Keeper (2 hours)
        As above. (Note: You also receive a blue orb for completion of this quest.)

      Zucchini Bread for the Baker [Needs Detail]

      Contributed by: Zolor
      Level:
      Difficulty: easy
      Locale(s): Riverton, Lumond's Haven
      Total Time: 1 hour, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the baker ( )
        In Riverton. From north @, go S to Emerald Avenue, 6W, N.
      2. to give zucchini bread to the baker ( )
        In Haven. From town square, go 5W and buy them here.
      3. to give a rhubarb pie and a peach cobbler to the baker ( )
        In Haven. From town square, go 5W and buy them here.

      [ ] [Incomplete]

      Contributed by: Jonuv
      Level: 28
      Difficulty: moderate
      Locale(s): Academy of Braneri
      Total Time: 3 hours, 30 minutes
      Objectives:
      1. to find the trading master (40 minutes)
        In Academy. From @, go all N, S, W, 3N and look around.
      2. to give 10 of a pair of skis to Gelia, the ski instructor (2 hours)

      Frequent Pathways

      Find the mayor of Riverton.

      In Riverton, from the north entrance ("North Entrance to Riverton"), go S, S, S, W, S, U.

      Find Basalan, the Mayor of the City of Medievia.
      In the City of Medievia, from recall: W, W, W, W, N, W, N, U, S.

      Find a foreman in the Riverton Mines.
      Enter the Riverton Mines by going south from "The Western Entrance to Riverton." (If the mine is closed, you will have to pick lock or ethereal south.)
      Follow the tunnel south, then all east until you see a down exit. Go down. Go all north, E, E, all south, W, all north, E, S, then down again. Go in any direction a few rooms; you should find a foreman randomly (they are aggro and hard to miss.)

      Find the top of the Dragon Staircase in Castle Med.
      From recall in Medievia, go: all U, all N until "An Intersection in the Chamber of Planes," then W, W, W, N, N, E, E, U.

      Find Pherrance, the Duke of Trellor
      From the top of the dragon staircase, go: S, S, E, E, S, W, W, U, S, S, E, E, E, S.

      Find Crossing of Trails in Ruellia.
      From the zone entrance, go D, all N, W, N, N, D, E, N, E to "Next to the Waterfall." Go U, 6 N, then all east to "Beside the Valley Walls." Search then go east. Go U, N, N, W, U to "A Faint Trail." Go N, W, W, N, N, E, N, U to "Traversing the Glacier." Go E, N, N, N, W, N, N, E, U to "Along the Ridge." Go N, N, D, W, N, D, N to "Crossing of Trails."

      Find the Wizard / Find Marious / Find the War Room in Castle Medievia.
      From Med City recall, go all U, all N until "An Intersection in the Chamber of Planes," then W, W, W, N, N, E, E, U to "The Top of the Dragon Staircase." Then go S, S, E, E, S, W, W, U, S, S, S, W, W, N.

      Find Roqorshon in Goland's Tower.

      From zone entrance to Goland's, go all N. Kill the guard and loot key. Unlock N, go N, 2E to "The Check-In Room." Kill the mob here and loot his key. Then go all W, all N, unlock door N, N, U, 2S, 2E to Tuthluth. Kill him for a key. Then go 2W, N, unlock door E, open door E, E, N, unlock contrapshun, open contrapshun, get all contrapshun. Then go S, W, S, unlock door S, open door S, S, U, 2E to Roqorshon.

      Find the entrance to Esacha Fen.

      From entrance of Enara, go 2N, 4E, 4N, E, N, E, N (into NPK), 3E, N, E, 2N, 3W to "Before A Village of Wagons." From here, go W and look at the mobs in these rooms to find one which has "a swamp fetish." Get the fetish from the mob, then go back to "Before A Village of Wagons." From here, go 2E, U, 4N, 3E to "In the Fen." (Ignore the unkey message!) Go N to enter the Esacha Fen; the fetish lets you pass the barrier.

      Find Baskille, the retired sailor.
      From recall in Trellor, all N, then W.

      Find the satyr/satyr's flute in Fire Giants' Keep.
      From start of the zone, go all U, all S, E, all S, W, then (through an invisible exit) W. Satyrs load in the next few rooms, with flutes. Note: this is a PK, and popular, area.

      Find the hunter in the Preserve.
      From start of the zone ("The Entrance to the Preserve"), go W, W, N, E, N, E, E, N, U, U, N, W, N, W, W, S, S, E, N.

      Find the Ancient Golden Wyrm.
      From Med Recall, go all U then all N until the first room called "A Black Tiled Path." Go E then E again. Open the boulder (if not already open). Then go D, D, D, N, E, E, N, E, N, N, U, W, W. The room is called "A Vast Cavern."

      Find the crossroads in the Crime Underground.
      This room is actually called "Entrance to the Training Grounds" and is a good central location to give directions to many of the named mobs.

      From "The Den of the House," go D, D. Open wall with a key on the thief in that room. Go E, E, S. Open grating with a second key on the thief in that room. Go D, E, E, E, S.

      Find the Prized Boar Tavern in Forest of the Alendora.
      Enter the zone from the north entrance. From "A Winding Trail Delving Into the Alendora," go S, E, E, S, W, W, W, S, S ("The Northwestern Entrance to the Meadow"), E, N, U, U, E, E, S, S.

      From here, a number of named mobs are a few extra steps away.

      Find the High Priestess of Trell.
      From Trellor recall, go U, 2N, U, 2N, U.
      {% endblock %}
